[\[22b.1\]]par shes pa gang yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 
[\[22b.2\]]'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni spong ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang spong ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la spong ba ni dmigs pa dag la med pa'i 'du shes gang yin pa dang /_rlom sems gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni sgrib 
[\[22b.3\]]pa med pa'i ye shes la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes ni mtha' dang mtha' med pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni tshig gi mtshams sbyar ba shes pa la 
[\[22b.4\]]gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang tshig gi mtshams sbyar ba shes pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la tshig gi mtshams sbyar ba shes pa ni smon lam gyi khyad par yang dag par 'byung bas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni des 
[\[22b.5\]]pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang des pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la des pa ni sems can thams cad la phan pa'i gzhi gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni bdud kyi las dang bral ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang bdud kyi las dang bral ba la 
[\[22b.6\]]dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la bdud kyi las dang bral ba ni lta bar gyur pa yongs su shes pa gang yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam 
[\[22b.7\]]dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song gis/_gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba la dgod do zhes 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa las mi 'da' ba gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni chos la skyabs su song gis/_gzhan dag kyang chos la skyabs su 'gro ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin 
[\[23a.2\]]pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la chos la skyabs su 'gro ba ni chos mi spong ba gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni dge 'dun la skyabs su song gis/_gzhan dag kyang dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la dge 'dun la skyabs su 
[\[23a.3\]]'gro ba ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la lta ba gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni nga rgyal med pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang nga rgyal med pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la nga rgyal med pa ni sems can la shin tu gus pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag 
[\[23a.4\]]ni khon du 'dzin pa med pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang khon du 'dzin pa med pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la khon du 'dzin pa med pa ni sems kyi yongs su gdung ba nye bar zhi ba gang yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de 
[\[23a.5\]]dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni tshul 'chos pa med pa 
[\[23a.6\]]la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang tshul 'chos pa med pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la tshul 'chos pa med pa ni zang zing med pa'i sems kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni kha gsag med pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag 
[\[23a.7\]]kyang kha gsag med pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la kha gsag med pa ni sems can yongs su smin par byed pas yongs su len pa gtong ba gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni thob kyis 'jal ba med pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang thob kyis 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]'jal ba med pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la thob kyis 'jal ba med pa ni 'phags pa'i rigs yang dag par blangs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni 'tsho ba yongs su 
[\[23b.2\]]dag pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa ni dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir sdug bsngal gyi yo byad gang mi len pa de ci yang med pa dang /_
[\[23b.3\]]bde ba'i yo byad gang mi gtong ba de ci yang med pa'o/_/bdag ni gcig pur dga' ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang gcig pur dga' ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la gcig pur dga' ba ni 'du 'dzi yongs su spong bar dga' ba gang 
[\[23b.4\]]yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o//_//bam po gsum pa/_'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po 
[\[23b.5\]]yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba ni khams gsum 
[\[23b.6\]]gyis mi skrag pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems chud mi za ba gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu spong ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu spong ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la mnar sems 
[\[23b.7\]]kyi dngos po dgu spong ba ni sems can gyi gnas dgu yongs su shes pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni sems zhi ba nyid la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang sems zhi ba nyid la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la sems zhi ba nyid ni sems kyi yongs su 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]gdung ba med pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni zhi gnas kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang zhi gnas kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la zhi gnas kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba ni sems 
[\[24a.2\]]las su rung ba gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni tshul khrims lhod pa med pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang tshul khrims lhod pa med pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la tshul khrims lhod pa med pa ni cho ga dang /_tshul khrims dang /_lta ba nyams 
[\[24a.3\]]pa rnams las yang dag par 'da' ba gang yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa 
[\[24a.4\]]dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni lha dang mi la mi slu bar gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang lha dang mi la mi slu bar dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la lha dang mi la mi slu ba ni byang chub kyi sems 
[\[24a.5\]]yongs su mi gtong ba gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni sbyor ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang sbyor ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la sbyor ba ni sems can thams cad la phan pa'i dngos po sngon du 'gro ba'i rjes su bstan pa gang yin pa'o/_/
[\[24a.6\]]bdag ni sems dmu rgod ma yin pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang sems dmu rgod ma yin pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la sems dmu rgod ma yin pa ni dul ba dang cang shes kyi sems gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni sems can 
[\[24a.7\]]thams cad kyi slob mar khas len pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi slob mar khas len pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la sems can thams cad kyi slob mar khas len pa ni bya ba ci yod pa la bdag nyid 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]byed pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni sbyin gnas rnams la 'dud pa dang /_phyag bya ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang sbyin gnas rnams la 'dud pa dang phyag bya ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la sbyin gnas rnams la 'dud pa dang phyag bya ba 
[\[24b.2\]]ni sems can thams cad la nga rgyal med pa gang yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[24b.3\]]rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la dam pa'i chos yongs 
[\[24b.4\]]su tshol ba ni sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la skyo ba med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang /_tshul khrims dang thos pa'i tshogs sogs pa dang /_chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson zhing sbyin pa mi len/_ser sna mi gtong /_tshul khrims 
[\[24b.5\]]mi len/_'chal pa'i tshul khrims mi gtong /_bzod pa mi len/_gnod sems mi gtong /_brtson 'grus mi len/_le lo mi gtong /_bsam gtan mi len/_rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa mi gtong /_shes rab mi len/_'chal pa'i shes rab mi 
[\[24b.6\]]gtong /_dge ba mi len cing mi dge ba mi gtong ba gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni chos la gus pa dang bcas pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos la gus pa dang bcas pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa 'gyur te/_de la chos la gus pa dang bcas pa ni chos 
[\[24b.7\]]rnams la nan tan byed pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni chos smra ba la gus pa dang bcas pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos smra ba la gus pa dang bcas pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la chos smra ba la gus pa dang bcas pa ni chos smra 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]ba la ston par 'du shes pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni tshig rtsub po med pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang tshig rtsub po med pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la tshig rtsub po med pa ni phan 'dogs pa'i tshig gang yin pa'o/_/bdag 
[\[25a.2\]]ni gnod sems med pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang gnod sems med pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la gnod sems med pa ni las bya ba la 'jug pa gang yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems 
[\[25a.3\]]dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni sbyin pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa 
[\[25a.4\]]la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la sbyin pa ni chos ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni snyan par smra ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang snyan par smra ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la snyan par smra ba ni 
[\[25a.5\]]zang zing med pa'i sems kyis/_chos ston pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni don spyod pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang don spyod pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la don spyod pa ni gzhan la lung 'bogs pa dang /_kha ton 'don du 'jug pa la 
[\[25a.6\]]skyo ba med pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni don 'thun pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang don 'thun pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la don 'thun pa ni sbyin pa byin nas theg pa chen po la dgod pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni byang chub kyi sems 
[\[25a.7\]]la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang byang chub kyi sems la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad chud mi za zhing gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed pa dang /_'bad pa dang /_brtson 'grus 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]rtsom pa dang /_sems rab tu 'dzin pa dang /_yang dag par 'jog pa gang yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa 
[\[25b.2\]]lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni don so so yang dag par rig pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang don so so yang dag par rig pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur 
[\[25b.3\]]te/_de la don so so yang dag par rig pa ni chos kyi tshul yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos so so yang dag par rig pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_
[\[25b.4\]]de la chos so so yang dag par rig pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa 
[\[25b.5\]]rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni skad bsgrags pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la 
[\[25b.6\]]dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la tshig rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa'i shes pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni spobs pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang spobs pa la dgod do 
[\[25b.7\]]zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la spobs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la byin gyis rlob cing ston pa shes pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni tshig gcig bzung nas phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob cing ston kyang mi ldang ba gang yin pa ste/_'jam 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_
[\[26a.2\]]lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa bzod pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa bzod pa la dgod do zhes 
[\[26a.3\]]dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la kun nas nyon mongs pa ni lus la gnod pa dang /_sems la gnod pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni phongs pa med pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang phongs pa med pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_
[\[26a.4\]]de la phongs pa med pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud mi za ba gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni sems mi 'khrugs pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang sems mi 'khrugs pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la sems mi 'khrugs pa ni dge ba'i 
[\[26a.5\]]rtsa ba thams cad chud mi za ba gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni brtson 'grus la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang brtson 'grus la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la brtson 'grus ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_mi dge 
[\[26a.6\]]ba'i chos thams cad spong ba gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la sems can la dmigs pa'i byams 
[\[26a.7\]]pa ni sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa gang yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni khong khro ba med pa'i sems la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang khong khro ba med pa'i sems la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la khong khro ba med pa'i 
[\[26b.2\]]sems ni sems can thams cad srung ba gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni spong ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang spong ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la spong ba ni dus gsum gyi chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni 
[\[26b.3\]]chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni chos thams cad la mi dmigs shing mi dmigs pa la yang rlom sems med pa'o/_/
[\[26b.4\]]bdag ni dang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang dang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la dang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs ni byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i 
[\[26b.5\]]rjes su 'jug pa gang yin pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa ni sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pas yang dag par bsdus pa'i byams pa dang /_ser sna'i sems tshar gcod pa dang /_'chal pa'i tshul khrims sel ba dang /_gnod 
[\[26b.6\]]sems spong ba dang /_le lo sel ba dang /_rnam par g.yeng ba kun du spyod pa med pa dang /_'chal pa'i shes rab spong ba dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_sems can thams cad la sems sa dang mtshungs pa dang /_theg 
[\[26b.7\]]pa dman pa la mos pa med pa dang /_snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bya ba la brtson zhing sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin cing shes rab kyi rtsa ba las byung ba'i bslab pa dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs la mngon par brtson pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang ngo 
[\[27a.2\]]mtshar gyi 'du shes la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes ni chos thams cad la gnyis su med pa'i 'du shes dang /_spyod pa thams cad la bdag gir spyod par 'du shes pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni 
[\[27a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni bzod pa dang des pa la gnas 
[\[27a.4\]]kyis/_gzhan dag kyang bzod pa dang des pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la bzod pa dang des pa ni ngan du brjod pa dang ngan du smras pa'i tshig gi lam la khong khro ba'i sems med pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni sems zhi ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan 
[\[27a.5\]]dag kyang sems zhi ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la sems zhi ba ni ltung ba gleng ba med pa'o/_/bdag ni chos thams cad dngos po med pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad dngos po med pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed 
[\[27a.6\]]par 'gyur te/_de la chos thams cad dngos po med pa zhes bya ba de ni dngos po'i tshig go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dngos po'i rang bzhin las dngos po med pa gzhan ma yin te/_dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid dngos po med pa ste/_dngos po'i rang bzhin dngos po med 
[\[27a.7\]]pa shes pa des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'o/_/bdag ni chos gnas pa nyid la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos gnas pa nyid la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la chos gnas pa nyid ni chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa gang yin pa'o/_/
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]bdag ni chos la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la chos ni tha mi dad cing mi gnas pa gang yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/
[\[27b.2\]]'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa rnams gzhom pa yang ma yin/_ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa rnams mi gzhom pa yang ma yin no zhes 
[\[27b.3\]]bya ba la zhugs kyis/_gzhan dag kyang ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa rnams gzhom pa yang ma yin/_ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa rnams mi gzhom pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba la gzud do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin las ye shes gzhan ma yin 
[\[27b.4\]]pa'i phyir te/_nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin las ye shes gzhan med pas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin nyid ye shes yin te/_ye shes des ye shes de nyid btsal bar mi bya'o/_/dper na mdzub mo'i rtse mo de nyid kyis mdzub mo'i rtse mo de nyid la reg par mi rung ba de ltar ye shes de nyid kyis ye shes de nyid 
[\[27b.5\]]btsal bar mi bya'o/_/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa yang ma yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtag pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba la zhugs kyis/_gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa yang ma yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtag pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba 
[\[27b.6\]]la gzud do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa yang ma yin/_mi rtag pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba ni rlom sems kyi ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/_/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o zhes bya ba'i ye shes 'di la zhugs kyis/_
[\[27b.7\]]gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o zhes bya ba'i ye shes 'di la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni sems can gdul ba ji lta ba dang /_bsam pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam par gzhag pa las 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]mi 'da' ba gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni gzugs mtshan nyid med do zhes bya ba la zhugs kyis/_gzhan dag kyang gzugs mtshan nyid med do zhes bya ba la gzud do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs ni mtshan 
[\[28a.2\]]nyid med pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/_gzugs kyi rang bzhin las mtshan nyid med pa gzhan med pas gzugs kyi rang bzhin nyid mtshan nyid med pa ste/_gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid med pa shes pa des chos thams cad mtshan nyid med 
[\[28a.3\]]pa'o/_/bdag ni thabs mkhas pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang thabs mkhas pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la thabs mkhas pa ni chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni 
[\[28a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni bsod nams kyi tshogs 
[\[28a.5\]]mi zad pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang bsod nams kyi tshogs mi zad pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la bsod nams kyi tshogs mi zad pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub tu bsngos pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni ye shes kyi tshogs la gnas 
[\[28a.6\]]kyis/_gzhan dag kyang ye shes kyi tshogs la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la ye shes kyi tshogs ni stong pa nyid la mos pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba las byung ba'i las la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang shes rab kyi rtsa ba 
[\[28a.7\]]las byung ba'i las la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la shes rab kyi rtsa ba las byung ba'i las ni bdag nyid chos dkar po la gnas pa gang yin pa'o/_/yang shes rab kyi rtsa ba las byung ba'i las ni gzhan shes rab la dgod pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]ni ting nge 'dzin la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang ting nge 'dzin la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la ting nge 'dzin ni sems med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni so so yang dag par rtog pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang 
[\[28b.2\]]so so yang dag par rtog pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la so so yang dag par rtog pa ni las dang bya ba la 'jug pa gang yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong 
[\[28b.3\]]bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni dbu ma'i lam shes pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang dbu ma'i lam shes 
[\[28b.4\]]pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la dbu ma'i lam ni mtha' rnam par dag pa shes pa gang yin pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mtha'i rang bzhin las dbu ma'i lam gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/_mtha'i rang bzhin las dbu ma'i lam gzhan 
[\[28b.5\]]med pas mtha'i rang bzhin nyid dbu ma'i lam mo/_/bdag ni chos thams cad rtag pa'o zhes bya ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad rtag pa'o zhes bya ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la chos thams cad rtag pa ni mtha' 
[\[28b.6\]]dang dbung med pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad mtha' dang dbung med pa ni 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/_'dus byas kyi rang bzhin las mtha' dang dbung med pa gzhan med pas 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin nyid mtha' dang dbung med pa'o/_/mtha' 
[\[28b.7\]]dang dbung med pa gang yin pa de ni rtag pa brtan pa ther zug pa'o/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas la mchod pa bye brag tu mngon par 'phags pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas la mchod pa bye brag tu mngon par 'phags pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la sangs rgyas la mchod pa bye brag tu mngon par 'phags pa ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la bsnyen cing bsten pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byed cing rnyed pa dang bkur sti byas te/_ci nus kyis theg pa chen po yang dag 
[\[29a.2\]]par skyed cing sbyin pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni chos thams cad 'dus ma byas so zhes bya ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad 'dus ma byas so zhes bya ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la chos thams cad 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba de ni 
[\[29a.3\]]'dus byas kyi tshig go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dus byas kyi rang bzhin las 'dus ma byas gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/_'dus byas kyi rang bzhin las 'dus ma byas gzhan med pas 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin nyid 'dus ma byas te/_'dus byas kyi rang bzhin 'dus ma byas 
[\[29a.4\]]shes pa des chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa'o/_/bdag ni chos thams cad stong ngo zhes bya ba la zhugs kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad stong ngo zhes bya ba la gzud do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la stong pa nyid ni lta bar gyur pa gang yin pa'o/_/
[\[29a.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_stong pa nyid ni lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/_lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin las stong pa nyid gzhan med pas lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin nyid stong pa nyid do/_/lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes pa des chos thams cad 
[\[29a.6\]]stong ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur 
[\[29a.7\]]te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni chos thams cad mthong bar dka' ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad mthong bar dka' ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la chos thams cad mthong bar dka' ba ni rgyu dang rkyen gyi rang bzhin yin 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/bdag ni chos thams cad rtogs par dka' ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad rtogs par dka' ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la chos thams cad rtogs par dka' ba ni dmigs pa dang yid la byed pa'i rang 
[\[29b.2\]]bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/bdag ni chos thams cad rig par dka' ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad rig par dka' ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la chos thams cad rig par dka' ba ni shes pa dang /_shes bya mnyam 
[\[29b.3\]]pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/bdag ni chos thams cad rnyog pa med pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad rnyog pa med pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la chos thams cad rnyog pa med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[29b.4\]]bdag ni chos thams cad mi zad pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad mi zad pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la chos thams cad mi zad pa ni dpe dang dper bya ba'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa'i phyir te/_'jam dpal dbugs 
[\[29b.5\]]'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[29b.6\]]bdag ni chos thams cad mi phyed pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad mi phyed pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la chos mi phyed pa ni chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa'i phyir dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa 
[\[29b.7\]]gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mi phyed pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mi phyed pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mi phyed pa ni nang rnam par dag pa 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni ma rig pa dang 'du byed mi phyed pa shes pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang ma rig pa dang 'du byed mi phyed pa shes pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ma rig pa ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma 
[\[30a.2\]]yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te 'du byed rnams las ma rig pa gzhan yin du zin na 'du byed rnams rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro/_/ji ste ma rig pa las 'du byed rnams gzhan ma yin na de lta na ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu 'grogs par 'gyur ro/_/bdag ni chos 
[\[30a.3\]]thams cad mi rtag pa'o zhes bya ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad mi rtag pa'o zhes bya ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mi rtag pa nyid ni rtag pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/_rtag pa'i rang bzhin las 
[\[30a.4\]]mi rtag pa gzhan med pas rtag pa'i rang bzhin nyid mi rtag pa'o/_/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes ma 'gags pa'o zhes bya ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes ma 'gags pa'o zhes bya ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur 
[\[30a.5\]]te/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes ma 'gags pa ste gnyen po med pa'i phyir ro/_/'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' ni ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa mtha' dang dbung med pa yin mod kyi/_'on kyang dmigs pa'i dbang gis 'di ni khab kyi bu gu'o/_/'di ni bum pa'i 
[\[30a.6\]]nang ngo /_/'di ni nam mkha' tshad med pa'o zhes rab 'bring dang tha mar snang yang ma skyes ma 'gags pa'i phyir nam mkha' la rab 'bring dang tha ma med do/_/nam mkha' ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir te/_de mi rtog cing lhun gyis 
[\[30a.7\]]grub par bya ba 'di lta bu 'di 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang ma skyes ma 'gags pa mtha' dang dbung med pa yin mod kyi/_'on kyang sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang gis sems can gyi 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]bsam pa rab 'bring tha ma rnams la 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'o/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/_/'di ni sems can thams cad kyi go skabs yod pa theg pa chen po zhes bya ba tha dad pa 'byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang 
[\[30b.2\]]ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir de mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba 'di lta bu 'di 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na nyi ma'i 'od ni gnas dang dmigs pa'i dbang gis grib ma sna tshogs su 'gyur yang nyi ma'i 'od ni ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir mi rtog rnam 
[\[30b.3\]]par mi rtog go/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang dmigs pa'i dbang gis ye shes tha dad pa sna tshogs su 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi 
[\[30b.4\]]rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir de mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba 'di lta bu 'di 'byung ngo /_/'di la theg pa'am theg pa ma yin pa ni gang yang med de/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 
[\[30b.5\]]sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa sel 
[\[30b.6\]]ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang sems can gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa sel ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la kun nas nyon mongs pa ni lus la gnod pa dang sems la gnod pa'o/_/bdag ni chos snang ba'i sgo'i shes rab la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag 
[\[30b.7\]]kyang chos snang ba'i sgo'i shes rab la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_'jam dpal de la chos snang ba'i sgo'i shes rab ni chos bzhis 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dad pa dang /_bag yod pa dang /_bsam pa dang /_lhag 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]pa'i bsam pa ste/_'jam dpal chos bzhi po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos snang ba'i sgo'i shes rab 'byung bar 'gyur te/_chos snang ba'i sgo'i shes rab kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba thams cad gcod par 
[\[31a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/bdag ni ye shes snang ba'i sgo'i shes rab la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang ye shes snang ba'i sgo'i shes rab la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_'jam dpal de la ye shes snang ba'i sgo'i shes rab ni chos bzhis 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_
[\[31a.3\]]'di lta ste/_bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs dang /_stong pa nyid la mos pa dang /_sems can rnams byang chub kyi sems la gzhog pa ste/_'jam dpal chos bzhi po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes snang ba'i sgo'i shes rab 'byung bar 
[\[31a.4\]]'gyur te/_ye shes snang ba'i sgo'i shes rab kyis bdud kyi zhags pa dang /_bdud kyi las thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro/_/bdag ni sbyin pa'i bsam pa mi zad par sbyor ba'i shes rab la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa'i bsam pa mi zad par sbyor ba'i shes rab 
[\[31a.5\]]la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_'jam dpal de la sbyin pa'i bsam pa mi zad par sbyor ba'i shes rab ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can ser sna can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ba'o/_/bdag ni tshul khrims kyi bsam pa mi zad par 
[\[31a.6\]]sbyor ba'i shes rab la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang tshul khrims kyi bsam pa mi zad par sbyor ba'i shes rab la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_'jam dpal de la tshul khrims kyi bsam pa mi zad par sbyor ba'i shes rab ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[31a.7\]]kyi sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ba ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang nang du yang dag 'jog la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la nang du yang dag 
[\[31b.2\]]'jog ni lus dang sems dben zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsam pa thams cad la zhum pa med pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni 'dus byas kyi chos nyid la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang 'dus byas kyi chos nyid la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la 'dus byas kyi 
[\[31b.3\]]chos nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa ma yin/_mi stong pa ma yin/_sgro btags pa ma yin/_sgro ma btags pa ma yin/_lhag par byed pa ma yin/_lhag par mi byed pa ma yin/_dngos po ma yin/_dngos po med pa ma yin/_'dus byas ma yin/_'dus ma byas ma yin/_
[\[31b.4\]]mtshan nyid ma yin/_mtshan nyid med pa ma yin/_gnas ma yin/_gnas med pa ma yin/_gnyis ma yin/_gnyis su med pa ma yin/_gdeg pa ma yin/_gzhog pa ma yin/_len pa ma yin/_gtong ba ma yin pa ste/_de ltar 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni 'dus 
[\[31b.5\]]byas kyi chos nyid ces bya'o/_/bdag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos nyid la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang 'dus ma byas kyi chos nyid la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos nyid ces bya ba ni chos de dag nyid la dbyer med pa/_rlom sems med pa/_sgro 
[\[31b.6\]]mi 'dogs pa/_mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos nyid ces bya'o/_/bdag ni yang dag par mthong ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang yang dag par mthong ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la yang dag par 
[\[31b.7\]]mthong ba ni gnyis dang gnyis su med pa la mtshan nyid med par 'jug pa gang yin pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gnyis kyi rang bzhin las gnyis su med pa gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/_gnyis kyi rang bzhin las gnyis su med pa gzhan med pas gnyis kyi rang bzhin nyid gnyis 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]su med pa ste/_de ltar 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par mthong ba zhes bya'o/_/bdag ni zhe sdang med pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang zhe sdang med pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la zhe sdang med pa ni sems can thams 
[\[32a.2\]]cad la phan pa'i dngos po dang /_las kyi bya ba la 'jug pa gang yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub 
[\[32a.3\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi tshul la 'jug pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi tshul la 'jug pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 
[\[32a.4\]]'gyur te/_de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi tshul la 'jug pa ni thabs mkhas pas yang dag par zin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skyes pa yin gyis/_gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin 
[\[32a.5\]]pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba ni bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni byang chub kyi sems la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang byang chub kyi sems la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur 
[\[32a.6\]]te/_de la byang chub kyi sems ni byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po gang yin pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i phyir ro/_/bdag ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos so so yang dag par rig pa la dgod do 
[\[32a.7\]]zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la chos so so yang dag par rig pa ni chos thams cad kyi chos rab tu dbye ba bstan pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni don so so yang dag par rig pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang don so so yang dag par rig pa la dgod do zhes 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la don so so yang dag par rig pa ni chos thams cad kyi rab tu dbye ba bstan pa gang yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam 
[\[32b.2\]]dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par 
[\[32b.3\]]rig pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ni chos rnams la kun rdzob shes pa dang dbyer med pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang 
[\[32b.4\]]spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni chos thams cad kyi don dam pa la mkhas pa'i ye shes gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni dran pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang dran pa la dgod 
[\[32b.5\]]do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la dran pa ni mi brjed pa'i chos nyid do/_/bdag ni blo gros la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang blo gros la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la blo gros ni shin tu rnam par nges pa'i ye shes gang yin pa'o/_/
[\[32b.6\]]bdag ni brtan pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang brtan pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la brtan pa ni sdom pa la spyod pa gang yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs 
[\[32b.7\]]su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni rtogs pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang rtogs pa la dgod do zhes 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la rtogs pa ni mdo las 'byung ba'i dgongs pa khong du chud pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni shes rab la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang shes rab la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la shes rab ni 
[\[33a.2\]]'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la dbyer med par mkhas pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni tshogs la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang tshogs la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la tshogs ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'o/_/bdag ni yongs su 
[\[33a.3\]]gcod pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang yongs su gcod pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la yongs su gcod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/bdag ni thabs mkhas pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang thabs mkhas pa la dgod 
[\[33a.4\]]do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la thabs mkhas pa ni chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa gang yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan 
[\[33a.5\]]yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni 'du 'dzir spyod pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang 'du 'dzir spyod pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de 
[\[33a.6\]]la 'du 'dzir spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni 'du 'dzi med par spyod pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang 'du 'dzi med par spyod pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_/de la 'du 'dzi med par spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang 
[\[33a.7\]]yin pa'o/_/bdag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang zag pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa ni gang la rlom sems 'jug pa'o/_/bdag ni zag pa med 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]pa'i spyod pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang zag pa med pa'i spyod pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la zag pa med pa'i spyod pa ni gang la rlom sems kyi rgyu ba med pa'o/_/bdag ni tshad yod par byas pa'i spyod pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan 
[\[33b.2\]]dag kyang tshad yod par byas pa'i spyod pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la tshad yod par byas pa'i spyod pa ni mtshan ma'i gnas gang yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su 
[\[33b.3\]]sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni tshad med par byas pa'i spyod pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang tshad med 
[\[33b.4\]]par byas pa'i spyod pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la tshad med par byas pa'i spyod pa ni mtshan ma med pa'i gnas gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni tshad yod par byas pa shes pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang tshad yod par byas pa shes pa la dgod do 
[\[33b.5\]]zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la tshad yod par byas pa shes pa ni phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rnam par dpyod pa la mkhas pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni tshad med par 
[\[33b.6\]]byas pa shes pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang tshad med par byas pa shes pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la tshad med par byas pa shes pa ni gang la rlom sems kyi rgyu ba med pa'o/_/bdag ni yongs su chad pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan 
[\[33b.7\]]dag kyang yongs su chad pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la yongs su chad pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'o/_/bdag ni yongs su ma chad pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang yongs su ma chad pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]de la yongs su ma chad pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag 
[\[34a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni rang gi sems 'dul ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang rang gi sems 'dul ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la rang gi sems 
[\[34a.3\]]'dul ba ni bdag med pa'i chos la so sor rtog pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni lus dang sems 'dul ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang lus dang sems 'dul ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la lus dang sems 'dul ba ni sems can thams 
[\[34a.4\]]cad smin par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni bsam pa rnam par sbyong ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang bsam pa rnam par sbyong ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la bsam pa rnam par sbyong ba ni sems can thams cad la rnam 
[\[34a.5\]]par dpyad pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni sems can thams cad la rnam par dpyad pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang sems can thams cad la rnam par dpyad pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la sems can thams cad la rnam par dpyad 
[\[34a.6\]]pa ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni tshogs dag la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang tshogs dag la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la tshogs ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga gang yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 
[\[34a.7\]]'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]bdag ni lus 'dul ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang lus 'dul ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la lus 'dul ba ni lus kyi las kyi nyes pa rnam pa gsum yongs su spangs pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni ngag 'dul ba la gnas kyis/_
[\[34b.2\]]gzhan dag kyang ngag 'dul ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la ngag 'dul ba ni ngag gi las kyi nyes pa rnam pa bzhi yongs su spangs pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni yid 'dul ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang yid 'dul ba la dgod do zhes 
[\[34b.3\]]dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la yid 'dul ba ni yid kyi las kyi nyes pa rnam pa gsum yongs su spangs pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni ser sna'i sems 'dul ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang ser sna'i sems 'dul ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed 
[\[34b.4\]]par 'gyur te/_de la ser sna'i sems 'dul ba ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni g.yo med pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang g.yo med pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la g.yo med pa ni sems can 
[\[34b.5\]]thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa'o/_/de la sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa ni chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i phyir chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa gang yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[34b.6\]]rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o//_//bam po bzhi pa/_'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni le lo'i 
[\[34b.7\]]sems 'dul ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang le lo'i sems 'dul ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la le lo'i sems 'dul ba ni dge ba'i rtsom pa thams cad la zhum pa med pa'o/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas mchod pa la gnas kyis/_
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas mchod pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la sangs rgyas mchod pa ni gang byin gyis brlabs byas nas sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos ston pa gang yin pa de dag la mchod pa gang yin pa ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[35a.2\]]pa la mchod pa'o/_/bdag ni ye shes spyod pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang ye shes spyod pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la ye shes spyod pa ni sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i chos la rab tu dgod pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni 
[\[35a.3\]]ngag gi spyod pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang ngag gi spyod pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la ngag gi spyod pa ni sems can thams cad kyi ngag gi nyes pa yongs su spyod pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni sems kyi spyod pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan 
[\[35a.4\]]dag kyang sems kyi spyod pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la sems kyi spyod pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi nyes pa yongs su sbyong ba gang yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang 
[\[35a.5\]]po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni bdud kyi las sgro btags pa med pa sangs rgyas kyi phrin 
[\[35a.6\]]las la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang bdud kyi las sgro btags pa med pa sangs rgyas kyi phrin las la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la bdud kyi las sgro btags pa med pa sangs rgyas kyi phrin las ni bdud kyi las sgro btags pas sems 
[\[35a.7\]]can yongs su smin par byed pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'o zhes bya bar mos pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'o zhes bya bar mos pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la de bzhin 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]gshegs pa rtag pa ni dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/_/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa ther zug go zhes bya bar mos pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ther zug go zhes bya bar mos pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la 
[\[35b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ther zug ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad rgyun mi gcod pa'i phyir ro/_/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa shis pa zhes bya bar mos pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shis pa zhes bya bar mos pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 
[\[35b.3\]]'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa shis pa zhes bya ba ni mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_dran pa rnams don yod pa'i phyir ro/_/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa g.yung drung ngo zhes bya bar mos pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[35b.4\]]pa g.yung drung ngo zhes bya bar mos pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la de bzhin gshegs pa g.yung drung ngo zhes bya ba ni sku'i mtha' med pa'i phyir ro/_/sku'i mtha' med pa'i rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa'i phyir te/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin 
[\[35b.5\]]pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag 
[\[35b.6\]]ni phan pa'i dngos po la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang phan pa'i dngos po la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la phan pa'i dngos po ni sems can thams cad kyi lus dang sems kyi mi bde ba yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir de sdug bsngal gyi yo byad 
[\[35b.7\]]gang ci yang mi len pa med de/_bde ba'i yo byad gang ci yang yongs su mi gtong ba med pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]'gyur te/_de la mtshan ma med pa ni mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rlom sems ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba yin gyis/_gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba la 
[\[36a.2\]]dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba ni sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni chos la skyabs su song ba yin gyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos la skyabs su 'gro ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 
[\[36a.3\]]'gyur te/_de la chos la skyabs su 'gro ba ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin gyis/_gzhan dag kyang dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la dge 
[\[36a.4\]]'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba ni rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spangs pa gang yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga 
[\[36a.5\]]dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste bdag ni lus mi phyed pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang lus mi phyed pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la lus mi byed pa ni 
[\[36a.6\]]pha rol gyi gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni dad pa mi phyed pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang dad pa mi phyed pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la dad pa mi phyed pa ni las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pa gang 
[\[36a.7\]]yin pa'o/_/bdag ni snyoms par 'jug pa shes pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang snyoms par 'jug pa shes pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la snyoms par 'jug pa ni dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid la 'jug pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]chos mi phyed pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos mi phyed pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la chos mi phyed pa ni chos sgrub pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi phyed pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i bshes 
[\[36b.2\]]gnyen mi phyed pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi phyed pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi slu ba gang yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs 
[\[36b.3\]]su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni chos dang rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang 
[\[36b.4\]]chos dang rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la chos dang rjes su 'thun pa'i chos ni chos la yang dag pa nyid du sgrub pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni ngo tsha shes pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang ngo tsha shes pa la dgod do 
[\[36b.5\]]zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la ngo tsha shes pa ni lus dang ngag gis legs par spyad pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni khrel yod pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang khrel yod pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la khrel yod pa ni 
[\[36b.6\]]yid kyi legs pa spyad pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni yang dag par mthong ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang yang dag par mthong ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la yang dag par mthong ba ni chos thams cad mtha' dang dbung med par 'jug pa 
[\[36b.7\]]gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni rjes su chags pa spong ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang rjes su chags pa spong ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la rjes su chags pa spong ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i mi dge ba'i las mi skyed pa gang yin pa ste/_'jam 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang 
[\[37a.2\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni khong khro ba spong ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang khong khro ba spong ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la khong khro ba spong ba ni dge ba'i las skyes pa rnams chud mi gzon pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni cho ga la 
[\[37a.3\]]gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang cho ga la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la cho ga ni ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par srung ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[37a.4\]]yang dag par srung ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par srung ba ni las kyi bya ba la 'jug pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi gzon pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang gzhan gyi dge ba'i 
[\[37a.5\]]rtsa ba chud mi gzon pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi gzon pa ni byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la gnas pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni stong pa nyid la mos pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang stong pa nyid la 
[\[37a.6\]]mos pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la stong pa nyid ni lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa ste/_lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin las stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin te/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[37a.7\]]rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba'i 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]ye shes la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ni gnyis dang gnyis su med pa rnam par dag pa gang yin pa'o/_/bdag ni chos 
[\[37b.2\]]rnams rten cing mi 'byung ngo zhes bya bar mos pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos rnams rten cing mi 'byung ngo zhes bya bar mos pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la chos rnams rten cing mi 'byung ba ni rkyen rnams mi skye ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[37b.3\]]bdag ni chos thams cad gnas med do zhes bya bar mos pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad gnas med do zhes bya bar mos pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la chos thams cad gnas med do zhes bya ba ni phyogs cha tha dad pa med 
[\[37b.4\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mtshungs so zhes bya bar mos pa la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mtshungs so zhes bya bar mos pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la sangs rgyas nam mkha' 
[\[37b.5\]]dang mtshungs so zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa med pa dang rten pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'o 
[\[37b.6\]]zhes bya ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la sangs rgyas dang /_sems dang /_yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba ni lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir te/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni 
[\[37b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bdag ni sbyin pa las byung ba'i 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]bsdu ba'i dngos po la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po ni bsam pa dang sbyor ba'o/_/bdag ni tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsdu 
[\[38a.2\]]ba'i dngos po la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po ni byams pa dang snying rje'o/_/bdag ni bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsdu ba'i 
[\[38a.3\]]dngos po la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po ni thabs kyis yang dag par zin pa'i shes rab bo/_/bdag ni bsam pa 
[\[38a.4\]]la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang bsam pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la bsam pa ni dge ba'i chos rnams la dad pa dang 'dun pa'o/_/bdag ni sbyor ba la gnas kyis/_gzhan dag kyang sbyor ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa 
[\[38a.5\]]rnyed par 'gyur te/_de la sbyor ba ni dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa gang yin pa ste/_'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[38a.6\]]kyis brjod pa mthar phyin par rig nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ston pa thogs pa med pa gang yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mkhyen pa thogs 
[\[38a.7\]]pa med pa gang yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa khyu mchog tu gyur pa gang yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi kun nas mngon du gyur pa gang yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]la mi 'jigs pa gang yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku mtha' yas pa gang yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul gang yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes gang yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 
[\[38b.2\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi kun du gzigs pa gang yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi grags pa gang yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dbyer med cing mi gnas pa gang yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[38b.3\]]'das rnams kyi sku thogs pa med pa gang yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba gang yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i spyod pa'i gnas rnams gang yin/_sangs 
[\[38b.4\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams gang yin/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam 
[\[38b.5\]]dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mthong bar dka' ba rig par dka' ba ste/_brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing rtog ge'i spyod pa ma yin pa mos par dka' ba ste/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i sems can de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[38b.6\]]'di thos par 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dmus long la mar me mi gzugs kyi/_mig dang ldan pa rnams la mar me gzugs te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[38b.7\]]dpa' chen po gang dag bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa bsags pa de dag gi phyir kho bo 'dri'o/_/gang dag bskal pa grangs med par sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skyes gnas dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du gnas 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]par 'gyur ba'i las tshe 'di nyid la myong bar 'gyur ba de dag gi phyir kho bo 'dri'o/_/gang dag mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byas pa don yod pa de dag gi phyir kho bo 'dri yis ston cig_/kye rgyal ba'i sras chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma mos 
[\[39a.2\]]pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi smras/_kye rgyal ba'i sras skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde bar bya ba'i 
[\[39a.3\]]phyir ston cig_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal de la ston pa thogs pa med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams so 
[\[39a.4\]]so'i gling re rer yang gser gyi kha dog gis 'dul ba'i lha dang mi rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po skar 'od kyi kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[39a.5\]]pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po skar 'od kyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu 
[\[39a.6\]]rin po che'i rgyal po nyi zla mar me'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po nyi zla mar me'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po snang ba thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin 
[\[39a.7\]]gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po snang ba thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ze ba can gyi kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ze ba can gyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor 
[\[39b.2\]]bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu ston 
[\[39b.3\]]pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po brgya byin thogs pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po brgya byin thogs pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyi 'od kyi 
[\[39b.4\]]kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyi 'od kyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chu dang bar byed pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po 
[\[39b.5\]]che'i rgyal po chu dang bar byed pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje'i 'od kyi kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje'i 'od kyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i 
[\[39b.6\]]rgyal po pad ma ral gri kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po pad ma ral gri kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po bai dUr+ya'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin 
[\[39b.7\]]po che'i rgyal po bai dUr+ya'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po an da rnyil gyi kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po an da rnyil gyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]po che'i rgyal po mthon ka chen po'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje'i snying po'i kha dog gis 
[\[40a.2\]]'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje'i snying po'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dpal gyi snying po'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dpal 
[\[40a.3\]]gyi snying po'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dge ba bkod pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dge ba bkod pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal 
[\[40a.4\]]po ma chags pa bkod pa'i snying po'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ma chags pa bkod pa'i snying po'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mu tig dkar po'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams 
[\[40a.5\]]la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mu tig dkar po'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mu tig mthon ka'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mu tig mthon ka'i kha 
[\[40a.6\]]dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mu tig gser lta bu'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mu tig gser lta bu'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mu tig nam 
[\[40a.7\]]mkha'i 'od kyi kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mu tig nam mkha'i 'od kyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i 'od kyi kha dog 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i 'od kyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i 
[\[40b.2\]]kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha 
[\[40b.3\]]dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba 
[\[40b.4\]]rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin 
[\[40b.5\]]gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[40b.6\]]pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[40b.7\]]nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po so so yang dag pa'i rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba 
[\[41a.2\]]rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de 
[\[41a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[41a.4\]]pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[41a.5\]]pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin 
[\[41a.6\]]gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul 
[\[41a.7\]]ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po 'jig rten 
[\[41b.2\]]gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po 
[\[41b.3\]]che'i rgyal po bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin 
[\[41b.4\]]po che'i rgyal po dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/
[\[41b.5\]]nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dus gsum bstan pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dus gsum bstan pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/
[\[41b.6\]]nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mi skyo bar sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mi skyo bar sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa 
[\[41b.7\]]la thogs pa med do/_/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dbyer med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dbyer med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya la dngos po'i dbang gis bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pa 'byung ste/_nor bu rin po che 
[\[42a.2\]]bai dUr+ya ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyis/_'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir de mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems 
[\[42a.3\]]can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dbang gis kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'i mdzad pa 'byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ste/_'jam dpal 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[42a.4\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi ston pa thogs pa med pa'o/_/'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa thogs pa med pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang /_gling re re dang /_rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re dang /_
[\[42a.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor 'jug pa rnams la mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/_/'jig rten gyi khams re re dag gling re re dang /_rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi bsod nams kyi 
[\[42a.6\]]tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/_/de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa 
[\[42a.7\]]med do/_/de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/_/de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/_/de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/_/de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing 
[\[42b.2\]]thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/_/de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la 
[\[42b.3\]]thogs pa med do/_/de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/_/de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi mngon 
[\[42b.4\]]par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/_/de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med 
[\[42b.5\]]do/_/de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/_/de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa 
[\[42b.6\]]rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/_/de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen 
[\[42b.7\]]pa la thogs pa med do/_/de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/_/de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]cad kyi rdul snyed kyi zhing thams cad la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/_/de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa 
[\[43a.2\]]rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/_/de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen 
[\[43a.3\]]pa la thogs pa med do/_/de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i 
[\[43a.4\]]phyir ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_brag phug gi nang nas brag cha sems can gyi sgra rnam pa mang po 'jug pas sgra skad gzhan dang gzhan dag mtha' yas pa 'byung ste brag cha ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog mod kyi 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir de mi rtog
