[\[43a.5\]]cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la yang sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang /_'dul ba ji lta ba de dag gis de lta bu'i skad du ston pa 'byung bar shes te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par 
[\[43a.6\]]mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir de mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa thogs pa med pa mdor bstan pa yin te/_rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par 
[\[43a.7\]]byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa khyu mchog tu gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]re re dang /_gling re rer yang thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam mkha' khyab par 'gengs te/_sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa'o/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs 
[\[43b.2\]]pa'i mdzod spu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang /_gling re rer yang thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam mkha' khyab par 'gengs pa/_sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa/_khyu mchog tu gyur 
[\[43b.3\]]pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa'o/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan re rer yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang /_gling re rer yang thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med 
[\[43b.4\]]pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam mkha' khyab par 'gengs pa/_sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa/_khyu mchog tu gyur pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa'o/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[43b.5\]]khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang /_gling re rer yang thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam mkha' khyab par 'gengs pa/_sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa/_khyu mchog tu gyur pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i 
[\[43b.6\]]bskal par byin gyis rlob pa'o/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu re rer yang thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam mkha' khyab par 'gengs pa/_sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa/_khyu mchog tu gyur pas phyi ma'i 
[\[43b.7\]]mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa'o/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yo byad thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang /_gling re rer yang thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]mkha' khyab par 'gengs pa/_sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa/_khyu mchog tu gyur pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir te/_ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa ni smon 
[\[44a.2\]]lam gyi stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa/_khyu mchog tu gyur pa mdor bstan pa yin te/_rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/_/
[\[44a.3\]]'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun nas mngon du gyur pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang /_gling re re dang /_rdul phra rab re re la ste/_rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi phyogs re re la byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 
[\[44a.4\]]'khod pa ni rab tu mang gi_/'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa dag gi rdul phra rab ni ches nyung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sems can dang /_'jig rten gyi khams dang /_gling dang /_ri rab dang /_ri rab 
[\[44a.5\]]chen po dang /_khor yug dang /_khor yug chen po dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang /_'bab chu dang /_mtshe'u dang /_mtsho bran dag gang la yang gnod pa dang sgrib pa med de/_sngon 
[\[44a.6\]]ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin du bya ba dag 'jug ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/bsam pa ji lta ba dang /_'dul ba ji lta ba'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am 
[\[44a.7\]]ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang 'di ltar kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa gnya' shing gang tsam na bzhugs par mngon du mthong ngo /_/
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bco lnga'i nam phyed kyi dus na 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo thams cad kyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mdun na 'dug 
[\[44b.2\]]par mthong yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 
[\[44b.3\]]gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi sems can bsam pa ji lta ba dang /_'dul ba ji lta ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs par mthong yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir mi 
[\[44b.4\]]rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun nas mngon du gyur pa mdor bstan pa yin te/_rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal 
[\[44b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing yongs su sbyong ba la mi 'jigs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang /_rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[44b.6\]]khams rgya mtsho la 'jug go/_/de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag 
[\[44b.7\]]bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes 
[\[45a.2\]]kyis rnam par sbyong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye 
[\[45a.3\]]shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis 
[\[45a.4\]]rnam par sbyong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye 
[\[45a.5\]]shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni byang chub sems dpa' las 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs 
[\[45a.6\]]med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni sems can gyis bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la 
[\[45a.7\]]ni 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]rgya mtsho la la ni dus gsum bstan pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[45b.2\]]rgya mtsho la la ni mi skyo bar sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni dbyer med pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni 
[\[45b.3\]]gnas gang nas kyang mi g.yo'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mi g.yo ba'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba la mi 'jigs pa mdor bstan pa yin te/_rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin 
[\[45b.4\]]gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtha' yas pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang /_gling re re la ste/_'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 
[\[45b.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brgya stong grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ni ches mang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 
[\[45b.6\]]rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo /_/'jig 
[\[45b.7\]]rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems 
[\[46a.2\]]dpa' rgya mtsho pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/byang 
[\[46a.3\]]chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med 
[\[46a.4\]]pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[46a.5\]]lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta 
[\[46a.6\]]ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[46a.7\]]rgya mtsho rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten 
[\[46b.2\]]gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches 
[\[46b.3\]]mang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho smon lam gyi bye brag rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan 
[\[46b.4\]]dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag ni ches mang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub 
[\[46b.5\]]sems dpa' rgya mtsho bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi 
[\[46b.6\]]khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag ye shes 
[\[46b.7\]]kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]ni rab tu nyung gi_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho pha rol tu phyin pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin 
[\[47a.2\]]gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho 
[\[47a.3\]]sa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag sa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i 
[\[47a.4\]]rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho gzungs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag gzungs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[47a.5\]]pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho ting nge 
[\[47a.6\]]'dzin gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[47a.7\]]khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho rnam par thar pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag rnam par thar pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[47b.2\]]'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho so so yang dag par rig pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag so so yang dag par rig pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan 
[\[47b.3\]]mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mngon par shes pa'i bye brag gzhan 
[\[47b.4\]]dang gzhan thob pa de dag mngon par shes pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i 
[\[47b.5\]]rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho smon lam gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag smon lam gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin 
[\[47b.6\]]gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du sbyar te/_rten pa rnams dang /_ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes rnams dang /_spyod pa rnams dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams dang /_dbugs 
[\[47b.7\]]'byin pa rnyed pa rnams dang /_sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa rnams dang /_tshul khrims rnams dang /_lung bstan pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dag la 'jug pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rnams dang /_sems can gyi 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa rnams dang /_'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rnams dang /_bskal pa la 'jug pa rnams dang /_dus gsum bstan pa rnams dang /_dus gsum la 'jug pa rnams dang /_mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang /_ye 
[\[48a.2\]]shes dbyer med pa rnams dang /_gzungs rnams dang /_sangs rgyas ston pa rnams dang /_kun tu bzang po'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang /_kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos rnams dang /_snying rje chen po thob pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen rnams dang /_
[\[48a.3\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gus par bya ba'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang /_yongs su dag pa rnams dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /_ye shes rjes su rtogs pa rnams dang /_so sor rtogs pa rnams dang /_stobs bskyed pa rnams dang /_mnyam pa nyid kyi 
[\[48a.4\]]tshul gyi lam rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos 'chad pa rnams dang /_kun tu bzung ba rnams dang /_spobs pa rnams dang /_ye shes kyi dbang rnams dang /_gnas med pa rnams dang /_sems mnyam pa nyid dang /_ye shes mngon par bsgrubs pa rnams dang /_
[\[48a.5\]]sprul pa rnams dang /_byin gyis brlabs pa rnams dang /_dbugs 'byin pa chen po rnyed pa rnams dang /_zab mo la 'jug pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos la rten pa rnams dang /_sems bskyed pa brtan pa rnams dang /_the tsom thams cad gcod pa rnams dang /_
[\[48a.6\]]sems bskyed pa rnams dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang /_ltem po ngag la mkhas pa rnams dang /_ye shes rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa rnams dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_zad par gyi skye mched rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams 
[\[48a.7\]]dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_rig pa rnams dang /_rnam par grol ba rnams dang /_skyed mos tshal rnams dang /_rin po che bkod pa rnams dang /_mi bskyod pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa mi gtong ba la gnas pa rnams dang /_
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]rgya mtsho lta bu'i ye shes la 'jug pa rnams dang /_rin po che lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa rnams dang /_rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang /_theg pa chen po'i go cha rnams dang /_rtsom pa chen po rnams dang /_rtsom pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa rnams 
[\[48b.2\]]dang /_mi phyed pa'i dad pa rnams dang /_lung bstan pa rnams dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba rnams dang /_ye shes khong du chud pa rnams dang /_sems bskyed pa rgya che ba mtha' dang dbung med pa rnams dang /_gter rnams dang /_sdom pa rnams dang /_dbang 
[\[48b.3\]]rnam par sprul pa rnams dang /_zhing rnam par sprul pa rnams dang /_chos rnam par sprul pa rnams dang /_smon lam rnam par sprul pa rnams dang /_spyod yul rnam par sprul pa rnams dang /_ye shes rnam par sprul pa rnams dang /_mngon par shes pa rnam par sprul pa rnams 
[\[48b.4\]]dang /_rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa rnams dang /_stobs rnam par sprul pa rnams dang /_rnam par rol pa rnams dang /_yul rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_lus rnams dang /_
[\[48b.5\]]lus kyi las rnams dang /_gzugs rnams dang /_ngag gi las rnams dang /_sems rnams dang /_sems bskyed pa rnams dang /_sems rgyas par byed pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_bsam pa rnams dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams dang /_sbyor ba rnams 
[\[48b.6\]]dang /_mos pa rnams dang /_'jig rten gyi khams su mos pa la 'jug pa rnams dang /_bag chags rnams dang /_len pa rnams dang /_nan tan rnams dang /_'grub pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos la nges pa rnams dang /_theg pa rnams dang /_mi 
[\[48b.7\]]'gyur ba rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa'i chos rnams dang /_nges par 'byung ba'i lam rnams dang /_skyes bu dam pa'i ming thob pa rnams dang /_lam rnams dang /_lam gyi tshad rnams dang /_lam gyi tshogs rnams dang /_lam sgom pa rnams 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]dang /_lam bkod pa thams cad la'ang de bzhin du brjod par bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 
[\[49a.2\]]'khor ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi snod chus gang zhing sgrib pa med pa rnam par dag pa thams cad du snang ste/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag 
[\[49a.3\]]kyang 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na/_'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling re rer sems can bsam pa ji lta ba dang /_'dul ba ji lta ba de dag gis cig car mthong ste/_de bzhin 
[\[49a.4\]]gshegs pa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i sku thogs pa med pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtha' yas pa mdor 
[\[49a.5\]]bstan pa yin te/_rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so//_//bam po lnga pa ste tha ma/_'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni dpes bstan par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_skyes bu mkhas pa gang 
[\[49a.6\]]dag dpe bshad pas don shes par 'gyur ba yod pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_mtsho dpag tshad 'bum phrag lnga pa bya rog gis btung du rung bar mu dang kha da chad du gyur pa/_pad ma'i 'dab mas g.yogs pa zhig yod la/_de la skyes bu la la zhig gis 
[\[49a.7\]]lcags kyi shing rta phang lo rtsib ma stong yod pa/_nam mkha' lding gi mgyogs pa bas kyang lhag pa'i rta de lta bur mgyogs pas shing rta drangs te/_de ltar mgyogs pa'i shing rta drangs nas phang lo la'ang chus mi reg_/rta'i rmig pas kyang pad ma'i 'dab ma mi rdol ba de lta bu'i 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]shing rta des drangs pa las mtsho chen po de nas sbrul gdug pa steng du byung ste/_skad cig gang la shing rta bsgyur ba'i skad cig de la sbrul gdug pa des shing rta de lan bcur bskor te/_'jam dpal skad cig gang gis sbrul gdug pas shing rta de lan cig bskor ba'i skad cig de la dge slong 
[\[49b.2\]]kun dga' bos chos rnam pa bcu bstan pa bshad de don kyang rig par byed do/_/dge slong kun dga' bos skad cig gang la chos gcig bstan pa bshad pa'i skad cig de la dge slong shA ri'i bus chos rnam pa stong bstan pa bshad nas don kyang rig par byed do/_/dge slong shA ri'i 
[\[49b.3\]]bus skad cig gang la chos gcig bstan pa bshad pa'i skad cig de la gnas brtan maud gal gyi bus 'jig rten gyi khams brgyad khri 'da'o/_/gnas brtan maud gal gyi bus skad cig gang la 'jig rten gyi khams gcig 'das pa'i skad cig de la/_de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[49b.4\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi gling re rer dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa las 'pho ba dang /_skye ba dang /_mngon par 'byung ba dang /_dka' ba spyod pa dang /_sbyor ba dang /_byang chub kyi snying por bzhud pa dang /_bdud 'dul ba dang /_mngon 
[\[49b.5\]]par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po dang /_chos gnas pa dang /_chos nub pa dus gcig tu ston to/_/mu stegs can gyi gnas kyi spyod pa dang /_skyes pa'i rabs thams cad du yang dus gcig tu snang 
[\[49b.6\]]ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mkhyen pa thogs pa med pa dang /_gzigs pa thogs pa med pa dbyer med pa dang mi rten cing dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_rin po che bai dUr+ya las dngos po'i dbang gis gzhal du med pa'i bya ba dag 'byung ste/_
[\[49b.7\]]bai dUr+ya ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang 'thun pa'i phyir mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba gzhal du med pa dag 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]kyang sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i dbang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du dus gcig tu skad cig skad cig la mdzad pa gzhal du med pa dag 'byung mod kyi/_'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_
[\[50a.2\]]de mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ste/_ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni 'dzam bu'i gling du snod chus bkang ba sgrib pa med pa rnam par dag pa thams 
[\[50a.3\]]cad du cig car du snang yang gnas nas mi g.yo'o/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du sems can sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par dag pa de dag bsam pa ji lta ba dang /_ji 
[\[50a.4\]]ltar 'dul ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni dga' ldan gnas nas g.yos pa yang med mod kyi/_'on kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du mdzad pa rtsom pa thams cad kyang snang ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mi g.yo 
[\[50a.5\]]ba'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rab dang /_'bring dang /_tha ma'i dbang gis sems can rnams kyi 'du byed rab 'bring tha ma dag 'byung ste/_'du byed ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on 
[\[50a.6\]]kyang 'du byed de dag ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir de mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du rnam par smin pa tha ma dang /_'bring dang /_rab kyi dbang gis sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tha ma dang /_'bring 
[\[50a.7\]]dang /_rab tu mthong ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_sprin las ro gcig pa'i char 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]'bab ste/_bab nas snod kyi bye brag gis kha dog sna tshogs dang /_dri sna tshogs su gyur te/_sprin ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal 
[\[50b.2\]]de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ro gcig ste/_de sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i dbang gis chos kyi dbyings tha dad par snang yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi 
[\[50b.3\]]rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po gang du 'byung ba der lcags dang lcags kyi yo byad rnams mi 'byung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[50b.4\]]'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa gang du byung ba der me'i 'od rnams dang /_glog gi 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo /_/der nyi ma'i 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo /_/der nor bu'i 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo /_/der lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[50b.5\]]nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba'i 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo /_/der rgyal po rnams kyi bka' mi 'byung ngo /_/der rigs bzhi rnams mi 'byung ngo /_/der mi khom par skye ba rnams mi 
[\[50b.6\]]'byung ngo /_/der sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba rnams mi 'byung ngo /_/der mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams mi 'byung ngo /_/der nyon mongs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/der 'khrug pa thams cad 
[\[50b.7\]]mi 'byung ngo /_/der mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dang /_gcer bu dang /_'tsho ba pa rnams mi 'byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan zhing yul chags pa med pa'i phyir rnam par mi 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul mdor bstan pa yin te/_rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal de la de bzhin 
[\[51a.2\]]gshegs pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes ni 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang /_gling re rer skad cig skad cig la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[51a.3\]]pa'i gzugs kyi sku kha dog dang /_rnam par gnas pa dang 'jug pa dus gcig tu 'byung ba dag ni ches mang ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med 
[\[51a.4\]]pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang /_gling re rer sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan dang gzhan dag rtsom par sbyor ba dang /_las dang bzo'i gnas thams cad 
[\[51a.5\]]la sbyor ba dag 'byung ba ni ches mang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[51a.6\]]rab 'byam thams cad na mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i las bya ba thams cad gang ci 'byung ba de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ma 'dres 
[\[51a.7\]]pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_sa la rten/_sa la gnas nas sa bon thams cad dang /_rtswa dang shing gel pa dang /_rtsi dang nags tshal thams cad 'phel zhing rgyas la yangs par 'gyur te/_sa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la rten/_de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi mu 
[\[51b.2\]]stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dang /_gcer bu pa la sogs pa mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'phel zhing rgyas pa yangs par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[51b.3\]]ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_gang dag zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman la reg pa de dag gi zug rngu thams cad 'byin te/_
[\[51b.4\]]zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du gang dag tha na de bzhin gshegs pa ri mor bris pa'am/_glegs 
[\[51b.5\]]bam la bris pa la reg kyang rung ste/_rgyu des de dag gi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi zug rngu 'byin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog 
[\[51b.6\]]cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur te/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni mi rtog_/rnam 
[\[51b.7\]]par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos bstan pa gang 'dod 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du 'gro zhing chos bstan pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa las nyan kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa 
[\[52a.2\]]de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes mdor bstan pa yin te/_rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni 
[\[52a.3\]]'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang /_rdul phra rab re re dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag la 'jug ste/_'jig rten gyi khams re re 
[\[52a.4\]]dang /_gling re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag lnga bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das 
[\[52a.5\]]pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag ni ches mang ngo /_/de bzhin du ye shes kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag 
[\[52a.6\]]bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med pa/_ma 'dres pa/_nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go_/de bzhin du pha 
[\[52a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]gyis rlob pa dag go/_/de bzhin du sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal

[\[52b.3\]]mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go_/de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs 
[\[52b.4\]]pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/_/de bzhin du rnam par thar pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam mkha'i 
[\[52b.5\]]khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/_/de bzhin du so so yang dag par rig pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig las 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med 
[\[52b.6\]]pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/_/de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs 
[\[52b.7\]]pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/_/de bzhin du smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/_/de bzhin du brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par 
[\[53a.2\]]gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/_/de bzhin du dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i 
[\[53a.3\]]bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems 
[\[53a.4\]]dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob 
[\[53a.5\]]pa dag go/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/_phyi ma'i 
[\[53a.6\]]mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/_/de bzhin du sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med 
[\[53a.7\]]pa/_nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/_/de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad cig skad cig la 'byung 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]ba thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/_/de bzhin du bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa las 'das pa skad 
[\[53b.2\]]cig skad cig la 'byung ba thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob pa dag go/_/'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na 'das pa dang /_
[\[53b.3\]]ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho gang dag yod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu re rer 'jig cing chags so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mtha' dang dbung med pa'i chos nyid brnyes pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[53b.4\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa mdor bstan pa yin te/_rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu gzigs pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi sems 
[\[53b.5\]]can 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba dang /_bde 'gror 'gro ba dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs te/_de bzhin du gtsug tor gyis kyang gzigs so/_/de bzhin du mdzod spus kyang gzigs so/_/de bzhin du mtshan re res kyang gzigs so/_/
[\[53b.6\]]de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re res kyang gzigs so/_/de bzhin du spu'i khung bu re res kyang gzigs so/_/de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba dang /_bde 'gror 'gro ba dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba 
[\[53b.7\]]dag dus gcig tu gzigs so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun tu gzigs pa mdor bshad pa yin te/_rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i grags pa ni 'jam 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]dpal de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang /_gling re re dang /_rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag 'jug cing sems 
[\[54a.2\]]kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang /_gling re rer 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa thams cad 'byung ste/_sems can 
[\[54a.3\]]yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob ste/_ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du zhing rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_chos rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_sku rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_smon lam rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_spyod yul 
[\[54a.4\]]rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_stobs rnam par 'phrul pa de lta bu la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thogs pa med 
[\[54a.5\]]pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa dag skad cig skad cig la 'byung ste/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob po/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i 
[\[54a.6\]]phyir ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i grags pa mdor bstan pa yin te/_rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyer med cing mi gnas pa ni 'jam dpal de 
[\[54a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na tha dad la 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gling 'di na tha dad la gling gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa khyim 'di na tha dad la khyim gzhan du gnas pa ma yin 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i ris 'di na tha dad la lha'i ris gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye ba 'di na tha dad la dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye ba gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'gro ba 
[\[54b.2\]]'di na tha dad la [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba 'di na tha dad la sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa'i khams na tha dad la gzugs kyi khams su 
[\[54b.3\]]gnas pa ma yin no/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyer med cing mi gnas pa mdor bstan pa yin te/_rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thogs pa med 
[\[54b.4\]]pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam dag na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag yod pa de dag gi nam mkha' ci 'dra ba'i mtha' ni yod srid kyi/_dus gsum gyi phyogs mtha' yas pa dag na rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'byung ba dang /_'jig par snang ba'i rgyal ba'i gtsug 
[\[54b.5\]]tor gyi mtha' ni phyogs rnams na mi rnyed do/_/de dag gi nam mkha' ci 'dra ba'i mtha' ni yod srid kyi/_de bzhin du rgyal ba'i mdzod spu dang /_de bzhin du mtshan re re dang /_de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re re dang /_de bzhin du spu'i khung bu re re'i mtha' ni phyogs rnams 
[\[54b.6\]]na mi rnyed do/_/lha dang /_mi dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi tshul bstan pa ji lta bus 'dul ba de dag gis chos kyi tshul bstan pa de 'dra ba dag 'byung bar shes te/_de la lha dang /_mi dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis ni gtsug tor las 
[\[54b.7\]]bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/_/kha cig gis ni ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/_/kha cig gis ni pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]'byung bar shes so/_/kha cig gis ni sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/_/kha cig gis ni gzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/_/kha cig gis ni ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag 
[\[55a.2\]]bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/_/kha cig gis ni rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/_/kha cig gis ni so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/_/kha cig gis ni mngon par shes 
[\[55a.3\]]pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/_/kha cig gis ni smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/_/kha cig gis ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/_/kha cig gis 
[\[55a.4\]]ni dbugs 'byin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/_/kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/_/kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs 
[\[55a.5\]]med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/_/kha cig gis ni sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/_/kha cig gis ni 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag 
[\[55a.6\]]bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/_/kha cig gis ni bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/_/kha cig gis ni dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/_/kha cig gis ni dus 
[\[55a.7\]]gsum bstan pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/_/kha cig gis ni mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/_/lha dang /_mi dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis ni gtsug tor nas 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]dbyer med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/_/de bzhin du lha dang /_mi dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa ji lta ba dang /_'dul ba ji lta ba zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag gis sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la de 
[\[55b.2\]]bzhin du mdzod spu dang /_de bzhin du mtshan re re dang /_de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po re re dang /_spu'i khung bu re re nas chos tha dad pa rgya mtsho'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thogs pa med pa mdor bstan pa yin te/_rgyas 
[\[55b.3\]]par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba ni 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag na rdul phra rab kyi rdul 
[\[55b.4\]]yod pa dag ni rab tu nyung gi_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dag ni ches mang ngo /_/de la byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad tsam mo/_/byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bcu dang /_
[\[55b.5\]]nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad brgya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad brgya phrag bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu'o/_/'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[55b.6\]]kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad stong ngo /_/'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad stong phrag bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[55b.7\]]dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag brgya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba phrag stong ngo /_/
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrun ni dpag tshad bye ba stong phrag bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu yod de/_de dag thams cad kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang /_gling thams cad na dus gcig tu 
[\[56a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa nyis 'gyur du mthong ngo /_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa gang la la zhig sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la/_'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi gom pa 'dor bas steng gi phyogs 
[\[56a.3\]]logs su song ste/_gom pa re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor song la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug tshol zhing /_de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi bskal pa rgya mtshor song yang der yang de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[56a.4\]]nyis 'gyur du mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba mdor bstan pa yin te/_rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/_/'jam 
[\[56a.5\]]dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa spyod pa'i gnas rnams ni 'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung gi_/'jig rten gyi khams re re dang /_gling re re dang /_rdul phra 
[\[56a.6\]]rab kyi rdul re re la de bzhin gshegs pa sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa spyod pa'i gnas rnams ni ches mang ngo /_/'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang /_gling re re dang /_rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la de bzhin gshegs pa sems can yongs su smin par mdzad 
[\[56a.7\]]pa spyod pa'i gnas ji snyed pa de bas ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las 'od zer gyi rgya mtsho 'byung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su sgrogs pa dag ches mang ngo /_/sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la de bzhin du gtsug tor dang /_mdzod spu dang /_mtshan re re dang /_
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]dpe byad bzang po re re dang /_spu'i khung bu re re nas zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho dag 'byung ste/_de la 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/_/'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa 
[\[56b.2\]]rjes su sgrog go/_/'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rjes su sgrog go/_/'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni sa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/_/'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/_/'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni rnam 
[\[56b.3\]]par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/_/'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/_/'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/_/'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni smon lam rgya mtsho 
[\[56b.4\]]grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/_/'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/_/'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/_/'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa 
[\[56b.5\]]rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/_/'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/_/'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni sems can gyi bsam pa dang /_spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/_/'od 
[\[56b.6\]]zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/_/'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/_/'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su 
[\[56b.7\]]sgrog go/_/'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni dus gsum bstan pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/_/'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/_/'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni ye shes tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]rjes su sgrog ste/_thogs pa med pa/_sgrib pa med pa/_dbyer med pa/_nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis rlob po/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa 
[\[57a.2\]]spyod pa'i gnas rnams mdor bstan pa yin te/_rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa la mi 'jigs pa ni/_'jam dpal de bzhin 
[\[57a.3\]]gshegs pa skad cig skad cig la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rgya mtsho dag dus gcig tu rdul gcig la yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/de la sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni bsod nams kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya 
[\[57a.4\]]mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni ye shes kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni pha rol tu phyin pa tha dad 
[\[57a.5\]]pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni sa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni gzungs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med 
[\[57a.6\]]pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni rnam par thar pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs 
[\[57a.7\]]med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni so so yang dag par rig pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/sems can rgya mtsho 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]kha cig ni mngon par shes pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni smon lam tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/
[\[57b.2\]]sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su 
[\[57b.3\]]smin par mdzad do/_/sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med 
[\[57b.4\]]pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni sems can gyi bsam pa dang /_spyod pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/sems can rgya mtsho 
[\[57b.5\]]kha cig ni 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni bskal pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par 
[\[57b.6\]]mdzad do/_/de bzhin du dus gsum la 'jug pa dang /_dus gsum bstan pa dang /_mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dbyer med pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/de bzhin du sems can rnam par sprul pa dang /_zhing rnam par sprul pa dang /_chos rnam 
[\[57b.7\]]par sprul pa dang /_lus rnam par sprul pa dang /_smon lam rnam par sprul pa dang /_spyod yul rnam par sprul pa dang /_ye shes rnam par sprul pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnam par sprul pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa dang /_stobs rnam par sprul 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]pas rnam par rol pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la/_sems can rgya mtsho zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag rdul gcig la yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs 
[\[58a.2\]]pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa la mi 'jigs pa mdor bstan pa yin te/_rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa rgya mtsho 
[\[58a.3\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can dag la nyin gcig bzhin lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis dge 
[\[58a.4\]]bsnyen ston pa gzhan la mi rten pa/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa gcig la 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bslab pa la bslabs pa'o snyam du bsams nas nyin gcig zan cig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal 
[\[58a.5\]]rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du dge bsnyen ston pa gzhan la mi rten pa/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang 
[\[58a.6\]]ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis dge slong gcig la nyin gcig zan byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_
[\[58a.7\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa rgya mtsho gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dge slong dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_rigs kyi 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis dad pas rjes su 'brang ba gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 
[\[58b.2\]]du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig chos kyi rjes su 'brang 
[\[58b.3\]]ba gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi chos kyi 
[\[58b.4\]]rjes su 'brang ba dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis brgyad pa gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/_'di ni 
[\[58b.5\]]de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi brgyad pa dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang 
[\[58b.6\]]ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis rgyun du zhugs pa gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/
[\[58b.7\]]'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rgyun du zhugs pa dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi 
[\[59a.2\]]bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi lan cig phyir 'ong ba dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa 
[\[59a.3\]]bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis phyir mi 'ong ba gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 
[\[59a.4\]]bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi phyir mi 'ong ba dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi 
[\[59a.5\]]bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis dgra bcom pa gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi 
[\[59a.6\]]khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dgra bcom pa dag la nyin bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis rang sangs rgyas gcig la nyin gcig 
[\[59a.7\]]zan cig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis sangs rgyas ri mor bris pa'am/_gzugs su byas pa mthong na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed 
[\[59b.2\]]na/_thal mo sbyor ba'am/_me tog gam/_bdug pa'am/_spos sam/_mar me 'bul ba lta ci smos te/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang 
[\[59b.3\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa phul ba dang /_de bzhin du lha'i na bza' rnams phul pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs 
[\[59b.4\]]kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis tha na phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gcig la sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung bas yongs su 'dzin te/_tha na nyin gcig zan cig byin na yang 'di ni de bas ches bsod 
[\[59b.5\]]nams grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig 
[\[59b.6\]]bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis glang po che'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i 
[\[59b.7\]]rtsa ba ci yang rung bas yongs su 'dzin te/_tha na nyin gcig zan cig byin na yang 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du glang po che'i 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi 
[\[60a.2\]]bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis zla ba dang nyi ma'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung bas yongs su 'dzin te/_tha na nyin gcig zan cig byin na yang 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par 
[\[60a.3\]]skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du zla ba dang /_nyi ma'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin 
[\[60a.4\]]du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/_
[\[60a.5\]]'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul 
[\[60a.6\]]snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa sbyin pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub 
[\[60a.7\]]sems dpa' gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang /_de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig 
[\[60b.2\]]gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_klog pa 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/bzlog ste bsti stang ma byas pa'i mi dge ba'i las kyang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba 
[\[60b.3\]]dang /_ra'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang /_glang po che'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang /_zla ba dang nyi ma'i shing rta lta bus 'gro ba dang /_nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'ang de bzhin te/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'jig rten 
[\[60b.4\]]gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi bar chad byas pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro 
[\[60b.5\]]ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad byed cing khro ba dang brnyas pa'i sems skyed na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[60b.6\]]mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi mig phyung nas bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa'i sems bskyed 
[\[60b.7\]]de gshe ba dang /_mi snyan par smra ba dang /_rnyogs par byed na/_'di ni de bas ches sdig pa mang du skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la rkyen ci yang rung bas brnyas pa bskyed de spyos na/_de mi dge 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]ba'i las des sems can dmyal ba ngu 'bod chen por lus dpag tshad lnga brgya par skye bar 'gyur te/_de la mgo lnga brgya yod par 'gyur ro/_/de'i mgo re re la yang kha lnga brgya lnga brgya yod par 'gyur/_de'i kha re re la yang lce lnga brgya lnga brgya yod par 
[\[61a.2\]]'gyur te/_lce re re la yang gshol lnga brgya lnga brgyas rmo bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su skyes pa'i sems can thams cad la dbyug pa dang mtshon gyis 
[\[61a.3\]]bsnun te bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa'i sems bskyed nas khro ba dang /_gnod sems dang /_tha ba dang /_khros pa'i sems skyed na/_'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs 
[\[61a.4\]]med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sdang ba'i sems kyis sems can rnams la gnod par 'dod cing /_'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang /_gling re re na dgra 
[\[61a.5\]]bcom pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi srog gcad pa dang /_rin po che'i mchod rten rin po che'i stegs bus yongs su bskor cing gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan btsugs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bshig pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 
[\[61a.6\]]'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po nyid la sgro btags te brnyas pa'i sems bskyed nas/_rkyen cis kyang rung /_khro ba dang /_gshe ba dang /_mi snyan par zer ba dang /_khyad du gsod par byed na/_
[\[61a.7\]]'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las de bzhin gshegs pa nges par 'byung ba'i phyir te/_de ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin no/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' la skur pa 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]des chos spangs pa yin no/_/chos kyang gzhan la chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' nyid chos so/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig khros nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 
[\[61b.2\]]gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad btson ra mun gnag dag tu bcug pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la khros te/_byang chub sems dpa' la rgyab kyis phyogs shing 'dug nas ma rungs pa 'di mi blta'o zhes zer na/_'di ni de bas ches sdig 
[\[61b.3\]]pa grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/_gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu yang rung ba la smad na/_'di 
[\[61b.4\]]ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_ri'i rgyal po chen po ri rab kyis 'di lta ste/_mtho ba dang /_yangs pa dang che bas ri thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge'o/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du 
[\[61b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pas kyang /_'di lta ste/_mtho ba dang /_yangs pa dang /_che bas phyogs bcu dag na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma mos pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed yod pa dag gi dge 
[\[61b.6\]]ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa lnga las byung ba/_bskal pa grangs med par bsags pa zil gyis mnan nas lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge'o/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems 
[\[61b.7\]]can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la bkod pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis phung po med pa'i gzhi la mos na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal gal te sems can 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]thams cad phung po med pa'i gzhi la mos par gyur pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos la/_mos nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_klog pa dang /_
[\[62a.2\]]klog tu 'jug pa dang /_tha na glegs bam du bris pa la mos nas 'dzin par byed cing mar me dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa rnams kyis mchod par byed na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam 
[\[62a.3\]]dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dag_/nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa re re'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhal du 
[\[62a.4\]]med pa grangs med pa rnams dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang /_lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud gsan pa bas/_gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig chud zos par byas na/_'di 
[\[62a.5\]]ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed na/_gshe ba dang /_mi snyan par smra ba lta ci smos/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis mchod rten gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bshig pa dang /_bsregs pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am/_
[\[62a.6\]]rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems dang /_tha ba dang /_khro ba'i sems bskyed de/_gshe ba dang /_mi snyan par smras na/_'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[62a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nges par byung la/_sangs rgyas las mchod rten rnams byung zhing /_sangs rgyas las 'jig rten thams cad dang /_lha'i ris thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad byung la/_sangs rgyas kyang 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' las byung bas na/_byang chub sems dpa' la bsti stang ma byas pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la bsti stang ma byas pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' la bsti stang byas pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la bsti stang byas pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[62b.2\]]la mchod pa bla na med pas mchod pa byed 'dod pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod par bya'o/_/'jam dpal gal te grong khyer la la zhig na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya'am/_bye ba stong ngam/_bye ba brgya stong ngam/_gzhal du med pa grangs med pa dag yod la/_chos 
[\[62b.3\]]kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma mos na de dag gi las ni rgyal pos 'khrug par 'gyur ba'am/_chus 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las sam/_chom rkun gyis 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las sam/_mu ges 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las sam/_mes 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las 
[\[62b.4\]]sam/_kla klos 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las su 'gyur ro/_/grong khyer chen po de na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yod na de'i las ni bskal pa grangs med par mtshams med pa'i gnas su skye bar mi 'gyur/_grong khyer der 'khrug par 
[\[62b.5\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' de dag las rgyal pos 'khrug par 'gyur ba mi 'byung /_chus 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung /_chom rkun gyis 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung /_mu ges 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung /_mes 
[\[62b.6\]]'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung /_kla klos 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung la/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i las bskal pa rgya mtsho grangs med par sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar 
[\[62b.7\]]'gyur ba yod na der 'khrug par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i las bskal pa grangs med/_brjod du med par mtshams med par skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_de'i las bskal pa bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cur ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba yang tshe 'di la myong 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]ste/_'khrug pas byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bsod nams chen po'i tshogs bsags pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_rgyar dpag tshad brgya pa'i rdzing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang la dug srang stong yang mi gdug 
[\[63a.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chu'i phung po chen pos rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du bskal pa grangs med par sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi nang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i las rab tu mang ba yang rnam par smin par mi 'gyur 
[\[63a.3\]]ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams dang /_lha dang /_
[\[63a.4\]]mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan 
[\[63a.5\]]po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D202}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ni ya ta a ni ya ta ga ti mu drA a ba tA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_
[\[63a.6\]]bod skad du/_'phags pa nges pa dang ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i 
[\[63a.7\]]khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu la 'di lta ste/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_mthu chen thob 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]dang /_sman gyi rgyal po dang /_sman gyi yang dag 'phags dang /_mchod rten mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra skad rgyal po dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu thams cad kyang rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin 
[\[63b.2\]]la gnas pa/_zab cing brtan pa'i chu'i rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa/_dbang bskur ba'i gzungs thob pa/_sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa'i gzungs thob pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[63b.3\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya gang gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges te/_bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir ldog par 'gyur ba'o/_/
[\[63b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges te/_bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir mi ldog pa'o zhes bgyi bar bdag gis 'tshal bar 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nges pa dang ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag 
[\[63b.5\]]rgya la 'jug pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni lnga po 'di dag
