[\[63b.6\]]yin te/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang /_glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang /_zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu dang /_nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba 
[\[63b.7\]]lta bu ste/_'jam dpal lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba yin no/_/'jam dpal de la byang chub sems dpa' gnyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges pa'i 'gro ba pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' gsum ni bla 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i 'gro ba pa yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges pa'i 'gro ba pa bla na med pa'i ye shes 
[\[64a.2\]]kyi lam las slar ldog pa dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang /_glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu yin te/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' 'di gnyis ni 
[\[64a.3\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges te/_bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir ldog pa yin no/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu 
[\[64a.4\]]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa 'di gsum ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges te/_bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir mi ldog pa yin no/_/'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub 
[\[64a.5\]]sems dpa' phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/_'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga brgya'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams 'da' bar 'dod la/_der yang de'i bya ba dang /_
[\[64a.6\]]bya ba chen po dang /_don dang /_don chen po dang /_ched che ba dang /_ched che rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis bzhon pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo/_/de yang 'di snyam du dpyod de/_ma la bdag phyugs kyi shing 
[\[64a.7\]]rta la zhon la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya gor ma chag snyam ste/_'jam dpal mi de phyugs kyi shing rta la zhon te lam der zhugs nas/_de yun ring zhing dus ring mo zhig na dpag tshad brgyar phyin pa las/_de rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos de nas bzlog nas dpag 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]tshad brgyad cur phyir ded de phul na 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems mi des bskal pa gcig gam/_bskal pa brgya'am/_bskal pa stong ngam/_bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum mam/_bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' ba'am/_
[\[64b.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus sam/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni gnas ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ni skabs ma mchis te/_phyugs kyi shing rta la 'tshal ba'i mi des bskal pa gcig gam/_bskal pa brgya'am/_
[\[64b.3\]]bskal pa stong ngam/_bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum mam/_bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus pa de ni gnas ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin 
[\[64b.4\]]du rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la theg pa chen po mi 'dzin mi klog par nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas te/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la snyen cing sten la bsnyen bkur byed 
[\[64b.5\]]cing de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed la kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed la/_kun dga' ra ba'am/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par byed/_nyan thos kyi theg pa klog cing kha ton byed/_dpyod cing khong du chud par byed la gzhan dag 
[\[64b.6\]]kyang klog tu 'jug pa nas khong du chud pa'i bar du byed na/_de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des shes rab rtul por 'gyur te/_bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir 'dren cing phyir zlog go/_/byang chub sems dpa' de'i 
[\[64b.7\]]byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab kyi mig gang yin pa de yang de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed cing nyams par byed do/_/'jam dpal dper na mi la 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]la zhig mig nad kyis mig zums par gyur nas/_de mig dbye ba dang gzums su rung bar bya ba'i phyir zla ba gcig gi bar du dpyad byas te/_zla ba gcig lon nas mig 'byed cing 'dzums par byed pa las/_de'i dgra'am/_mi mdza' ba gzhan zhig 
[\[65a.2\]]gis pi pi ling gi phye ma spar gang gis mig bkang nas de yang long bar byas pa de bzhin du/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab kyi mig gang yin pa de yang de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin 
[\[65a.3\]]cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed cing nyams par byed de/_'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' phyugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i shing rtas 
[\[65a.4\]]'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/_'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/_der yang de'i bya ba dang /_bya ba chen po dang /_don dang /_don chen po dang /_ched che ba dang /_ched che rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[65a.5\]]bdag gis bzhon pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo/_de yang 'di snyam du spyod de/_ma la bdag glang po che'i shing rta yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la zhon te 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya gor ma chag snyam nas/_'jam dpal mi 
[\[65a.6\]]de glang po che'i shing rta yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la zhon te lam der zhugs nas/_de lo brgyas dpag tshad nyis stong du son pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos de nas phyir phul te bzlog na/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_glang po che'i shing rta la zhon pa'i mi des 
[\[65a.7\]]bskal pa gcig gam/_bskal pa brgya'am/_bskal pa stong ngam/_bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum mam/_bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus sam/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni gnas 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ni skabs ma mchis te/_glang po che'i shing rta 'tshal ba'i mi des bskal pa gcig gam/_bskal pa brgya'am/_bskal pa stong ngam/_bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum mam/_bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 
[\[65b.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus pa de ni gnas ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la nyan thos 
[\[65b.3\]]kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig gnas te/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la snyen cing sten la bsnyen bkur byed cing de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed la kun spyod cing longs spyod par byed la/_kun dga' ra ba'am/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par 
[\[65b.4\]]gnas par byed/_nyan thos kyi theg pa klog cing kha ton byed/_dpyod cing khong du chud par byed la gzhan dag kyang klog tu 'jug par byed cing kha ton byed du 'jug la yongs su sbyong bar byed du 'jug na de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du 
[\[65b.5\]]byed pa des shes rab rtul por 'gyur te/_bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir 'dren cing phyir zlog go/_/byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab 
[\[65b.6\]]kyi mig gang yin pa de yang de'i nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed cing nyams par byed do/_/'jam dpal dper na shing gi sdong po chen po srid du dpag tshad stong pa zhig yod la/_de yang rgya 
[\[65b.7\]]mtsho chen pos khyer ba las bar snang la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dag gis de rgya mtsho chen po'i lam las phyir phul te bzlog nas/_de la lcags kyi gar bu dpag tshad lnga stong yod pa zhig btags na/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_shing gi sdong po 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]chen po de rgya mtsho chen po la 'gro ba 'am/_sems can bsgral ba'i phyir spyad par nus sam/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub 
[\[66a.2\]]sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi shing chen po yang nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho las phyir phul zhing bzlog ste/_thams 
[\[66a.3\]]cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtshor 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur/_'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las kyang sems can rnams sgrol mi nus te/_'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/'jam dpal ji ltar 
[\[66a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma dang zla bas 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/_'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/_der yang de'i bya ba dang /_bya ba chen po dang /_don dang /_don chen po dang /_ched che ba dang /_ched 
[\[66a.5\]]che rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo/_/de yang 'di snyam du dpyod de/_ma la bdag gis nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya gor ma 
[\[66a.6\]]chag snyam nas/_'jam dpal mi de nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas lam der zhugs na/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_mi des nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar nus sam/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rngo 
[\[66a.7\]]thogs lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa rgyud de'i lo dus ring mo zhig gis rngo thogs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]sems bskyed la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la mi snyen cing mi sten la/_bsnyen bkur mi byed nyan thos kyi theg pa pa de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par mi byed/_kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par mi byed/_kun dga' ra ba 
[\[66b.2\]]'am/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par mi byed la/_nyan thos kyi theg pa klog par mi byed/_kha ton mi byed/_sems par mi byed la/_gzhan dag kyang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang klog tu 'jug par mi byed/_kha 
[\[66b.3\]]ton byed du 'jug par mi byed de/_de gang klog pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na klog la/_gang ston pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na ston na/_'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/'jam dpal dper na nam mkha' 
[\[66b.4\]]lding gi dbang po'i rgyal po chen po lang tsho dang /_stobs dang /_mthu chen po thob pa ni 'dod na ri rab kyi rtse mo nas ri rab kyi rtse mor 'gro'o/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_bsam pa dang 
[\[66b.5\]]lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang /_lang tsho dang /_mthu chen po thob pa yang 'dod na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su ston par byed do/_/'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[66b.6\]]nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/_'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/_der yang de'i bya ba dang /_bya ba chen po dang /_don dang /_don chen po dang /_ched che ba dang /_ched che 
[\[66b.7\]]rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo/_/de yang 'di snyam du dpyod de/_ma la bdag nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya'o snyam na/_'jam 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_mi des nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar nus sam/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rngo thogs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de 
[\[67a.2\]]bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la mi snyen mi sten cing bsnyen bkur mi byed la/_nyan thos 
[\[67a.3\]]kyi theg pa pa de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par mi byed/_kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par mi byed/_kun dga' ra ba'am/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par mi byed la nyan thos kyi theg pa klog par mi byed/_kha ton mi byed/_dpyod 
[\[67a.4\]]cing khong du chud par mi byed la/_gzhan dag kyang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang klog tu 'jug par mi byed/_kha ton byed du 'jug par mi byed de/_de gang klog pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na klog la/_gang ston pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na ston 
[\[67a.5\]]cing de theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang /_theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams la gus pa dang bcas/_zhe sa dang bcas par byed cing der gzhol/_der 'bab/_der bab la/_de dag dang lhan cig tu 
[\[67a.6\]]gnas te/_de dag la snyen cing sten la bsnyen bkur byed/_de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed/_kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed/_de dag dang kun dga' ra ba'am/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par byed la/_de theg 
[\[67a.7\]]pa chen po yongs su tshol zhing sdud la 'chang bar byed/_mar me dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dag gis mchog tu gus par mchod par byed/_de theg pa chen po klog cing kha ton byed la/_dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]bas lung 'bogs par byed/_ma bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brnyas pa'i sems mi skyed/_bzhin 'dzum pa dang gsong por smra la/_tshig mi brlang mi gtum mi rtsub pa dang /_dga' ba dang snyan par smra zhing /_de srog gi phyir yang theg pa chen po mi spong 
[\[67b.2\]]la de theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang /_theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams la ci nus ci lcogs kyis snying nas lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su 'dzin par byed cing /_de su dang yang lhan cig 'gyed 
[\[67b.3\]]pa dang rtsod par mi byed la/_de sngon ma byung ba dang ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams tshol ba'i rang bzhin can yin zhing /_gang dag las thos pa de dag la ston pa la gus pa drag po lta bu skyed par byed/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la ma 
[\[67b.4\]]bslabs pa dag la khyad du gsod par mi byed/_nyes pa bden pa dang mi bden pas gzhan dag la gleng bar mi byed la/_nyes pa gzhan gyi 'khrul pa yang mi tshol zhing byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms la slob pa 'di ni 'jam dpal 
[\[67b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/_'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig 'jig rten 
[\[67b.6\]]gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/_der yang de'i bya ba dang /_bya ba chen po dang /_don dang /_don chen po dang /_ched che ba dang /_ched che rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag myur 
[\[67b.7\]]du 'da' bar bya snyam mo/_/de yang 'di snyam du dpyod de/_ma la bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba gdab gor ma chag snyam nas/_'jam dpal mi de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song nas 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]gsol ba btab ste/_bcom ldan 'das bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga brgya'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' bar 'tshal te/_der yang bdag gis bgyi ba dang /_bgyi ba chen po dang /_don dang /_don chen po dang /_ched che 
[\[68a.2\]]ba dang /_ched che rab cig mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas la/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas kyang mi de 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar mdzad na/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du 
[\[68a.3\]]sems/_de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag myur du 'da' bar mdzad spyod dam/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das spyod lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa spyod lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam 
[\[68a.4\]]dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas te/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la mi snyen mi sten cing bsnyen bkur 
[\[68a.5\]]mi byed la/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa de dag dang lhan cig 'dris par mi byed/_kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par mi byed/_kun dga' ra ba'am/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par mi byed la/_nyan thos kyi theg pa klog 
[\[68a.6\]]par mi byed/_kha ton mi byed/_dpyod cing khong du chud par mi byed la/_gzhan dag kyang tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang klog tu 'jug par mi byed/_kha ton byed du 'jug par mi byed de/_de gang klog pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na klog_/gang kha 
[\[68a.7\]]ton byed pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na kha ton byed/_gang ston pa de yang theg pa chen po kho na ston cing de lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid yongs su dag la/_tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dge ba'i chos can yin la/_gzhan dag kyang lus dang /_ngag dang /_
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]yid yongs su dag pa la dgod/_tshul khrims dang /_dge ba'i chos can la dgod/_theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang /_theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams la gus pa dang bcas/_zhe sa dang 
[\[68b.2\]]bcas par byed la/_der gzhol/_der 'bab/_der bab cing de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas te/_de dag la snyen cing sten la bsnyen bkur byed cing de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed/_kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed la/_de dag dang kun dga' ra ba'am/_gtsug 
[\[68b.3\]]lag khang ngam/_'chag sar spyod yul 'thun par gnas par byed/_de theg pa chen po yongs su tshol zhing sdud la 'chang bar byed/_mar me dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dag gis mchog tu gus pa drag pos mchod 
[\[68b.4\]]par byed de/_theg pa chen po klog cing kha ton byed la/_gzhan dag kyang dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba chen po drag pos klog tu 'jug cing kha ton byed du 'jug_/ma bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brnyas pa'i sems mi skyed la/_byang chub 
[\[68b.5\]]sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'god par byed/_de bzhin 'dzum zhing gsong por smra la/_gzhan dag kyang bzhin 'dzum zhing gsong por smra ba la dgod/_de tshig mi brlang /_mi gtum/_mi rtsub la/_gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 
[\[68b.6\]]dgod cing /_de dga' ba dang snyan par smra la/_srog gi phyir yang theg pa chen po mi spong zhing /_de theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang /_theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams la gus pa drag po dang /_
[\[68b.7\]]dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba chen pos sri zhu bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas la/_gzhan dag kyang bsam pa chen po dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pas bslab pa de kho na la 'god par byed/_su dang yang lhan cig 'gyed pa dang rtsod par mi byed/_de sngon ma byung ba dang /_
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams gus pa drag pos don du gnyer zhing tshol ba dang /_gang dag las thos pa de dag la ston pa la gus pa drag po lta bu skyed par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'god/_gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la ma bslabs 
[\[69a.2\]]pa rnams la yang rlom sems mi byed/_nyes pa bden pa dang /_mi bden pas gzhan dag la gleng bar mi byed/_nyes pa gzhan gyi 'khrul pa yang mi tshol/_gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'god par byed/_de byang chub sems dpa'i las chud zos pa'i sems can 
[\[69a.3\]]gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed/_gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i las chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de byang chub sems dpa'i lam chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag 
[\[69a.4\]]kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lam chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i 
[\[69a.5\]]sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god 
[\[69a.6\]]par byed/_de byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_
[\[69a.7\]]de byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]pa'i spyod pa'i stobs chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i spyod pa'i stobs chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de byang chub sems dpa'i spyod 
[\[69b.2\]]pa'i gnas chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gnas chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms chud 
[\[69b.3\]]zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de bgo bsha'i rang bzhin can yin la/_gzhan dag kyang 
[\[69b.4\]]bgo bsha'i rang bzhin can la 'god par byed/_de sangs rgyas kyi chos chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de dge ba'i chos la 'dun 
[\[69b.5\]]pa dang bral ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang bral ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de bcing bas bcings pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag 
[\[69b.6\]]kyang bcing bas bcings pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de yun ring po nas na ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang yun ring po nas na ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_
[\[69b.7\]]de sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de mgon med pa'i sems 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang mgon med pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de yun ring po nas gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan 
[\[70a.2\]]dag kyang yun ring po nas gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de rigs ngan du skyes pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang rigs ngan du skyes pa'i sems can gyi khams 
[\[70a.3\]]la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de byang chub kyi sems chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang byang chub kyi sems chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de byang chub 
[\[70a.4\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de chos kyi spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can 
[\[70a.5\]]gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang chos kyi spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed 
[\[70a.6\]]la/_gzhan dag kyang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de theg pa chen po la mos pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang 
[\[70a.7\]]theg pa chen po la mos pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de tshul khrims kyi sdom pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa chud zos pa'i 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par 
[\[70b.2\]]lta ba la 'god par byed/_de bzod pa dang des pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang bzod pa dang des pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de zhi gnas dang 
[\[70b.3\]]lhag mthong chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_legs par 
[\[70b.4\]]sdom pa dang /_des pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_legs par sdom pa dang /_des pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_
[\[70b.5\]]de dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_brtan pa dang /_rtogs pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_brtan pa dang /_rtogs pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par 
[\[70b.6\]]lta ba la 'god par byed/_de pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi tshul la 'jug pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi tshul la 'jug pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 
[\[70b.7\]]'god par byed/_de sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de dge ba'i 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]bshes gnyen chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de sems can la phan par 'dod pa chud zos 
[\[71a.2\]]pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang sems can la phan par 'dod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de chos la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed 
[\[71a.3\]]la/_gzhan dag kyang chos la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de ye shes la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang ye shes la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems 
[\[71a.4\]]can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de don la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang don la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de nges pa'i 
[\[71a.5\]]don gyi mdo sde la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de yang dag par spong ba bzhi chud zos 
[\[71a.6\]]pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/_gzhan dag kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/_de bden pa'i chos dang /_don dang /_'dul ba smra ba la mkhas pa yin 
[\[71a.7\]]la/_gzhan dag kyang bden pa'i chos dang don dang /_'dul ba smra ba la mkhas pa la 'god par byed/_de dbul po'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed cing gzhan dag kyang dbul po'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]byed/_de 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byams pas khyab par byed de/_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni mgon med pa/_sems can 'di dag ni skyabs med pa/_sems can 'di dag ni dpung gnyen med pa/_sems can 'di dag ni gling med pa/_sems can 'di 
[\[71b.2\]]dag ni gnas med pa/_sems can 'di dag ni skyob pa med pa yin na/_kye ma nam zhig na bdag sems can 'di dag gi mgon du 'gyur zhig gu/_skyabs su 'gyur zhig gu/_dpung gnyen du 'gyur zhig gu/_gling du 'gyur zhig gu/_gnas su 'gyur 
[\[71b.3\]]zhig gu/_skyob par 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa'o/_/'jam dpal dper na bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding lang tsho dang /_stobs dang /_mthu chen po thob pa de ni 'dod na ri rab kyi rtse mo nas ri rab kyi rtse mor 'gro'o/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs 
[\[71b.4\]]pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' yang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang /_mgyogs pa dang /_shugs dang /_rtul ba chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang du skye bar 'dod pa der yang skye bar 'gyur la/_ngan song ngan 
[\[71b.5\]]'gro log par ltung bar skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen dang /_gling dang /_gnas dang /_skyob par yang 'gyur ba de ni 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/'jam 
[\[71b.6\]]dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa phul zhing /_lha'i na bza' dag kyang phul te de bzhin gshegs 
[\[71b.7\]]pa re re la yang nyin gcig bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal pos yongs su gang bar byas nas sbyin pa byin te/_de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du phul la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]ni sems can gcig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal gal te rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi 
[\[72a.2\]]rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal 
[\[72a.3\]]gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems 
[\[72a.4\]]can gcig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can 
[\[72a.5\]]thams cad phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig dgra bcom pa nyid la bzhag na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang 
[\[72a.6\]]la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig rang sangs rgyas nyid la bzhag na/_'di 
[\[72a.7\]]ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod la rigs kyi 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig 
[\[72b.2\]]rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems 
[\[72b.3\]]la bzhag na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad glang po 
[\[72b.4\]]che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa 
[\[72b.5\]]skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/_
[\[72b.6\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni/_sems can gcig nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_
[\[72b.7\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]gcig de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 
[\[73a.2\]]kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing /_lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/_de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni dge bsnyen dad pa 
[\[73a.3\]]can gsum la skyabs su song ba/_bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang ldan pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba/_gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[73a.4\]]gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi dge bsnyen dad pa can gsum la skyabs su song ba/_bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang ldan pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i 
[\[73a.5\]]zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing /_lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/_de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni gang zag brgyad pa la nyin gcig zan cig byin na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med 
[\[73a.6\]]par skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi gang zag brgyad pa rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/_de 
[\[73a.7\]]ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la/_nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing /_lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/_de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye 
[\[73b.2\]]ma snyed du byin la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig 
[\[73b.3\]]rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing /_lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/_de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[73b.4\]]gzhan zhig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 
[\[73b.5\]]phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/_de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni dgra bcom pa gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin 
[\[73b.6\]]na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi dgra bcom pa rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa 
[\[73b.7\]]byin zhing /_lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/_de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni rang sangs rgyas gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin 
[\[74a.2\]]te/_de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/de ci'i 
[\[74a.3\]]phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang gi tshe gang dang gang las brtsams te byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa de'i tshe des sems de la mi dge ba'i las ma spangs pa ci yang med la/_des sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang ma bzung ba med pa'i phyir te/_'jam dpal de 
[\[74a.4\]]ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/'jam dpal dper na bya'i rgyal po ka la ping ka sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug cing mig ma bye ba dag gis kyang sgra skad kyi gdangs zab cing snyan pas bya'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon par 
[\[74a.5\]]byed do/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du dang po'i sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug cing /_mig las dang nyon mongs pa'i mun pa'i rab rib kyi bris yog pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i sbyor ba bsgrub pa'i sgra skad kyis nyan thos dang rang 
[\[74a.6\]]sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon par byed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/_nyin gcig 
[\[74a.7\]]bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/_de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyin gcig 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]zan cig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[74b.2\]]dpa' rnams la/_nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing /_lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/_de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[74b.3\]]dpa' gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta 
[\[74b.4\]]bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing /_lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/_de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro 
[\[74b.5\]]ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed 
[\[74b.6\]]kyi nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing /_lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/_de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[74b.7\]]gzhan zhig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/_nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing /_lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/_de ltar 
[\[75a.2\]]sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos shing yid ches par byed na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu 
[\[75a.3\]]mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi kha zas byed du bcug la/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byas la/_nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron 
[\[75a.4\]]mas spras pa/_nor bu rin po che snang ba thams cad brtsegs pa'i stegs bus bskor ba/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_rin po che'i chun pos mdzes par byas pa/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng ba/_nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas bkab pa/_
[\[75a.5\]]dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa/_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying pos byugs pa/_me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_man dzu Sha ka dang /_man dzu Sha ka chen po dang /_sna ma'i me tog dang /_klu shing gi me tog dang /_ta ra ni bar na dang /_go ta ra ni dang /_dri 
[\[75a.6\]]mchog dang /_d+ha nu ska ri dang /_lha'i sna ma'i me tog dang /_ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_me tog chen po rnams bkram pa byed du bcug ste/_rang sangs rgyas de dag la lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang 
[\[75a.7\]]byin te/_de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'am/_thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'am/_'jig rten gyi mgon po zhes bya ba'i sgra thos sam/_ri mor bris pa mthong 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]ngam/_gzugs su byas pa mthong na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur na/_gang sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar ba lta ci smos te/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/gang mar me'am/_bdug pa'am/_me tog gam/_spos 
[\[75b.2\]]'bul ba lta ci smos te/_tha na de'i yon tan bsngags pa gcig tsam brjod na yang 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do/_/longs spyod chen por 'grub par byed cing mthar gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal dper na chu'i thigs pa chung 
[\[75b.3\]]ngu rgya mtsho chen por song ba yang sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me ma byung gi bar du bar ma dor yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ji ltar chung ba yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi me ma byung gi bar du bar ma dor 
[\[75b.4\]]yongs su zad pa'am/_mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni ji ltar chung yang /_'di lta ste/_bong dang /_khyon dang /_che bas skar ma'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lhang nger 'dug cing kun du lhang nger 'dug go_/
[\[75b.5\]]'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ji ltar chung ba yang 'di lta ste/_mtho ba dang /_yangs pa dang /_che bas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lhang nger 'dug go/_/'jam dpal de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[75b.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub 
[\[75b.7\]]sems dpa' rnams dang /_nyan thos rnams dang bcas pa la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa phul zhing lha'i na bza' dag kyang phul te/_de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]gis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos par byed na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed par 'gyur na/_gang yi ger 'dri ba'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'am/_ston par byed pa lta ci smos te/_'di ni de bas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 
[\[76a.2\]]thob par 'gyur ba'i bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sdang ba'i sems kyis nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa dag gi zas dang gos bcad la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis 
[\[76a.3\]]ni khros te sdang ba'i sems kyis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i zan cig phrogs sam/_zan cig gcod du bcug na 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i 
[\[76a.4\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab la sogs pa bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa nas yang dag par bsgrubs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni rang gi sems kyi 
[\[76a.5\]]rgyud las skyes pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms par byed par zad kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' ni tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can la kham gcig tsam yongs su btang ba yang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par 'gyur bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam 
[\[76a.6\]]dpal nan gyis dper bya na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis khros te sdang ba'i sems kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i 
[\[76a.7\]]phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po med par byas la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sdang ba'i sems kyis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims tha na bslab pa gcig blangs pa tsam yang med par byas 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]na/_'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye 
[\[76b.2\]]shes mthong ba'i phung po ni rang gi sems kyi rgyud las skyes pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms par byed par zad kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' ni tha na nyi ma gcig gi bslab pa gcig las byung ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung 
[\[76b.3\]]po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po thams cad ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am 
[\[76b.4\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis khros te/_gnod sems kyi sems kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad btson rar bcug la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' la khros te gnod sems kyi 
[\[76b.5\]]sems kyis 'di dang phrad par ma gyur cig ces rgyab kyis phyogs te 'dug na/_'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi mig 
[\[76b.6\]]phyung la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni khros te gnod sems kyi sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' la bltas na/_'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal nan gyis dper bya na gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[76b.7\]]thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi mig phyung bar gyur la/_de nas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis byams pa'i sems kyis mig bskyed la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]dga' ba'i sems kyis bltas na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad btson rar 'dug pa las btson 
[\[77a.2\]]ra nas thar bar byas nas/_'khor los sgyur ba'i bde ba la bkod la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba'i sems kyis mthong bar 'dod cing /_dga' ba'i sems kyis de'i bsngags pa brjod na/_
[\[77a.3\]]'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod la/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni theg pa 
[\[77a.4\]]chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas la bskyed pa gcig tsam 'phel bar byas na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig 
[\[77a.5\]]rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/_theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phung po med pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam 'don du bcug na 'di 
[\[77a.6\]]ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal nan gyis dper bya na/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 
[\[77a.7\]]'gro dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams su skyes par byas la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' gcig byang chub kyi sems las mos pa bzlog na/_'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal gal te rigs kyi bu'am 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems las mos pa bzlog la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni tha na theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig theg 
[\[77b.2\]]pa chen po la mos pa bzlog na/_'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes 
[\[77b.3\]]par gyur la/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis sems can de dag thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas bton nas byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni sems can 
[\[77b.4\]]gcig theg pa chen po la mos pa la 'jug par byed na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams rang sangs rgyas las nyams 
[\[77b.5\]]par byas la/_gcig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig byang chub sems dpa' las nyams par byas na/_'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa skyed do/_/'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi 
[\[77b.6\]]rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti gcad pa'i phyir rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la ser sna'i sems bskyed cing phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su de dag gi grags pa dang /_sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa ma yin pa bsgrags la/_rigs kyi 
[\[77b.7\]]bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig gi rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti gcad pa'i phyir rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la ser sna'i sems bskyed cing bsngags pa ma yin pa bsgrags na/_'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]skyed do/_/'jam dpal gang la la zhig gis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba'i sems kyis tha na chu ra'i chu tsam byin na yang las des de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid du ma myong bar gyur na/_
[\[78a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' klog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa la mos pa la lta ci smos/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_nyan thos de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[78a.3\]]rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa nges pa dang ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgyal 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang /_su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_
[\[78a.4\]]zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D203}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya d+harma mu drA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_/bod skad du/_'phags pa chos kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i 
[\[78a.5\]]mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/_mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong lnga stong thams pa'i dge slong 
[\[78a.6\]]gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga 
[\[78a.7\]]sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung ba rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi na/_bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na legs par gsungs pa'i chos 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]'dul ba la dge slong rab tu byung ba 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams las kyang ma 'das la/_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang ma 
[\[78b.2\]]thob pa de tsam gyis na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin te/_de ltar rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba yin gyis de lta ma yin par 
[\[78b.3\]]rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni log par rab tu byung ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bu dge slong de lta bus ni dad pas byin pa longs spyad par 'os te/_gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_sman zong rnams longs spyad par 'os so/_/shA 
[\[78b.4\]]ri'i bu gzhan yang brtson pa mi gtong ba'i dge slong gang yin pa de ni gzugs gtong bar mi byed/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa gtong bar mi byed de/_de tsam gyis na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung 
[\[78b.5\]]ba 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin te/_de ltar rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba yin gyi/_de lta ma yin par rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni log par rab tu byung ba yin no/_/shA ri'i 
[\[78b.6\]]bu dge slong de lta bus ni dad pas byin pa longs spyad par 'os te/_gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos dang /_sman zong rnams longs spyad par 'os so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[78b.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ci la dgongs te/_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams las kyang ma 'das la/_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang ma thob pa de tsam gyis na/_dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'phags pa 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin te/_de ltar rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba yin gyi/_de lta ma yin par rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni log par rab tu byung ba yin no/_/shA ri'i 
[\[79a.2\]]bu dge slong de lta bus ni dad pas byin pa longs spyad par 'os te/_gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_sman zong rnams longs spyad par 'os so zhes de skad bka' stsal/_shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor so so'i skye 
[\[79a.3\]]bo'i chos rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/_de dag ni 'da' bar bya bar mi nus so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams ni yongs su ma grub pa ste/_de dag ni 'da' bar bya bar sla ba ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems can gyi khams ni nang na yang mi dmigs/_
[\[79a.4\]]phyi rol na yang mi dmigs/_gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs te/_sems can gyi khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa dang /_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de dag ni 'da' bar bya bar sla ba ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[79a.5\]]'di skad du so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams las kyang ma 'das la zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang ma thob pa de tsam gyis na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'phags pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin te/_
[\[79a.6\]]de ltar rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba yin gyi/_de lta ma yin par rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni log par rab tu byung ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bu dge slong de lta bus ni dad pas byin pa longs spyad par 'os te/_gos dang /_zas 
[\[79a.7\]]dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos dang /_sman zong rnams longs spyad par 'os so zhes gang gsungs pa de yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang dag gi rten tam/_gnas med pa de dag ni ji ltar thob par rung /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te zag pa med pa'i 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]chos rnams thob tu rung na ni dmigs pa las dgra bcom pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid ni ltos pa med pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dgongs nas 'di 
[\[79b.2\]]skad du so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams las kyang ma 'das la zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang ma thob pa de tsam gyis na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin te/_de ltar rab tu 
[\[79b.3\]]byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba yin gyi/_de ltar ma yin par rab tu byung ba gang yin pa de dag ni log par rab tu byung ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bu dge slong de lta bus ni dad pas byin pa la longs spyad par 'os te/_gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan 
[\[79b.4\]]dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_sman zong rnams longs spyad par 'os so zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs te brtson pa mi 
[\[79b.5\]]gtong ba'i dge slong gang yin pa de ni gzugs gtong bar mi byed/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa gtong bar mi byed de/_de tsam gyis na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'phags pa 'jig rten 
[\[79b.6\]]las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin te/_de ltar rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba yin gyi/_de lta ma yin par rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni log par rab tu byung ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bu dge slong de lta 
[\[79b.7\]]bus ni dad pas byin pa longs spyad par 'os te/_gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_sman zong rnams longs spyad par 'os so zhes de skad bka' stsal/_shA ri'i bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]kyis chos nyid las dgongs nas 'di skad du/_brtson pa mi gtong ba'i dge slong gang yin pa de ni gzugs gtong bar mi byed/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa gtong bar mi byed ces bka' stsal to/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[80a.2\]]rab 'byor/_chos kyi dbyings ni nang na yang mi dmigs/_phyi rol na yang mi dmigs/_gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/_/nang gdags pa ni gdags su med pa dang skye ba med pa'i gdags pa'o/_/de ltar na sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid kyis chos kyi 
[\[80a.3\]]dbyings mnyam pa nyid do/_/chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid do/_/de ltar na sems can gyi khams dang chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/_/gang la gnyis su med pa de gnyis su byar med pa de la ni gsal ba 
[\[80a.4\]]yang med/_gzhag pa yang med do/_/gang la gsal ba yang med/_gzhag pa yang med pa de ni 'das pa'am 'thob par byar mi nus te/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dgongs nas 'di skad du brtson pa mi gtong ba'i dge slong gang yin pa 
[\[80a.5\]]de ni gzugs gtong bar mi byed/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa gtong bar mi byed de/_de tsam gyis na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par 
[\[80a.6\]]bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin te/_de ltar rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba yin gyi/_de lta ma yin par rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni log par rab tu byung ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bu dge slong de lta bus ni dad pas byin pa 
[\[80a.7\]]longs spyad par 'os te/_gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_sman zong rnams longs spyad par 'os so zhes bka' stsal to/_/dogs pa med pa'i dge slong ni dogs pa khas mi len to/_/yi ge med cing yi ge las 'das pa'i 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]dge slong gang yin pa de ni bgrang ba las bstan par mi nus la/_de la ni 'ong ba yang med/_'gro ba yang med/_'greng ba yang med/_'dug pa yang med/_nyal ba yang med do/_/rtog pa can ma yin pa'i dge slong ni brtags pa la longs spyod pa'o/_/rtog pa can gyi dge 
[\[80b.2\]]slong ni ma brtags pa la longs spyod pa ste/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dgongs nas de tsam gyis na dge slong legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdzogs par bsnyen pas rdzogs par bsnyen pa yin 
[\[80b.3\]]te/_de ltar rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni yang dag par rab tu byung ba yin gyi/_de lta ma yin par rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni log par rab tu byung ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bu dge slong de lta bus ni dad pas byin pa longs spyad par 'os te/_gos dang /_zas 
[\[80b.4\]]dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_sman zong rnams longs spyad par 'os so zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_shA ri'i bu legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis ji skad bstan 
[\[80b.5\]]pa bzhin du ngas de las dgongs nas bstan pa yin te/_'di ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bu phyag rgya 'dis mngon pa'i nga rgyal can brtag par 'dod pas ni phyag rgya de'i mdun du brjod par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu shin tu brtags pa ni 
[\[80b.6\]]phyag rgya 'dis ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can mang po brtag par nus so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na dge slong bdun brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/srid pa tha ma pa'i dge slong brgya ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma zhugs shing ma rtogs la 
[\[80b.7\]]ma mos nas stan las langs te dong ngo /_/dge slong lnga ni spong ba byas shing bzlog pa byas nas rang gi lus dang bcas te sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu ngas kye ma chos 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun no snyam ste/_
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]de la dgongs nas de skad bstan mod kyi 'on kyang gang dang yang mi 'thun pa med de/_shA ri'i bu dper na mi la la zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du skye bo phal po che'i mdun du khyed la ngas chos bshad par bya'o/_/chos de yang 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun no 
[\[81a.2\]]zhes tshig tu smra na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_chos de dang mi 'thun pa gang dag yin pa'i mi de dag yod pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin du nga yang kye ma chos 
[\[81a.3\]]'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun no zhes de skad du yang ston la de 'jig rten de yang yang dag par ma mthong ngo /_/'jig rten med pa la ni chos kyang bgrang du med do/_/'jig rten gdags pa yang med do/_/shA ri'i bu 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa zhes bya ba ni chos 
[\[81a.4\]]rnams ma 'dres shing chos rnams 'dre ba med pa la bya bar gsungs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma 'dres pa zhes bgyi ba'i tshig gi don gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba ni chos rnams ro gcig par gdags pa yin te/_gcig pu 
[\[81a.5\]]kho na yang ma yin/_tha dad pa kho na yang ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bu ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i tshig gi don gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni 
[\[81a.6\]]gdags su med pa'o/_/gang gdags su med pa de ni gdags par mi nus so/_/gang gdags par mi nus pa de ni 'jig rten pa yang ma yin/_'jig rten las 'das pa yang ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bu gang 'jig rten pa yang ma yin/_'jig rten las 'das pa yang 
[\[81a.7\]]ma yin pa de ni stong pa nyid ces bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa chos kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//lots+tsha ba ban de klu'i dbang po dang /_lha'i zla bas bsgyur cing 
[\[81b.2\]]gtan la phab pa/[ {D204}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya pra dI pa dA nI yaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa mar me 'bul ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 
[\[81b.3\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/_mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[81b.4\]]shA ri'i bu dpag tu med pa bzhi po 'di dag ni legs par yongs su sbyangs pa'i chos rnams dang ldan pa/_rnam par smin pa dpag tu med pa/_snang ba dpag tu med pa/_bsod nams la yang dag par gzhol ba dpag tu med pa/_gzugs dpag tu med pa/_bde ba la 
[\[81b.5\]]yang dag par gzhol ba dpag tu med pa dag ste/_de dag ni tshul khrims la 'jug pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la 'jug pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa dang /_len pa 
[\[81b.6\]]med par zag pa zad par 'gyur ba dag go/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pas bsam gtan par gyur pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes 
[\[81b.7\]]pas shes rab dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/_shes rab yangs pa dang ldan pa/_nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa/_ji lta ba bzhin gyi shes rab dang ldan pa/_grangs med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa/_rnam par nges pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa/_rnam par nges 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]pa gzigs pa/_mchog tu rnam par grol zhing shin tu rnam par grol ba'i thugs dang ldan pa/_g.yo ba med pa'i thugs dang ldan pa/_'khrug pa med pa'i thugs dang ldan pa/_'phrin las legs par mdzad pa'i thugs dang ldan pa dang /_shA ri'i bu de 
[\[82a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa/_dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa/_spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa/_yid la mdzad pa dang ma bral ba/_bden pa ston pa/_bden pa gzigs pa/_snang 
[\[82a.3\]]bar gyur pa/_dpag tu med pa/_tshogs dpag tu med pa/_zil gyis gnon pa/_zil gyis mi gnon pa'i tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa/_stobs 
[\[82a.4\]]bcu'i stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa/_mi 'jigs pa'i stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa/_byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa/_so so yang dag par rig pa'i stobs bskyed pa brnyes pa/_sngon gyi bsam 
[\[82a.5\]]pa phun sum tshogs pa/_sngon yongs su sbyong ba mdzad pa/_shes rab rin po che dang ldan pa/_brtson pa ma bor ba/_brtson 'grus dpag tu med pa/_mya ngan dang gnod pa dang bral ba/_yongs su 'dzin pa mi mnga' ba/_thams cad gzigs pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa/_
[\[82a.6\]]glang po chen po/_dpag tu med pa/_phung po mi mnga' ba/_bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med pa dang /_shA ri'i bu de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa/_
[\[82a.7\]]rig pa gsum dang ldan pa/_bsod nams kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma sems dang ba/_bsod nams don du gnyer ba/_bsod nams la dmigs pa/_bsod nams yo byad du 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]byed pa/_bsod nams 'dod pa/_rnal 'byor dang 'thun pa'i rjes su dran pa yid la byed pa/_sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pas tha na mar me'i snying po chung ngu'am ngan pa zhig 'bru mar gyis bskus sam mar gyis bskus te 'bul lam/_nges par 'bul lam/_yongs su 
[\[82b.2\]]'bul lam/_'jog par byed pa dang /_dge ba don du gnyer bas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyi ma'i mtha'i skye ba'i 'khor ba spangs pa/_de ltar byung ba na tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_
[\[82b.3\]]rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pas bzung ba nyid yid la byed dam/_de las yon tan gang yang rung ba zhig yid la byed dam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir dang gzhi de las de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[82b.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar sems bskyed de/_mar me 'di 'bar bar bya/_rab tu 'bar bar bya/_dbul bar bya/_yongs su dbul bar bya/_rab tu gzhag par bya'o snyam pa'am/_sems kyi rgyud dad par gyur 
[\[82b.5\]]pas tshul khrims yongs su dag pa/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa bsod nams mang po mnga' ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bsnyen bkur byed de/_
[\[82b.6\]]de tsam mam/[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]tsam mam/_chung ngu zhig gam/_dan ngon tsam zhig gam/_gsog tsam zhig gam/_tha na glog gi rgyun tsam zhig kyang snang bar byed dam/_tha na them skas kyi gzhi gcig snang bar byed na yang shA ri'i bu de'i rnam par smin pa ni nyan thos rnams kyis sam/_
[\[82b.7\]]rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan par mi nus so/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang lan la ni mi re zhing dad pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_dang bas yongs su btang ba'i rnam par smin pa bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pas ston par spyod do/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]dad pa dang ldan pa gus par gnas shing g.yo med la sgyu med pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la nges par sems pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dge ba'i bsam pa skyes nas mar me [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]tsam mam/_chung ngu tsam zhig kyang snang bar byas te mar me snang bar byas 
[\[83a.2\]]pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de'i tha na them skas tsam snang ngam/_bskor sa tsam snang ngam/_smad dam/_gdugs sam/_thams cad snang ngam/_tha na bar skabs gang yang rung ba zhig snang ba'i mar me de mod la myur du shi ste/_rlung gis bskyod pas sam/_char 
[\[83a.3\]]pas sam/_mar zad pas sam/_snying po zad pas shi la/_shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na klus dkrugs pa na sprin stug po'i dra ba 'khrigs pa las nam mkha' las glog byung nas nub na/_shA ri'i bu myur du 'byung ba'i rjes su 'brang ba de mthong bas sems can rnams kyi mig 
[\[83a.4\]]thibs zhes byed pa de tsam du shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me 'bul ba'i dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_de las gzhan pa sems can bslab pa'i gzhi ma blangs pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba don du gnyer ba/_sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[83a.5\]]chos dang /_dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa/_bdag nyid bskyab par bya ba la gnas pa/_bsod nams 'dod pa rnams kyis ji tsam du chung ba'i mar me phul ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam du dpag tu med pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[83a.6\]]mkhyen to/_/shA ri'i bu mar me 'bul ba [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]cig phul bas mar me phul ba las mngon par grub pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de'i rnam par smin pa ni shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par lha dang bcas/_tshangs pa dang 
[\[83a.7\]]bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus bstan par mi nus so/_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_shA ri'i bu mar me 'bul ba yongs su phul ba des bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam du dpag tu 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]med grangs med pa yongs su bzung bar gyur pa'i don de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/_shA ri'i bu mar me de tsam du chung ngu phul ba'i rnam par smin pa yang dpag tu med na/_gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod 
[\[83b.2\]]rten la mchod pa khyad par can byed dam byed du 'jug ste/_spos sam/_me tog phreng ngam/_gdugs sam/_ba dan rnams sam/_gang yang rung ba'i mar me'i phreng ba rnam pa mang pos mchod pa khyad par can byed dam byed du 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 
[\[83b.3\]]chos 'di bzhi ni dad pas rtogs par bya ba yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni dpag tu med do snyam du dad pas rtogs par bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar chung ngu'i rnam par smin pa yang dpag tu med par 'gyur ba dad pas rtogs par bya ba dang /_dkon mchog 
[\[83b.4\]]gsum la dad pa'i las mngon par 'du byed pa'i rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ston pa mthong ba/_nyan thos khyed kyis kyang rnam pa thams cad du bsam pa'am/_yongs su bsam par mi nus na/_'phags pa'i rigs la mi gnas pa gzhan rnams kyis las kyi rnam par smin pa 
[\[83b.5\]]mngon sum du shes pa'am/_khong du chud par nus pa lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do/_/gzhan du na de ni dad pas rtogs par bya ba yin pa dang /_shA ri'i bu nyan thos rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam pa'am shes par mi nus te/_shA ri'i 
[\[83b.6\]]bu khyed rnams gnas 'di la bsam pa dang bral bar gyis shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[83b.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes gsungs so/_/shA ri'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang sems can rnams kyi 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do zhes ston par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu sems can gyi bsam pa dang /_sems dang /_lhag mthong yang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_dad pas rtogs par bya ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bu 'phags pa'i rigs la gnas 
[\[84a.2\]]pa khyed cag nyid kyang sems can thams cad kyi shes pa de la mig dang mkhas pa la shes pa mi 'jug na/_sems ma dul ba tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang bral ba/_brjed ngas pa/_
[\[84a.3\]]ma rig pa'i mun pas mig bsgribs pa gzhan gang dag bdag ci zhig_/bdag su zhig_/bdag ci 'dra ba zhig_/bdag gang nas/_bdag ji tsam zhig_/bdag ji lta bu zhig_/bdag ldan pa'i ngang tshul can nam/_bdag mi ldan pa'i ngang tshul can nam/_bdag brjed ngas 
[\[84a.4\]]pa'am/_bdag dran pa nye bar gnas pa'am/_bdag mkhas pa'i las byed pa'am/_bdag byis pa'i las byed pa'am/_bdag gang nas 'ongs/_bdag gang du 'gro zhes rang gi chos la shes pa 'jug pa yang med pa rnams lta ci smos/_shA ri'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo ni 
[\[84a.5\]]bdag la shes pa 'jug pa yang med na/_phyin ci log gi lta ba can de las kyi rnam par smin pa shes par lta ga la 'gyur te de ni gnas med do/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims dang bral ba ma yin/_ting nge 'dzin dang bral ba ma yin/_shes rab dang bral ba 
[\[84a.6\]]ma yin/_rnam par grol ba dang bral ba ma yin/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang bral ba ma yin/_rig pa dang bral ba ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni tshul khrims dpag tu med pa'o/_/
[\[84a.7\]]tshul khrims chags pa med pa'o/_/tshul khrims bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/_/tshul khrims gzhal du med pa'o/_/tshul khrims rdzogs pa'o/_/tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'o/_/de la las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]shA ri'i bu ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/_shA ri'i bu 'di la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar rab tu mkhyen te/_sems can 'di ni dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su zad cing /_mi dge ba'i chos 
[\[84b.2\]]rnams kyis gang ba'o/_/sems can 'di ni dge ba'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_mi dge ba'i chos rnams 'gag par 'gyur ba'o/_/sems can 'di ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams skye bar 'gyur zhing /_dge ba'i chos rnams 'gag par 'gyur ba'o zhes shA ri'i bu 'jug 
[\[84b.3\]]pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa sems can de dang de dag gi las dang las kyi rnam par smin pa sna tshogs rjes su 'jug pa rab tu mkhyen to/_/shA ri'i bu de la sems can rnams mun pa yod cing mkhas pa med de mkhyen pa de lta bu dang ldan pa/_mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan pa des 
[\[84b.4\]]sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa lung ston to/_/shA ri'i bu de la gang dag dad pa de dag ni yid ches par 'gyur la gang dag ma dad cing bstan pa 'di las nyams pa de dag ni smad par 'gyur zhing rtsod par 'gyur te/_de ni de dag la yun ring por 
[\[84b.5\]]mi phan pa dang /_don med pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_log par ltung bar 'gyur ba'o/_/shA ri'i bu de la sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me 'bul ba des mar me 'bul ba yongs su phul ba dang /_nges par phul ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba
