[\[84b.6\]]bsags pa'i las mngon par 'dus byas pa dang /_rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu bde ba 'dod pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa dang /_dad pas yongs su phul ba bsags pas tshe 'di nyid la sems kyi nges par sems pa gsum 'thob ste/_gsum 
[\[84b.7\]]gang zhe na/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod pa byas te/_lus thob pa snying po dang snying po ma yin pa'i lus shes par byas la snying po sbyin par bya'o snyam nas longs spyod rnams la nyes 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]dmigs can du shes te/_snying po med pa'i longs spyod rnams la snying po sbyin par byed pa 'di ni shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa byas pa'i sems kyi nges par sems pa dang po'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag 
[\[85a.2\]]gis bsod nams kyi zhing bla na med pa'i yon gnas kyi sbyin pa mchog len pa po la mchod pa byas pas bdag la sems can dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa'am/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs pa'am/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa med do/_/bdag gi 'gro ba bde ba 
[\[85a.3\]]ni lnga ste/_mtho ris 'thob pa'am/_mi 'thob pa'am/_gzugs 'thob pa'am/_longs spyod 'thob pa'am/_byang chub 'thob po snyam pa de ni shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa bya ba'i sems kyi nges par sems pa 'thob pa gnyis pa'o/_/shA 
[\[85a.4\]]ri'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me 'bul ba yongs su phul ba la yang dag par gnas pa yin te/_gal te bdag gis sbyin pa byin no/_/bdag gis bsod nams dag kyang byas so/_/bdag gis ser sna spangs so snyam du shes shing /_de 'di 
[\[85a.5\]]snyam du sems te/_bdag ni sbyin pa po yin la/_bdag gis kyang sbyin pa byin no snyam du/_de ltar sems shing gtong ba la yongs su gdung ba med/_brnyas pa med de/_shA ri'i bu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa byas pa'i sems kyi nges par sems 
[\[85a.6\]]pa 'thob pa gsum pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me 'bul ba phul bas/_'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe snang ba gsum thob ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_dge legs byas pa mngon du 'gyur te/_dran pa 'thob 
[\[85a.7\]]cing dge ba rnams brjed par mi 'gyur te/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams rjes su dran pa 'di ni snang ba dang po'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa byas pa'i sems 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]can de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dran par 'gyur te/_bdag gis sangs rgyas la mchod pa byas so zhes mchog tu dga' ba 'thob ste/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pa 'di ni snang ba gnyis pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang sems can de 
[\[85b.2\]]'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sems can gzhan sbyin pa gtong ba mthong na/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis mar me 'bul ba phul lo/_/phyis kyang sbyin pa byin no snyam du de gtong ba'i sems skyes shing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rnams kyis mi 'phrogs la/_de la chos rjes su dran 
[\[85b.3\]]pa de lta bu 'byung ste/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ba bzhin du yid la byed pa 'di ni snang ba thob pa gsum pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me dbul ba phul ba de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe snang ba 
[\[85b.4\]]bzhi 'thob ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_mdun na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba mthong ba dang /_mdun na zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba mthong ba dang /_lha'i 'khor gnas pa mthong ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[85b.5\]]byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs shing byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa mthong ste/_de la bdag nyid gus par byed pa la gnas shing thal mo sbyar bar byas par mthong ba ste/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me dbul ba phul bas/_'chi 
[\[85b.6\]]ba'i tshe snang ba 'di bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/_de bzhin du ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/mtha' yas chos bdag drang srong chen po yi/_/mchod 
[\[85b.7\]]rten rnams la mkhas pa gang zhig gis/_/mar me phul ba byas pa'i las de yis/_/bde dang don dang rnyed pa mtha' yas 'thob/_/de ni 'chi khar dran pa nyams mi 'gyur/_/mar me phul ba'ang bdag nyid mthong bar 'gyur/_/zang zing med pa'i dga' ba bzhi yang 'thob/_/
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]'chi ba'i dus tshe rmongs pa med par 'gyur/_/kun nas snang ba dag kyang des shes te/_/nyi ma dang ni zla ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur/_/bye ba khrag khrig lha rnams des mthong 'gyur/_/rmongs pa med par sangs rgyas chos kyang smra/_/de la pha ma bu dang rtsa lag dang /_/
[\[86a.2\]]'khor rnams kun gyis bskor nas ngu na yang /_/de rnams la ni mngon du de mi phyogs/_/de tshe nam yang dran pa nyams mi 'gyur/_/de yi mdun na gzhal med khang mchog mthong /_/'jigs med lha yi bu mo rnams kyang mthong /_/skyed mos tshal bzhi shin tu brgyan sdug cing /_/
[\[86a.3\]]'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan mthong bar 'gyur/_/thub pa'i skyes mchog rnams la mchod byas pas/_/des ni byang chub snying por bde gshegs dang /_/des ni bdag kyang thal mo sbyar byas shing /_/lha klu lha min rnams kyis mdun bdar mthong /_/gus dang bcas pas 'jig rten 'dren 
[\[86a.4\]]pa mthong /_/de der phyin te bde bar gshegs mthong nas/_/dga' bas de tshe spyan yang 'dren par byed/_/de yis gdugs tshod sbyar la gnang bar mdzad/_/so so rnyed pa'i bde bas tshim gyur nas/_/'chi dus byas tshe sdug bsngal des mi myong /_/byang chub dam pa mchog la sems 
[\[86a.5\]]kyang dga'/_/de la 'chi ba'i 'jigs chen 'byung mi 'gyur/_/mar me phul ba'i rnam smin 'di yin te/_/'chi dus byed tshe dran pa nyams mi 'gyur/_/de la phyogs rnams snang bar gyur par 'gyur/_/sngon cad ma mthong gzugs bzang rnams kyang mthong /_/de ni shi nas mtho ris nges 
[\[86a.6\]]'gro zhing /_/lha yi stan la de lus 'dug par shes/_/rgyal ba la ni mchod pa byed pa'i tshe/_/des ni kun nas lha mo rnams kyang mthong /_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me dbul ba phul bas sum cu rtsa gsum du skyes nas lha'i bu de rnam pa lnga yongs 
[\[86a.7\]]su dag pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu lha'i bu de rnam pa lnga yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ji lta bu zhe na/_de'i lus yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /_de lha'i mthu rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_de'i dran pa dang shes rab yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]de'i rna bar sgra snyan pa thos par 'gyur ba dang /_de'i 'khor yid bde ba mang ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/_de bzhin du ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[86b.2\]]stsal to/_/drang srong mchod rten mar me phul bas ni/_/de yi lus ni rab tu 'od gsal zhing /_/gzhan gyis mi tshugs dpal dang ldan pa dang /_/lha stong gi ni gtso bor de 'gyur ro/_/lha yi sgra dbyangs snyan cing yid 'ong thos/_/ji ltar lha gzhan de bzhin 'di yang mchog_/dran 
[\[86b.3\]]dang blo mchog dang ni ldan pa dang /_/'khor mchog phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'thob par 'gyur/_/gang du lha bu de ni 'gro ba der/_/de 'gro ba na lha kun 'dong bar byed/_/gang gis de lus 'di ltar 'od 'bar ba/_/sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu de 'dra'o/_/skyed mos tshal gyi gzhi na 
[\[86b.4\]]shing gi ming /_/zla mchog ces bya gzhal med khang gis brgyan/_/zla ba ji ltar kun nas gsal ba ltar/_/de yi shing rnams de bzhin gsal ba yin/_/mar me rab 'bar ji bzhin rnam gsal la/_/yid 'ong dri ngad phyogs rnams gtong byed pa/_/me tog gsal ba 'di ni ming 
[\[86b.5\]]ci zhes/_/lha rnams ngo mtshar stong snyed 'dzin par 'gyur/_/de yi 'khor tshogs me tog de dag gis/_/brgyan pa byas pas de dag mdzes par 'gyur/_/bye ba khrag khrig lha yi nang na de/_/nyi ma shar ba bzhin du rnam par mdzes/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 
[\[86b.6\]]la mar me dbul ba phul bas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skyes nas/_lha'i bu de dag yun ji srid cig na 'chi 'pho ba'i chos su 'gyur ba bdag nyid kyis shes te/_lha'i bu des 'chi ba na rang gi 'khor dang /_lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar byas 
[\[86b.7\]]yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas gnas de nas shi 'phos te/_shi 'phos nas kyang log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/_mi'i 'jig rten du skyes na yang rigs mchog tu btsun pa/_dad pa dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang ldan par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te sangs 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]rgyas mi 'byung ba zhig la bab na yang de sdig pa'i lta ba can ma yin zhing ya mtshan du 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/_de bzhin du ston pas gzhan 
[\[87a.2\]]yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha yi srid par bdag ni yun ring du/_/gnas par 'gyur zhes de yi shes 'di 'jug_/lha gtso de yis de yang rab tu shes/_/gang tshe 'chi ba'i dus ni 'bab 'gyur ba/_/de tshe mtshan ma lnga dag 'byung 'gyur te/_/bye ba phrag mang lha dag der 'du zhing /_/
[\[87a.3\]]de dag mngon sum du ni chos kyang ston/_/bdag ni 'di nas ring por mi thogs 'chi/_/srid pa thams cad mi rtag bde ba med/_/gzhan dag 'chi zhing gzhan dag skye bar 'gyur/_/kye ma bdag ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes/_/de ni dbus 'dug shin tu mi bzad smra/_/de yi mngag gzhug rnams 
[\[87a.4\]]kyang de bzhin du/_/lha gzhan du ma sdug bsngal nyam thag go/_/de nas bdag gis ltas ni lnga mthong nas/_/de ni rang gi stan la dga' mi 'thob/_/gnas de nas ni langs te 'gro bar byed/_/gzhal med khang gi gnas su'ang dga' mi skye/_/bdag cag 'di mthong tha ma 'di yin zhes/_/
[\[87a.5\]]de bzhin lha mang du ma mya ngan byed/_/de yi stan mchog dam pa gang yin pa/_/de ni lha yi bu mos blangs te 'bul/_/stan de mthong nas de ni rang stan la/_/dga' ba thob par ma gyur de nas shi/_/lha yi dbang po lha gnas shi 'phos nas/_/mi yi 'jig rten du ni mngon par 'gro/_/de yi rang la 
[\[87a.6\]]yod pa'i dran mi nyams/_/der yang bde bar 'gyur gyi sdug bsngal min/_/skyes nas tshe rabs rab tu dran gyur te/_/skyes ma thag tu sngon gyi srid pa shes/_/nyon mongs rnams kyis bdag la gnod 'gyur zhes/_/shin tu sdug bsngal der yang dga' ba med/_/lha yi 'jig rten thob pa'i dpal 
[\[87a.7\]]dran nas/_/mi yi 'jig rten la ni bde mi rnyed/_/mtho ris sdug bsngal mi yul smos ci dgos/_/srid pa thams cad snying po med cing g.yo/_/gang dang gang tshe lus stobs nyams gyur pa/_/de tshe de ni rab tu 'byung bar nges/_/'di yang de yi rnam smin 'gyur ba ste/_/rnam rtog spyod par 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]nam yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de ni de yi mar me phul ba'i 'bras/_/de dang der ni tshe rabs des dran 'gyur/_/bya ba'i 'os min las ni de mi spyod/_/gdon mi za bar de ni khyim nas 'byung /_/long bar mi 'gyur zha bor mi 'gyur zhing /_/de yi mig ni med par 'gyur ma yin/_/nad can ma yin 
[\[87b.2\]]'jigs rung sgra ldan min/_/blun por mi 'gyur mi shes mi 'gyur ro/_/mig med par ni nam yang mi 'gyur zhing /_/de yi mig ni na bar 'gyur ma yin/_/mig gcig ma yin khog long mig ma yin/_/de yi mig la mi gsal med par 'gyur/_/mig ni ring zhing dkar gnag rnam par gsal/_
[\[87b.3\]]srid par de yi mig ni dag par 'gyur/_/nor bu 'od [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ltar ni don zhib rtogs/_/bskal pa grangs med dag tu nams kyang de'i/_/sha yi mig ni yongs su nyams mi 'gyur/_/de la mig nad dag ni mi 'byung ste/_/mar me phul ba'i rnam smin de yin no/_/de bzhin lag rtsis gzugs 
[\[87b.4\]]dang rtog ge rnams/_/rtog par khong chud bzod ldan 'jigs pa med/_/de ni mdzangs la blo dang ldan par 'gyur/_/blo ni shin tu cha phra don dam mthong /_/srid pa dag la byed pa med par lta/_/rgyal ba'i bstan la snang ba thob par 'gyur/_/de bzhin 'jig rten 'dren pa sangs rgyas mthong /_/
[\[87b.5\]]mthong nas dad pas mchod pa rab tu byed/_/gzugs kyi dngos po bzang dang mdzes par 'gyur/_/mdza' bshes dang ni rtsa lag skye bo dga'/_/phyug cing stobs ldan nor ni mang bar 'gyur/_/mi phyed 'khor ni phun sum tshogs pa 'thob/_/ji ltar mar mes mun pa bsal nas su/_/
[\[87b.6\]]kun la 'od kyis snang ba khyab pa ltar/_/de bzhin kun snang byas nas lhang nge'o/_/mun pa'i dbang du nges par de mi 'gro/_/sangs rgyas mchod rten la ni mi gang gis/_/sems ni dad pas mar me'i phreng ba 'bul/_/mar me phul ba'i sems ni rnam dag cing /_/de ni 'jig rten 
[\[87b.7\]]rigs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/blta na sdug cing rab tu mdzes par 'gyur/_/'jig rten kun gyi dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/_/ltad mo mi 'dod bkra shis 'dod ma yin/_/g.yon phyogs lam la de ni bsten mi 'gyur/_/de ni 'jig rten log lta gang dag dang /_/lam gol gang dag yin 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]pa der mi mos/_/rgyal phran tsam gyis chog par de 'dzin cing /_/su dang yang ni 'thab tu 'gro mi byed/_/tshegs 'byung med cing mya ngan med par 'gyur/_/de yi sems la yongs su yi chad med/_/de la yid mi ches par mi 'gyur ro/_/bsam pa ngan dang gnod pa byed 
[\[88a.2\]]pa med/_/rgyal po'i pho brang gang du de smra ba/_/rgyal po dang ni rgyal 'khor grags par 'gyur/_/skya rbab nad kyis nams kyang de mi thebs/_/za mar mi 'gyur ma ning 'gyur ma yin/_/legs par gnas shing bde dang ldan 'gyur la/_/de yi lus la nad rnams 'byung mi 'gyur/_/rmi 
[\[88a.3\]]lam du ni sdig pa mi rmi la/_/des ni ji ltar ston pa de tshe shes/_/des ni yang dang yang du gter rnyed de/_/bde gshegs mchod rten mchod pas de ltar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me dbul ba phul bas/_sems can de ni 'dun pa bzhi 'thob ste/_bzhi 
[\[88a.4\]]gang zhe na/_lus kyi 'dun pa dang /_longs spyod kyi 'dun pa dang /_rigs btsun par skye ba'i 'dun pa dang /_shes rab 'thob pa ste/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me dbul ba phul bas 'dun pa bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[88a.5\]]de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/_de bzhin du ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/drang srong chen po'i mchod rten mar me phul/_/de yi lus rdzogs pa dang stobs cher 'gyur/_/de ni nams kyang rtsod pa sten mi byed/_/
[\[88a.6\]]dbang phyug tshugs pa med pa phyogs bcur spyod/_/drang srong chen po'i mchod rten mar me phul/_/rnam par grags pa'i longs spyod ldan pa dang /_/yon tan mchog ldan rab mchog khyim du skye/_/skyes nas tshe rabs dran pa nyid du 'gyur/_/g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa mchog 
[\[88a.7\]]ldan 'gyur/_/srog chags rnams la rtag tu snying brtse byed/_/rtag tu mi 'tshe shin tu des par 'gyur/_/rnam ltung 'gro ba'i khyim du de mi skye/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me dbul ba phul bas yongs su dag pa bzhi 'thob ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_lus 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]yongs su dag pa dang /_ngag yongs su dag pa dang /_yid yongs su dag pa dang /_mdza' bshes yongs su dag pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de skye ba'i gnas de dang /_de dag tu skyes pa na srog gcod pa spong bar 'gyur te/_de srog gcod 
[\[88b.2\]]par mi byed do/_/ma byin par mi len to/_/'dod pas log par g.yem pa spong bar 'gyur te/_rang gi chung ma la yang log par mi sten to/_/'bru'i chang dang /_bcos pa'i chang btung ba spong bar byed do/_/sems can gang la yang dbyug pa'am/_mtshon nam/_bong ba'am/_
[\[88b.3\]]khu tshur ram/_mtshon char gyur pa gang yang rung bas rnam par 'tshe bar mi byed cing /_de sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las ldog par 'gyur te/_shA ri'i bu de dag ni lus kyi yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/_/de la ngag gi yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_de [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spangs 
[\[88b.4\]]pa yin te/_de ma mthong ba'am/_ma thos pa rjod par mi byed la/_mthong ba dang /_thos pa dris pa yang dus ma yin par smra bar mi byed de/_de mthong ba'am/_thos pa dris na yang dag par smra bar byed de/_de bdag gi don nam/_gzhan gyi don du yang rung ste log par 
[\[88b.5\]]mi smra'o/_/gzhan dag gis [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba bcol ba'i tshe yang dag par shes na bden pa srung bar byed de/_ngag gi yongs su ma dag pa de dag spong bar byed do/_/de de dag dbye ba'i phyir 'di nas thos pa pha bir mi snyod/_de dag dbye ba'i phyir pha bi nas thos pa 'dir mi snyod de/_
[\[88b.6\]]'thun pa rnams ni gcugs par byed cing /_bye ba rnams la ni sdums byed do/_/de ngag rtsub po spangs pa yin te/_ngag gang zher 'debs pa/_brlang ba/_gzhan la rtsub pa/_gzhan la mi bde ba/_mi sdug pa/_mi 'dod pa/_mi dga' ba/_yid du mi 'ong ba/_
[\[88b.7\]]gzhan la gnod pa/_khon du 'dzin pa'i ngag de lta bu spangs nas/_ngag mnyen pa/_'jam pa/_yid du 'ong ba/_bden pa/_rnar snyan pa/_snying du sdug pa/_mdza' bar 'gyur ba/_skye bo mang po mgu ba/_skye bo mang po 'dod pa/_dga' ba/_yid du 'ong ba/_
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]dgra thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa de lta bu'i ngag smra'o/_/de tshig kyal pa spangs pa yin te/_de spang bar bya ba gzhan dang mi smra ba yin/_de gzhan gyi lag rtsis dang brda sbed par byed do/_/de mang du smra bar mi byed/_dus ma yin par smra bar mi byed la/_mya 
[\[89a.2\]]ngan las 'das pa dang mi ldan pa'i tshig mi smra ste/_de ltar de dag gi las yongs su ma dag pa spong ba 'di ni/_shA ri'i bu ngag gi las yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/_/de yid kyi las yongs su ma dag pa spong ba yin te/_de brnab sems su mi byed cing /_de gzhan gyi nor 
[\[89a.3\]]dang /_gzhan gyi rdzas dang /_gzhan gyi yo byad dag la brnab sems mi skyed do/_/de gnod sems mi byed de/_gnod sems spong ba yin no/_/log par lta ba yang spong ste/_sdig pa'i lta ba can ma yin no/_/de ltar yid kyi las yongs su ma dag pa spong ba 'di ni yid 
[\[89a.4\]]kyi las yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/_/mdza' bshes yongs su dag pa yang 'thob ste/_gang dag [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_'bru'i chang dang /_bcos pa'i chang btung ba spong ba dang /_mi rtsub pa dang /_mi brlang ba dang /_legs par sdom pa dang /_yang dag pa'i lta ba can 
[\[89a.5\]]de dag la sten cing gang du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_nyan thos rnams la yang sten cing snyen la bsnyen bkur byed de/_shA ri'i bu 'di ni yongs su dag pa bzhi pa ste/_mdza' bshes 
[\[89a.6\]]yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me dbul ba phul bas/_yongs su dag pa bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/_de 
[\[89a.7\]]bzhin du ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rnam par sbyang phyir bde gshegs gsungs pa la/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyis shin tu bsdams/_/lta ba ma rnyed tshul khrims rnam par dag_/de yi mig ni yid las byung ba yin/_/nyi bzhin phyogs rnams 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]su ni shin tu gsal/_/de yis zag pa zad pa myur du shes/_/de yi blo ni rdzu 'phrul che bar 'gyur/_/lha mig rdul dang bral zhing zag pa med/_/blo ldan de yis 'jig rten sems rnams dang /_/lha yi mngon shes so so rig pa shes/_/'dod na nyan thos byang chub rnyed mi dka'/_/
[\[89b.2\]]mar me phul ba'i rnam smin de yin no/_/drang srong chen po'i mchod rten mar me phul/_/gal te sangs rgyas byang chub 'dod na'ang bla/_/blo ldan pa la gsum char nyams pa med/_/shes rab mig ldan longs spyod chen por 'gyur/_/shA ri'i bu theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i 
[\[89b.3\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me dbul ba phul na/_skye ba'i gnas de dang de dag tu 'dun par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi mchog brgyad 'thob ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_sha'i mig mchog 'thob pa dang /_dran pa spyi 
[\[89b.4\]]gtsug bltar mi mthong ba 'thob pa dang /_bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang 'thun pa'i lha'i mig mchog 'thob pa dang /_shes rab yongs su rdzogs pas tshul khrims nyams pa med pa 'thob pa dang /_sngon bsod nams byas pas mtho ris 'thob pa dang /_
[\[89b.5\]]bsod nams legs par byas pas dal ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi mig tu gyur pas sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang /_shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos mar me phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal 
[\[89b.6\]]srid 'thob ste/_de la yang zhe 'gras pa med pa'i yid dang ldan zhing mchog tu blta na sdug pa'am/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin rdzu 'phrul chen po thob cing mig stong dang ldan par 'thob par 'gyur ba'am/_tshangs pa'i gnas la mkhas pa'i tshangs par yang 'gyur te grags pa'i bsam 
[\[89b.7\]]gtan 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pas 'dun par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi mchog brgyad po de dag 'thob bo/_/gzhan yang chos brgyad 'thob ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan dpag tu med pa 'thob pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi spobs 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]pa dpag tu med pa 'thob pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi shes rab dpag tu med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam 
[\[90a.2\]]par grol ba dpag tu med pa dang /_sems can gyi sems dang bsam pa dpag tu med pa la 'jug pa 'thob ste/_shA ri'i bu mar me phul bas de ltar rnam par smin pa dpag tu med pa yongs su bzung ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[90a.3\]]chos 'chad pa na/_kye e ma ho chos 'chad do/_/kye e ma ho chos rab tu ston to zhes mar me dbul ba phul ba'i mar me de til gyi mar mer rjes su bzung bas/_chos kyi mar me rjes su 'dzin par byed do/_/de mar me phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des tshogs dpag tu med pa brgyad 'thob 
[\[90a.4\]]ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_dran pa'i tshogs dpag tu med pa 'thob pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_blo gros kyi tshogs dang /_dad pa'i tshogs dang /_brtson 'grus kyi tshogs dang /_shes rab kyi tshogs dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs dang /_spobs pa'i tshogs dang /_bsod 
[\[90a.5\]]nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa 'thob ste/_tshogs dpag tu med pa brgyad po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang 'thob ste/_rim gyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin 
[\[90a.6\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/_de dang ba'i sems kyis thal mo sbyar ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des chos mchog tu byung ba brgyad 'thob ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_gzugs mchog tu byung ba 'thob pa dang /_g.yog 'khor mchog tu byung 
[\[90a.7\]]ba 'thob pa dang /_tshul khrims mchog tu byung ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams su skye ba mchog tu byung ba dang /_dad pa mchog tu byung ba dang /_spobs pa mchog tu byung ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'phags pa'i lam 'thob pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o/_/shA ri'i bu de ci'i phyir dpag tu med pa zhes bya zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa la des mchod pa'i 'bras bu dpag tu med pa'i phyir te/_phan yon dpag tu med pa yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/_
[\[90b.2\]]brtsam byos mngon par 'byung bar gyis/_/sangs rgyas bstan la brtson par byos/_/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde rnams gzhom par byos/_/zhes ched du brjod pa de ched du brjod pa mdzad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' 
[\[90b.3\]]stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu chos lnga po 'di dag ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_mir skye ba 'thob pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba dang /_de la mngon par dga' ba dang /_tshul khrims yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_zag pa zad pa ste/_shA ri'i 
[\[90b.4\]]bu chos lnga po de dag ni sems can thams cad kyis mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin te/_de dag ni khyed rnams kyis thob zin to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/_de bzhin du ston pa gzhan yang 'di skad ces 
[\[90b.5\]]bka' stsal to/_/byang chub don phyir sems can phan 'dogs pas/_/bde gshegs mchod rten dbul ba 'dir phul bas/_/mkhas pa de yis byas pa'i las des ni/_/tshe rabs kun du khyad par can du 'gyur/_/'di nas shi 'phos lha mis bsngags pa yi/_/yang srid dam pa de ni 
[\[90b.6\]]'thob par 'gyur/_/ri rab bzhin du de ni mi g.yo la/_/'od zer dag gis phyogs kun snang zhing mdzes/_/lha tshogs rnams kyis mthong nas gus dang bcas/_/mchog tu gus pas de la dga' ba skyed/_/stod pa byed cing de la mchod pa byed/_/yang dang yang du lta bas ngoms pa med/_/
[\[90b.7\]]bsod nams mtshan byas de ni lhas mchod 'os/_/tshangs pa'i gnas na tshangs pa mdzes pa 'dra/_/ci yi las shig nges par des bsten na/_/gang gis de yi lus ni shin tu mdzes/_/'di na bsod nams mi 'dod su zhig yod/_/'phags pa'i tshul khrims mkhas pa su mi sten/_/thub pa 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]mthong na lta bas mi ngoms te/_/chos thos nas ni su zhig bag mi byed/_/mi yi 'jig rten gnas tshe de yis ni/_/bde gshegs mchod rten mar me phul byas shing /_/bde bar gshegs kyi bstan la gnas byas pas/_/'di na lha mchog rnyed pa legs par rnyed/_/mi yi lus ni 
[\[91a.2\]]bdag gis thob gyur cig_/rgyal ba'i bstan la dad pa mchog thob shog_/gal te bag med gyur na lus 'dor gyi/_/chos kyi dam pa 'dor bar yod ma gyur/_/mi lus rnyed par dka' ba thob gyur nas/_/blun rnams ci phyir rang gi don mi byed/_/bde gshegs bstan la gnod byed sems ldan na/_/
[\[91a.3\]]shi nas g.yang sa chen por ltung bar 'gyur/_/de yis 'byor ba rgya chen lhas thos nas/_/skyo ba skyes te smon lam 'debs byed pa/_/mi yi lus ni bdag gis thob gyur cig_/legs don gyur nas tshangs spyod bdag ston shog_/'chi ba'i dus byed tshe yang de bzhin du/_/chos la phan zhing sems la gsal 
[\[91a.4\]]gyur cing /_/lha stong bye ba lha mo rnams bcas pas/_/de ni bdag gi yin zhes dga' bar byed/_/lha yi bu mo yid 'ong brgyan pa rnams/_/skyed mos tshal bzhir de ni rtse byed 'jug_/yid du 'ong ba'i spos ngad kun nas ldang /_/glu dbyangs snyan pa'i sgra yang thos par 'gyur/_/bsngags pa'i lha de ga 
[\[91a.5\]]las gar 'gro ba/_/de dang der ni gzugs bzang rnams kyang mthong /_/mi sdug gzugs ngan rnams kyang mi mthong ste/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten mar me phul bas 'gyur/_/de nas shi 'phos mi yi srid pa 'dir/_/dran dang ldan bzhin ma yi mngal na gnas/_/btsas nas gang nas shi 'phos tshe 
[\[91a.6\]]rabs dran/_/'phags pa'i ye shes stobs las nyams mi 'gyur/_/bde gshegs mchod rten mar me phul byas pas/_/de yis las byas pa ni de nyid kyis/_/'khor los sgyur ba mi bdag stobs chen ldan/_/yid 'ong gzugs bzang blta na dga' bar 'gyur/_/de yis las byas pa des tshe 
[\[91a.7\]]ring 'gyur/_/gcig tu dag pa nyid kyi bde dang ldan/_/de yi lus ni nad kyis nyon mi mongs/_/mar me phul ba'i rnam smin de yin no/_/bde bar gshegs la mar mes mchod byas pas/_/rkun po'i gnod med rgyal po'i chad pa med/_/gshed ma med cing chung ma byi pho med/_/de yi las kyis 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]nams kyang gtse mi 'gyur/_/bde zhing lo legs gang du'ang 'jigs pa med/_/rtag tu 'byor cing legs 'byor nor 'bru ldan/_/de yi skyed mos tshal mchog phreng ba dang /_/tshal dang shing phran lo ma sna tshogs brgyan/_/de yis 'jig rten gtso bo sangs rgyas mthong /_/mthong nas kyang ni mchog tu 
[\[91b.2\]]dga' 'gyur te/_/de dag rnams la gus par de mchod byed/_/rgyal srid spangs nas dge slong nyid la sten/_/bsngags pa mtha' yas gzigs pa mtha' yas shing /_/mtha' yas blo ldan bde gshegs mchod rten la/_/mar me phul bas mtha' yas blo ldan 'gyur/_/mar me bzhin du 
[\[91b.3\]]phyogs rnams kun du gsal/_/mar me chen pos skyes mchog thub pa yi/_/mchod rten gsal byas rnam dag mig gis ni/_/byang chub rdul bral zag pa med thob nas/_/de phyogs kun du mar me bzhin du gsal/_/bde gshegs mchod rten mar me phul bas na/_/rnam grol blo 
[\[91b.4\]]mnga' stobs bcu rnams ldan zhing /_/de bzhin ma 'dres chos kyi pha rol byon/_/kun nas spyan ldan bde bar gshegs par 'gyur/_/phyogs rnams dag na bgrang byas 'jig rten khams/_/gang dag ji snyed yod pa ma lus pa/_/mar me lta bur me yi rgyu yis ni/_/ma lus pa dag rtag 
[\[91b.5\]]tu snang byas 'gyur/_/bdag nyid che la mar me phul ba las/_/mthu 'byung gang yin de ni de yin no/_/mar me 'dra ba dag la sems can kun/_/lhag byas gal te mthu chen don dam mthong /_/rang rgyal rnams su gyur la de mchod phyir/_/gcig 'gas mar me 'bar bar byas gyur la/_/
[\[91b.6\]]mar me'i snying po ri rab tsam byas shing /_/de yis 'jig rten ma lus snang byed la/_/rnam pa de 'dras mtha' yas phyogs kun du/_/gal te mar me 'bul bar byed gyur la/_/rang rgyal byang chub tu ni smon sems kyis/_/bskal pa brgya phrag mtha' yas 'bar byed pas/_/gang zhig 
[\[91b.7\]]byang chub phyir ni smon sems kyis/_/mchod rten mchog la rtswa mes gsal byed na/_/de bas de mchog 'bras bu ches che zhes/_/don dam gzigs pa sangs rgyas rnams gsung ngo /_/phyogs bcu'i skye bo gang dag dpag med pa/_/rang sangs rgyas nyid mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir/_/
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]re res de bzhin mar me rnams phul zhing /_/bskal pa grangs med de dag 'bar byed la/_/'jig rten ched du bde gshegs nyid 'dod cing /_/gang zhig 'jig rten dam pa'i mchod rten la/_/mar me 'bul lam lan cig phyag 'tshal na/_/de bas 'di bsod 'bras bu khyad par 
[\[92a.2\]]'phags/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul mthong dka' bsam mi khyab/_/thos nas dad dang dga' ba skyed par byed/_/dad med chos mchog ma thob byis pa rnams/_/zhum zhum por ni shin tu byed par 'gyur/_/de phyir 'jig rten kun mgon gang yin pa/_/dag chos spyod yul can rnams rnyed dka' 
[\[92a.3\]]bas/_/thub rnams spyan sngar shin tu dang sems kyis/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyi ched du smon lam thob/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar 
[\[92a.4\]]bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa mar me 'bul ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nya barma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs 
[\[92a.5\]]pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D205}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya nA ga ra a ba lam bi kA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems 
[\[92a.6\]]dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am 
[\[92a.7\]]ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_mchod cing brjed de/_
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]pad ma chus ma gos pa bzhin du bzhugs so/_/de nas de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir ston zla tha chung sa zla ba nya ba'i tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la/_'bru mar gyis zangs po che stong bkang ste dngar nas mar me sbar ba'i 'od kyis kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad bzhir 
[\[92b.2\]]snang bas khyab par byas so/_/de nas yang de'i tshe mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po na dga' byed ma zhes bya ba grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhig 'dug go/_/des 'bru mar sran gre'u dang sbyar ba nyos nas zhag bzhi kha 'tshos te nyam chung bar gyur to/_/de nas 'bru mar de khyer te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 
[\[92b.3\]]song nas khyams kyi nang logs su mar me sbar te bzhag nas 'di ltar sems bskyed de/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji ltar da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du bdag kyang ma 'ongs 
[\[92b.4\]]pa'i dus na ston par gyur te chos ston par gyur cig_/dge 'dun yang sdud par gyur cig ces byas so/_/'di ltar yang sems bskyed de/_gal te bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba zhig na/_mar me 'di bdag phyir ma 'ongs kyi bar du 'bar bar gyur cig ces byas 
[\[92b.5\]]nas mar me de spar te grong khyer du song na/_mar me de'i 'od kyis 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad snang bar gyur te nam nangs kyi bar du yang mar me de ma shi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maung gal gyi bu chen pos chos gos kyi mtha' mas mar me gsad par byas na gsad par ma nus so/_/de 
[\[92b.6\]]nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos rnam par 'thor rlung gis gsad par byas kyang gsad par ma nus so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maung gal gyi bu chen pos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'dug nas stong gsum 'dir shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char gyi rgyun dbab par byin gyis 
[\[92b.7\]]brlabs te mar me de'i steng du btang yang gsad par ma nus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu thong shig_/mar me 'di ni byang chub kyi sems kyis sbar ba yin la/_byang chub kyi sems ni nyan thos kyis zil gyis gnan par mi nus so/_/de ci'i 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]phyir zhe na/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zil gyis gnan du med pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas re zhig na bud med de nyi ma shar te grong khyer nas phyir 'ongs nas/_des mar me de shin tu 'bar ba mthong ba dang /_
[\[93a.2\]]de mchog tu dga' ba chen pos rgyas par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid ni 'di yin te/_gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 
[\[93a.3\]]zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung bar gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig 
[\[93a.4\]]rten gyi bar du song ste zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od kyang zil gyis mnan nas yang slar log ste bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du nub par gyur to/_/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 
[\[93a.5\]]'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgyal mchog rnam par 'dren pa gang zag mchog_/rgyu med par ni 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_/ci yi rkyen gyis zhal ni 'dzum mdzad pa/_/'jig rten 
[\[93a.6\]]phan pa thugs brtses bdag la gsungs/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba 'di bskal pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/_rtag tu lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa dag nyams su myong nas de bzhin 
[\[93a.7\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du snang ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/stobs bcu ldan pa mchod phyir zangs chen phrag stong gsal rgyal gyis/_/mar me bzang po sbar bas 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]dpag tshad bzhir ni kun du snang /_/grong khyer 'tsho ba'i 'bru mar sran ma gre'u sbyar sbar ba yis/_/'dzam gling snang bas khyab gyur de ni byang chub sems kyi mthus/_/maud gal gyis ni mar me gsad 'dod rdzu 'phrul rgya chen byas/_/rnam par 'thor ba'i rlung gi shugs btang gsad par yong ma 
[\[93b.2\]]nus/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'dug nas chu rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam/_/phab kyang gsad par ma nus mar me nyi ma'i 'od bzhin snang /_/de ni zhag bzhi kha 'tshos rgyal byed dga' ba'i tshal du 'ongs/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis bde gshegs zhabs la phyag byas thal sbyar 'dug_/
[\[93b.3\]]mnyam med 'dzum pa mdzad pas kun dga' bo yang rab dga' nas/_/gzi brjid mtha' yas 'dzum mdzad 'di yi 'bras bu ji 'dra gsungs/_/dga' byed 'di ni bskal pa nyi shu brgyad na rgyal bar 'gyur/_/rang byung kun snang zhes bya 'od kyis stong chen bzhi snang byed/_/ma 'ongs dus na bde bar 
[\[93b.4\]]gshegs pa bye ba mchod par 'gyur/_/de ni kun du 'khor los sgyur 'gyur rgyal rnams bkur stir byed/_/sangs rgyas rtogs pa brjod pa yi ni dad rnams rab dga' byed/_/skye bo mkhas pa dag gis de thos sems kyang rab tu dga'/_/de ltar rgyal ba bsam yas stobs bcu'i chos kyang 
[\[93b.5\]]bsam mi khyab/_/dga' ba bskyed na rnam smin mtshungs med bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_lha 
[\[93b.6\]]dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[93b.7\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang /_lo ts+tsha ba ban de klu'i dbang pos bsgyur ba/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sing ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de de ba tsan dras zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]{D206}]@#/_/bod skad du/_zas kyi 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 'od ma'i tshal na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya 
[\[94a.2\]]phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang /_gzhan yang dge slong pha dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen pha dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_lha klu sde brgyad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas maung gal gyi bu chen po 'dug pa las langs te/_bcom ldan 
[\[94a.3\]]'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon grong khyer du bsod snyoms la mchis pa'i shul logs su mi grangs khri stong snyed mchis te/_de dag gi mgo bo ni ri bzhin du che/_khog pa ni ri rab lhun po tsam 'dra/_mgrin pa ni khab bzhin du phra/_phan tshun 
[\[94a.4\]]bskyod cing mchi ba na shing rta lnga brgya shin tu 'khrol ba'i sgra byung ste/_de yang mi bzad pa'i gzhob kyi dud pa kun nas 'thul lo/_/de ci'i dngos po lags pa dang /_ci las gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[94a.5\]]maud gal gyi bu de dag ni 'dre bkren ltogs pa yin te/_sngon 'das pa'i dus na mchod sdong bshig pa dang /_mchod ston sbyar ba bshig pas de lta bu'i sdig pa rnam par smin pa yin no/_/yang gcig tu na gzhan gyi mchod ston zos nas za gcig par ma byas pa'i sdig gi rnam par smin pa de yin 
[\[94a.6\]]no/_/mchod ston lhag ma za gcig par mi byed pa la ma byin cig_/yon bdag gis lhag ma rnams dge 'dun la sbags pa'i gsol ba byos la bzod par gsol cig_/sbags pa'i zas rnams dge 'dun rnams kyis gnang ba byin cig_/gnang ba ma byin na dge 'dun rnams kyang ltung 
[\[94a.7\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas maud gal gyi bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni yang dag pa'o/_/yon bdag su yang rung ste chos bzhin du bsdu ba'i phyir mchod pa'i yo byad 'byor tshogs te/_zas gcig par byas pa rnams ni zas kyi 'tsho ba dang ldan par 'gyur 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_za gcig par ma byas pa rnams ni zas dang mi ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na nyi ma gcig za gcig pa thub na nyi ma drug khrir bsod nams dang bza' ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de la de ltar ma byas pa rnams ni nyi ma khri phrag 
[\[94b.2\]]drug cur 'dre ltogs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i sbyin pa ni shin tu lci ba yin te/_gnyis na lcags kyi thu lum zos kyang sla'i/_yon bdag dad pa can gyi zas ni shin tu bzhu bar dka' ste/_shin tu yun ring por sdug bsngal bar 'gyur te/_tshe rabs khri phrag brgyar 
[\[94b.3\]]'dre ltogs pa'i dngos por 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams kyi zas bya'o cog la nan tan cher byos shig_/snam phrag gam phu rung gi nang du khyer bar byas na tshe rabs lnga brgyar dmyal bar ltung ste/_lcags kyi thu lum dmar po mchan khung g.yon pa nas thal te mchan khung g.yas par thal 
[\[94b.4\]]lo/_/lhag ma mi bkur bar byos shig_/chung ngu na khre'i 'bru gcig tsam khyer na yang lcags kyi 'khor lo tsam du 'gyur ro/_/dge bsnyen gyis kyang rung ste bsod nams kyi zas sbyar ro cog la thog ma nas myang ba'i sbags par mi bya'o/_/de myangs pas sbyar ba thams cad lhag ma'i sbags 
[\[94b.5\]]pa mi bya'o/_/byas pa don med par 'gyur ro/_/gnyis na ma byas kyang sla'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha thams cad mi dgyes par 'gyur ro/_/gnyen po thams cad mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig myangs pa zhig yod na tshe rabs lnga khrir 'dre ltogs par 'gyur ro/_/sdug bsngal 
[\[94b.6\]]mi bzad pa sna tshogs kyang myong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig phyin chad bsod nams 'dod pas tshul bzhin du bsod nams kyi zas gtsang sbras phyed pa dang /_shin tu gus par sbyar la lag pa shin tu dag par bkrus nas tshod ma la sogs pa drod bag tu sbyar ro cog shin tu bkab pa 
[\[94b.7\]]dang /_rim gro bskyed de de dag kyang sngar myang bar mi bya'o/_/de nas bsod nams su gyur cing lha thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/gnyen po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/lha la sogs pa thams cad kyis srung zhing byin gyis rlob par 'gyur te yang dag par smra ba yin no/_/
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]bsod nams rnam par smin pa ni brag ca dang gzugs brnyan bzhin no/_/de ltar 'dre bkren ltogs pa ni thog ma mi las gyur te/_thog ma lag pa mi gtsang bas dge 'dun gyi kha zas gtsang ma la reg pa dang /_bdag gi lag pa mi gtsang bas dge 'dun gyi kha zas gtsang 
[\[95a.2\]]ma'i nang du bsngogs sam/_zas gtsang ma'i nang du kha zas mi gtsang ba bsres te dge 'dun la sbyin pa byas pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar 'dre ltogs par ltung ste/_rtag tu mi gtsang ba za zhing snam phyi sar mi gtsang ba za na/_snam phyi sa'i srungs mas lcags kyi ber kas gdengs te 'dre ltogs 
[\[95a.3\]]pa de rnams phyi sa'i sar mi snyan par byed do/_/mi'i rnag dang /_khrag dang /_mchil snabs dang /_ngar snabs dang /_khrud ma mi gtsang ba btsog pa za zhing mi gtsang ba srung zhing bud med bu btsas pa'i khrag mi gtsang ba 'dzag pa za bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe rabs khri phrag lnga brgyar khyi dang 
[\[95a.4\]]phag pa dang /_sbur ba la sogs pa'i lus su gyur nas rtag par mnam zhing btsog pa dang mi gtsang ba za bar 'gyur te/_/de lta bu'i sdug bsngal bskal pa grangs khri stong du myong ste thar pa'i dus med do/_/rnam par thar par dka'o/_/shin tu mi zad pa yang brjod kyis mi lang ngo /_/gal 
[\[95a.5\]]te lag pa pho mtshan la reg gam/_lag pa mo mtshan la reg gam/_lag pa mi gtsang bas dge 'dun gyi kha zas gtsang ma la reg gam/_dge 'dun gyi kha zas la mi gtsang ba nang du bcug gam/_mi gtsang ba'i zas dge 'dun zar bcug na de lta bu'i sdig pa rnam par smin pa ni thams 
[\[95a.6\]]cad mig nad kyi rims kyis btab pa dang sdig par mi shes pa'o/_/phyin chad dge 'dun gyi kha zas gtsang bar byas pa dang /_lag pa gtsang mas dge 'dun gyi kha zas kyi snod la bzung ba dang /_lag pa gtsang mas khre 'bras bkru ba dang /_kha zas gtsang ma sbyin pa byas pa ni 
[\[95a.7\]]bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyin chad 'di yongs su grags pa dang /_myur bu'i yid kyis zung shig_/'tsho ba rnam par dag pa'i mdo rdzogs so//[ {D207}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_hasti 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]kak+Sh+ya nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_glang po'i rtsal zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong 
[\[95b.2\]]gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mngon par grags pas mngon par grags pa/_gzungs thob pa/_spobs pa thogs pa med pa/_gnyis su med pa'i chos 'chad pa/_rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa drug khri dang yang thabs cig tu 
[\[95b.3\]]bzhugs te/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus dpe med blo gros dang /_mngon par gnon pa'i sgra sgrogs gzi brjid snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin po che bzhi'i me tog rgyas pa dang /_glog chen sgron ma dang /_mtha' yas par lta zhing yul 
[\[95b.4\]]thams cad las 'das pa dang /_ri rab brtsegs pa ltar mngon par 'phags pa dang /_mngon par dga' bas mgu ba skyed pa dang /_dpung pa dri ma med pas 'od zer bcom pa dang /_sems can gyi bsam pa nges pa'i don gyi pha rol du bgrod par dong ba dang /_rdo rje lta bur brtan pa thob pa 
[\[95b.5\]]dang /_sgrar brjod pa dang /_dbyangs dang nga ro thams cad las 'das pa dang /_tshangs pa'i sgra gzi brjid mngon par 'phags pa dang /_grags pa'i sgras 'jigs pa bcom pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rin po che thams cad bsags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[95b.6\]]chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' drug khri rnams dang thabs cig go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi dro'i dus na/_nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 
[\[95b.7\]]shing gzhan zhig gi drung na rab tu zhi ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste bzhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus rgyang ring po nas bcom ldan 'das spyod lam rab tu zhi ba mthong ba dang myur du rtswa bsdus nas phyogs gcig tu skyil mo krung bcas lus bsrang ste/_
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]dran pa mngon du byas nas 'dug go/_/de der 'dug ma thag tu e ma'o de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa rab tu zhi ba 'di dang /_bde ba dang /_yid bde ba 'di ngo mtshar to/_/sems can gang dag chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam par bzhag par rab tu shes 
[\[96a.2\]]pa de dag ni bde ba dang ldan pa yin no snyam du sems la sems kyi rtog pa de lta bu skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te mgur bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das kyi mgur bsal 
[\[96a.3\]]ba'i sgra thos pa dang dga' mgu rangs par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/_/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/stong pa'i chos la ji 
[\[96a.4\]]ltar bdag bzod bzhin/_/gang dag sems can yang dag mi rtog cing /_/chos la'ang nams kyang rtog par mi byed pa/_/'jig rten na ni de dag mnyam par bzhag_/sems can 'khrul la nams kyang mi lta zhing /_/chos rnams nam mkha' bzhin du bsams byas nas/_/gang dag sgyu 
[\[96a.5\]]ma'i ngo bo nyid mos pa/_/gang dag bdag tu lta med de dag bde/_/'di dag sems can yin nam ma yin zhes/_/'du shes thams cad la ni mi dmigs pa/_/sems can kun la 'du shes med pa dang /_/gang dag sems can lta med de dag bde/_/ril por 'du shes nams kyang 
[\[96a.6\]]gang ma chags/_/nams kyang dngos po'i 'du shes rmongs pa med/_/ldang bar mi byed 'dug par byed pa'ang med/_/gang dag srog tu lta med de dag bde/_/sems can tha dad mi byed mkhas pa gang /_/chos kyi dbyings dang 'gal bar mi 'gyur la/_/gang zag 'du shes thams 
[\[96a.7\]]cad rnam par bshig_/gang dag tha dad blo med de dag bde/_/gang dag sbyin dang tshul khrims rtag tu gnas/_/'jungs pa'i bsam par nams kyang ma gyur cing /_/gong bu'i chos la'ang yang dag mi gnas pa/_/gang dag tshul khrims rlom med de dag bde/_/gang dag bzod dang 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]nges pa'i yon tan 'phags/_/gang dag thab mo dag la'ang mi lta zhing /_/brtson 'grus ldan min le lo can yang min/_/gang dag bzod pa'i 'du shes med pa de dag bde/_/gang dag bsam gtan byed cing brtan pa mi gnas pa/_/de yang g.yeng bar rnam par mi sems pa/_/mnyam 
[\[96b.2\]]par bzhag pa'i chos rnams rab tu shes/_/gang dag bsam gtan 'du shes med pa de dag bde/_/gang dag 'du shes med cing 'di la shes rab med/_/mi shes dbang du 'gro ba'ang ma yin la/_/mkhas pa'ang ma yin rmongs pa'ang yod ma yin/_/gang dag shes rab 'du shes med dag 
[\[96b.3\]]bde/_/ji ltar dgon pa de bzhin grong na gnas/_/gnyi gar 'du shes mtshungs shing mnyam par 'jug_/grong gi spyod yul smod par mi byed cing /_/gang dag dgon pas mi rlom de dag bde/_/gang dag bsod snyoms khyim dang bcas par spyod/_/de dag bsod snyoms de yi 'du shes med/_/
[\[96b.4\]]bsod snyoms spyod pa bdag yin snyam mi sems/_/gang dag bsod snyoms 'du shes med dag bde/_/gang dag bor ba'i phyag dar khrod pa rnams/_/blangs nas bdag gis lus la 'chang bar byed/_/bdag ni gos ngan snyam du de mi sems/_/gang dag gzhan la mi smod de dag bde/_/sangs 
[\[96b.5\]]rgyas gnang zhing bde gshegs bsngags pa yi/_/chos gos gsum las lhag par mi 'chang zhing /_/bdag ni 'jigs med yin par mi rtog pa/_/gang dag nga rgyal med pa de dag bde/_/gang na bdag med sems can yod min pa'i/_/gang dag chos mchog dam pa 'chad byed pa/_/
[\[96b.6\]]bdag ni 'chad mkhan yin par sems pa'ang med/_/gang dag med par ma gyur de dag bde/_/dkar po kun la yang dag 'du shes med/_/snying po med pa rjes su 'du shes med/_/dkar dang gnag par gang dag mi sems pa/_/gang dag gnyis su mi spyod de dag bde/_/gang dag 
[\[96b.7\]]langs la langs par 'du shes med/_/'dug kyang 'dug par 'du shes yod ma yin/_/nyin mtshan phyad par 'chag cing brtson 'grus rtsom/_/gang dag spros pa med pa de dag bde/_/gang dag gnas min gnas par mi rtog cing /_/khyad par shes pa zhi bar mi rtog la/_/de 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]bzhin gshegs dang mu stegs khyad par med/_/gang dag mchog tu rlom sems med pa de dag bde/_/gang la grangs dang bgrang ba'ang yod ma yin/_/nam mkha'i dbyings ltar mnyam nyid mi gtong la/_/bdag dang sems can tha dad mi sems pa/_/gang 
[\[97a.2\]]dag khyad par thob med de dag bde/_/gang dag sgyu mar gyur cing rmi lam spyod/_/rab tu ma rmongs mig yor lta bur gyur/_/'jig rten dag na chu zla bzhin du spyod/_/gang dag kun tu mi brtson de dag bde/_/sems can gang dag mkhas la don dam lta/_/brda dang tha snyad snying po med par 
[\[97a.3\]]shes/_/rab tu zhi ba'i chos rnams rjes su rtogs/_/gang dag mtshan ma'i spyod yul ma yin de dag bde'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar shes rab zab pa la spyod pa'i chos la mchog tu gyur pa/_
[\[97a.4\]]de legs so legs so/_/shA ri'i bu de bas na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'di la dge slong dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa de dag thams cad khyod kyis sdus shig_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni mi spro'o/_/de ci'i slad 
[\[97a.5\]]du zhe na/_glang po chen po dag ni mgu bar dka' ba'i slad du'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe nyid kyi sku las 'od zer phyung nas des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bskul ba dang /_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri gang na ba dang /_
[\[97a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas bar snang gi nam mkha' la gnas par gyur to/_/dge slong dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags par gyur to/_/rgyal po'i khab 
[\[97a.7\]]kyi grong khyer chen po nas kyang srog chags brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad yod pa'i 'khor 'dus par mkhyen nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i bzhin la gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang 'dzum pa mdzad 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]do/_/de nas de nyid kyi tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/de 
[\[97b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[97b.3\]]pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas khri rnams kyis/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'di la glang po'i rtsal lta bu zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa thos pa dang /_myur ba myur bar [{]rings [,]ring [}]
[\[97b.4\]]pa'i tshul du stan las langs te/_chos gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das da yang glang po'i rtsal lta bu zhes 
[\[97b.5\]]bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bdag la bshad na legs so/_/bde bar gshegs pa bdag la bstan na legs so/_/gang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i bzhin la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de deng sang thos par dkon la/_chos kyi rnam 
[\[97b.6\]]grangs de ngo mtshar du 'gyur zhing zab la zab par snang ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'di ltar khyod lhag mthong la mkhas shing dpyod pa legs so legs so/_/de bas na kun dga' bo khyod legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/
[\[97b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'drir gzhug pa'i phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la de lta bu'i mtshan ma mdzad nas/_de'i phyir gang bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]de lta bu'i zab mo zab pa gang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_mtshan mar lhung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa ma yin pa zhu ba zhu'o snyam du sems par gyur to/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de ltar yid la byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[98a.2\]]gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thams cad dang 
[\[98a.3\]]ldan pa'i 'khor 'di dag kyang 'dus kyis 'jam dpal khyod gang dang gang 'dod pa zhus shig_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yon tan thams cad la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la yang gda' ba lags/_sems can 
[\[98a.4\]]tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa rnams kyang yongs su smin par bgyid cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na yang chu'i zla ba lta bur gda' ba lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis 
[\[98a.5\]]mdor don chen po zhu ba zhus pa legs so legs so/_/de'i rnam par dbye ba rgya cher legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 'tshal lo zhes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[98a.6\]]kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos drug dang ldan na bya ba de dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed cing yon tan gyi chos thams cad la yang gnas par 'gyur ro/_/drug gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa byed pa na/_sbyin pa'i bdag 
[\[98a.7\]]po bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin mod kyi/_bdag ser sna spyod pa las rnam par log par mi mthong ngo /_/tshul khrims la gnas pa yin mod kyi/_bdag tshul khrims ngan pa'i las las 'das pa yin par mi shes so/_/bzod pa dang nges par ldan pa yin mod kyi/_bdag 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]gnod sems kyi spyod pa dang bral bar mi mthong ngo /_/brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin mod kyi/_lus dang sems kyis brtson pa ma yin no/_/bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la mkhas pa yin mod kyi/_sems rtse gcig tu 
[\[98b.2\]]gnas par gyur pa yang ma yin no/_/spyod yul shes rab la gnas pa yin mod kyi/_bdag 'gro ba thams cad las yongs su ma grol bar mthong ngo /_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di drug dang ldan na bya ba de dag yongs su rdzogs par byed cing yon tan gyi chos thams cad la 
[\[98b.3\]]yang gnas pa yin no/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang chos drug dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' bya ba de dag yongs su rdzogs par byed cing yon tan gyi chos thams cad la yang gnas pa yin no/_/drug gang zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can dmyal ba'i gnas yongs 
[\[98b.4\]]su gzung ba yang yongs su 'dzin la mtho ris kyi chos kyang myong bar byed pa dang /_dud 'gror 'gro ba'i gnas kyang yongs su 'dzin la mi'i chos rgya chen po yang myong bar byed pa dang /_rigs dma' bar skye ba yongs su gzung ba yang yongs su 'dzin la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi bde ba yang 
[\[98b.5\]]myong bar byed pa dang /_skye ba thams cad du gtogs par yang ston la 'gro ba'i khyad par gyi bya ba rnams kyang myong bar byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba la mkhas pa yang yin la gnas nas kyang mi 'pho/_'gro ba yang med/_'ong ba yang med cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams 
[\[98b.6\]]cad du yang chu'i zla ba bzhin du snang ba dang /_sgra skad thams cad kyang 'byin la phan tshun 'dres par yang mi byed pa yin te/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' chos de drug dang ldan na bya ba de dag ston cing yon tan gyi chos thams cad la yang gnas pa yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa 
[\[98b.7\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can dmyal ba'i gnas yongs su gzung ba yang yongs su 'dzin la mtho ris kyi chos kyang myong ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]'jam dpal 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pad mo chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sems can dmyal ba'i gnas yongs su gzung ba yang yongs su 'dzin te/_de lha'i bde ba gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]yod pa de dag thams cad de na myong bar 
[\[99a.2\]]byed do/_/sems can de dag gis kyang de dmyal bas dmyal bar mthong ste/_de cha lugs des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag dmyal ba dang bral bar gyur pa la chos 'chad do/_/de sems can stong phrag du ma sems can dmyal ba las rab tu thar bar byed do/_/'jam dpal de ltar 
[\[99a.3\]]na byang chub sems dpa' sems can dmyal ba'i gnas yongs su gzung ba yang yongs su 'dzin la mtho ris kyi chos kyang myong bar byed pa yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dud 'gro'i gnas kyang yongs su 'dzin la mi'i chos rgya chen po 
[\[99a.4\]]yang myong bar bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nye bar zhi ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dud 'gro'i gnas yongs su 'dzin cing sems nyams pa med par mi'i chos rgya chen po myong bar byed 
[\[99a.5\]]do/_/de cha lugs des dud 'gror gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos 'chad de/_de sems can stong phrag mang po chos la 'jog go/_/'jam dpal de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dud 'gro'i gnas kyang yongs su 'dzin la mi'i chos rgya chen po yang myong bar byed pa yin no/_/'jam dpal 
[\[99a.6\]]gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rigs dma' bar skye ba yongs su gzung ba yang yongs su 'dzin la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi bde ba yang myong bar bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di la byang chub sems 
[\[99a.7\]]dpa' mngon par gnon cing rnam par gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_de ting nge 'dzin de mngon par gnon pa dang /_rnam par gsal bas rigs dma' bar skye ba yongs su gzung ba yang yongs su 'dzin la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi bde ba yang myong bar byed 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]de/_thabs des kyang sems can stong phrag du ma chos la 'jog go/_/'jam dpal de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rigs dma' bar skye ba yongs su gzung ba yang yongs su 'dzin la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi bde ba yang myong bar byed pa yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[99b.2\]]ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad du gtogs par yang ston la/_'gro ba'i khyad par bgyid pa yang myong ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di la byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad la btang ba snang ba'i khyad par ston pa 
[\[99b.3\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go/_/de ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas 'gro ba thams cad du gtogs par yang ston cing 'gro ba'i khyad par gyi byed pa yang myong bar byed de/_'jam dpal de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad du gtogs par yang ston la 'gro ba'i 
[\[99b.4\]]khyad par yang myong bar byed pa yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba la mkhas shing gnas nas kyang mi g.yo/_'gro ba yang ma mchis/_'ong ba yang ma mchis la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 
[\[99b.5\]]du yang chu'i zla ba ltar gda' ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzugs thams cad rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug ste/_de ting nge 'dzin de la gnas pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[99b.6\]]rnams su bdag gi lus cig car snang bar byed la gnas nas kyang mi g.yo/_'gro ba yang med/_'ong ba yang med de/_snyoms par zhugs pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong zhing chos kyang nyan te/_'jam dpal de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 
[\[99b.7\]]du 'gro ba la mkhas pa yang yin la gnas nas kyang mi g.yo/_'gro ba yang med/_'ong ba yang med de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang chu'i zla ba bzhin du snang ba yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sgra skad thams cad 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]kyang 'byin par bgyid la phan tshun 'dres par yang mi bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di la byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas par 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob nas sems can gyi sems kyi bsam pa mtha' yas pa la 
[\[100a.2\]]'jug cing sgra bshad pa mtha' yas pa rnams shes/_bdag gi tshul mtha' yas pa rnams kyang rab tu shes te/_de gzungs de thob pas sgra skad thams cad kyang 'byin la phan tshun 'dres par yang mi byed de/_'jam dpal de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sgra skad thams cad kyang 'byin la 
[\[100a.3\]]phan tshun 'dres par yang mi byed pa yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ni mngon par 'byung bar dka'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rtogs par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpas chos kyi rnam 
[\[100a.4\]]grangs ji lta bur rtogs par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rtogs par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas nam mkha'i tshul rtogs par bya'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i tshul ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[100a.5\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' ni chags pa ma yin/_zhe sdang ba ma yin/_rmongs pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang chags pa ma yin/_zhe sdang ba ma yin/_rmongs pa ma yin no/_/'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' ni sbyin pa phun 
[\[100a.6\]]sum tshogs pa ma yin pa nas shes rab kyi bar du phun sum tshogs pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa nas shes rab kyi bar du phun sum tshogs pa ma yin no/_/de 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' ni yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin/_spang 
[\[100a.7\]]bar bya ba ma yin no/_/de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin/_spang bar bya ba ma yin no/_/'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' ni bsgom par bya ba ma yin/_mngon du bya ba ma yin no/_/de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang bsgom par bya ba ma yin/_mngon du bya ba 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]ma yin no/_/'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' ni mun pa ma yin/_snang ba ma yin no/_/de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang mun pa ma yin/_snang ba ma yin no/_/'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' ni kun tu gzung bar bya ba ma yin no/_/de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang kun tu gzung bar bya ba 
[\[100b.2\]]ma yin no/_/'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' ni lam gyis yang dag par zhugs pa ma yin/_lam ngan pas ma yin no/_/de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang lam gyis yang dag par zhugs pa ma yin/_lam ngan pas ma yin no/_/'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' ni nyan thos kyi theg 
[\[100b.3\]]pas yang dag par zhugs pa ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas ma yin/_theg pa chen pos yang dag par zhugs pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang nyan thos kyi theg pas yang dag par zhugs pa ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas ma yin/_theg pa chen pos 
[\[100b.4\]]yang dag par zhugs pa ma yin no/_/'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' ni sems par byed pa ma yin/_shes par byed pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang sems par byed pa ma yin/_shes par byed pa ma yin no/_/'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' ni len par byed pa ma 
[\[100b.5\]]yin/_'dor bar byed par ma yin/_blang bar bya ba ma yin/_dor bar bya ba ma yin no/_/de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang len par byed pa ma yin/_'dor bar byed pa ma yin/_blang bar bya ba ma yin/_dor bar bya ba ma yin no/_/'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' ni gang gis kyang nyon 
[\[100b.6\]]mongs par bya mi nus so/_/de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar gtogs pa'i chos thams cad kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin te/_de dag zhi bar yang mi 'gyur/_nye bar zhi bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' ni mi gnas pa'i phyir gnas ma yin/_gnas 
[\[100b.7\]]pa ma yin/_g.yo bar mi byed/_'gul bar mi byed do/_/byang chub sems dpas de bzhin du chos thams cad mi gnas pa la gnas par blta'o/_/de dag yang dag par thob pas mi 'gul/_mi g.yo/_mi gnas/_gnas par mi byed do/_/de la 'jam dpal chos thams cad kyi 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]ngo bo nyid de lta bu la gang de bzhin gshegs pa lta bar 'dod pa de dag ni log par lta ba'o/_/gang log par lta ba de dag ni yang dag par zhugs pa'o/_/gang yang dag par zhugs pa de dag la byin pa ni 'bras bu che ba ma yin/_phan yon che ba ma yin no/_/gang dag 
[\[101a.2\]]la byin na 'bras bu che ba ma yin/_phan yon che ba ma yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas so/_/gang 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas yin pa de dag la sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa med do/_/gang la sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa med pa de dag gis 'du shes med pa yongs su rdzogs par byas so/_/
[\[101a.3\]]gang gi 'du shes med pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa de dag myur du mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'khor de'i nang nas dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can drug cu bstan pa 'di thos pa dang 'di snyam du gyur te/_mun nag gi lam du gyur la de bzhin gshegs pa yang 
[\[101a.4\]]mun nag gi lam du ston to/_/'di lta ste/_mu stegs can gzhan dag kyang de skad ston/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang de skad ston pas de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_mu stegs can gzhan gang 'od srung dang /_ma ska ri 'ga' ba ya la dang /_mi dkar ba skra'i la ba can dang /_kun 
[\[101a.5\]]rgyal 'be'i ra ti'i bu dang /_dpon po kA t+yA ya na dang /_gcer bu pa nye du'i bu rnams kyi tshig mtshungs so snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams kyi sems kyi rtog pa mkhyen nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[101a.6\]]'jam dpal de de bzhin te/_gang ngas chos bshad pa 'di mu stegs can gzhan rnams dang mtshungs na/_mu stegs can gzhan rnams kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pas chos bshad pa mi shes so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams lhag par 
[\[101a.7\]]sdug bsngal/_mi dga'/_ma mgu/_ma rangs/_chos bshad pa 'di yang ma shes nas stan las langs te dong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa khyed gar 'dong /_de dag gis de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]pa shA ri'i bu chos bshad pa 'di bdag cag gis ma 'tshal to/_/des de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs te bstan pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs te/_de skad bstan pa de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[101b.2\]]la zhu ba'i bar du re zhig sdod cig_/de nas dge slong de dag tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i tshig thos nas so so'i stan la slar 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong 'di dag gi the tshom bsal ba'i slad du de bzhin 
[\[101b.3\]]gshegs pas ci las dgongs te 'di skad bstan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_dge slong gang nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol ba de sgra gang gis kyang dngang ba dang /_skrag pa dang /_
[\[101b.4\]]kun tu skrag par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/dge slong bden pa mthong ba yang sgra thams cad kyis mi dngang /_mi skrag_/kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur na dge slong gang nye bar len pa ma mchis par zag pa las sems rnam par grol ba lta ci smos/_bcom 
[\[101b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 'di la skyes bu blun po kha cig yang dag pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams brtags nas lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du gyur cing gnas so/_/shA ri'i bus gsol pa/_gang thos nas 'khor thams cad the tshom ma mchis par 'gyur ba'i tshig bshad pa de dag 
[\[101b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa rmi lam dang mtshungs/_sgyu ma dang mtshungs par mthong ba des yang dag par mthong ngo /_/gang yang dag par mthong ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag 
[\[101b.7\]]par 'du shes mi byed/_snying por 'du shes dang /_rdzas su 'du shes dang /_dngos por 'du shes dang /_ril por 'du shes mi byed/_gang de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag par 'du shes pa ma yin/_snying po dang /_rdzas dang /_dngos po dang /_ril por 'du shes pa ma yin pa de dag 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]gis 'du byed thams cad [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]par mthong ngo /_/gang gis 'du byed thams cad [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]par mthong ba de dag gis chos thams cad log par shes so/_/gang gis chos thams cad log par shes pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas log par lta ba yongs su rdzogs pa 
[\[102a.2\]]yin par bstan to/_/de dag gis lta bar gyur pa thams cad log pa yin par yang shes te/_de'i phyir yang de dag log par lta ba zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des gang de bzhin gshegs pa lta bar 'dod pa de dag log par lta ba zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu de dag ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[102a.3\]]pa'i sku ma 'khrugs par lta ba'o/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku log pa yin par rtog pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes med pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu gang 'di ltar log par shes pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gang log 
[\[102a.4\]]par lta ba de dag yang dag par zhugs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gang so so'i skye bo rnams rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_dpyod pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa dang /_ldang bar byed pa dang /_kun tu ldang bar byed pa dang /_rten pa dang /_gnas pa dang /_
[\[102a.5\]]len pa dang /_'dor ba dang /_bdag dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_gang zag tu lta ba nye bar len pa dang /_bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa dang /_bdag gir 'dzin pa la chags pa de dag gi spyod pa dang /_shes pa dang /_g.yo ba dang /_spros pa de lta bu dag de dag gis shes 
[\[102a.6\]]te/_de dag ji lta bur yod pa ma yin pa de lta bu nyid du shes so/_/shA ri'i bu med pa zhes bya ba de ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba de ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa zhes bya ba de ni log pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/de ltar gang tshul 'di lta bu yang dag pa ma yin 
[\[102a.7\]]par 'dzin pa dag log par mthong ba de'i phyir de dag yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu rnam grangs de nyid kyis gang log par lta ba de dag yang dag par zhugs pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gang yang dag par zhugs pa de dag la stsal na 'bras bu che ba ma lags/_
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]phan yon che ba ma lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gang tshul 'di lta bus yang dag par zhugs pa dang ldan par gyur pa de dag la sbyin pa ni mya ngan las 'da' ba la gzhol/_mya ngan las 'da' ba la 'bab/_mya ngan las 'da' ba la bab/_mya ngan las 'da' ba'i mthar 
[\[102b.2\]]thug par 'gyur te/_mya ngan las 'da' ba yang 'bras bu chung ba yang ma yin/_'bras bu che ba yang ma yin/_phan yon chung ba yang ma yin/_phan yon che ba yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mya ngan las 'das pa ni 'bras bu thams cad dang bral zhing btags pa ma yin/_gdags par bya 
[\[102b.3\]]ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na de bzhin gshegs pas mya ngan las 'das pa/_gdags su ma mchis pa la ji ltar yon tan mtha' yas pa'i sman yon gyi bye brag bstan/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu skye ba'i spyod yul can gyi 
[\[102b.4\]]sems can bdag dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_gang zag tu smra ba rnams mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa gdags su med pa la yang de bzhin gshegs pas yon tan mtha' yas pa'i phan yon gyi bye brag bstan to/_/shA ri'i bu 'on kyang 'phags pa rnams ni sbyin pa 
[\[102b.5\]]la 'jug par mi blta'i/_'phags pa rnams 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_sbyin pa las ldog par blta'o/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na zhing pa dag zhing la nas kyi sa bon btab ste/_de'i nas de nyid la brten nas sre da dang /_rtswa dang /_sngo rnams skye na/_shA ri'i bu de ji 
[\[102b.6\]]snyam du sems/_sre da dang rtswa dang /_sngo 'di dag zhing pa de'i las byas pa'i 'bras bu yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na zhing pas nas kyi sa bon btab pa de'i nas de dag nyid la brten 
[\[102b.7\]]nas sred rnams 'byung ba dang /_rtswa dang /_sngo rnams skye bar 'gyur te/_nas kyi snyi ma gzhan rnams kyang 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du 'phags pa rnams la sbyin pa byin pa ni tshegs chung ngus longs spyod chen por 'gyur la/_gzhan yang zag pa zad pa sred pa'i 'bras bu thams cad skems par byed 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]do/_/'di lta ste/_dper na nas 'dod pa dag 'di ni nas kyi sa bon de'i 'bras bu ma yin/_'di ni nas kyi sa bon de'i snyi ma ma yin no snyam nas sre das mgu bar mi 'gyur zhing /_rtswa dang /_sngos rangs par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'dus ma byas pa'i zhing la sbyin pa byin pa 'dus byas 
[\[103a.2\]]kyi 'bras bu yin par bstan par mi bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des gang yang dag par zhugs pa de dag la byin pa 'bras bu che ba ma yin/_phan yon che ba ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang dag la stsal na 'bras bu che ba ma lags shing sman yon che ba ma lags pa de dag 
[\[103a.3\]]ji ltar 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gang 'bras bu che bar 'du shes pa yang ma yin/_'bras bu chung bar 'du shes pa yang ma yin pa de dag sbyin pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang sbyin pa skye bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni lha dang bcas pa'i 
[\[103a.4\]]'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de la zad mi shes pa'i zhing la sbyin pa byin pa ni me tog kyang mi chags/_'bras bur yang mi 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu rnam grangs 'dis gang la byin na 'bras bu che ba yang ma yin/_phan yon che ba yang ma yin pa de dag 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas 
[\[103a.5\]]yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gang 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas de dag la byin pa rnam par smin pa ma mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_sbyin pa gang mya ngan las 'da' ba'i mthar thug par 'gyur ba de rnam par smin pa'i chos 
[\[103a.6\]]can yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa de de ste sbyin pa'i chos can lags na/_'phags pa'i gang zag rnams 'dus ma byas pas rab tu phye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 
[\[103a.7\]]legs so/_/legs so/_/rnam grangs 'dis gang 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas yin pa de dag la byin pa rnam par smin pa med pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gang sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa ma mchis pa de dag gis 'du shes ma mchis pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis pa 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_gang chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa de yod dam/_'on te med/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid 'tshal ba de sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid 'tshal ba lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis 
[\[103b.2\]]pa lags te/_mchis pa ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid du bstan to/_/sgyu ma lta bu gang lags pa de yang ma mchis pa'o/_/gang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid 'tshal ba 'di ni 'du shes ma mchis pa'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[103b.3\]]slad du zhe na/_'di la gang yang dag par gyur pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu legs so/_/legs so/_/de de bzhin te/_shA ri'i bu 'di la chos 'ga' zhig rdzas sam/_yang dag par yod par gyur na sems can rnams phyis kyang mya ngan 
[\[103b.4\]]las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir chos thams cad yang dag pa ma yin/_yod pa ma yin/_rdzas ma yin pa de'i phyir sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mya ngan las bzlas kyang sems can med pa'i phyir sems can rnams las gang yang zad par mi mngon no/_/shA ri'i bu de lta 
[\[103b.5\]]bas na gang sems can thams cad med pa'i 'du shes dang /_de dag kyang mi dmigs pa 'di ni 'du shes med pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des gang dag la byin pa rnam par smin pa med pa de dag gis 'du shes med pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[103b.6\]]ldan 'das ji ltar na gang dag gis 'du shes med pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis pa'i 'du shes des myur du mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu gang gis med pa mngon sum du byas pa de dag ni shes pa'o/_/med pa yang gang zhe na/_med 
[\[103b.7\]]pa zhes bya ba ni bdag tu lta ba dang /_sems can du lta ba dang /_srog tu lta ba dang /_gang zag tu lta ba dang /_chad par lta ba dang /_rtag par lta ba'o/_/med pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa dang /_chos su 'du shes pa dang /_dge 'dun du 'du shes pa dang /_mya ngan las 'da' bar 'du 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]shes pa dang /_ji tsam du sems kyi sbyor ba dang /_spyod pa dang /_shes pa dang /_g.yo ba dang /_spros pa de dag thams cad med pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu de bas na tshul de lta bur yang dag pa ma yin par 'dzin pa de dag las yongs su grol ba de dag ni shes pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu rnam 
[\[104a.2\]]grangs des gang gis 'du shes med pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa de dag myur du mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgongs te gsungs pa'i bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/dge bsnyen 
[\[104a.3\]]drug stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/lha'i bu sum khri drug stong rnams kyis ye shes mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can drug cu po de dag rnams kyang nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/
[\[104a.4\]]de dag sems rnam par grol nas mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni deng slan chad ston pa drug rnams kyi rjes su rab tu byung ngo /_/deng slan cad bdag cag gi ston pa sangs rgyas ma lags/_chos la mi rten/_dge 'dun la mi rten to/_/deng slan chad bdag cag 
[\[104a.5\]]bya ba ma mchis par smra ba/_rgyu ma mchis par smra ba/_las ma mchis par smra ba/_rnam par smin pa ma mchis par smra ba/_'dul ba ma lags par smra ba'o/_/de'i tshe 'khor de na srog chags stong phrag mang po rnams 'di snyam du gyur te/_'di ltar dge slong 'di dag 'di lta bu yang dag pa ma 
[\[104a.6\]]yin pa'i tshig smra ba las na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bslab pa phul nas mu stegs can gyi mtshan ma 'dzin par mi 'gyur ram snyam du gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems kyis 'khor de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa shes nas dge slong de dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ci las 
[\[104a.7\]]bsams te/_deng phan chad bdag cag ston pa drug gi rjes su rab tu byung ngo zhes de skad smra/_de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu deng phan chad bdag cag gi ston pa thams cad ston pa drug dang mnyam zhing mtshan nyid gcig cing bye brag med par rnam par rig go/_/bdag cag 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]gis ston pa thams cad tha dad pa med par rig nas rnam par mi rtog par rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo /_/smras pa ci las bsams nas deng phan chad bdag cag gi ston pa sangs rgyas ma yin no zhes de skad smra/_de dag gis smras pa/_deng phan chad bdag cag bdag la rten gyi gzhan la mi rten/_
[\[104b.2\]]bdag la skyabs su dong gi gzhan la skyabs su dong ba ma yin/_bdag ston pa yin gyi ston pa gzhan ma yin no/_/de bas na deng phan chad bdag cag gi ston pa sangs rgyas ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag ma gtogs par sangs rgyas med/_sangs rgyas ma gtogs par bdag med do/_/
[\[104b.3\]]smras pa/_ci las bsams nas deng phan chad bdag cag chos la mi rten/_dge 'dun la mi rten ces de skad smra/_de dag gis smras pa/_deng phan chad bdag cag gis gang la brten pa dang /_gang dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i chos gang yang ma dmigs so/_/de bas na bdag cag deng phan chad chos 
[\[104b.4\]]la mi rten/_dge 'dun la mi rten to/_/smras pa/_ci las bsams te bdag cag deng phan chad bya ba med par smra'o zhes de skad ces zer/_de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag gis deng phan chad chos thams cad ma byas par shes te/_gang na byas pa yang med/_'gyur ba yang med pa'i chos de 
[\[104b.5\]]bdag cag gis mngon du byas so/_/de bas na deng phan chad bdag cag bya ba med par smra'o/_/smras pa/_ci las bsams te deng phan chad bdag cag rgyu med par smra'o zhes de skad zer/_de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag srid pa thams cad du 'gro bar skye ba'i rgyu deng zad de gang na rgyu yang med 
[\[104b.6\]]rkyen yang med pa'i chos de mngon du byas so/_/de'i phyir deng phan chad bdag cag rgyu med par smra'o/_/smras pa/_ci las bsams te deng phan chad bdag cag rnam par smin pa med par smra'o zhes de skad zer/_de dag gis smras pa/_deng phan chad bdag cag gis gang na las kyang med/_las kyi
