[\[104b.7\]]rnam par smin pa yang med cing /_chos thams cad shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das par yongs su shes so/_/de'i phyir bdag cag deng phan chad las kyi rnam par smin pa med par smra'o/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ci las bsams te deng phan chad bdag cag 'dul ba ma yin par 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]smra'o zhes de skad zer/_de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu deng phan chad bdag cag gis gang na 'dul ba yang med/_gsung ba yang med/_'dul ba ma yin pa yang med cing chos thams cad shin tu dul bar yongs su shes te/_de'i phyir bdag cag deng phan 
[\[105a.2\]]chad 'dul ba ma yin par smra'o/_/de nas dge slong de dag gi lhag pa'i nga rgyal bstan pa 'di lta bu thos nas dge slong sum stong drug brgya rnams nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rab tu rnam par grol lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin 
[\[105a.3\]]te/_dge slong dag gang na chos gang yang rtogs pa med pa de ni yang dag pa thob pa yin gyis legs so legs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rtogs pa rtogs pa zhes bgyi ba'i rtogs pa de chos gang gi tshig 
[\[105a.4\]{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal rtogs pa rtogs pa zhes bya ba de ni skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/gsol pa/_skye ba ma mchis pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpas ji ltar bslab par bgyi/_
[\[105a.5\]]ji ltar spyad par bgyi/_ji ltar rnal 'byor du 'jug par bgyi/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa bslab pa shes par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa bla med pa'i/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[105a.6\]]ye shes thob 'dod pas/_/chos rnams gang yang mi gzung zhing /_/chos rnams gang yang mi 'dor ro/_/gang zhig skye bar 'gyur ba yi/_/chos ni gang yang mi rnyed de/_/chos rnams 'byung ba med pa la/_/byis pa dag ni 'byung bar 'dod/_/chos rnams shes par bya ba dang /_/spang bar bya 
[\[105a.7\]]bar srog chags 'chad/_/byis pa skye ba'i spyod yul can/_/skye ba med la dad mi 'gyur/_/byang chub lam ni dam pa dang /_/lam gyi chos rnams btang byas te/_/byis pa gnyis la chags pa ste/_/gnyis su med pa mi shes so/_/sgyu ma sna tshogs gyur pa la/_/byis pa rnams kyis tha dad 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]mthong /_/'di la tha dad yod ma yin/_/de dag thams cad mtshan nyid gcig_/so so'i skye bor gang brjod dang /_/'jig rten sangs rgyas mkhas pa dag_/mi gnyis gnyis su dbyer med de/_/de dag sgyu ma'i tshul du mnyam/_/byis pa kha cig smra ba ni/_/nam zhig bdag cag 
[\[105b.2\]]'dod chags zad/_/zhe sdang gti mug zhi bar 'gyur/_/nam zhig nyon mongs med par 'gyur/_/med la yod par 'du shes pa'i/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gzhig pa'i phyir/_/gang dag stong pa nyid ston pa/_/de dag chad pa mya ngan 'das/_/zad pa med cing skye med par/_/mya ngan 
[\[105b.3\]]'das pa yang dag bstan/_/zad cing skye med gang brtson pa/_/de dag nga yi bstan las ring /_/sbyin dang tshul khrims 'du shes dang /_/gang dag byang chub 'du shes dga'/_/de dag mtshan ma'i spyod yul bas/_/nga yi byang chub des mi rtogs/_/byis pa med pas rmongs pa dag_/
[\[105b.4\]]chos rnams gsog tu mi shes te/_/chos rnams mtshan nyid gcig pa la/_/de dag tha dad 'byed par byed/_/gang gis chos 'di shes pa ni/_/ngo bo nyid kyis mtshan med pa/_/sor mo lnga yi lag pa bzhin/_/de dag byang chub rnyed mi dka'/_/byang chub gang dang yang mi ring /_/gang dang 
[\[105b.5\]]yang ni nye ba med/_/rtog dang rnam rtog gang ldan pa/_/de dag byang chub rab tu ring /_/byis pa phan tshun spyod pa dag_/gcig la gcig ni smod byed pa/_/'di ni tshul khrims ldan ma yin/_/tshul khrims mi ldan 'di mi srun/_/chos rnams rmi lam lta bu ste/_/'dus byas thams 
[\[105b.6\]]cad yang dag min/_/sgyu ma bzhin du skye mthong nas/_/mkhas pa snying por mi 'dzin to/_/bden par 'di la tshul khrims med/_/tshul khrims mi ldan bden par med/_/chos rnams brten te byung bas na/_/'di la bdag ni yod ma yin/_/bskal pa bye ba stong dag tu/_/snyom las med par 
[\[105b.7\]]sbyin pa byin/_/tshul khrims dag ni mchog bsrungs kyang /_/'dren pas nga ni lung ma bstan/_/gang tshe nga ni 'du shes bral/_/sbyin pa'i 'du shes ma lus dang /_/rnam par rtog pa kun spangs pa/_/de tshe byang chub lung bstan to/_/sbyin pas longs spyod 'gyur bar bstan/_/tshul khrims 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]kyis ni mtho ris bstan/_/gang na [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]mi dmigs pa/_/de ni byang chub bla med do/_/byis pa dmigs par gnas pa dag_/mi skye 'dus ma byas pa yi/_/bzod pa bdag gis thob po zhes/_/mi mkhas pa dag rtog par byed/_/chos rnams skye ba med pa la/_/gang 
[\[106a.2\]]dag skye bar sems pa ni/_/bskal pa bye ba stong du yang /_/de yi bzod pa rnyed par dka'/_/chos rnams ming gis lung bstan te/_/chos rnams la ni byed pa med/_/rtsa ba med cing gnas med de/_/thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do/_/sangs rgyas bye ba mang po yis/_/'dod chags 
[\[106a.3\]]zhe sdang spang ba'i phyir/_/chos mchog dag kyang bshad mod kyi/_/chos rnams zad pa'ang yong med do/_/gal te chos de yang dag na/_/thams cad yang dag zad par 'gyur/_/gang phyir de dag yang dag min/_/de bas mtha' ni mi rnyed do/_/'dod chags zhe sdang mtha' yas te/_/gti mug 
[\[106a.4\]]gi ni mtha' yang med/_/gang dag gi ni mtha' med pa/_/de dag gi ni rtsa ba med/_/sa bon myu gu med na ni/_/'dab ma 'bras bu ga la 'byung /_/'dab ma med pa gang yin pa/_/de la me tog yod ma yin/_/chos rnams skye ba med pa la/_/sems can sa bon mi rnyed do/_/sems can sa bon 
[\[106a.5\]]med pa'i phyir/_/skye med mya ngan 'da' ba med/_/ji ltar bud med mo sham dag_/de la bu ni yod ma yin/_/de la bu ni yod min na/_/bu yi mya ngan byed pa med/_/chos rnams thams cad ma skyes par/_/de ltar rig cing mthong nas ni/_/'khor ba dag tu 'khor ba na/_/sdug bsngal 'jigs 
[\[106a.6\]]pa de la med/_/byis pa med pas rmongs pa dag_/rmongs pas chos nyid mi shes te/_/nam mkha' khur du thogs byas te/_/mi mkhas pa dag skyo bar 'gyur/_/med cing mtha' yang med pa dang /_/grangs med pa dang tshad med par/_/gang gis chos 'di shes pa ni/_/de dag la ni skyo ba med/_/
[\[106a.7\]]ji ltar thog ma'i mtha' dag ni/_/med pa dag tu ngas bstan pa/_/de bzhin phyi ma'i mtha' dag dang /_/dbus kyang mtshan nyid gcig pa yin/_/rtog pa'i mtha' ni mtha' med de/_/mtha' ni gsob dang med pa yin/_/don rnams de ltar shes byas na/_/dngos po gnyis su mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]mtha' ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/_/sems can mtha' ni bsam mi khyab/_/mtha' ni mig yor lta bu ste/_/de bas ye shes shes mi 'gyur/_/rnam par rtog la spyod pa na/_/sdig pa ji ltar zad par 'gyur/_/nam zhig sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur zhes/_/sems ni de ltar 'jug par 'gyur/_/
[\[106b.2\]]sangs rgyas dag ni ma skyes pas/_/de dag 'byung ba gang yang med/_/'byung ba med pa'i chos rnams la/_/byis pa rnams ni 'byung bar 'dod/_/nam mkha' la ni rten pa dang /_/gnas dang gnas par bya mi nus/_/nam mkha' la ni gnas med de/_/thogs pa med cing dngos po med/_/ji 
[\[106b.3\]]ltar nam mkha' dngos med pa/_/de ltar byang chub shes par byos/_/ji ltar byang chub shes bya ba/_/de ltar sems can shes par byos/_/nam mkha'i dbyings dang byang chub dang /_/sems can khams rnams de dag mnyam/_/gang gis de dag mnyam shes pa/_/de yis byang chub rnyed mi 
[\[106b.4\]]dka'/_/gang dag byang chub mi brtson zhing /_/tshul bzhin du yang sems mi byed/_/chos rnams tshol bar mi byed pa/_/de yis byang chub rnyed mi dka'/_/byang chub btsal du med pa ste/_/ji ltar tshol ba thams cad ltar/_/sems kyi thob pa rnams kyis ni/_/bla med byang chub rtogs 
[\[106b.5\]]mi nus/_/sbyin pas byang chub thob snyam nas/_/sbyin pa'i sems pa gang sems pa/_/byang chub thob pa gang yang med/_/ma thob pa ni byang chub mchog_/tshul khrims sems la gang chags dang /_/brtson 'grus yang dag nyid rtog cing /_/gang dag 'du shes 'jug par byed/_/nga 
[\[106b.6\]]yi bstan la de mi sbyor/_/chos kun sbyor ba med pa la/_/nga yis sbyor ba nye bstan te/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]rtsom pa gang med pa/_/de ni sbyor ba bla med pa'o/_/chos 'di rnams ni zag pa med/_/chos 'di zag dang bcas pa zhes/_/gang la 'du shes de yod pa/_/de yi sems ni tshul bzhin min/_/
[\[106b.7\]]gang gis chos rnams bsam yas pa/_/nam mkha' 'dra ba mthong ba dang /_/ma bcings pa dang ma grol ba/_/de yi shes rab bla na med/_/gang zhig tshul khrims ldan par rtog_/tshul khrims mi ldan rnam rtog pa/_/gnyis ni tshul khrims ngan par bshad/_/gnyis su med pa tshul 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]khrims mchog_/chos rnams tha dad bya ba med/_/khyad par med cing mtshan med par/_/gang gis mthong zhing shes pa dag_/de dag nga yi bstan pa 'dzin/_/gang gis sems ni nam mkha' ltar/_/ma chags bzhin du phyogs su 'gro/_de ltar ye shes chags 
[\[107a.2\]]med pa/_/de yi dge sbyong yang dag nyid/_/gang gis [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]ma brtags shing /_/thams cad du yang sems pa med/_/sems can med cing chos med pa/_/de dag byang chub rnyed mi dka'/_/'dod chags mtha' la gang mi gnas/_/'dod chags dang yang bral ma gyur/_/'dod chags 
[\[107a.3\]]las kyang rgyal mi byed/_/de ni byang chub mi dkon no/_/gang dag bskal par mi skyo zhing /_/mthas kyang 'jig par mi 'gyur la/_/'khor bas skrag par mi 'gyur ba/_des ni byang chub rnyed mi dka'/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs nas 'jam 
[\[107a.4\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos par byed/_the tsom du mi byed/_nem nur du mi byed/_lung sbyin par byed/_'dzin par byed/_klog par byed/_kun chub par byed/_gzhan la yang rgya cher yang 
[\[107a.5\]]dag par ston pa de'i phan yon bsngags pa nyi shu yod par re bar bya'o/_/nyi shu gang zhe na/_lhas bsrungs par 'gyur/_klus bsrungs par 'gyur/_gnod sbyin gyis bsrungs par 'gyur/_sems g.yengs par mi 'gyur/_tshe brjes nas kyang tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_mngon par 
[\[107a.6\]]shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur/_tshe brjes ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' byams pa mthong bar 'gyur/_de ste chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems mi g.yeng bar yid la byed cing gnyid kyi snyom pa sel na/_de'i rmi lam du sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' mthong 
[\[107a.7\]]ba yang re bar bya'o/_/de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos na rjes su 'thun pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa re bar bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems na tshe 'di nyid la gnod sems med par re bar bya'o/_/dug myur ba'i nang na 'dug na yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yid la byed na 'jigs pa 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]med par re bar bya'o/_/slar rgol ba tshar gcod par re bar bya'o/_/kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par re bar bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rtogs par byed pa'i tshe las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar re bar bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa na yang chos kyi sgo brgya stong du ma 
[\[107b.2\]]thob par re bar bya'o/_/byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa dang /_mtha' yas 'khyil ba'i gzungs thob par yang re bar bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yid la byed pa na yang bdud kyis bskor ba med par re bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs par yang skye bar re bar bya'o/_/smon 
[\[107b.3\]]lam thams cad grub par yang re bar bya'o/_/srog chags kyi rigs rkang pa med pa dang /_rkang gnyis pa dang /_rkang bzhi pa dang /_rkang pa mang po dug can rnams las bsrungs par re bar bya'o/_/de la mi'i rgyal po 'khrugs pa'i 'jigs pa med par re bar bya ste/_'jam dpal 
[\[107b.4\]]gang sems la the tshom med pa dang /_nem nur med par chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par byed/_'chang bar byed/_klog par byed/_kun chub par byed/_gzhan la yang rgyas par yang dag par ston pa'i chos smra ba de la yon tan bsngags pa nyi shu po 'di rnams yod par re bar 
[\[107b.5\]]bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na sman gyi shing thams cad ni sems can rnams kyi nad thams cad zhi bar bgyid do/_/de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang nad thams cad rab tu zhi 
[\[107b.6\]]bar bgyid par blta bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin no/_/'jam dpal de de bzhin te/_khyod kyis tshig 'di legs par smras so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal sngon 'das 
[\[107b.7\]]pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med cing shin tu grangs med pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i stabs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba zhig 'jig rten du byung bar gyur te/_des srog chags stong phrag du ma rnams la rgyang ring po nas 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad do/_/de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'dus te 'dus par gyur to/_/des de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan to/_/des sems g.yeng ba med pa dang /_the tsom med pa dang /_
[\[108a.2\]]nem nur med pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yon tan bsngags pa dang bcas par bzung zhing kun chub par byas te/_kun chub par byas nas kyang mos pa'i mthu dang ldan par gyur te/_grong dang grong khyer dang /_ljongs dang /_yul dang yul 'khor dang /_pho brang 'khor du 'ongs nas bdag 
[\[108a.3\]]ni sman pa'o/_/bdag ni sman pa'o zhes bdag nyid khas 'che'o/_/de nas de ma thag tu srog chags nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba stong phrag du ma srog gi skyabs kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan ga la ba der lhags so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan 
[\[108a.4\]]mos pa'i mthu la gnas pa'i sems kyis sems can de dag la chos kyi gzhung 'dis brims so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las gang rig sngags 'byung ba de dag gis kyang bsrungs pa dang /_bskyabs pa dang /_yongs su bzung bar byas so/_/'jam dpal de la rig sngags kyi 
[\[108a.5\]]tshig de dag kyang gang zhe na/_tad ya thA/_a la ta/_bi tA la/_bi b+h+ri na/_a tir+tha/_a b+h+ri da/_a nu Da/_bi bra m+ha/_na hi kha ga ru nga /_mA yA su kha/_A nan da/_dzA la da/_na da mi tra/_a mi tra/_dzo tra hi ta/_sarba da tra la/_a~M ga ma~M ga aratha yu ta/_sa brA mA i sha_/rig 
[\[108a.6\]]sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams kyis sems can de dag bsrung ba byas so/_/des gal te gdug pas zos pa'am/_gal te mi ma yin pas gtses pa'am/_srog chags kyi rigs dug can gang yang rung ba 'ga' zhig gis zin pa'am gal te nad skem pa dang /_mdze byung ba'am/_gal 
[\[108a.7\]]te rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang 'dus pa'i nad kyis btab pa/_nad sna tshogs kyis rab tu gzir ba'i sems can de dag nad de dang de dag las rab tu thar bar byas so/_/'jam dpal de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gnas 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]nas sems can de rnams nad las rab tu thar bar byas so/_/'jam dpal khyod ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de gzhan yin pa snyam du sems na de de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i tshe de'i dus na nga nyid byang chub sems 
[\[108b.2\]]dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar gyur te/_ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos nas sems can de snyed kyi don byas so/_/'jam dpal rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_sman thams cad kyi kha ba ji lta ba de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la blta bar bya'o/_/
[\[108b.3\]]'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rig sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_kun chub par bgyid pas ji lta bur kun tu spyad par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal rig sngags 'di dag 'don pa'i 
[\[108b.4\]]byang chub sems dpas gtsang sbra bya ba dang /_sha mi bza' bar kun tu spyad par bya'o/_/des rkang pa gnyis kyang mi bsku'o/_/'du 'dzi'i nang na gnas par mi bya'o/_/sems can thams cad la yang phyi phyir zhing byams pa'i sems su bya'o/_/gang dag las 'tshe ba 'ong bar 'gyur ba de 
[\[108b.5\]]dag la sems gdug par mi bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang gtsang sbra ma phyed pas kha ton mi bya'o/_/sa phyogs mi gtsang bar gzhag par mi bya'o/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam bgyid de/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa'i byang chub 
[\[108b.6\]]sems dpas bdag gi lus dang srog la mi lta bar bgyi'o snyam du sems so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_khyod ji skad zer ba de bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[108b.7\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di skye bo mang po'i don byed par 'gyur gyis/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis zung shig_/kun dga' bo sems can gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa de dag glang po'i rtsal dang /_glang po chen po'i rtsal gyis gnon par 'gyur/_kun dga' bo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]'di la mos pa de dag seng ge'i 'gros dang /_khyu mchog gi 'gros su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu dga' ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'byung bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/nga 'das pa'i phyi na byang 
[\[109a.2\]]chub sems dpa'i lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i glegs bam du 'ong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sgrom du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' gdol pa rnams kyi lag tu 'ong bar mi 'gyur/_glegs bam du 'ong ba dang /_sgrom du 'ong bar mi 'gyur 
[\[109a.3\]]ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bdag gis gzung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam 
[\[109a.4\]]grangs 'di ji ltar zin pa bzhin du gang dag la byin pa'i sems can de dag la khyod ston pa'i bya ba byed pa legs so legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[109a.5\]]pa dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams yid dga' ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod do/_/glang po'i rtsal zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[109a.6\]{D208}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sgra chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 
[\[109a.7\]]'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/_lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]la song ngo /_/mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la 'gro ba na/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos khang pa brtsegs pa chen po phyi nang byugs shing byi dor byas pa/_sgo gtan legs par bcug pa/_skar khung bcad pa zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_gang zhig gis 
[\[109b.2\]]khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta bu zhig byas te phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed pa dang /_gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod rten gyi bum pa skyu ru ra tsam gyi nang du bcug ste/_srog shing khab tsam btsugs 
[\[109b.3\]]nas gdugs rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'dogs par byed pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs tshon gang tsam zhig byed na/_de gnyis las gang bsod nams ches mang du 'phel snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mnyan yod nas bsod snyoms las slar 'khor nas zan zos 
[\[109b.4\]]te zas phyi ma spangs nas lhung bzed dang /_chos gos bzhag ste rkang pa bkrus nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[109b.5\]]dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'di na bdag snga dro sham thabs dang /_chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la mchis te/_btsun pa bdag mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la mchi ba na khang pa brtsegs pa chen po slad nang byugs 
[\[109b.6\]]shing byi dor bgyis pa/_sgo gtan legs par stsal pa/_skar khung bkum pa zhig mthong lags so/_/mthong nas kyang bdag nyid 'di snyam du sems te/_gang zhig gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta bu zhig bgyis te phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la dbul bar bgyid pa dang /_
[\[109b.7\]]gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod rten gyi bum pa skyu ru ra tsam gyi nang du stsal te/_srog shing khab tsam btsugs nas gdugs rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'dogs par bgyid pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]gzugs tshon gang ba tsam zhig bgyid na/_de gnyis las gang bsod nams ches mang du 'phel snyam bgyid lags te/_bcom ldan 'das la bdag don 'di yongs su zhu lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[110a.2\]]bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo legs so legs so/_/kun dga' bo khyod gang zhig gis khang pa brtsegs pa de lta bu zhig byas te phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la dbul bar byed la/_gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring 
[\[110a.3\]]bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod rten gyi bum pa skyu ru ra tsam gyi nang du bcug ste/_srog shing khab tsam btsugs nas gdugs rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'dogs par byed pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs tshon gang tsam zhig byed na/_de gnyis las gang bsod nams ches 
[\[110a.4\]]mang du 'phel zhes pa ni khyod kyi zhu ba bzang la spobs pa legs te dpyod pa dge'o/_/kun dga' bo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/kun dga' bo gang zhig gis khang pa brtsegs pa de lta bu zhig byas nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[110a.5\]]la dbul bar byed la/_gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod rten gyi bum pa skyu ru ra tsam gyi nang du bcug ste/_srog shing khab tsam btsugs nas gdugs rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'dogs par byed pa'am/_de bzhin 
[\[110a.6\]]gshegs pa'i sku gzugs tshon gang tsam zhig byed na/_kun dga' bo bsod nams 'di la bsod nams snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro_/stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de 
[\[110a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dpag tu med pa'i chos 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/_tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang /_shes rab dpag tu med pa dang /_rnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa dang /_
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling chu zheng dang rgyar dpag tshad bdun stong yod pa 'di rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams 
[\[110b.2\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di lta ste/_'bras sA lu'i zhing ngam/_til gyi zhing ngam/_smyig ma'i tshal lam/_'dam bu'i tshal lam/_bu ram shing gi tshal bzhin du gang bar gyur pa de dag la/_mi la la zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms 
[\[110b.3\]]dang /_mal stan dang /_nad kyi gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis ci 'dod pa bstabs te/_de dag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang mchod rten byas te/_gdugs dang /_sil snyan dang /_ba dan dang /_dri dang /_bdug pa dang /_phreng ba dang /_phye ma dang /_
[\[110b.4\]]byug pa dag gis mchod pa byed la/_gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod rten gyi bum pa skyu ru ra tsam gyi nang du bcug ste/_srog shing khab tsam btsugs nas gdugs rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'dogs par byed pa'am/_
[\[110b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs tshon gang tsam zhig byed na/_kun dga' bo bsod nams 'di la bsod nams snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/_stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[110b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dpag tu med pa'i chos 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/_tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang /_shes rab dpag tu med pa dang /_rnam par grol ba dpag tu med 
[\[110b.7\]]pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo shar gyi lus 'phags gling chu zheng dang rgyar dpag tshad brgyad stong yod pa rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang gang bar gyur ces bya ba nas rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]pa zhes bya ba'i bar du rgya cher snga ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling chu zheng dang rgyar dpag tshad dgu stong yod pa rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang gang bar gyur ces bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro/_/kun dga' bo byang gi 
[\[111a.2\]]sgra mi snyan gyi gling chu zheng du dpag tshad khri yod pa rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang gang bar gyur ces bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro/_/kun dga' bo lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong rab tu brtan pa dag yod de/_ka ba de 
[\[111a.3\]]dag thams cad kyang lha'i bai dUr+ya sngon po yin no/_/kun dga' bo khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnam par rgyal ba gser gyi bye ma bdal ba la tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa/_gser gyi dra bas g.yogs shing gser gyi dril bu g.yer khas bskor ba ste/_kun dga' bo gang zhig stong gsum gyi stong 
[\[111a.4\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de lta bu sha stag gis bkang ste/_phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la dbul bar byed la/_gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung yungs 'bru tsam zhes bya ba nas rgya cher snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro/_/
[\[111a.5\]]kun dga' bo lus 'phags mo'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras pha rgyun du zhugs pa bsad nas de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir sku gdung gi brgyad cha la bkur stir bya ba de/_bla mar bya ba dang /_ri mor bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba dang /_rjed par bya ba 
[\[111a.6\]]dang /_gsol bar bya ba la brtson par 'gyur ro zhes sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa'i dge ba'i las de des byas pas sems can dmyal bar lan cig song nas las de nyid dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang /_sngon legs par spyad pa de nyid kyis de nas thar nas bskal pa nyi shur log par 
[\[111a.7\]]ltung bar mi 'gyur la/_skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/_yang dag par khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas rang byang chub mngon du byed par 'gyur te/_rang sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dpag tu med pa'i chos 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/_tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang /_shes rab dpag tu med pa dang /_rnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i 
[\[111b.2\]]ye shes gzigs pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dpag tu med pa'i chos rnams dang ldan pa de'i phyir de la mchod pa'i rnam par smin pa yang de ltar dpag tu med 
[\[111b.3\]]par shes par bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshes chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/_nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/_lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/_byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/_dbus mtho 
[\[111b.4\]]na mtha' dma'/_mtha' mtho na dbus dma' bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[111b.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdud rtsi'i rnga zhes bya bar zung shig_/sgra chen po zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[111b.6\]]zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/'phags pa sgra chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud d+ha sing ha dang /_lo ts+tsha ba ban de dge ba 
[\[111b.7\]]dpal gyis bsgyur/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bir+yA kar sing ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de de btsan dras zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D209}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sing ha nA di ka na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]bod skad du/_'phags pa seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das nyi zla'i gnas rnam par rgyal byed kyi khang 
[\[112a.2\]{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]nang na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang dgra bcom pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po la bka' stsal pa/_rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po khyod sangs 
[\[112a.3\]]rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logs na gang gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos 'phags 
[\[112a.4\]]zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_mchod pa bya ba'i phyir song shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po 'jig rten gyi khams der song nas/_
[\[112a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das chos 'phags de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'phags des byang chub sems 
[\[112a.6\]]dpa' de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod ga las 'dir 'ongs/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de la cang mi smra bar kha rog 'dug go/_/de'i tshe der 'khor 'dus pa gang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[112a.7\]]dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po 'di 'jig rten gsum gyi bla mas bka' stsal pa la lan mi gsol bar kha rog 'dug 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]zhig gu snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis der seng ge bsgyings pa lta bus phyogs bcur gzigs nas 'khor thams cad the tsom du gyur pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'phags de 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i 'od kyi snang ba gser gyi 
[\[112b.2\]]kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer brgya stong phrag du mas phyogs bcu snang bar mdzad do/_/de nas skad cig de nyid la sa chen po g.yos par gyur to/_/phyogs bcu nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' gzugs dang /_kha dog dang /_tshul du ma 'chang ba dag bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul chen po de mthong 
[\[112b.3\]]nas 'jig rten gyi khams der thams cad 'dus te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas rang rang gi dge bas bsgrubs pas 'dug ste/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_ngo mtshar du gyur 
[\[112b.4\]]pa dang /_rmad du gyur pas 'dzum dmul nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'od zer gyi cho 'phrul du ma dag mthong lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'od zer gyi snang ba 'di lta bu dag sngon nam yang ma mthong lags so/_/
[\[112b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das 'di'i don de ni legs pa lags te/_gang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa de lta bu mdzad pa'i don de bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te lung bstan du gsol/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'od phreng gis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_
[\[112b.6\]]rnam 'dren gang zag mchog ste thugs rje can/_/rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_/bdag dang 'jig rten snang mdzad thugs rje can/_/'dzum mdzad rgyu dang mdzad rgyu nges par gsungs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'phags 'dzam bu chu bo'i 
[\[112b.7\]]gser ltar snang zhing 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma rab tu 'gyed pa/_sku'i gzugs dang mdog gzi brjid kyis 'bar ba de la byang chub sems dpa' 'od phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis cho 'phrul mang po mthong lags te/_bdag 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]gis sngon 'od zer gyi snang ba 'di lta bu nams kyang ma mthong lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa des bka' stsal pa/_'od phreng phyogs 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyi snang ba 'di lta bu chung ngu zhig mdzad de/_mtshan ma snang ba de dag ni rgyu med pa ma 
[\[113a.2\]]yin/_byed rgyu med pa ma yin no/_/'od phreng khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas khyod la bshad do/_/don gang gi phyir ngas 'dzum pa mdzad pa thos nas kyang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis skrag par mi bya/_dngang bar mi bya/_dngang bar 'gyur bar mi bya/_
[\[113a.3\]]som nyir mi bya/_the tsom du mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/smon lam ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/rnam par 'phrul pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/don de dag yang dag par mthong nas the tsom ma byed cig_/
[\[113a.4\]]'od phreng gang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas nga'i drung du byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po btang ba 'di khyod kyis mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub 
[\[113a.5\]]sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po 'di la ngas khyod ga las 'ongs zhes de skad dris na/_de cang mi smra bar kha rog 'dug ste/_rigs kyi bu ngas don gyi dbang 'di mthong nas 'dir 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pas rmas pa'i lan de ci'i phyir 'dis ma gsol snyam 
[\[113a.6\]]du 'khor 'di dag thams cad the tsom du gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu ngas rmas pa'i lan skyes bu dam pa 'dis ci'i phyir ma gsol ce na/_'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa'i chos rnams la/_bcom ldan 'das bdag la khyod ga las 'ongs zhes 'ong ba rmed par mdzad do snyam mo/_/chos thams cad 
[\[113a.7\]]brjod du ma mchis par yang glo bar chud na/_bcom ldan 'das ga las 'ongs zhes byung ba'i gnas la bdag gis gsol bar spro ba ma mchis so snyam du sems te/_rigs kyi bu mdor na rigs kyi bu 'dis chos thams cad bstan te/_yang dag pa'i chos ston pa yin no/_/rigs kyi 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]bu byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung pos yi ge med pa'i chos dang /_tshig med pa dang /_brjod du med pa dang /_yi ge dang bral ba dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_mtshan ma dang bral ba dang /_blang ba med pa dang /_blang ba dang bral ba dang /_'ong ba med pa dang /_mthong ba med 
[\[113b.2\]]pa dang /_gnas pa med pa dang /_sems dang yid dang /_rnam par shes pa dang bral ba dang /_rgyu rkyen dang bral ba dang /_tshig med pa dang /_rnam par rig pa med pa dang /_lta ba med pa dang /_ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /_tshig gis brjod du med pa dang /_brda med pa 
[\[113b.3\]]dang /_yi ge gcig la 'di lta ste/_yang dag pa ma yin pa dang /_bsags pa med pa'i gnas pa dang /_yi ge med pa dang /_gdul ba med pa rnams la su zhig ston snyam du shes nas rigs kyi bu bstan pa med pa 'dir bstan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[113b.4\]]lus 'od gsal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad bstan du ma mchis pa lags na chos de dag thams cad lkugs pas bstan par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ji skad smras pa 
[\[113b.5\]]de bzhin te/_lkugs pa 'ba' zhig gis ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad kyang mi shes bzhin du chos ston par byed do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can thams cad ma 'tshal bzhin du chos ston pa de bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/_
[\[113b.6\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lus 'od gsal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na dmus long dag nyi ma shar kyang gzugs mthong bar mi 'gyur zhing nyi ma'i 'od ci 'dra ba yang mi shes te/_ji ltar gzhan dag 
[\[113b.7\]]gis nyi ma'i mtshan nyid 'di lta bu zhig yin no zhes bstan pa dang /_de ltar gzhan gyi sgra las nyi ma yin par mngon par zhen to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du chos thams cad nang du 'dus shing dbyings kyi nang du 'dus te/_dbyings med cing yi ge med pa/_yi ge dang bral ba/_chos thams 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]cad brjod du med pa yin na rkyen gyi dbang gis sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na ri brag dang sgra la brten nas brag ca'i sgra 'byung yang rigs kyi bu ri brag gi sgra ni stong pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du rkyen la brten nas yi ge'i sgra 'byung bar 
[\[114a.2\]]'gyur te/_yi ge'i sgra ni stong pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag brjod pa de thams cad so so yang dag par rig pa'i nang du 'dus par blta ste/_tshig gis brjod pa gang yin pa de ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa yin par blta ba dang /_tshig gis brjod pa gang yin pa de ni don 
[\[114a.3\]]so so yang dag par rig pa yin par blta bar bya'o/_/de lta bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems can gyi gang cung zad g.yo ba de thams cad chos kyi sdom bzhir 'dus par blta bar bya ste/_'byung po dag mi shes pas gnas mi g.yo'o/_/de ltar mi dmus long de ji ltar shes pa de bzhin 
[\[114a.4\]]du chos de nyid la mngon par zhen to/_/rigs kyi bu don yongs su tshol bar 'dod pas rang gi rgyud las yongs su btsal bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub yongs su tshol bar 'dod pas rang gi nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga las btsal bar bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i don ji lta ba 
[\[114a.5\]]bzhin bshad pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/snang ba chen pos 'jig rten khyab par shin tu snang bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'phags kyi ljags kyi dbang po phyung nas stong gsum gyi stong 
[\[114a.6\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ljags kyi dbang pos yang dag par bkab par gyur to/_/ljags kyi dbang po de las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma byung ste/_'od zer de dag gis sems can dmyal ba chen po la sogs pa nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi 'jig rten 
[\[114a.7\]]gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ljags kyi dbang po de nyid slar bsdus nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bka' stsal pa/_grogs po dag lce 'di lta bu yod pa ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]mi zer ste/_grogs po dag ngas gtam cung zad ji lta ba bzhin bshad 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]pa de ltar brtag pa dang /_de ltar dad pa dang /_yid ches par gyis shig_/de nas sa bcu la gnas pa dang /_lha dang klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'khor 
[\[114b.2\]]thams cad stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i don bstan pa bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus som nyi mi bgyi zhing the tsom mi bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom 
[\[114b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la lan gnyis lan gsum du gzigs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_rigs kyi bu dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir seng ge'i sgras bshad par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi 
[\[114b.4\]]mjed na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'phags nga nyid yin te/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der sgrub pa 
[\[114b.5\]]rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams la chos ston pa mdzad do/_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ngo mtshar du gyur cing rmad du gyur pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar sems can thams cad la seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa 
[\[114b.6\]]legs lags so/_/legs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 'khor 'dir seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i sgra 'di thos par 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang yid ches par 'gyur ba'i sems can gang lags pa de dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i 
[\[114b.7\]]rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags na gang 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang /_mdo sde 'di la me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis mchod pa bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa'i mdo sde 'di sems can gang gi rna bar thos par 'gyur ba de ni bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/_/de nas bcom 
[\[115a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la legs so bya ba gnang ste/_rigs kyi bu ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_legs so legs so/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra 'di thos nas rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis legs so zhes bya ba 'ga' zhig rjes su 
[\[115a.3\]]'bul na yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma yin te/_de dag ngas yongs su bzung ba yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas kyang 'gron du gnyer bar byed do/_/de dag gis nga yi byang chub phrag pa la khyer ba yin 
[\[115a.4\]]no/_/gang snyigs ma lnga dag la bab pa'i tshe mdo sde 'di la mos pa'i sems can de dag ni ngas yongs su smin par byas pa yin te/_tshe rabs gzhan du yang mi pham pas yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de'i skye ba'i rgya mtsho bskams pa yin no/_/bdud pham par byas pa yin no/_/nyon 
[\[115a.5\]]mongs pa rnams bsal ba yin no/_/chos kyi rnga shin tu brdungs pa yin no/_/srid pa gsum rnam par bzlog pa yin no/_/phyir rgol ba rnams las nges par rgyal ba yin no/_/nyon mongs pa'i tshogs bcom pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis stong 
[\[115a.6\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'di thos nas dad par mi byed na 
[\[115a.7\]]de nyes pa che ba yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas rigs kyi bu de de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gror bya bas rim gror byed pa dang /_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gzhan zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par bstan pa 'di thos nas dad cing sems rab tu dang bas 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]legs so zhes bya ba 'bul na/_gang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byas pa de bas 'di bsod nams ches lhag par brgya phrag stong sogs par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na rigs kyi bu gang dag nga la skyabs su song ba de dag gis mdo sde 'di bri bar bya bcang bar bya'o/_/de 
[\[115b.2\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po dang /_'od phreng dang /_glog gi 'od dang /_spyan rnam par dag pa dang /_byams pa dang /_mi 'jigs mdzad dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_mthu chen thob dang /_'jam dpal dang /_spobs pa dpa' bo dang /_
[\[115b.3\]]sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_spyan ras gzigs dang /_kun tu bzang po dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe 
[\[115b.4\]]snyigs ma lnga la bab pa na bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di rgyas par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gang mdo sde 'di la mos pa'i sems can de ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das par rig par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyi rna bar mdo sde 'di thos par mi 
[\[115b.5\]]'gyur te/_gang dag rgya cher 'jug pa de dag gi yon tan gyi mtha' ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du rtogs par dka' lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so/_/de 
[\[115b.6\]]ltar khyed rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gdos pa 'dzin pa lta bur gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba'i phung po dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[115b.7\]]rten de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sing ha dang /_lo ts+tsha ba ban de sba rje ye shes snying pos bsgyur nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]{D210}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya shA li stam+b+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sA lu'i ljang pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 
[\[116a.2\]]'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i 
[\[116a.3\]]bgrod par bya ba'i sa phyogs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas phan tshun yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i gtam rnam pa mang po byas nas 'dus te gnyis ka rdo leb la 'khod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[116a.4\]]byams pa deng 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis sA lu'i ljang pa la gzigs nas dge slong rnams la mdo 'di gsungs so/_/dge slong dag sus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mthong ngo /_/sus chos mthong ba des sangs rgyas mthong ngo zhes de skad bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[116a.5\]]'das cang mi gsung bar gyur na byams pa bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i mdo de'i don ni ci/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni gang /_chos ni gang /_sangs rgyas ni gang /_ji ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong na chos mthong /_ji ltar chos mthong na sangs rgyas mthong /_de skad 
[\[116a.6\]]ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di la bcom ldan 'das chos kyi bdag po thams cad mkhyen pas dge slong dag sus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mthong ngo /_/
[\[116a.7\]]sus chos mthong ba des sangs rgyas mthong ngo zhes gsungs pa de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gang zhe na/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/_'di yod pas 'di 'byung la/_'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ba ste/_gang 'di ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/_'du byed 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_
[\[116b.2\]]srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/_de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du 
[\[116b.3\]]byed 'gag_/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag_/tshor 
[\[116b.4\]]ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug 
[\[116b.5\]]pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/_de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes gsungs so/_/chos gang zhe na/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/_'di lta ste/_yang dag pa'i 
[\[116b.6\]]lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ste/_
[\[116b.7\]]'bras bu thob pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa gcig tu bsdus te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos so zhes bka' stsal to/_/de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang zhe na/_sus chos thams cad thugs su chud pa'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/_des 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi spyan dang /_chos 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]kyi sku dang ldan pa dang /_slob pa dang mi slob pa'i chos de dag gzigs pa'o/_/de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong ba ji lta bu zhe na/_'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis sus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtag pa dang /_srog med pa dang /_srog dang bral ba dang /_ji lta bu 
[\[117a.2\]]nyid dang /_ma nor ba dang /_ma skyes pa dang /_ma byung ba dang /_ma byas pa dang /_'dus ma byas pa dang /_thogs pa med pa dang /_dmigs pa med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_'jigs pa med pa dang /_mi 'phrogs pa dang /_zad pa med pa dang /_rnam par zhi ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du mthong 
[\[117a.3\]]ba ste/_gang gis tshul 'di 'dra bar chos la'ang rtag pa dang /_srog med pa dang /_srog dang bral ba dang /_ji lta bu nyid dang /_ma nor ba dang /_ma skyes pa dang /_ma byung ba dang /_ma byas pa dang /_'dus ma byas pa dang /_thogs pa med pa dang /_dmigs pa med pa dang /_zhi ba 
[\[117a.4\]]dang /_'jigs pa med pa dang /_mi 'phrogs pa dang /_zad pa med pa dang /_rnam par zhi ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du mthong ba des 'phags pa'i chos mngon par rtogs te/_yang dag pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas bla na med pa'i chos kyi skur sangs rgyas mthong ngo zhes gsungs so/_/smras pa/_
[\[117a.5\]]ci'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya/_smras pa rgyu dang bcas rkyen dang bcas pa la bya'i/_rgyu med rkyen med pa la ni ma yin te/_de'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/de la bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid mdor bsdus te bka' stsal pa 
[\[117a.6\]]rkyen 'di nyid kyi 'bras bu ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /_ma byung yang rung /_chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ni 'dug pa'o zhes bya ba nas gang 'di chos nyid dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos mi 'gyur ba nyid dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar 'thun pa dang /_
[\[117a.7\]]de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa nyid dang /_bden pa kho na dang /_ma nor ba nyid dang /_phyin ci ma log pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar du gsungs so/_/'di ltar yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di gnyis kyi phyir 'byung ste/_
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rgyu dang 'brel pa dang /_rkyen dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro/_/de yang phyi'i dang /_nang gi dang rnam pa gnyis su blta'o/_/de la phyi rol gyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rgyu dang 'brel pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sa bon las myu gu/_myu gu las 'dab ma/_'dab 
[\[117b.2\]]ma las sdong bu/_sdong bu las sbu bu/_sbu bu las snying po/_snying po las me tog_/me tog las 'bras bu'o/_/sa bon med na myu gu mi 'byung ste/_me tog med na 'bras bu'i bar du yang mi 'byung ngo /_/sa bon yod na myu gu mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/_de bzhin du me tog 
[\[117b.3\]]yod na 'bras bu'i bar du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de la sa bon ni 'di snyam du bdag gis myu gu mngon par bsgrub po snyam du mi sems so/_/myu gu yang 'di snyam du bdag ni sa bon gyis mngon par bsgrubs so snyam du mi sems so/_/de bzhin du me tog kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis 
[\[117b.4\]]'bras bu mngon par bsgrub po snyam du mi sems pa'i bar du ste/_'bras bu yang 'di snyam du bdag ni me tog gis mngon par bsgrubs so snyam du mi sems mod kyi/_'on kyang sa bon yod na myu gu mngon par 'grub cing 'byung bar 'gyur ba nas de bzhin du me tog yod na 'bras bu'i bar du 
[\[117b.5\]]yang mngon par 'grub cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar phyi rol gyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rgyu dang 'brel par blta'o/_/phyi rol gyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rkyen dang 'brel pa ji ltar blta zhe na/_khams drug 'dus pa'i phyir te/_khams drug po gang dag 'dus pa'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[117b.6\]]'di lta ste/_sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_nam mkha' dang /_dus kyi khams rnams 'dus pa las phyi rol gyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rkyen dang 'brel par blta'o/_/de la sa'i khams ni sa bon rten pa'i bya ba byed do/_/chu'i khams ni sa bon rlan pa'i bya ba byed do/_/me'i 
[\[117b.7\]]khams ni sa bon yongs su dro ba'i bya ba byed do/_/rlung gi khams ni sa bon 'bu ba'i bya ba byed do/_/nam mkha'i khams ni sa bon la mi sgrib pa'i bya ba byed do/_/dus ni sa bon 'gyur ba'i bya ba byed do/_/rkyen 'di rnams med par sa bon las myu gu mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi/_nam phyi rol 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]gyi sa'i khams ma tshang ba med par gyur la de bzhin du chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_nam mkha' dang /_dus kyang ma tshang ba med par gyur te/_thams cad 'dus pa las sa bon 'gags pa na de las myu gu mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de la sa'i khams kyang 
[\[118a.2\]]'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon rten pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/de bzhin du chu'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon brlan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/me'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon yongs su dro bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/rlung gi khams kyang 
[\[118a.3\]]'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon 'bu bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/nam mkha'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon la mi sgrib pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/dus kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon bsgyur ba'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/sa bon yang 'di snyam du bdag 
[\[118a.4\]]gis myu gu mngon par bsgrub po snyam du mi sems so/_/myu gu yang 'di snyam du bdag ni rkyen 'di dag gis mngon par bsgrubs so snyam du mi sems mod kyi/_'on kyang rkyen 'di dag yod la sa bon 'gags pa na myu gu mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du me tog yod na 'bras bu'i 
[\[118a.5\]]bar du yang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/_myu gu de yang bdag gis ma byas/_gzhan gyis ma byas/_gnyi gas ma byas/_dbang phyug gis ma byas/_dus kyis ma bsgyur/_rang bzhin las ma byung /_rgyu med pa las kyang ma skyes te/_'on kyang sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_nam 
[\[118a.6\]]mkha' dang /_dus kyi khams rnams 'dus nas sa bon 'gags pa na myu gu mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/_de ltar phyi rol gyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rkyen dang 'brel par blta'o/_/de la phyi rol gyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam pa lngar blta ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_rtag par ma yin pa dang /_
[\[118a.7\]]chad par ma yin pa dang /_'pho bar ma yin pa dang /_rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen po mngon par 'grub pa dang /_de dang 'dra ba'i rgyud du'o/_/ji ltar rtag par ma yin zhe na/_gang gi phyir myu gu yang gzhan la sa bon yang gzhan te/_myu gu gang yin pa de nyid sa bon ma yin la/_sa bon 'gags 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]pa las myu gu 'byung ba ma yin/_ma 'gags pa las kyang ma yin gyi/_sa bon yang 'gags la de nyid kyi tshe myu gu yang 'byung ste/_de'i phyir rtag par ma yin no/_/ji ltar chad par ma yin zhe na/_sngon 'gags pa'i sa bon las myu gu skye ba ma yin/_ma 'gags pa las kyang ma yin gyi/_sa 
[\[118b.2\]]bon yang 'gags la de nyid kyi tshe srang mda'i mthon dman bzhin du myu gu skye bas de'i phyir chad par ma yin no/_/ji ltar 'pho bar ma yin zhe na/_gang gi phyir myu gu yang gzhan la sa bon yang gzhan/_myu gu gang yin pa de nyid sa bon ma yin te/_de'i phyir 'pho bar ma yin no/_/ji ltar 
[\[118b.3\]]rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen po mngon par 'grub ce na/_sa bon chung ngu btab pa las 'bras bu chen po mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/_de'i phyir rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen po mngon par 'grub po/_/sa bon ji lta bu btab pa de lta bu'i 'bras bu mngon par 'grub pas de'i phyir de dang 'dra ba'i 
[\[118b.4\]]rgyud du ste/_de ltar phyi rol gyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam pa lngar blta'o/_/de bzhin du nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang gnyis kyi phyir 'byung ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rgyu dang 'brel pa dang /_rkyen dang 'brel pa'o/_/de la nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rgyu 
[\[118b.5\]]dang 'brel pa gang zhe na/_gang 'di ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba nas skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/gal te ma rig pa ma byung na 'du byed rnams kyang mi mngon pa zhig_/de bzhin du skye ba ma byung du zin na rga shi'i bar du yang mi mngon pa zhig na/_'di ltar ma 
[\[118b.6\]]rig pa yod pa las 'du byed rnams mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba nas skye ba yod pa las rga shi'i bar du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de la ma rig pa yang 'di snyam du bdag gis 'du byed rnams mngon par bsgrub po snyam du mi sems so/_/'du byed rnams kyang 'di snyam du bdag 
[\[118b.7\]]cag ni ma rig pas mngon par bsgrubs so snyam du mi sems pa nas de bzhin du skye ba yang 'di snyam du bdag gis rga shi mngon par bsgrub po snyam du mi sems shing /_rga shi yang 'di snyam du bdag ni skye bas mngon par bsgrubs so snyam du mi sems pa'i bar du ste/_'on kyang ma rig pa 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]yod pa las 'du byed rnams mngon par 'grub cing 'byung bar 'gyur ba nas de bzhin du skye ba yod pa las rga shi'i bar du mngon par 'grub cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar na nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rgyu dang 'brel par blta'o/_/nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung 
[\[119a.2\]]ba rkyen dang 'brel par ji ltar blta zhe na/_khams drug po 'dus pa'i phyir te/_khams drug po gang dag 'dus pa'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_nam mkha' dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams rnams 'dus pa las nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rkyen 
[\[119a.3\]]dang 'brel par blta'o/_/de la nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sa'i khams gang zhe na/_gang 'di 'dus nas lus kyi sra ba'i dngos po mngon par 'grub par byed pa 'di ni sa'i khams zhes bya'o/_/gang lus sdud pa'i bya ba byed pa 'di ni chu'i khams zhes bya'o/_/gang lus kyis 
[\[119a.4\]]zos pa dang /_'thungs pa dang /_'chos pa dang /_myangs pa rnams 'ju bar byed pa 'di ni me'i khams zhes bya'o/_/gang lus kyi dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i bya ba byed pa 'di ni rlung gi khams zhes bya'o/_/gang lus kyi nang sbubs yod par byed pa 'di ni nam mkha'i khams zhes bya'o/_/
[\[119a.5\]]gang mdung khyim gyi tshul du lus kyi ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu mngon par 'grub par byed pa rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga 'dus pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o/_/rkyen 'di dag med par lus skye bar mi 'gyur 
[\[119a.6\]]gyi/_nam nang gi sa'i khams tshang zhing de bzhin du chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_nam mkha' dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams rnams kyang tshang bar gyur la/_thams cad 'dus pa de las lus mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de la sa'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis 'dus nas 
[\[119a.7\]]lus kyi sra ba'i dngos po mngon par bsgrub po snyam du mi sems so/_/chu'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis lus kyi sdud pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/me'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis lus kyi zos pa dang /_'thungs pa dang /_'chos pa dang /_myangs pa rnams 'ju 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/rlung gi khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis lus kyi dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/nam mkha'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis lus kyi nang sbubs yod par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'di snyam 
[\[119b.2\]]du bdag gis lus kyi ming dang gzugs mngon par bsgrub po snyam du mi sems so/_/lus kyang 'di snyam du bdag ni rkyen 'di dag gis bskyed do snyam du mi sems mod kyi/_'on kyang rkyen 'di dag yod na lus skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de la sa'i khams ni bdag ma yin/_sems can ma 
[\[119b.3\]]yin/_srog ma yin/_skye ba po ma yin/_shed las skyes pa ma yin/_shed bu ma yin/_bud med ma yin/_skyes pa ma yin/_ma ning ma yin/_nga ma yin/_bdag gi ma yin te/_gzhan su'i yang ma yin no/_/de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams 
[\[119b.4\]]dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang bdag ma yin/_sems can ma yin/_srog ma yin/_skye ba po ma yin/_shed las skyes pa ma yin/_shed bu ma yin/_bud med ma yin/_skyes pa ma yin/_ma ning ma yin/_nga ma yin/_bdag gi ma yin/_
[\[119b.5\]]gzhan su'i yang ma yin no/_/de la ma rig pa gang zhe na/_khams drug po 'di dag nyid la gang gcig pur 'du shes pa dang /_ril por 'du shes pa dang /_rtag par 'du shes pa dang /_brtan par 'du shes pa dang /_ther zug tu 'du shes pa dang /_bde bar 'du shes pa dang /_bdag 
[\[119b.6\]]tu 'du shes pa dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_skye ba po dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang /_shed las skyes pa dang /_shed bur 'du shes pa dang /_nga zhes bya ba dang /_bdag gi zhes bya bar 'du shes pa ste/_'di lta bu la sogs pa mi 
[\[119b.7\]]shes pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'di ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar ma rig pa yod pas yul rnams la 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug 'jug ste/_de la yul rnams la 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gang yin pa 'di ni ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]bya'o/_/dngos po so sor rnam par rig pa ni rnam par shes pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig byung ba nye bar len pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni ming dang gzugs so/_/ming dang gzugs la rten pa'i dbang po rnams ni skye mched drug go/_/chos gsum 'dus pa 
[\[120a.2\]]ni reg pa'o/_/reg pa myong ba ni tshor ba'o/_/tshor ba la zhen pa ni sred pa'o/_/sred pa 'phel ba ni len pa'o/_/len pa las skyes pa yang skyed pa'i las ni srid pa'o/_/rgyu de las phung po byung ba ni skye ba'o/_/skyes nas phung po smin pa ni rga ba'o/_/rgas nas phung po zhig pa ni 'chi ba'o/_/'chi zhing 
[\[120a.3\]]myos te mngon par chags pa dang bcas pa'i nang gi yongs su gdung ba ni mya ngan to/_/mya ngan las byung ba'i tshig tu smra ba ni smre sngags 'don pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs dang ldan pa'i mi bde ba myong ba ni sdug bsngal lo/_/yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i yid kyi sdug bsngal ni yid 
[\[120a.4\]]mi bde ba'o/_/gzhan yang 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'khrug pa zhes bya'o/_/de la mun pa chen po'i phyir ma rig pa'o/_/mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir 'du byed rnams so/_/rnam par rig pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'o/_/rten pa'i phyir ming dang gzugs 
[\[120a.5\]]so/_/skye ba'i sgo'i phyir skye mched drug go/_/reg pa'i phyir reg pa'o/_/myong ba'i phyir tshor ba'o/_/skom pa'i phyir sred pa'o/_/nye bar len pa'i phyir len pa'o/_/yang srid pa skye ba'i phyir srid pa'o/_/phung po 'byung ba'i phyir skye ba'o/_/phung po smin pa'i phyir rga ba'o/_/'jig pa'i phyir 'chi ba'o/_/
[\[120a.6\]]mya ngan byed pa'i phyir mya ngan to/_/tshig gis smre ba'i phyir smre sngags 'don pa'o/_/lus la gnod pa'i phyir sdug bsngal ba'o/_/sems la gnod pa'i phyir yid mi bde ba'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i phyir 'khrug pa'o/_/gzhan yang de kho na mi rtogs shing log par shes te mi shes pa 
[\[120a.7\]]ni ma rig pa'o/_/de ltar ma rig pa yod na 'du byed rnam gsum mngon par 'grub ste/_bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba dang /_bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba dang /_mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba'o/_/'di dag ni ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya'o/_/de la bsod 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed rnams las bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang /_bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed rnams las bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang /_mi g.yo bar nye bar 
[\[120b.2\]]'gro ba'i 'du byed rnams las mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid du 'gyur ba 'di ni 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig skyes pa phung po gzugs can ma yin pa bzhi dang /_gzugs gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[120b.3\]]rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya'o/_/ming dang gzugs rnam par 'phel bas skye mched drug gi sgo nas bya ba byed pa rnams 'byung ste/_de ni ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug ces bya'o/_/skye mched drug po dag la reg pa'i tshogs drug 'byung ste/_de ni skye mched drug gi 
[\[120b.4\]]rkyen gyis reg pa zhes bya'o/_/ji lta bur reg pa 'byung ba de lta bur tshor ba 'byung ste/_de ni reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/_/tshor ba'i bye brag de dag myong ba dang /_mngon par dga' ba dang /_lhag par zhen pa dang /_lhag par zhen nas 'dug pa de ni tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred 
[\[120b.5\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/myong ba dang /_mngon par dga' ba dang /_lhag par zhen pa dang /_lhag par zhen nas 'dug pa las bdag sdug pa'i ngo bo dang /_bde ba'i ngo bo dang bral bar ma gyur cig snyam du yongs su mi gtong bar phyir zhing smon pa 'di ni sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa zhes bya'o/_/de 
[\[120b.6\]]ltar smon cing yang srid pa skyed pa'i las lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis kun nas slong ba de ni len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa zhes bya'o/_/las de las skyes pa'i phung po lnga rnams 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba zhes bya'o/_/skyes nas mngon du 'grub pa'i phung po rnams 
[\[120b.7\]]kyi 'phel ba yongs su smin pa dang /_'jig par 'gyur ba de ni skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi zhes bya'o/_/de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni rgyu gzhan dang gzhan las byung ba/_rkyen gzhan dang gzhan las byung ba/_rtag pa ma yin/_mi rtag pa ma yin/_
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]'dus byas ma yin/_'dus ma byas ma yin/_rgyu med pa ma yin/_rkyen med pa ma yin/_myong ba yod pa ma yin/_zad pa'i chos ma yin/_'jig pa'i chos ma yin/_'gog pa'i chos ma yin te/_thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa/_rgyun ma chad par klung 
[\[121a.2\]]gi rgyun bzhin du rjes su zhugs pa'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni rgyu gzhan dang gzhan las byung ba/_rkyen gzhan dang gzhan las byung ba/_rtag pa ma yin/_mi rtag pa ma yin/_'dus byas ma yin/_'dus ma byas ma yin/_rgyu med pa ma yin/_rkyen 
[\[121a.3\]]med pa ma yin/_myong ba yod pa ma yin/_zad pa'i chos ma yin/_'jig pa'i chos ma yin/_'gog pa'i chos ma yin te/_thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa/_rgyun ma chad par klung gi rgyun bzhin du rjes su zhugs mod kyi/_'on kyang yan lag bzhi po 'di dag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 
[\[121a.4\]]yan lag bcu gnyis po de dag bsdu bar bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa dang /_sred pa dang /_las dang /_rnam par shes pa'o/_/de la rnam par shes pa ni sa bon gyi rang bzhin gyis rgyu byed do/_/las ni zhing gi rang bzhin gyis rgyu byed do/_/ma rig pa dang sred pa ni nyon 
[\[121a.5\]]mongs pa'i rang bzhin gyis rgyu byed do/_/de la las dang nyon mongs pa dag ni sa bon rnam par shes pa skyed do/_/de la las ni sa bon rnam par shes pa'i zhing gi bya ba byed do/_/sred pa ni sa bon rnam par shes pa rlan par byed do/_/ma rig pa ni sa bon rnam par shes pa 'debs te/_rkyen 'di dag med na sa 
[\[121a.6\]]bon rnam par shes pa mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/de la las kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon rnam par shes pa'i zhing gi bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/sred pa yang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon rnam par shes pa brlan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/ma rig pa yang 'di snyam du bdag gis 
[\[121a.7\]]sa bon rnam par shes pa gdab bo snyam du mi sems so/_/sa bon rnam par shes pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni rkyen 'di dag gis bskyed do snyam du mi sems te/_'on kyang sa bon rnam par shes pa las kyi zhing la rten pa/_sred pa'i rlan gyis brlan pa/_ma rig pa'i lud kyis bran pa/_skye ba na skye ba'i gnas nying 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]mtshams sbyor ba/_ma'i mngal de dang der ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu mngon par 'grub ste/_ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu de yang bdag gis ma byas/_gzhan gyis ma byas/_gnyis kas ma byas/_dbang phyug gis ma byas/_dus kyis ma bsgyur/_rang bzhin las ma byung /_byed pa la rag las 
[\[121b.2\]]pa ma yin/_rgyu med pa las kyang ma skyes te/_'on kyang pha dang ma phrad pa dang /_zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /_rkyen gzhan yang 'tshogs na bdag po med pa'i chos/_bdag gi med pa/_'dzin pa med pa/_nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dag la rgyu dang rkyen ma tshang ba med 
[\[121b.3\]]pa'i phyir skye ba'i gnas nying mtshams sbyor ba ma'i mngal de dang der myong ba dang ldan pa'i sa bon rnam par shes pa ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu mngon par 'grub bo/_/'di lta ste/_mig gi rnam par shes pa ni rgyu lngas 'byung ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_mig la rten pa dang /_gzugs dang /_snang ba dang /_nam 
[\[121b.4\]]mkha' dang /_de skyed pa'i yid la byed pa la yang brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo /_/de la mig ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten gyi bya ba byed do/_/gzugs ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa'i bya ba byed do/_/snang ba ni mngon pa'i bya ba byed do/_/nam mkha' ni mi sgrib pa'i bya ba 
[\[121b.5\]]byed do/_/de dang 'byung ba yid la byed pa ni bsam pa'i bya ba byed do/_/rkyen de dag med na mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi/_gang gi tshe nang gi skye mched mig ma tshang bar ma gyur la/_de bzhin du gzugs dang /_snang ba dang /_nam mkha' dang /_de dang 'byung ba yid la byed pa dag ma tshang 
[\[121b.6\]]bar ma gyur te/_thams cad 'dus pa de las mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la mig ni 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten gyi bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/gzugs kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du 
[\[121b.7\]]mi sems so/_/snang ba yang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mngon pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/nam mkha' yang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mi sgrib pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/de dang 'byung ba'i yid la byed pa yang 'di snyam du 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i bsam pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni rkyen 'di dag gis bskyed do snyam du mi sems te/_'on kyang rkyen 'di dag yod pa las mig gi rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin 
[\[122a.2\]]du dbang po lhag ma rnams kyang ci rigs su sbyar ro/_/de la chos gang yang 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du mi 'pho mod kyi/_rgyu dang rkyen ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir las kyi 'bras bur mngon pa yang yod do/_/'di lta ste/_dper na rab tu phyis pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin gyi gzugs 
[\[122a.3\]]brnyan snang ba yang bzhin me long gi dkyil 'khor du ma 'phos mod kyi/_rgyu dang rkyen ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir bzhin du mngon pa yang yod do/_/de bzhin du 'di nas kyang su yang shi 'phos pa med la gzhan du yang ma skyes te/_rgyu dang rkyen rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir las kyi 'bras bur mngon pa yang yod 
[\[122a.4\]]do/_/'di lta ste/_dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong nas 'gro ste/_'on kyang snod chung ngu chus gang bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gnas de nas ma 'phos te/_snod chung ngu chus gang ba'i nang du song ba yang med mod kyi/_
[\[122a.5\]]rgyu dang rkyen ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du mngon pa yang yod do/_/de bzhin du 'di nas kyang su yang shi 'phos pa med la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/_rgyu dang rkyen rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir las kyi 'bras bur mngon pa yang yod do/_/'di lta ste/_dper na me ni rgyu dang rkyen 
[\[122a.6\]]ma tshang na mi 'bar gyi rgyu dang rkyen 'tshogs pa las 'bar ro/_/de bzhin du bdag po med pa'i chos/_bdag gi med pa/_'dzin pa med pa/_nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dag la rgyu dang rkyen rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir skye ba'i gnas nying mtshams sbyor ba ma'i 
[\[122a.7\]]mngal de dang der sa bon rnam par shes pa las dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bskyed pa ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu mngon par 'grub ste/_de ltar na nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rkyen dang 'brel par blta'o/_/de la nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam pa lngar blta ste/_lnga gang 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]zhe na/_rtag par ma yin pa dang /_chad par ma yin pa dang /_'pho bar ma yin pa dang /_rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen po 'byung ba dang /_de dang 'dra ba'i rgyud du'o/_/ji ltar rtag par ma yin zhe na/_gang gi phyir tha ma'i 'chi ba'i phung po rnams kyang gzhan la/_skye ba'i char gtogs pa 
[\[122b.2\]]rnams kyang gzhan te/_tha ma 'chi ba'i phung po gang yin pa de nyid skye ba'i char gtogs pa rnams ma yin gyi/_tha ma'i 'chi ba'i phung po rnams kyang 'gag la skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po rnams kyang 'byung bas de'i phyir rtag par ma yin no/_/ji ltar chad par ma yin zhe na/_tha ma'i 
[\[122b.3\]]'chi ba'i phung po rnams sngon 'gags pa las skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po rnams 'byung ba ma yin/_ma 'gags pa las kyang ma yin gyi/_tha ma'i 'chi ba'i phung po rnams kyang 'gags la/_de nyid kyi tshe skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po rnams srang mda'i mthon dman bzhin 'byung bar 
[\[122b.4\]]'gyur te/_de'i phyir chad par ma yin no/_/ji ltar 'pho bar ma yin zhe na/_sems can gyi ris mi 'dra ba nas skal pa mnyam pa'i skye bar skye ba mngon par sgrub pas de'i phyir 'pho bar ma yin no/_/ji ltar rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen po 'byung zhe na/_las chung ngu byas pa las 'bras bu chen po'i 
[\[122b.5\]]rnam par smin pa myong ste/_de'i phyir rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen po mngon par 'grub po/_/ji ltar myong bar 'gyur ba'i las byas pa de ltar myong bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa myong bas de'i phyir de dang 'dra ba'i rgyud du'o/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[122b.6\]]yang dag par gsungs pa 'di gang la la zhig gis yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtag par rgyun du srog med pa dang /_srog dang bral ba dang /_ji lta bu nyid dang /_ma nor ba dang /_ma skyes pa dang /_ma byung ba dang /_ma byas pa dang /_'dus ma byas 
[\[122b.7\]]pa dang /_thogs pa med pa dang /_dmigs pa med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_'jigs pa med pa dang /_mi 'phrogs pa dang /_zad pa med pa dang /_rnam par zhi ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du mthong ba dang /_med pa dang /_gsog dang /_gsob dang /_snying po med pa dang /_nad dang /_
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]'bras dang /_zug rngu dang /_sdig pa dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de ni ci bdag 'das pa'i dus na 'byung ba zhig gam/_'on te bdag 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba zhig_/bdag 'das pa'i dus na 
[\[123a.2\]]cir gyur pa zhig_/bdag 'das pa'i dus na ji lta bur gyur pa zhig gu snyam du sngon gyi mtha' la mi rtog go/_/ci ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_'on te ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar mi 'gyur/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na cir 'gyur/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur 
[\[123a.3\]]snyam du phyi ma'i mtha' la mi rtog go/_/'di ci zhig_/'di ji lta bu zhig_/ci zhig yod/_cir 'gyur/_sems can 'di dag gang nas 'ongs/_'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes da ltar byung ba la yang mi rtog go/_/'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze dag gi lta bar song 
[\[123a.4\]]ba tha dad pa gang dag yod pa 'di lta ste/_bdag tu smra ba dang ldan pa'am/_sems can du smra ba dang ldan pa'am/_srog tu smra ba dang ldan pa'am/_gang zag tu smra ba dang ldan pa'am/_dge mtshan dang bkra shis su smra ba dang ldan pa dag kyang rung ste/_lhag par g.yo ba dang bral bar g.yo ba 
[\[123a.5\]]de dag de'i tshe na des spangs par 'gyur te/_yongs su shes nas rtsa ba nas bcad de/_ta la'i mgo bzhin mi snang ba'i rang bzhin du phyis mi skye mi 'gag pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang la la chos la bzod pa 'di lta bu dang ldan te/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'ang yang dag par 
[\[123a.6\]]khong du chud na de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 
[\[123a.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de skad ces smras nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]rten yi rangs te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bshad pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sA lu'i ljang pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//[ {D211}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_
[\[123b.2\]]pra tI t+ya sa mut+pA dA di tsa bi b+hang+ga nirde sha nA ma sU tra/_bod skad du/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang po dang rnam par dbye ba bstan pa zhes bya ba'i mdo/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 
[\[123b.3\]]tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang po dang rnam par dbye ba bstan gyis/_de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/rten cing 
[\[123b.4\]]'brel par 'byung ba dang po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'di yod na 'di 'byung /_'di skyes pas 'di skye ba ste/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched 
[\[123b.5\]]drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid 
[\[123b.6\]]mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang po zhes bya'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rnam par dbye ba gang zhe na/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed ces bya 
[\[123b.7\]]ba'i ma rig pa gang zhe na/_gang de sngon gyi mtha' mi shes pa dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' mi shes pa dang /_sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi shes pa dang /_nang mi shes pa dang /_phyi mi shes pa dang /_nang dang phyi mi shes pa dang /_las mi shes pa dang /_rnam par smin pa mi shes pa dang /_las dang rnam 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]par smin pa mi shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas mi shes pa dang /_chos mi shes pa dang /_dge 'dun mi shes pa dang /_sdug bsngal mi shes pa dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam mi shes pa dang /_rgyu mi shes pa dang /_rgyu las yang dag par 'byung ba'i chos mi 
[\[124a.2\]]shes pa dang /_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_bsten par bya ba dang /_bsten par bya ba ma yin pa dang /_ngan pa dang /_gya nom pa dang /_nag po dang /_dkar po dang /_rnam par dbye ba dang bcas pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung 
[\[124a.3\]]ba dang /_reg pa'i skye mched drug yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin khong du mi chud pa dang /_gang de dang der yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes pa dang /_ma mthong ba dang /_mngon par ma rtogs pa dang /_rmongs pa dang /_kun du rmongs pa dang /_ma rig pa dang /_mun pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba 
[\[124a.4\]]'di ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o/_/ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed ces bya ba'i 'du byed gang zhe na/_'du byed ni rnam pa gsum ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_lus kyi 'du byed dang /_ngag gi 'du byed dang /_yid kyi 'du byed do/_/'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par shes pa gang 
[\[124a.5\]]zhe na/_rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug ste/_mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba la ming gang zhe na/_gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi ste/_tshor ba'i 
[\[124a.6\]]phung po dang /_'du shes kyi phung po dang /_'du byed kyi phung po dang /_rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o/_/gzugs gang zhe na/_gzugs gang yin pa ci yang rung /_de dag thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang /_'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa ste/_gzugs 'di dang /_snga ma'i ming gnyi 
[\[124a.7\]]ga gcig tu mngon par bsdus nas ming dang gzugs zhes bya'o/_/ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug ces bya ba'i skye mched drug gang zhe na/_nang gi skye mched drug ste/_mig nang gi skye mched dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid nang gi skye mched do/_/skye 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa zhes bya ba'i reg pa gang zhe na/_reg pa'i tshogs drug ste/_mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/_/reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya ba'i tshor ba gang zhe na/_tshor ba ni gsum ste/_
