[\[124b.2\]]bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'o/_/tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa zhes bya ba'i sred pa gang zhe na/_sred pa ni gsum ste/_'dod pa'i sred pa dang /_gzugs kyi sred pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i sred pa'o/_/sred pa'i rkyen 
[\[124b.3\]]gyis len pa zhes bya ba'i len pa gang zhe na/_len pa ni bzhi ste/_'dod pa nye bar len pa dang /_lta ba nye bar len pa dang /_tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs nye bar len pa dang /_bdag tu smra ba nye bar len pa'o/_/len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa zhes bya ba'i srid pa gang zhe na/_srid pa ni 
[\[124b.4\]]gsum ste/_'dod pa'i srid pa dang /_gzugs kyi srid pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i srid pa'o/_/srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba zhes bya ba'i skye ba gang zhe na/_gang sems can de dang de dag gi sems can gyi ris de dang de dag tu gang skye ba dang /_shin tu skye ba dang /_'pho ba dang /_mngon 
[\[124b.5\]]par 'byung ba dang /_rab tu 'byung ba dang /_phung po so sor thob pa dang /_khams so sor thob pa dang /_skye mched so sor thob pa dang /_phung po rnams mngon par grub pa dang /_srog gi dbang po rab tu skyes pa 'di ni skye ba zhes bya'o/_/skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi zhes bya ba'i rga ba gang zhe na/_
[\[124b.6\]]gang de'i spyi ther dang /_skra dkar dang /_gnyer ma'i tshogs pa dang /_rnyis pa dang /_zhum pa dang /_ba lang chu 'thung ba lta bur gug pa dang /_lus nag po'i thig les gang ba dang /_lud pa lu zhing dbugs rgod pa dang /_mdun du lus bub pa ltar byed pa dang /_khar ba la brten pa 
[\[124b.7\]]dang /_blun pas mong rtul ba nyid dang /_zhan pa nyid dang /_nyams pa dang /_yongs su nyams pa dang /_dbang po rgud pa dang /_'du byed rnams rnyings pa dang /_shin tu rnyings par gyur pa 'di ni rga ba zhes bya'o/_/'chi ba gang zhe na/_sems can gang yin pa de dang de dag sems 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]can gyi ris/_de dang de dag nas 'phos pa dang /_'pho ba nyid dang /_zhig pa dang /_nang nyams pa dang /_tshe nyams pa dang /_drod yal ba dang /_srog gi dbang po 'gags pa dang /_phung po rnams 'dor ba dang /_shi ba dang /_dus byed pa 'di ni shi ba zhes 
[\[125a.2\]]bya ste/_shi ba 'di dang snga ma rga ba gnyis gcig tu bsdus nas rga shi zhes bya ste/_'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par dbye ba yin no/_/dge slong dag khyed la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang po dang rnam par dbye ba bshad par bya'o/_/zhes ngas smras pa gang yin pa de'i ched du ngas 
[\[125a.3\]]smras pa 'di dag yin no/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang po dang rnam par dbye ba bstan pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//[ {D212}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya pra tI t+ya sa muta pA da nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rten cing 'brel 
[\[125a.4\]]bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang na/_ar mo nig lta bu'i rdo leb la rta thul la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams dang /_
[\[125a.5\]]'phags pa byams pa dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pas brgyan pa rnams dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po dang /_sred med kyi bu dang /_dbang phyug 
[\[125a.6\]]chen po la sogs pa lha rnams dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo 
[\[125a.7\]]g.yas pa'i lha nga ri rab kyi rtse mo la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha 'di dag ni mchod rten bgyid par 'tshal ba sha stag ste/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir mchis na/_ci nas tshangs pa'i 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]bsod nams 'phel ba dang /_lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu las dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dag bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar/_bcom 
[\[125b.2\]]ldan 'das kyis de dag la chos bstan du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/_ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun te ShAn ta thA ga to h+ya ba data/_te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e bam bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH/_chos gang rgyu byung de dag gi/_/rgyu dang de 
[\[125b.3\]]'gog gang yin pa'ang /_/de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal te/_/dge sbyong chen pos de skad gsungs/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di lta ste/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku yin te/_sus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong ba des/_
[\[125b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la la zhig gis mi gnas pa'i phyogs su mchod rten ni skyu ru ra'i 'bru tsam/_srog shing ni khab tsam/_gdugs ni ba ku la'i me tog tsam zhig byas la/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung 
[\[125b.5\]]ba chos kyi dbyings kyi tshigs su bcad pa nang du bcug na de tshangs pa'i bsod nams skyed par 'gyur te/_'di nas shi 'phos shing 'chi ba'i dus byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas shi 'phos te 'chi ba'i dus byas nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba 
[\[125b.6\]]mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_nyan thos de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[125b.7\]]gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]{D213}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ang gu li mA lI yaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sor mo'i phreng ba la phan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di 
[\[126a.2\]]skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sha stag mang po dang /_'khor bzhi dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_
[\[126a.3\]]gnod sbyin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs mang po dang /_sha za dang /_'byung po'i tshogs dang /_lha'i bu mo dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /_nyi ma dang /_lha ma yin dang /_srin po dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_bdud 
[\[126a.4\]]la sogs pa la sems can thams cad nges par sgrol ba/_shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sde chen po mtshon cha thogs pa zhes bya ba ston te/_thog mar yang dge_/bar du yang dge_/tha mar yang dge_/don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_
[\[126a.5\]]yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su dkar ba/_tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par rab tu ston to/_/gang gi tshe mdo sde chen po mtshon cha thogs pa mthar phyin par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen po nas byang phyogs logs 
[\[126a.6\]]su rgyang mi ring ba zhig na/_bram ze'i bu 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba/_ri sding zhes bya ba'i grong khyer nas skyes pa/_shin tu dbul po bram ze mo bzang mo zhes bya ba'i bu phas bor ba/_lo bcu gnyis lon pa/_gzugs dang /_mdog 
[\[126a.7\]]dang /_stobs dang /_khong dpa' la phun sum tshogs pa/_shin tu blta na sdug pa/_tshig 'jam pa zhig yod de/_slob dpon nor bu bzang po/_rig byed bzhi'i pha rol tu song ba/_ha la ha se zhes bya ba'i grong na gnas pa de'i drung na/_bram ze'i bu 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba/_shin tu yid gzhungs shing /_bla ma la mchod pa byed pa/_dbang po thul ba/_brtul zhugs dang mi 'gyur ba la spyod pa de srid srung gi rig byed slob bo/_/de'i tshe slob dpon nor bu bzang po de rgyal pos 
[\[126b.2\]]bos nas/_mnyan du yod par 'gro ba na/_rang gi slob ma bram ze'i bu 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa khyim srung du bcug ste/_mnyan du yod par song ngo /_/de nas de'i tshe mkhan po'i chung ma gzhon nu gzugs bzang zhing phun sum tshogs pa des 
[\[126b.3\]]bram ze'i bu 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa mthong ba dang /_sems chags nas rab tu mi bzod par gyur pa dang /_gos dang rgyan rnams kyang lhod cing 'phyang ste/_'dod chags kyis non nas/_mgyogs pa mgyogs par bram ze'i bu 'jig rten thams 
[\[126b.4\]]cad kyis blta na sdug pa'i gos las bzung ste/_'dod pa la gzhol zhing bsod nams ma yin pa skyed do/_/de nas bram ze'i bu 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa de rang bzhin gyis bla ma la gus pa/_dbang po dul ba/_brtul zhugs dang mi 'gyur ba 
[\[126b.5\]]la spyod pa sems can gyi mchog des mkhan po'i chung ma la 'di skad du bla ma'i btsun mo khyod ni bdag gi ma dang 'dra ste/_de ltar ma mdzad cig ces smras so/_/de gtong ba lta mi byed nas gos gcig bor te/_ngo tsha nas gos gcig dang gud du song ngo /_/de nas mkhan 
[\[126b.6\]]po'i chung mas 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa'i sems la rnam par brtags nas/_mig mchi mas gang zhing 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis non nas rnam par sems par gyur te/_de nas de sdug bsngal zhing 'di snyam sems so/_/'jig rten thams 
[\[126b.7\]]cad kyis blta na sdug pa bde ba'i bar chad byed pa de shi'ang slas bud med gang gi khyor yang ma gyur par thal bar gyur cig snyam ste/_lus kun rang gi sen mos dral nas na zhing mi bde ste/_lus mi sdug par bcos nas bud med des g.yo sbyar te/_khyim gnyis kyi 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]bar gyi gdung ma la gyen du bcings nas btags so/_/de nas de'i tshe slob dpon nor bu bzang po rgyal pos mchod nas slar rang gi khyim du 'ongs pa dang /_des mthong ngo /_/mthong nas de'i thag pa bcad de kye ma'o zhes skad drag tu phyung nas rang gi chung 
[\[127a.2\]]ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bzang mo 'di ci sus khyod 'di lta bur byas/_bzang mos smras pa/_khyod kyi slob ma 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na sdug pas nan gyis kho mo la nyal po byas nas 'di ltar byas so/_/de nas slob dpon nor bu bzang pos 'jig rten 
[\[127a.3\]]thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa de'i mthu chen po shes te/_de thog ma btsas ma thag tu rgyal rigs thams cad kyi mtshon rnams shubs nas phyung ste/_mda' ste'u kha ma bzhin du thams cad du lhung nas/_de'i tshe rgyal rigs thams cad skrag cing rab tu 'jigs par 
[\[127a.4\]]gyur te/_'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa sems can gyi mchog de'i mthu chen po de lta bu shes nas/_de la cung zad bsgo ba tsam zhig nus te/_'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag nyid ngan pa bla ma'i chung ma ma rung 
[\[127a.5\]]bar byed pa khyod nyes pa chen po byas pas bram zer mi 'gyur gyis mi stong sod cig dang de nas byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces rang gi slob ma bram ze'i bu 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa la bsgo ba dang /_bram ze'i bu 'jig rten thams cad kyis blta na sdug 
[\[127a.6\]]pa de rang bzhin gyis bla ma la gus pas rang gi slob dpon la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye mkhan po bdag la 'os pa ma lags so/_/yang slob dpon gyis smras pa/_ji bdag nyid ngan pa khyod mtho ris su 'gro ba'am/_bram zer 'gyur bar mi 'dod dam/_yang slob 
[\[127a.7\]]mas smras pa/_legs so legs so/_/mkhan po de ltar bgyi'o zhes smras te/_mi stong bsad de 'ongs nas rang gi slob dpon la gus par smra ba byas pa dang /_slob dpon gyis de mthong nas gtum po 'di da rung ma shi ba lta zhes ngo mtshar du gyur te/_'o na da shi bar 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]bya'o snyam nas/_de skad ma zer bar bsad pa re re'i sor mo rnams long shig_/mi stong sod la sor mo rnams phreng bar byas te 'ongs dang /_gdod bram zer 'gyur ro zhes zer nas de'i phyir sor mo'i phreng ba zhes bya'o/_/yang sor mo'i phreng ba des legs so zhes smras nas/_
[\[127b.2\]]mi nyis stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba bsad do/_/de'i tshe sor mo'i phreng ba'i ma zas kyi mchog dang mngar sna bzhi thogs nas bdag gi bu 'di ltar gyur pa lta zhig na nyon mongs blud do snyam ste 'ongs pa dang /_sor mo'i phreng bas rang gi ma 'ongs par mthong nas bdag gi ma mtho ris 
[\[127b.3\]]su 'gro bar bya'o snyam ste ral gri thogs nas 'ongs so/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yul dang dus mkhyen nas mnyan du yod pa nas gnag pa'i dgongs su 'dom bzhi bcus ma tshang ba'i bar du shing a sho ka'i drung na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thams cad dang 
[\[127b.4\]]ldan pa de ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du mdun na bzhugs par gyur to/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas 'o na dge sbyong gau ta ma gsad do snyam ste/_ral gri thogs nas mgyogs pa mgyogs par 'ongs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes thams 
[\[127b.5\]]cad dang ldan pas bdag nyid gshegs pa lta bur bstan pa dang /_sor mo'i phreng bas ma la mdun gyis bltas te/_gnyis kyi bar du tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/zas gtsang sras po bzhugs su gsol/_/bdag ni 
[\[127b.6\]]sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/tshon gos mnabs pa bzhugs su gsol/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gom bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs 
[\[127b.7\]]shig_/mkhas pa'i gtso bo bzhugs su gsol/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/lhung bzed thogs pa bzhugs su gsol/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/seng ge'i rtsal mnga' bzhugs su gsol/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs 
[\[128a.2\]]shig_/stag gi rtsal mnga' bzhugs su gsol/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/ngang stabs legs bzhud bzhugs su gsol/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/
[\[128a.3\]]sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/lha yi glang po stabs mdzes bzhugs/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/nyi rtse mchog 
[\[128a.4\]]gzi brtson pa bzhugs/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/zla ba nya zhal spyan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bzhugs/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/
[\[128a.5\]]bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/gser gyi ri 'dra bzhugs su gsol/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/pad mo 'dab stong spyan bzhugs shig_/bdag ni 
[\[128a.6\]]sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/shangs kyi shugs drang bzhugs su gsol/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong 
[\[128a.7\]]khyod bzhugs shig_/ku mu da 'dra tshems mchog bzhugs/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/gsung mchog ljags mnga' bzhugs su gsol/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/mdzod spu'i thig le mchog mnga' bzhugs/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/
[\[128b.2\]]dbu skra mthon snum mchog mnga' bzhugs/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/snyan dang phyag ring mchog mnga' bzhugs/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam 
[\[128b.3\]]bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/phyag mchog glang po'i sna 'dra bzhugs/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/gsang ba sbubs su sbas pa 
[\[128b.4\]]bzhugs/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/pus mo bzang po mnga' ba bzhugs/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig 
[\[128b.5\]]dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/zangs kyi sen mo mchog mnga' bzhugs/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/'gro ba mchog gis spos byugs bzhugs/_/bdag ni sor 
[\[128b.6\]]mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs bzhugs/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs 
[\[128b.7\]]shig_/khu byug sgra dbyangs snyan sgrogs bzhugs/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/gnyi 'od bye ba brgya 'das bzhugs/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/dus rab bstabs la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/de ltar 
[\[129a.2\]]dul 'gros rab mgyogs bzhugs/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' bzhugs su gsol/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam 
[\[129a.3\]]bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/bden bzhi mchog mnga' bzhugs su gsol/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/phan mdzad lam brgyad ston 
[\[129a.4\]]pa bzhugs/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis mnga' bzhugs/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs 
[\[129a.5\]]shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/dpe bzang brgyad cu mnga' ba bzhugs/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/na chung mchog la 'dod spangs bzhugs/_/bdag ni sor mo'i 
[\[129a.6\]]phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/ji srid bdag ma khros par bzhugs/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod ni bzhugs 
[\[129a.7\]]su gsol/_/lha min dbang dang srin po rgyags bcas bcom/_/bdag ni 'di 'dra'i ngo mtshar yong ma mthong /_/shin tu mgyogs pa'i shugs ldan khyod su zhig_/ral gris ma btab bar du dge sbyong bzhugs/_/bdag gi ming yang khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_/
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod ni bzhugs su gsol/_/bdag ming gang gis thos pa tsam gyis 'gum 'gyur na/_/mngon sum bdag mthong gson par gyur pa ni/_/shin tu mthu ldan sems can dag lta 
[\[129b.2\]]ga la mchis/_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod ni bzhugs su gsol/_/bdag nyid mngon sum du ni mchis gyur kyang /_/rta yi bang ltar shin tu mgyogs bzhud pa/_/lha 'am klu 'am khyod su myur du gsungs/_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/
[\[129b.3\]]da ni bdag kyang mthu dang mi ldan gyur/_/brtan pa khyod ni slebs par mi nus so/_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/bzhugs shig dge sbyong khyod bzhugs shig_/dge sbyong brtul zhugs khrims 'dzin na/_/sho gam 
[\[129b.4\]]gnas las ma 'da' zhig_/bdag ni sor mo'i phreng ba ste/_/sor mo'i sho gam bdag stsol cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du gom pa bdun gshegs te/_seng ge'i lta bas kun du gzigs nas sor mo'i phreng ba la tshigs su bcad pa 
[\[129b.5\]]'di dag gsungs so/_/yang dag nyid kyi mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims 
[\[129b.6\]]brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/ma byas yang dag mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/
[\[129b.7\]]sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/zhi ba ma skyes mtha' la nga 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 
[\[130a.2\]]'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/'dus ma byas kyi mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos 
[\[130a.3\]]khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/rga ba med pa'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/
[\[130a.4\]]de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs 
[\[130a.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nad med pa yi mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i 
[\[130a.6\]]phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/'chi ba med pa'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig 
[\[130a.7\]]go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/kun nas nyon mongs med par nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug

[\[130b.5\]]zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nga ni bden pa'i mtha' la gnas pa ste/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/
[\[130b.6\]]sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nga ni chos kyi mtha' la

[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nga ni shes pa'i mtha' la gnas pa ste/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/

[\[131a.6\]]te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/rdul med pa yi 
[\[131a.7\]]mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/rdul dang bral ba'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug

[\[131b.5\]]tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/gtse ba med pa'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs

[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/ci yang med pa'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos

[\[132a.6\]]rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nga ni 
[\[132a.7\]]rab kyi mtha' la gnas pa ste/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nga ni dam pa'i chos la gnas pa ste/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim

[\[132b.4\]]khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nga ni ther zug mtha' la gnas pa ste/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul 
[\[132b.5\]]khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/gzhom du med pa'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/
[\[132b.6\]]sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/'jigs med chos kyi 
[\[132b.7\]]mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/mtha' yas chos kyi mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/
[\[133a.2\]]'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/bstan med chos kyi mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni 
[\[133a.3\]]yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin 
[\[133a.4\]]par bya/_/zab mo'i chos kyi mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon 
[\[133a.5\]]tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/blta dka'i chos kyi mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis 
[\[133a.6\]]chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/phra ba'i chos kyi mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang 
[\[133a.7\]]sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/mkhas pa'i chos kyi mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba 
[\[133b.2\]]khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/mthong bar dka' ba'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag 
[\[133b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par 
[\[133b.4\]]bya/_/kun gzhi med pa'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon 
[\[133b.5\]]tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/tha ba med pa'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis 
[\[133b.6\]]chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nyon mongs med pa'i mtha' la nga gnas 
[\[133b.7\]]te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nga ni dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa ste/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor 
[\[134a.2\]]mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/rnam par grol ba'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni 
[\[134a.3\]]yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam 
[\[134a.4\]]sbyin par bya/_/nga ni zhi ba'i mtha' la gnas pa ste/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims 
[\[134a.5\]]brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nga ni zhi gnas mtha' la gnas pa ste/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[134a.6\]]rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nye bar 
[\[134a.7\]]zhi ba'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nye bar chad pa'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos 
[\[134b.2\]]khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nye bar zhi ba'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/
[\[134b.3\]]de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs 
[\[134b.4\]]pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nga ni gya nom mtha' la gnas pa ste/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i 
[\[134b.5\]]phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/spros pa med pa'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni 
[\[134b.6\]]yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam 
[\[134b.7\]]sbyin par bya/_/nga ni gnas med mtha' la gnas pa ste/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nga rgyal 'dul ba'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam 
[\[135a.2\]]sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/sgyu ma 'dul ba'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/
[\[135a.3\]]de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i 
[\[135a.4\]]sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/ma rig 'dul ba'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i 
[\[135a.5\]]phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/rnam par btang ba'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/
[\[135a.6\]]nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon 
[\[135a.7\]]rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nges par spangs pa'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs 
[\[135b.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nga ni 
[\[135b.3\]]skye mched mtha' la gnas pa ste/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan 
[\[135b.4\]]rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nga ni dge ba'i mtha' la gnas pa ste/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin 
[\[135b.5\]]gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i 
[\[135b.6\]]mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs 
[\[135b.7\]]la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/mi g.yo ba yi mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/gnas dang khang pa'i mtha' la nga 
[\[136a.2\]]gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang 
[\[136a.3\]]dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/'gyod pa med pa'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/
[\[136a.4\]]'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/rab tu sbyangs pa'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod 
[\[136a.5\]]kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/
[\[136a.6\]]khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nga ni mthar gtugs mtha' la gnas pa ste/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug 
[\[136a.7\]]cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/khro glen 'dod spangs mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin 
[\[136b.2\]]par bya/_/nyon mongs spangs pa'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul 
[\[136b.3\]]zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/phung po spangs pa'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho 
[\[136b.4\]]gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/khro glen 'dod zad 
[\[136b.5\]]mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/
[\[136b.6\]]nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nga ni 'gog pa'i mtha' la gnas pa ste/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/
[\[136b.7\]]'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nga ni rten gyi mtha' la gnas pa ste/_/de yang sor phreng 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i 
[\[137a.2\]]sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nga ni mgon gyi mtha' la gnas pa ste/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 
[\[137a.3\]]'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nga ni skyabs kyi mtha' la gnas pa ste/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag 
[\[137a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin 
[\[137a.5\]]par bya/_/nga ni dpung gnyen mtha' la gnas pa ste/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims 
[\[137a.6\]]brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nga ni gling gi mtha' la gnas pa ste/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[137a.7\]]te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]go skabs rig pa'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan 
[\[137b.2\]]rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/ser sna phrag dog 'dul mthar nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis 
[\[137b.3\]]chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/skom pa 'dul ba'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/
[\[137b.4\]]de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i 
[\[137b.5\]]sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nga dang nga med mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng 
[\[137b.6\]]ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/phung po nges spangs mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni 
[\[137b.7\]]yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]gam sbyin par bya/_/zhi gnas kun gyi mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul 
[\[138a.2\]]khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/lam gcod pa yi mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/
[\[138a.3\]]sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/stong chen sgo yi mtha' la nga 
[\[138a.4\]]gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang 
[\[138a.5\]]dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/nyon mongs kun spangs byang mthar nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/
[\[138a.6\]]'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/sred pa zad pa'i mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod 
[\[138a.7\]]kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/'dod chags bral 'gog mtha' la nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 
[\[138b.2\]]'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin par bya/_/bde mchog mya ngan 'das mthar nga gnas te/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang 
[\[138b.3\]]dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khyod la mtshon rnon sho gam sbyin 
[\[138b.4\]]par bya/_/rtag brtan mchog shis rab bsil mthar nga gnas/_/de yang sor phreng khyod kyis mi rig go/_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam sbyin gyis chos khu zhim po 'thung /_/'dug cig sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'dug cig_/tshul khrims brtul 
[\[138b.5\]]zhugs yon tan rdzogs la 'dug_/nga ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/sho gam mtshon rnon khyod la sbyin par bya/_/shin tu rno ba'i mtshon 'di myur 'or la/_/rig pa'i ye shes skyabs su myur du shog_/tshur shog slob dpon ngan 'gro'i dbang song bas/_/
[\[138b.6\]]chos ma yin pa'i phung po chos su sems/_/de nas bdag nyid khong du chud par 'gyur/_/kun kyang chad pas rab 'jigs shing /_/thams cad la ni srog phangs te/_/bdag nyid kho na dper byas la/_/mi bsad gsod du mi gzhug go/_/pha rol ji ltar de 
[\[138b.7\]]bzhin bdag_/bdag nyid ji lta de bzhin gzhan/_/bdag rang nyid ni dper byas la/_/mi bsad gsod du mi gzhug go/_/srin po'i byad gzugs de ltar ma byed cig_/yan lag lus la shin tu khrag chags shing /_/bsad pa'i mtshon cha rnon po khrag 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]byugs pa/_/khyod kyis phrag la thogs pa mi mdzes so/_/sor mo'i phreng ba mgo las myur du 'or/_/kye ma bram ze'i bu'i las 'di 'dra zhing /_/chos 'dod bram ze'i bu yang 'di 'dra na/_/srin po ma rungs pa dag ji 'dra ge/_/phyugs 
[\[139a.2\]]rnams la yang ma ni mchod yin na/_/kye ma brtse med sdig grogs dbang song mi/_/shin tu rno ba'i mtshon cha gdangs brtsams te/_/rang gi ma yi drung du nye bar 'ong /_/gang yang sor mo'i phreng ba khyod lta bu/_/sdig byed mi yi nang na gcan gzan yin/_/
[\[139a.3\]]srin po'i nang na shin tu sdig can te/_/lha min nang na'ang ma rungs las byed pa/_/sor phreng khyod ni shin tu cher dkris shing /_/sdig pa sems pa mi yis spangs pa ste/_/ma ni 'jig rten dag na dka' mchog byed/_/nyon mongs des ni zla bcu rum na 
[\[139a.4\]]bsrel/_/de nas phyis ni btsas par gyur nas kyang /_/bshang gci mang reg sdug bsngal myong bas gsos/_/ltos shig sor phreng khyod kyi gtso mo ni/_/mig ni khrag gi mchi mas rab tu gang /_/bud med bu la byams shing sdug pa yis/_/mngar 
[\[139a.5\]]gyi bum pa phrag la thogs te 'ongs/_/rgan mo nyon mongs rlung gis skra yang bshig_/gos ngan ral po rlung gis bskyod cing 'brul/_/lus la rdul gos rkang pa ser ka byung /_/rgan mo nyon mongs sdug bsngal chen po myong /_/lus skams yun ring rlung dang 
[\[139a.6\]]lhags pas nyen/_/sdug bsngal mang pos shin tu gdungs par gyur/_/bud med de ni rnam par snying myos te/_/bsam yas sdug bsngal ldan zhing kyi hud 'bod/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng ba'i mas de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_bdag gi bu sor mo'i phreng ba gnyis phan 
[\[139a.7\]]tshun lan dang yang lan gyis rgya zhing cher rtsod pa las bdag gi bu pham ste/_lag cha bor bar mthong nas/_sdug pa'i sdug bsngal chen pos reg ste/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan rin chen gter stor ba/_/bdag 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]gis nyon mongs myong bas rnyed/_/bdag gis mig tu gyur pa thob/_/mig gi rdul rnams bdag gis bsal/_/bdag gi bu ni mi khrag gis/_/kye ma lus dang zas la reg_/kun du 'khyam zhing mtshon rnon thogs/_/'gro ba mang po'i phung po gsod/_/bdag 
[\[139b.2\]]gi bu yang mgu bya zhing /_/sangs rgyas phyag bya'am ji ltar bya/_/khyod kyi bu ngan 'di 'dra zhes/_/'gro [{]mangs [,]mang [}]tshig rtsub mnyan mi nus/_/de la sogs pa rnam pa du mar smre'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[139b.3\]]sor mo'i phreng ba khyod kyi gtso mo ni shing drung na 'dug ste/_de lta bu shin tu dka' ba byed pa'i bud med 'di la khyod ral gri thogs te/_bdag gi ma mtho ris su 'gro bar 'gyur ro snyam nas gsad par 'dod pa ni sor mo'i phreng ba chos ma yin pa'i phung po la chos su 
[\[139b.4\]]nor to/_/'di lta ste dper na/_sos ka'i dbyar zla ra ba'i dus la smig rgyu ba la chu yin snyam nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams kun du 'khyam pa de bzhin du/_sor mo'i phreng ba khyod kyang slob dpon ngan pa'i man ngag gis rmongs par gyur te/_chos ma yin pa la chos su sems 
[\[139b.5\]]pa'i sems can ni mnar med pa zhes bya ba'i mi zad pa chen por 'gro'o/_/sor mo'i phreng ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyabs su myur du song shig song shig_/zhugs shig_/sor mo'i phreng ba khyod ma 'jigs shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jigs pa med pa'i 'byung 
[\[139b.6\]]gnas te/_sangs rgyas ni sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin dang mtshungs par gzigs pa/_na ba rnams gso ba dang /_skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs so/_/sangs rgyas ni dbye gnas na bzhugs pa/_rtsa lag med pa rnams kyi rtsa lag go/_/sangs 
[\[139b.7\]]rgyas ni dbul po rnams kyi mi zad pa'i gter ro/_/sangs rgyas ni lam stor ba rnams la lam bzang po ston pa'o/_/sangs rgyas ni 'jigs pas gzir ba rnams kyi skyabs su gyur pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni gru zhig pa rnams kyi grur gyur pa'o/_/
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]mtshon rnon po myur du 'or la/_rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa long shig_/song la bla ma'i rkang pa la gtugs te bzod pa gsol cig_/rgan mo nyon mongs ma la rab tu 'byung bar thong shig ces gsol ba thob la srid pa mi zad pa las sems 
[\[140a.2\]]can rnams sgrol cig dang /_sho gam bzang po rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa sbyin no/_/sor mo'i phreng ba khyod yun ring por lam ngan par 'khyams shing ngal bar gyur gyis chos kyi ro'i chu 'thung shig_/sor mo'i phreng ba khyod kyang sho gam len pa yin/_de bzhin 
[\[140a.3\]]gshegs pa yang sho gam len pa yin te/_sor mo'i phreng ba de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sho gam len pa lam bsel gyi rgyal po yin te/_sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral cing lam bsel/_rtag tu sho gam len 
[\[140a.4\]]to/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas de nyid du srin po ltar shin tu rno zhing mi zad pa'i mtshon rnon po bor nas/_/byis pa lo gcig lon pas me mdag blangs pa dang /_me mdag de bor nas rang gi lag la nyug cing /_ngus te cho nges 'debs pa de bzhin du sor mo'i phreng ba 
[\[140a.5\]]yang mtshon shin tu rno ba de bor nas ngu zhing cho nges btab ste/_mi nyis stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba'i sor mo'i phreng ba thogs pa yang rang gi lus las phud nas kyi hud ces zer te/_dper na mi zhig nyal ba las rang gi rkang pa la sbrul gyis zin ma thag tu myur du sad nas/_
[\[140a.6\]]lag pa bskum pa las sprugs te/_shin tu mi zad pa'i sbrul bzung nas 'dor ba de bzhin du sor mo'i phreng ba yang rang gi mgo las sor mo'i phreng ba myur du bor ro/_/ji ltar bdag nyid gdon dang bral bar gyur par shes nas ngo tsha ba de bzhin du/_de nas sor mo'i phreng bas kyang /_
[\[140a.7\]]bdag nyid mngon par rig nas me tog rtsa lag 'tsho zhes bya ba'i kha dog ltar khrag gis lus thams cad yog cing /_sprin chen po ltar mig mchi mas gang nas rab tu ngu zhing bdag la rdeg ste/_ji ltar sbrul gyis zin nas smyos pa'i mi sbrul ltar ltos 'phye zhing 'gro 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]'gro ba de bzhin du sor mo'i phreng ba yang tshad shing sum cu rtsa dgu kho ra khor yug gi sa la ltos 'phye zhing song nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs mgo la bzhag ste/_tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye ma sangs rgyas byams pa'i mchog mnga' zhing /_/skyes 'dul kha sgyur bdag 
[\[140b.2\]]gi slad gshegs pas/_/gti mug chos kyi rlabs chen mi shes chu/_/rgya mtsho che las bdag deng nges par bsgral/_/kye ma sangs rgyas thugs rje mchog mnga' zhing /_/skyes 'dul kha sgyur bdag gi slad gshegs pas/_/shing rtsa 'bras bu lo ma mang ba yi/_/
[\[140b.3\]]dgon pa las ni deng bdag nges par bsgral/_/kye ma sangs rgyas dga' ba mchog mnga' zhing /_/skyes 'dul kha sgyur bdag gi slad gshegs pas/_/lta ba sna tshogs ri mor bris pa yis/_/stag gi lag nas bdag deng nges par bsgral/_/kye ma sangs rgyas 
[\[140b.4\]]btang snyoms mchog mnga' yang dag gzigs/_/skyes 'dul kha lo sgyur ba bdag gi slad gshegs pas/_/'o dod 'bod dang cher 'bod mnar med pa'i/_/sems can dmyal chen gting nas deng bdag bsgral/_/'di ni skyabs med pa yi skyabs lags 
[\[140b.5\]]te/_/rtsa lag med pa rnams kyi rtsa lag go/_/bdag gis ya nga tsha ba'i las bgyis na/_/bdag ni 'di 'drar gyur la skyabs mdzad gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sor mo'i phreng ba la slar bka' stsal pa/_sor mo'i phreng ba khyod longs la myur du song 
[\[140b.6\]]ste/_ma'i rkang pa la gtugs la bzod pa gsol cig_/bzod pa gsol nas/_rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol cig ces gsol ba thob cig_/de nas sor mo'i phreng ba bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung nas langs nas/_rang gi ma ga 
[\[140b.7\]]la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_rang gi ma la lan mang du bskor ba byas te/_chu srin byis pa gsod ces bya ba bzhin du 'gre zhing ngus nas cho nges btab ste/_rang gi ma la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/_/slob dpon ngan pa'i dbang song bas/_/
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]mi stong dgu brgya bkum lags te/_/kye ma bdag gis mi zad bgyis/_/bdag gis sdig phung mang po rnyed/_/ma khyod bdag gi rten lags te/_/sangs rgyas shin tu skyabs su gda'/_/khyod kyi zhabs ni mgor bzhag ste/_/rab 'byung 
[\[141a.2\]]bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol/_/de nas mas rang gi bu la tshigs su bcad pas phyir smras pa/_ngas ni bu khyod btang zin gyis/_/rab byung 'jig rten pha rol spyod/_/bdag kyang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/_/de bzhin rab tu 'byung bar gsol/_/
[\[141a.3\]]kye ma bcom ldan bsam mi khyab/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpe med de/_/sangs rgyas bdag gi bu sgrol ba/_/'jig rten kun la thugs kyang brtse/_/mgon po khyod kyi gzugs rnams dang /_/yon tan dpe yang 'gro la med/_/bdag gis chung 
[\[141a.4\]]zad brjod nus te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi lha/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgan mo la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad gsungs so/_/khyod kyi bu ni nga mdun du/_/rab tu 'byung bar gnang ba ni/_/legs so bud med nyon mongs ma/_/rgyun mi chad 
[\[141a.5\]]par bde bar shog_/khyod ni rab tu byung ba yi/_/dus las shin tu yol zin gyis/_/dge bsnyen ma yi chos rnams kyis/_/rgan mo bdag nyid dbugs phyung shig_/skad cig tsam du 'dir sdod de/_/rgyal po gsal rgyal ji srid na/_/'di dag tu ni 
[\[141a.6\]]mthong gyur pa/_/de tsam du yang bde bar 'dug/_//bam po gnyis pa/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang /_lha'i bu mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas bskor cing mdun du bdar te/_snang ba chen pos mnyan du yod pa'i yul 
[\[141a.7\]]thams cad snang bar byas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_sor mo'i phreng ba gnyis mi ltar 'thab pa dang /_cang shes ltar 'thab pa mthong ste/_rab tu dga' nas bcom ldan 'das dang sor mo'i phreng ba gnyis la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye ma mi 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]'dul kha lo sgyur/_/sangs rgyas nor la bzang po mdzes/_/kye ma 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyis/_/sor mo'i phreng ba rab tu btul/_/rtag tu mi yi khrag gis lus byugs te/_/lha min dbang dang lha dang srin po dang /_/gnod sbyin stobs dang ldan pa rtsal chen dang /_/klu dang 
[\[141b.2\]]sha za lto 'phye mi 'am ci/_/stobs ldan rtsal chen nam mkha' lding dag dang /_/sems can gtum po stobs ldan gzhan dag kyang /_/sor phreng ming thos nyal bzhin mig btsums 'dug_/de 'dra gtum po'i las byed sor phreng de/_/mi yi rgyal po tsam gyis ga la sod/_/
[\[141b.3\]]de ni btsas ma thag tu de yi tshe/_/lha dang lha ma yin pa kun skrag na/_/mi yi rgyal po tsam lta ci zhig smos/_/ming gis go cha mtshon kun rdol cing snang /_/de ltar drag cing stobs ldan rtsal che ba/_/kye ma de bzhin gshegs kyis btul ba legs/_/mthu dang 
[\[141b.4\]]rtsal kyang bsam gyis mi khyab mnga'/_/sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas ni/_/yul dang ye shes spyod yul bsam mi khyab/_/sor mo'i phreng ba de ring mdzes par snang /_/shin tu gzugs bzang btso ma'i gser ltar gyur/_/nyi ma'i zer shar kha 
[\[141b.5\]]dog lta bur mdzes/_/sor phreng byad sdug tshul khrims gnas pa mdzes/_/tshul khrims bral ba'i mi ni yong mi mdzes/_/kye ma bdag deng khyim chos mang thob snyam/_/sor mo'i phreng ba chos gos stsal bar bgyi/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan bdag la thugs 
[\[141b.6\]]brtse bzhes/_/sor mo'i phreng ba dge sbyong tshul 'dra stsal/_/slong ba kun gyi rgyal po chen po la/_/de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gzigs su gsol/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/skyes bu dam pa nga'i 
[\[141b.7\]]lha'i gos mchog 'di khyod kyi chos gos gyis shig_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sbrang ma lta bu khyod su zhig_/brgya byin ma dad pa yi sbyin pa nga len tam/_brgya byin khyod ni 'dod pa'i gong bu ste/_khyod kyis da dung chu klung mang po 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]ma rgal te/_rang bzhin gyis gcer bus gzhan la ji ltar gos sbyin/_khyod ni rang bzhin gyis gcer bu na/_chos gos kyi phyir ji ltar rin thang med pa'i gos gzhan la sbyin/_dper na rgyal po'i gyad stong thub bdag nyid lus thams cad thog mar 'gyel na/_ba 
[\[142a.2\]]lang rgan po 'dam du song ba bzhin/_ma rgal ba nyid du 'gyel bas rgan po gzhan gyi gyad stong thub la ji ltar brgal bar bya/_de bzhin du ngas kyang khyod kyi rin thang med pa'i gos gyon na brgya byin mig stong can nyon mongs pa'i bdud bye ba dang /_rang bzhin gyi bdud la sogs pa 
[\[142a.3\]]dang ji ltar 'gyed/_ngas ni bdud mtha' yas pa dang /_'thab cing nyon mongs pa mang po zad par bya ste/_dge sbyong gi chos de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la spyad par bya'i/_khyod kyi mal cha ni de ltar gnas par mi bya'o/_/brgya byin 
[\[142a.4\]]mig stong can khyod ni lha rnams kyi dbang phyug ma yin te/_khyod ni dmus long du gyur pa dang khyad par med do/_/brgya byin khyod kyis gtum po'i las kyi sdig pa ci 'dra ba'i bye brag mi shes so/_/sor mo'i phreng ba gtum po yin par sbrang ma lta bu khyod kyis ji ltar shes/_kye ma brgya 
[\[142a.5\]]byin gyis gsal bar gtum po'i las mi shes so/_/bstan pa'i tshul shes na rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa'i thog mar rin thang med pa'i chos gos gyon na/_dge sbyong ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/_brgya byin khyod ni rab tu 'byung ba'i dben pa tsam yang mi shes te/_kye ma brgya byin khyod ni 
[\[142a.6\]]bstan pa las phyi rol du gyur pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_gser dang /_nor bu zla mdzes la sogs pa'i rin po ches gang ba'i bum pa brgyad khri dang /_sa le sbram dang /_rin po che'i bum pa gzhan yang dpag tu med pa spangs te/_mchil ma'i 
[\[142a.7\]]thal ba bzhin du rin thang med pa'i gos bor te/_gang dge sbyong gi chos la nges par byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras thu bo/_gnas brtan 'od srung chen po gnas mal nags khrod du 'cha' zhing /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis kyis bsdams te/_lus kyis brtul 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]zhugs spyod pa yang ci'i phyir rin thang med pa'i gos mi gyon/_ci'i phyir khang pa'i gnas mal spangs shing gnas brtan 'od srung chen po bdud rtsi lta bu'i kha zas sna tshogs dang /_sha'i ro'i kha zas spangs te/_sha med par brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa la yang dag par spyod/_khyim nas 
[\[142b.2\]]khyim du rgyu zhing lkugs pa ma yin par lkugs par 'du shes pas mdun dang /_rgyab dang /_glo nas med ces zer ram gshe na yang bde bar gyur cig ces brtan par phyir 'byung ngo /_/yod ces zer na yang gnas brtan chags par mi 'gyur te/_bde bar gyur cig ces brtan par 
[\[142b.3\]]phyir 'byung la bum pa re res kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dge sbyong rnams nam 'tsho'i bar du bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_bldag pa spyad par 'gyur na/_ci'i phyir de lta bu'i longs spyod kyi phung po chen po dge 'dun gyi nor du ma bzhag ste/_bdag gir bya ba spangs shing btang nas yi 
[\[142b.4\]]dgas dang /_dbul po dang /_bkren pa dang /_slong ba la sogs pa'i gter zad mi shes par byas pa de lta bu ni brgya byin dge sbyong gi chos te/_til tsam gyi bag sogs pa de yang dge sbyong gi chos ma yin no/_/bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_nor rnam pa mang po dang /_
[\[142b.5\]]zhing gi dngos po dang /_de bzhin du nyo ba dang /_'tshong ba de ni dge sbyong gi chos dang 'thun pa ma yin te/_de dag ni khyim na gnas pa rnams kyi nor lta bu yin no/_/sngar smos pa'i nor de dag len pa gang yin pa dang /_rung ba ma yin pa'i nor sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa de dag 
[\[142b.6\]]ni blun por mtshungs te/_'bras ma rung bar byed pa'i zhing gi ngo dang 'dra bar skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can de dag nga chad pas gcad par bya'o/_/gang ngas bsad nas sor mo'i phreng bar byas pa de dag thams cad kyang bstan pa la sun 'byin pa sha stag ste/_dge bsnyen nam/_
[\[142b.7\]]dge bsnyen ma'am/_dge sbyong ngam/_dge sbyong ma gcig kyang med do/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/chos ni bsad pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang sras gcig po sgra gcan zin bzhin du 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]sems can thams cad la gzigs na/_ji ltar skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can rnams kyi yan lag gcad par bka' stsol bar 'gyur/_de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/_brgya byin lha'i dbang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gsad pa dang /_mi gsad pa'i bye 
[\[143a.2\]]brag brgya byin khyod kyis ga la shes/_sgyu ma byed pa'i sgyu ma ji ltar zhing pas mi shes pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i yul sgyu ma yang /_brgya byin bstan pa'i phyi rol du gyur pa zhing pa lta bus ga la shes/_mi gsad pa dang /_gsad pa la yang rnam pa gnyis yod de/_
[\[143a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i gsod pa dang /_nyan thos kyi gsod pa ste/_rnam pa de gnyis kyang sbrang bu lta bu khyod kyis ga la shes/_byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang /_khyod kyi yul gyi khyad par ni nam mkha' la sbrang bu'i 'phur stabs bzhin no/_/'di lta ste dper na/_
[\[143a.4\]]dge sbyong 'dres zin pa la dge sbyong rnams 'gog par zhugs na/_skye bo mang pos ci'i phyir 'gog pa la zhugs zhes dris na brgya byin khyod la dri ste/_de'i tshe de ltar 'gog pa'i zlog pa de mchog yin nam/_bsgo ba de'i tshe gal te 'gog pa des shi na su la sdig par 'gyur 
[\[143a.5\]]te/_gal te gsod pa'i sems sbyangs na/_su la yang sdig par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can rnams chad pas bcad pa las gal te shi na su la'ang sdig par mi 'gyur gyi/_bsod nams kyi phung po mang du skyed do/_/de ltar gsod pa dang /_
[\[143a.6\]]mi gsod pa'i bye brag ni shes par dka' ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gsod pa'i chos su mi 'gyur ro/_/dper na/_sman pas nad pa'i lce'i drung du gtsags bus btab ste/_khrag phyung ba las de'i 'og tu de gal te shi na ci sman pa la sdig tu 'gyur ram/_sman pa 
[\[143a.7\]]ni mi mang po la phan par byed pas sman pa la sdig tu mi 'gyur te/_gsod pa'i sems ni ma gtogs so/_/de bzhin du skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can rnams chad pas bcad pa las gal te shi na su la yang sdig par mi 'gyur gyi/_bsod nams kyi phung po mang du 'phel te/_
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]gsod pa'i sems ni ma gtogs so/_/dper na bu'i slob dpon mthong ma thag tu byis pa shi na bu'i slob dpon la sdig par 'gyur ram/_de bzhin du khong nas dpa' ba'i gzi brjid mthong nas/_mthong ba tsam gyis skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can shi na ci zlog pa la sdig par 
[\[143b.2\]]'gyur ram/_zlog pa la sdig par mi 'gyur gyi/_bsod nams mang du 'phel te/_gsod pa'i sems ni ma gtogs so/_/de'i phyir brgya byin khyod sdig pa'i las dang /_bsod nams rnams kyi las kyi bye brag mi shes so/_/dge sbyong dang /_dge sbyong ma yin pa'i bye brag 
[\[143b.3\]]mi shes kyis dam pa'i chos la sdang ba'i ya mtshan can rnams ni chad pas gcad do/_/gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la sogs pa nyan thos chen po brgyad cu dang /_sa ya gro zhin skyes dang /_thug pa med la sogs pa de dag thams cad kyang nor gyi bum pa mang po bor nas yo byad 
[\[143b.4\]]bsnyungs shing chog shes pas dam pa'i chos la gnas pa dag ci rin thang med pa'i gos gyon tam/_dge slong gi lus mgo bregs shing rgyags pa thams cad bcom pa mgon med pa bzhin du/_lag na lhung bzed thogs pa gos la sogs pa yang kha dog bsgyur cing 
[\[143b.5\]]kha dog ngan par byas pa'i dge slong de dag la bag med pa ji ltar rung /_rtag tu grang ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_bru ba dang /_skom pas nyen cing [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]bzhin du rtag par rkang lag rdul gyis reg kyang tshul khrims las cung zad 'das pa'i dri ma yang med pa khwa'i sgo nga bzhin 
[\[143b.6\]]du tshul khrims srung ba de dag la 'du 'dzi dang /_smra ba la dga' bas ci zhig bya/_bal glang mche ba bcad pa bzhin du 'jigs shing gzugs mi sdug pa de dag la rin thang med pa'i gos gyon pas ci zhig bya/_lan gnyis su de skad ma zer cig_/brgya byin khyod ni 
[\[143b.7\]]bstan pa'i phyi rol pa yin te/_mu stegs rnams su bram ze'i dam tshig la gdol pa mi chud pa de bzhin du/_khyod kyang phyi rol gyi gdol pa yin gyis sbrang bu khyod cang ma smra shig_/de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos snang ba chen po phyung nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_sor mo'i phreng ba la lha'i mchod pa chen po byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das dang /_sor mo'i phreng ba la tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye ma bdag gis g.yul chen 
[\[144a.2\]]rab mthong ste/_/seng ge gnyis ni drag tu 'thab pa bzhin/_/kye ma sangs rgyas mi 'dul kha lo sgyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pas sor phreng dge bar btul/_/sbrul gyis sman pa mthong nas shin tu sgra 'byin cing /_/mi 'jigs kha rlangs 'byin pa zhi bar myur 
[\[144a.3\]]btul ltar/_/de bzhin 'jig rten gsum gyi sman pa mthong nas ni/_/sor phreng gtum rab las bgyid shin tu dul bar gyur/_/khams gsum sman pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gyad mchog rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[144a.4\]]thabs kyi sku mnga' ba/_/bsam yas stobs 'chang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos nyid la yang sor phreng bzhag pa ni/_/de ring lha khyod shin tu rnam par mdzes/_/de ltar shin tu mdzes pa dpe mi rnyed/_/de phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dpe ma mchis/_/sor 
[\[144a.5\]]phreng tshul khrims deng gnas shin tu mdzes/_/dul zhing byang la 'jigs pa ma mchis shing /_/gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis kyang gser 'dra ste/_/'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser 'bar mdog ltar mdzes/_/de bzhin gshegs la bdag gsol bdag la thugs 
[\[144a.6\]]brtse bas/_/bdag gi 'phrul gos de bzhin gshegs pas deng bzhes te/_/sor mo'i phreng ba'i lha yi chos gos bgyi bar gsol/_/de yi 'bras bus bdag kyang byang chub mchog thob shog_/sor phreng chos gos bdag gi gos bgos nas/_/tshangs 
[\[144a.7\]]pa'i spyod pa sems brtan rdzogs par shog_/bcom ldan 'das la sor mo'i phreng ba yang /_/tshangs par spyod pa phun sum tshogs par srungs/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po la slar 'di skad ces smras so/_/phra ma can cal col 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]smra ba khyod su zhig_/sor mo'i phreng bas bdag gi gos bgos nas/_sor mo'i phreng ba tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs srungs shig_/sor mo'i phreng ba yun ring du tshul khrims srungs shig ces nga la brnyas shing smra ba/_tshangs pa ngan pa tshangs pa ma yin par tshangs 
[\[144b.2\]]pa'i gzugs su 'dir 'ongs na tshangs pa tshangs pa zhes bya ba'i don ci/_'jig rten na tshangs pa'i las gang yin/_ngas sbrang bu lta bu las gos blangs te bgos la tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs yun ring por bsrung ngam/_nga ni su'i khol po yang ma yin te/_
[\[144b.3\]]nga ni su'i dad pa la yang mi 'jug go/_/nga la su'i bu lon yang ma chags te/_ngas ni sngon sems can dbul po rnams la nor byin to/_/dper na dpyid zla ra ba la 'phyang mo nyug pa'i thag pas btags te/_ring du song yang slar myur du rang gi gnas su 'khor ba de 
[\[144b.4\]]bzhin du tshangs pa sbrang bu khyod kyang dpyid zla ra ba la 'phyang thag btags pa ltar tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba myong nas phyir ltung ba'i chos can du ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i don yon tan gyi 'thad pa mi shes par gang sdig pa dang /_sdig 
[\[144b.5\]]pa ma yin par rtog pa khyod 'dra ba sbrang bu lta bu de dag srid pa dag na/_mi mkhas shing mi ldan pa 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi nang na kun du 'khyam mo/_/kye ma tshangs pa sdig pa dang sdig pa ma yin pa nges par shes na/_sor mo'i phreng bas gtum po'i las byas so 
[\[144b.6\]]zhes smros shig_/tshangs pa ngan pa sbrang bu lta bu khyod mi shes kyis/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slobs shig_/de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos/_sor mo'i phreng ba la slar 'di skad ces smras so/_/sor mo'i phreng ba mi nyis stong du gcig 
[\[144b.7\]]ma tshang ba bsad de/_mi bzad pa byas pa ni mngon sum du da dung yang snang ngo /_/khyod kyi drag shul gyi las ni bya rog dang khras kyang byed mi nus te/_'di lta bu drag shul gyi las ma yin na/_drag shul gyi las ci lta bu yin/_gal te 'di lta bu bdud ma 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]yin na/_srin po mi bzad pa yang ji lta bu zhig yod de/_sor mo'i phreng ba bag yod par gyis la/_khyod kyis las byas pa rnams ji nas byang bar 'gyur ba de ltar brtson par gyis shig_/kye ma sangs rgyas ni thugs rje can te/_sor mo'i 
[\[145a.2\]]phreng ba la sogs pa gtum po'i las byed pa rnams nges par sgrol ba'o/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po la slar 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshangs pa khyod srin bu phra mo bzhin du mchong zhing 'khyam du gar 'gro_/sdig pa dang mi sdig pa 
[\[145a.3\]]mi shes pa'i sems can rnams ngan 'gror 'gro'o/_/blun po la la zhig nags kyi nang du song nas mtshan mo mun pa'i nang na shing gi rtsa ba'i steng na srin bu me khyer gyi phung po mthong ba dang /_ngan pa de skrag nas grong dang tshong dus su 'ongs te/_'brog tshig go zhes zer 
[\[145a.4\]]ba dang /_'gro ba mang po der dong ba dang /_mtshan mo mun nag gi nang na srin bu me khyer mthong nas/_'di me ma yin no zhes mthar gyis slar log ste dong ba de bzhin du/_tshangs pa ngan pa khyod kyang sor mo'i phreng ba blun po'o zhes ston cing bdag nyid dang /_skye bo mang po 
[\[145a.5\]]yang shin tu bslus te/_phyis sgyu ma'i phung po de sbrang bu lta bus kyang shes/_sems can mang pos kyang shes par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros 'chal pa blun po la la zhig nags khrod du song nas/_shing mya ngan med pa'i nags me tog rgyas pa mthong ba dang /_
[\[145a.6\]]me yin pa snyam du bsams te/_skrag nas grong dang tshong 'dus su song ste/_'gro ba mang po yang de bzhin du phyin pa dang /_rim gyis me dang /_shing mya ngan med pa'i bye brag shes pa de bzhin du sbrang bu lta bu khyod kyis sdig pa dang /_sdig pa ma yin pa rim gyis 
[\[145a.7\]]shes par 'gyur ro/_/de nas phyis skye bo mang pos kyang sgyu ma'i phung po lta bu 'di shes par 'gyur gyis tshangs pa ngan pa khyod lan gnyis su de skad ma zer cig_/de ltar [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra ba ma slob par khyod lta bu blo zhan pa/_sbrang ma lta bu rnams ni cang ma zer bar 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]'dug cig_/de nas 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis snang ba chen po phyung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_sor mo'i phreng ba la mchod pa chen po byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das dang sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye ma skyes bu stag gi 'thab mo mchog_/
[\[145b.2\]]don dam rgal zhing lan ldon shin tu mdzes/_/kye ma ston pa mi 'dul kha lo sgyur/_/de phyir mtha' yas stobs 'dzin sangs rgyas lags/_/zhabs mchog pad ma lta bur mnyen zhing 'jam/_/rdul gyis mi reg pa la phyag 'tshal te/_/lan mang skyabs mchis 
[\[145b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la/_/gsol ba bdag gi lhung bzed sor phreng stsol/_/sor mo'i phreng ba deng mdzes te/_/nam mkha' la ni zla ltar mdzes/_/sor phreng tshul khrims yon tan dang /_/brtul zhugs gzi brjid rdzogs pa mdzes/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas 
[\[145b.4\]]'jig rten skyong ba bzhi la slar smras pa/_sbrul lta bu'i 'jig rten skyong ba phra mo khyod su dag cig_/'jig rten skyong ba 'jig rten skyong ba snyam ste/_nga rgyal gyis khengs pas bdag gi lha'i lhung bzed sbyin no zhes nga la 'drid cing /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ltar 'jungs pa dag yud tsam 
[\[145b.5\]]gzhan gyi tshe nga'i ya nga ba dag ltos shig_/gyo mo'i snod ni su la yang mi dgos na/_'jig rten gyi mgon po snyam du sems pas bdag gi lha'i kha phyis nga la sbyin nam/_gang 'jig rten na ma rungs pa'i ya mtshan can rnams thal bar byed pa na 'jig rten skyong ba zhes 
[\[145b.6\]]grags te/_/chos yang dag par bskyang bar bya'i/_'jig rten bskyang bar mi bya'o/_/yang dper na la las khu byug gi sgra thos sam/_kha dog phun sum tshogs pa mthong ba dang de nas yud tsam na/_bya rog skad 'byin pa mthong nas khu byug khu byug ces nor 
[\[145b.7\]]ba de bzhin du khyod kyang chos su sems shing chos ma yin pa srung ngo /_/nags khrod na 'dug pa'i bya rog skad 'byin pa mthong nas/_khu byug snyam du sems pa bzhin du 'jig rten skyong ba khyed bzhis chos skyongs la 'jig rten ma skyong shig_/'jig rten skyong ba 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]skye bo mi shes pa sbrang bu lta bu khyed bzhi zung thub par gyis la cang ma smra shig_/de nas bdud sdig can sor mo'i phreng ba'i thad du 'ongs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa cher byas nas/_sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[146a.2\]]sor mo'i phreng ba myur du rab tu byung /_/nga yi tshong 'dus grong zhugs bslus pa ni/_/sor mo'i phreng ba nga ni mi dga' ste/_/sems can dmyal ba'i gting nas khyod brgal to/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas bdud sdig can la slar 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig can 
[\[146a.3\]]khyi rkun sbrang bu lta bu phar song /_khyod ci shin tu spobs par smra'am/_bdud sdig can khyod deng myur du byung ste song shig_/ji srid du khyi ltar bcing ba lngas bcings te/_rkang pa g.yon pas ma brdabs pa de'i bar du ni bdud khyod rab tu rtsen to/_/grong dang /_tshong 'dus 
[\[146a.4\]]dang /_lung pa'i sgo thams cad kyang ngas stong par byas te/_dper na nam mkha' lding ri rab kyi steng du 'dug nas rgya mtsho dpag tshad kyi bar mang po na/_klu phrug mthong na len pa de bzhin du sems can dmyal ba pa thams cad la yang nga nam mkha' lding ltar rnam 
[\[146a.5\]]par rtse zhing thar pa'i khu bas ngoms so/_/rtag tu bdud sdig can khyod kyi mgo bcad de/_byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu'i glang po che rnams rol to/_/bdud khyi rkun lta bu khyod cang ma zer bar chos bdud rtsi'i tshig nyon la yud tsam gyi bar du sdod de/_chos thos 
[\[146a.6\]]nas rang gi grong khyer du song shig dang /_tshong 'dus dang /_grong khyer rnams shes par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_sor mo'i phreng ba la lha'i mchod pa chen po byas nas/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/
[\[146a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs mchog bdag gis mgos gtugs te/_/pad mo mchog dang 'dra ba'i bsngags brjod bstod par bgyi/_/bde gshegs pad mo 'dab stong spyan mnga' 'dab stong ldan/_/zhabs mchog 'jam pa pad mo 'dab ma stong can 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]'dra/_/zhabs ni pad mo dmar skya 'dra zhing rdul mi chags/_/zhabs mchog ud pal 'dab 'dra phyag mthil shin tu 'jam/_/ud pal 'dab ma mchog gi zhal gyi dri bda' ste/_/'jig rten dag na ud pal 'dab ma bzhin du bsil/_/bde gshegs kun du 
[\[146b.2\]]blta sdug ud pal 'dab mchog bzhin/_/dbu skra 'jam zhing snum la ud pal mthing ga 'dra/_/dbu skra ud pal mthing ga dri mchog bsil ba 'dra/_/ud pal mthing ga snum pa'i mdog 'dra yid du 'ong /_/dbu skra nyag ma phra zhing lcang lo'i phreng ba mnga'/_/khyod 
[\[146b.3\]]kyi tshems mchog ku mu da dang zla ba 'dra/_/ku mu da dang zla ba pad mo'i snying po ltar/_/chu dang nya lcibs dag gi skyon gyis yong mi gos/_/tshems ni ku mud zla ba lta bur dri ma med/_/nyes pas mi gos tshems mchog ku mud kha dog 'dra/_/tshems kyang nyon 
[\[146b.4\]]mongs bsal cing thabs mchog tshems mnga' ba/_/pun da rI ka bzhin du dri med gsal ba'i blo/_/pun da rI ka bzhin du sems mchog dag pa ste/_/sems ni pun da rI ka lta bur mi gos pa/_/'dod khro glen pa'i nyes spangs sangs rgyas pun da rI/_/sangs 
[\[146b.5\]]rgyas pad mo dkar po lta bu'i blo gros mnga'/_/pad mo'i drung na ud pal dri mchog mdzes pa ltar/_/sangs rgyas deng mdzes ud pal gnyis ltar sor phreng mdzes/_/sor phreng deng mdzes 'di ltar sdig can bdud kyang ni/_/gos dkar gyon pas thog mar 
[\[146b.6\]]btul cing pham byas te/_/lan dang yang lan dag gis de bzhin gshegs dang rol/_/'di ni 'jig rten du yang mgon po myur du 'gyur/_/kye ma ral gri phyar nas bde gshegs bkrongs bsam nas/_/sor mo'i phreng ba 'dir 'ongs ma yang gsad par 
[\[146b.7\]]sems/_/deng zhi so so'i skye bo skal ba yod pa 'dra/_/bden par smra ba'i tshig ni gzhan du yong mi 'gyur/_/khyod kyi sdig byas ci nas lus 'dir byang 'gyur ba/_/de ltar sor phreng khyod kyis rtsoms shing nan tan gyis/_/kye ma dpa' bo khyod kyis gtum 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]pa'i las byas na/_/de ring chos kyi rje bor gyur nas bdag dga'o/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la slar 'di skad ces smras so/_/stabs mi sdug pa gtum po khyod su zhig_/khyod ni rang la dbang phyug snyam pa ste/_khyod ni ming 
[\[147a.2\]]gi dbang phyug yin gyi/_dbang phyug ji lta ba bzhin ma yin no/_/so so'i skye bo'am/_dgra bcom pa gang yin pa ji ltar shes myur du smros shig_/dbang phyug khyod sha za ltar mche ba rno na da rung yang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa ma thob bam/_'di lta ste/_skyes bu mdze 
[\[147a.3\]]tshabs chen pos btab pas/_mdze rab tu zhi ba bstan na/_'jig rten pa rnams 'di snyam du sems so/_/gang bdag nyid kyi nad zhi bar mi nus pa des gzhan gyi nad ji ltar gso snyam mo/_/de bzhin du gtum po sbrang bu lta bu khyod kyang bdag rtogs pas bdag gi khams
