[\[147a.4\]]kyang da dung mi shes te/_gtum po mdze tshabs chen pos btab pa lta bus sor mo'i phreng ba so so'i skye bo'am/_dgra bcom pa'o zhes pha rol gyi sems shes par ga la 'gyur/_sbrang bu lta bu khyod cang ma zer cig_/khyod ni sa'i dbang phyug tu dbang bskur ba dang /_sa'i 
[\[147a.5\]]dbang phyug gi rgyal tshab tu 'os pa ma yin gyis/_dmus long lta bu khyod yud tsam sdod cig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shing gang la rten te/_bzhugs pa'i shing de'i lha mos sor mo'i phreng ba la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/_/dpa' bo sor mo'i 
[\[147a.6\]]phreng ba myur bar du/_/khyod ni ngur smrig rgyal mtshan gyon cig dang /_/bde gshegs thabs cig thog mar bsod snyoms gsol/_/dpa' bo 'bras bu dam pa thob par bgyi/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas lha mo la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[147a.7\]]pa bshos mi gsol/_/nyan thos rnams kyang de bzhin na/_/khyod kyi sbyin pa su la sbyin/_/myur smros bzang mo yangs pa'i mig_/nga yi the tsom la gor chod/_/de nas lha mo yangs pa'i mig gis slar sor mo'i phreng ba la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]sangs rgyas rtag tu bshos gsol te/_/nyan thos rnams kyang de bzhin na/_/brtan pa rab tu 'byung 'dod la/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba mi cha'o/_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig ni rnam spongs shig_/g.yo yi bsam pa sdig can yin/_/chos gcig las ni 'das pa yi/_/skye bo 
[\[147b.2\]{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gyi tshig smra ba/_/'jig rten pha rol btang ba dag_/mi byed pa ni ci yang med/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas lha mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bud med khyod ci zhig 'khyam/_khyod kyang dman pa'i rigs su skyes kyis/_sbrang bu lta bu sangs rgyas kyis 
[\[147b.3\]]smad pa'i bud med kyi dngos po'i bdag nyid la shin tu rtogs shig_/'jig rten na [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba gang /_'jig rten na bden pa 'dzin pa gang /_'jig rten na zang zing la chags pa gang /_'jig rten na na zhing shi ba gang yin sbrang bu lta bus mi shes so/_/sems can gang 
[\[147b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bdag nyid chen po mi shes pa'i sems can de dag ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra ba'o/_/sems can gang zang zing la chags pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa la yang zang zing gis bkur ba'i sems can de dag ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba ste/_de dag la rab tu 'byung ba 
[\[147b.5\]]yang med na/_bsnyen par rdzogs par lta ga la 'gyur/_/sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem po ngag mi shes pa'i sems can de dag ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba ste/_de dag la rab tu 'byung ba yang med na/_bsnyen par rdzogs par lta ga la 'gyur/_nga ni chos gcig 
[\[147b.6\]]las kyang mi 'da'o/_/lha mo khyod kyis ni chos thams cad las 'das kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i lha yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la myur du bzod par gsol cig_/de nas sor mo'i phreng ba la lha mos slar 'di skad ces smras so/_/bud med kyi dngos po 
[\[147b.7\]]rigs dma' ba'o zhes zer ba ci la ldem po ngag tu smra/_sor mo'i phreng ba bud med dam/_skyes pa yin par ji ltar shes/_sor mo'i phreng ba khyod myur du smros shig_/khyod sha za'i dngos po da dung ma zhi'o/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas lha mo de la slar 'di skad 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]ces smras so/_/rgyal po'i mal du khyi song nas ri mo byed pa'i sems can gyis mi gtsang bar byas pa de bzhin du lha mo khyod kyang thabs kyi chos kyis rtse bas bud med kyi dngos por bsgyur te/_'dod pa'i yul la sems shing ri mo byed do/_/de bas na lha mo khyod 
[\[148a.2\]]bud med kyi dngos po spongs la skyes pa dang /_bud med ces bya ba rab tu stong par sgoms shig_/rab tu stong pa la goms na skyes pa'i dngos po myur du 'thob po/_/de nas de'i tshe shA ri'i bu dang /_maung gal gyi bu gnyis rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin 
[\[148a.3\]]du nam mkha' las 'ongs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_/sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/khyod 
[\[148a.4\]]kyis 'thun zhing rjes su dgongs pa'i bsod nams byas pa shes par gyis shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu dong la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyad pa rnams ltar bcug ste/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar 'dong 
[\[148a.5\]]ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu phyung nas/_'jig rten skye bo'i phung po mang po ltar nam mkha' las zla ba dri ma med pa dang /_ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar chas te 'dong ngo /_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/_tshe dang ldan pa maung gal gyi bu chen po la slar tshigs su 
[\[148a.6\]]bcad pa smras pa/_rdzu 'phrul ldan pa gang yin 'jig rten na/_/rdzu 'phrul rtsa ba las ni ci zhig skye/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan thob 'gyur ba myur smros la/_/khyod kyis nga yi the tsom myur du sol/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maung gal gyi bu chen pos sor mo'i phreng ba la 
[\[148a.7\]]tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/_gal te 'jig rten dag na sbyin bdag rnams/_/rtag tu lham yang rab tu sbyin par byed/_/gal te dge slong tshul khrims rdzogs pa la/_/lham gyi rnam pa shin tu phul ba ste/_/rnam pa gnyis po de dag gis/_
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]rdzu 'phrul 'dod pa rdzu 'phrul 'thob/_/sor phreng de ltar shes par gyis/_/rdzu 'phrul 'dod na de ltar spyod/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maung gal gyi bu chen po la/_sor mo'i phreng bas slar 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye ma btsun pa maung gal gyi bu sbrang bu'i spyad pa spyod de/_
[\[148b.2\]]rdzu 'phrul kun bzung ba mi shes so/_/sbrang bu yang nam mkha' la 'gro/_sbrang bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs can khyod cang ma zer cig_/bdag grol nas dgrol bar bya'o snyam ste/_phan pa'i sems des ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa myur du 'grub bo/_/dam pa'i 
[\[148b.3\]]chos phan par ston pa nyam thag pa'i tshe/_de'i mdun du bdag gi srog bor na/_des rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa 'grub bo/_/sems can bye ba mang po bsgral ba las lhag pa rgyal ba'i tshal na rdzu 'phrul ga la yod kyis nga mi 'gro'o/_/de ltar theg pa chen po dpag tu 
[\[148b.4\]]med pas na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'ang dpag tu med do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la sor mo'i phreng bas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jig rten dag na shes rab che ba gang /_/ji lta bur na blo gros skye bar 'gyur/_/ye shes 
[\[148b.5\]]chen po khyod kyis myur bar yang /_/myur du smros te nga yi the tsom chod/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sor mo'i phreng ba la tshigs su bcad pa slar smras pa/_tshul khrims lnga rnams rab tu bsrungs pas na/_/blo mchog shes rab chen po 'thob par 
[\[148b.6\]]'gyur/_/lus 'di bor nas rang gi blor bcas te/_/gang dang gang du 'dod pa der skye ste/_/de dang der ni shes rab chen por 'gyur/_/phyogs su snyan pa rnams grags sor mo'i phreng /_/dpa' chen blo ldan de ltar shes par gyis/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng 
[\[148b.7\]]bas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la slar 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'o zhes bstan pa mi 'chi ba'i tshig 'di las shes rab chen po skye ste/_de ltar ston pa shes rab dang ldan pa de ni sangs rgyas yin te/_kye ma btsun pa shes rab chen 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]po shA ri'i bu ni sbrang bu'i spyad pa spyod de/_sbrang bu lta bur 'gro ba khyod ni shes rab dang ldan pa mi shes so/_/sbrang bu lta bu'i shes rab can khyod cang ma zer cig_/btsun pa ni sbrang bu lta bu'i shes rab can no/_/de nas de'i tshe kun dga' bo der 'ongs nas/_
[\[149a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/legs so legs so/_/sor mo'i phreng ba khyod kyis 'thun zhing rjes su dgongs pa'i bsod nams byas pa nga dga'o/_/sor mo'i phreng ba myur du gsung rab yan 
[\[149a.3\]]lag dgu pa lhogs shig_/de nas gnas brtan kun dga' bo la/_sor mo'i phreng bas slar 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod mang du thos pa'i mchog tu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs na/_btsun pa kun dga' bo khyod la dri yis smros shig_/'jig 
[\[149a.4\]]rten na mang du thos pa gang /_ji ltar na mang du thos par 'byung /_btsun pa kun dga' bo ngas de skad dris pa myur du smros shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/_sor mo'i phreng ba la slar 'di skad ces smras so/_/mdo sde yan lag dgu pa 
[\[149a.5\]]klog pa dang /_gzhan la yang ser sna med par rab tu ston pa de las mang du thos shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzungs phun sum tshogs pa thos par 'gyur ro/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas gnas brtan kun dga' bo la slar 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jig 
[\[149a.6\]]rten na de bzhin gshegs pa ni ther zug g.yung drung ngo zhes bstan pa ston pa/_bstan pa de ni 'jig rten na mang du thos pa yin te/_mang du thos pa de lta bur shes par gyis shig_/kye ma btsun pa kun dga' bo ni sbrang bu'i spyad pa spyod de/_mang du thos pa 'byung 
[\[149a.7\]]ba'i sgo mi shes so/_/sbrang bu la yang mang du thos pa yod kyis/_sbrang bu lta bu'i mang du thos pa khyod cang ma zer cig_/de nas gnas brtan sgra gcan zin/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis 'thun zhing rjes su dgongs pa'i bsod nams byas pa nga dga'o/_/sor mo'i phreng ba myur du gus par bslab pa zung shig_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/_sgra gcan zin la slar smras pa/_btsun pa sgra gcan zin khyod 
[\[149b.2\]]bslab pa la dga' zhing gus pa'i mchog tu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs na/_'jig rten na bslab pa la gus pa gang yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras phangs pa myur du smros la nga'i the tsom chod cig_/de nas gnas brtan sgra gcan zin gyis sor mo'i 
[\[149b.3\]]phreng ba la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_sangs rgyas gsung rnams shin tu gus par gzung /_/de nas bslab la gus shing tshul khrims ldan/_/khong dpa' dbang gyur khong dpa' mchog 'dzin pa/_/sor mo'i phreng ba de ltar shes par gyis/_/sor mo'i phreng 
[\[149b.4\]]bas sgra gcan zin la slar 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa ni mchog tu rtag pa'o zhes gus pas bstan pa ni gus pa'i mchog ces bya ste/_btsun pa sgra gcan zin ston pa de ni 'jig rten na bslab pa la gus pa'i mchog tu shes par 
[\[149b.5\]]gyis shig_/kye btsun pa sgra gcan zin ni sbrang bu'i spyad pa spyod de/_sbrang bu lta bu khyod bslab pa la gus par mi shes so/_/sbrang bu la yang gus pa yod kyis/_sbrang bu lta bu khyod cang ma zer cig_/de nas gnas brtan ma 'gags pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[149b.6\]]'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/legs so legs so/_/sor mo'i phreng ba khyod kyis 'thun zhing rjes su dgongs pa'i bsod nams byas 
[\[149b.7\]]pa nga dga'o/_/sor mo'i phreng ba da ring por mi thogs par lha'i mig can du gyis shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la sor mo'i phreng bas slar 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa ma 'gags pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i mig can gyi 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]mchog tu gsungs na/_'jig rten na lha'i mig can gang /_lha'i mig ji ltar skye/_myur du smros la nga'i the tsom chod cig_/de nas sor mo'i phreng ba la tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas slar tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/_/mar mes rtag 
[\[150a.2\]]tu mig 'thob 'gyur/_/yang na gzhan la nan tan du/_/chos bshad pas kyang shes par bya/_/gzugs can nang na gzugs mchog can/_/de ltar sor phreng shes par gyis/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[150a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rab tu nan tan du mi 'chab cing /_sems can thams cad la phan par bstan pa ston na/_des lha'i mig 'thob par 'gyur te/_de ni 'jig rten na lha'i mig can no/_/kye ma btsun pa ma 'gags pa khyod ni sbrang bu'i spyad pa spyod de/_lha'i 
[\[150a.4\]]mig bskyed pa mi shes so/_/sbrang bu yang rang gi yul mthong gis sbrang bu lta bu khyod cang ma zer cig_/de nas gnas brtan dge sbyong gi khol po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/legs 
[\[150a.5\]]so legs so/_/sor mo'i phreng ba khyod kyis 'thun zhing rjes su dgongs pa'i bsod nams byas pa nga dga'o/_/sor mo'i phreng ba da ni bzod pa la mang du bsgom par bya'o/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/_gnas brtan dge sbyong gi khol po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[150a.6\]]'jig rten dag na bzod pa rdzogs pa su/_/bzod pa 'dod pas ji ltar bzod par 'gyur/_/ji lta bur na bzod par 'gyur ba yang /_/myur du smros la nga yi the tsom chod/_/de nas gnas brtan dge sbyong gi khol pos/_sor mo'i phreng ba la slar smras pa/_
[\[150a.7\]]dge slong bzod pa 'dod pa yis/_/ste'u dang tsan dan 'dra bar bya/_/de nas bzod pa thob par 'gyur/_/de ni 'jig rten rdul bzod yin/_/sor phreng de ltar shes par gyis/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas gnas brtan dge sbyong gi khol po la 'di skad ces 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]slar smras so/_/'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rab tu ston pa la mi mkhas pa/_log par lta ba'i mi dag zhe sdang zhing bstan pa ni bdag med pa'o zhes bdag nyid de ltar 'jog ste/_de dag ni tshig la goms par mi byed cing /_mtshungs pa med do snyam 
[\[150b.2\]]nas/_rang gi srog kyang btang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rab tu ston pa de ni bzod pa'i dam pa ste/_'jig rten na phan par ston pa'o/_/'jig rten na bzod pa dul ba zhi ba 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/kye ma gnas brtan dge sbyong gi khol po khyod ni sbrang bu'i spyad 
[\[150b.3\]]pa spyod de/_bzod pa bskyed par mi shes so/_/sbrang bu yang bkres pa dang /_skom pa bzod kyis/_sbrang bu lta bu khyod cang ma zer cig/_//bam po gsum pa/_de nas gang po byams ma'i bus bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_
[\[150b.4\]]sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/legs so legs so/_/sor mo'i phreng ba khyod kyis 'thun pa dang rjes su dgongs pa'i bsod nams byas pa nga yang dga'o/_/sor mo'i phreng ba sems can thams cad la phan par bstan pa'i chos kyi gtam ston cig_/de nas 
[\[150b.5\]]sor mo'i phreng bas/_gang po byams ma'i bu la slar 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang po khyod sangs rgyas kyis chos smra ba'i mchog tu gsungs na/_btsun pa 'jig rten na chos smra ba gang yin/_ji ltar na dge slong don shes pa yin/_btsun pa chos smra ba'i 
[\[150b.6\]]mchog gis shod cig_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas gang po byams ma'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sangs rgyas kun dang nyan thos kyis/_/gang de kun du ma brnyes pa/_/chos de mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_/srog chags rnams la bstan par bya/_/
[\[150b.7\]]de skad gsungs pa'i don ci gang pos smras pa/_'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang chos thams cad la sems can gyi dbyings dang /_bdag dang /_srog dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes pa dang /_shed bu shin tu nan tan du btsal 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]kyang ma rnyed nas/_bdag med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig go snyam ste 'das so/_/da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang chos thams cad la sems can gyi dbyings dang /_srog dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes pa dang /_shed bu shin 
[\[151a.2\]]tu nan tan du btsal kyang mi brnyes so/_/ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang chos thams cad la sems can gyi dbyings dang /_srog dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes pa dang /_shed bu dag nan tan du byas te btsal kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[151a.3\]]de bzhin du nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang dus gsum du chos thams cad la srog dang /_gang zag dang /_shed can dang /_shed bu dang /_sems can gyi khams dang /_bdag nan tan du btsal kyang ma rnyed mi rnyed rnyed par mi 'gyur te/_de ltar 
[\[151a.4\]]srog dang /_gang zag dang /_shed can dang /_shed bu dang /_sems can dang /_bdag gi dbyings med par ston to/_/de ltar bdag med par ston/_de ltar stong par ston te/_de lta bu'i chos kyi gtam ston to/_/sor mo'i phreng bas gang po byams ma'i bu la slar 'di skad 
[\[151a.5\]]ces smras so/_/kye ma btsun pa gang po khyod ni sbrang bu'i spyad pa spyod de/_chos kyi gtam ston mi shes so/_/sbrang bu yang zi zi zhes sgra 'byin shes kyis/_sbrang bu ltar blun po khyod cang ma zer cig_/gang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem po ngag mi shes pas bdag med pa la 
[\[151a.6\]]chos su sems pa ni gti mug gi chos kyi mar me'i nang du phye ma leb ltar lhung ngo /_/gang der sangs rgyas kyis ma brnyes zhes bya ba ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po med pa ma brnyes nas 'das so/_/
[\[151a.7\]]da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang sems can thams cad la bdag gi khams med pa mi brnyes so/_/ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang sems can thams cad la sems can gyi khams med pa brnyes par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]rang sangs rgyas dang /_nyan thos rnams kyis kyang dus gsum du sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po med pa ma brnyes mi brnyes brnyes par mi 'gyur te/_tshigs su bcad pa de'i don ni 'di'o/_/yang sangs rgyas kun gyis gang ma brnyes zhes bya ba ni 'das pa'i 
[\[151b.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang chos thams cad la nan tan du btsal kyang 'jig rten pa'i bdag the bo tsam dang /_ci tse'i 'bru dang /_'bras dang /_yungs 'bru dang /_til gyi ril bu tsam dmar po dang /_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dkar po dang /_thung ngu dang /_
[\[151b.3\]]ring po dang /_shin tu ring po la sogs pa snying ga na 'bar zhing 'dug ces bya ba dang /_lte ba'i drung dang /_mgo dang /_mig dang /_rna ba la me mar gyi snying po dmar po snum gyi rkyen gyis 'bar ba lta bu 'dug go zhes bya ba la sogs te/_rtog pa rnam pa mang po ni ji ltar 
[\[151b.4\]]'jig rten pa rnams bdag la sgom pa/_gang de dag gi rtag pa brten pa ther zug ste/_bdag ni 'di 'dra'o zhes bya sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_nyan thos thams cad kyis ma brnyes nas mngon par sangs rgyas nas srog chags rnams la bshad do zhes bya ste/_tshigs 
[\[151b.5\]]su bcad pa de'i don ni 'di yin gyi/_gang po ni phyin ci log tu rnam par brtags pas na de'i don ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang ma brnyes zhes bya ba de ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byas pa ma 
[\[151b.6\]]brnyes nas 'das te/_ma byas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khams mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po mtha' yas pas brgyan pa sems can thams cad la yod do/_/da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byas pa ni nan tan du btsal 
[\[151b.7\]]kyang ma brnyes te/_sems can thams cad la ma byas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyings sems can thams cad la mtha' yas pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa yod do/_/dus gsum du nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas sbrang ma lta bu rnams de bzhin 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]gshegs pa'i snying po yod ces grag ste/_mig gis ni blta mi nus so zhes 'dri ba de la byed pa'i rgyu ni bstan to/_/'di lta ste/_sgra gcan zin dpal gyi bslab pa dang /_tshul khrims lhur byed pas srog chags can gyi chu la shin tu nan tan du blta ste/_srog 
[\[152a.2\]]chags yin nam ma yin/_'on te rdul 'dra ba zhig ste/_thams cad ma yin no snyam pa las rim gyis brtags na srog chags phra mo yin par mthong ba de bzhin dus bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' stag rnams kyis rang gi lus la bdag gi dbyings yod par bdag nyid 
[\[152a.3\]]kyis kyang mthong ste/_'di 'dra ba de lta bu mtha' yas pa'i dbyings su mthong ngo /_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la 'jug pa ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa yin te/_gang dag kun tu 'bar ba dang /_rab tu 'bar ba lta bu'i 'jig rten du rang gi srog kyang btang ste 
[\[152a.4\]]ston par 'gyur ba ni rab tu dka' ba byed pa phan par ston pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' stag de dag la nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston gyi/_gzhan la mi ston to/_/sems can de dag ni bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa yin no/_/dper na/_'phrul 
[\[152a.5\]]gyi mig dang ldan pa'i nang na ma 'gags pa bzhin te/_ma 'gags pa dang lhan cig tu byis pa sha'i mig can song nas nam mkha' la bya song ba'i rjes la bltas na/_byis pa sha'i mig can gyis ci nam mkha'i bya rjes mthong ngam/_gnas brtan ma 'gags pas ni 
[\[152a.6\]]gsal bar mthong ste/_skyes bu sha'i mig can yang gnas brtan gyi dring la rab tu yid ches nas 'gro ba de bzhin du/_byis pa sha'i mig can dang 'dra ba nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mdo sde thams cad kyi tshul la yid ches nas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[152a.7\]]pa'i snying po yod par shes kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi dbyings lta yang dag par ga la mthong /_de ste nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas gzhan gyi dring la 'jog na/_mi dmus long tsam lta ga la yid ches/_sngon byung bas 'di mngar sna bzhi can du 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]gyur to zhes sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzhan du mi gsung ba rnams las kho bos thos te/_sems can gang dag gis mngar sna bzhi myong ba'i sems can de dag da dung yang byis pa'i tshe sa za ste/_gang gis yun ring po nas bsnyen pa ro zhim po de 
[\[152b.2\]]sems can rnams da dung yang gtong mi nus so/_/de bzhin du sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po'i drung du gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la bsgoms shing mang du byas pa'i sems can de dag ni da dung yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la 
[\[152b.3\]]yid ches te/_sems can de dag ni yun ring po nas bsgoms shing de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo ba ste gzhan ma yin no/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston pa dang /_thos nas yid ches par 'gyur ba'i sems can 
[\[152b.4\]]de dag ni gzhan ma yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras sa la za ba lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo ba'o/_/gang sngon phyugs su gyur te/_rang gi ma la rgal zhing ma rnam par myos pa'i sems can de dag ni da dung yang nyal ba'i tshe so sgra khrig khrig zer 
[\[152b.5\]]zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po chos de kho na nyid la yid mi ches so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang sems can gang so sgra khrig khrig zer zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la yid mi ches pa'i sems can de dag ni gzhan ma yin te/_btsun pa gang po de 
[\[152b.6\]]dag ni phyugs su gyur pa chos nyid mi shes pa'o/_/sngon phug ron du gyur pa'i sems can de dag ni shin tu gzugs 'dod cing g.yem pa'i dbang du song ste/_phal cher de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la yid mi ches shing drag shul gyi las byed do/_/ma 'ongs 
[\[152b.7\]]pa na yang sems can gang g.yem pa'i dbang du song ba dag phal cher de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la yid mi ches te/_sems can de dag ni gzhan ma yin gyi phug ron du gyur pa yun ring po nas nyon mongs pa la goms pa gang yin pa'o/_/gang sngon ngo tsha med pa'i 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]khwar gyur pa/_shin tu byas pa mi gzo ba mi gtsang ba za ba'i sems can de dag ni da dung yang dbul zhing ngo tsha ba med de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la yid mi ches so/_/ma 'ongs pa na yang sems can gang phan par ston pa'i drung nas/_de bzhin 
[\[153a.2\]]gshegs pa'i snying po thos na dgod de 'gro'o/_/bdag gi dbyings la yid mi ches pa'i sems can de dag ni gzhan ma yin gyi/_btsun pa gang po de ni ngo tsha med pa mi gtsang ba za ba'i khwa yin no/_/sngon spre'u mi sdug par gyur te/_yid rgya mtsho sna tshogs rnam par bkra 
[\[153a.3\]]ba'i rlabs lta bur g.yo ba'i sems can de dag ni da dung yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos na sems 'khrug par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la yid mi ches so/_/ma 'ongs pa na yang sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos na 
[\[153a.4\]]sems 'khrug cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la yid mi ches pa'i sems can de dag ni gzhan ma yin te/_btsun pa gang po spre'u lta bur dgod pa dman pa yin no/_/sems can gang sngon 'ug par gyur pa nyin par shin tu mi mthong zhing mtshan mo mthong ba de bzhin 
[\[153a.5\]]gshegs pa'i snying po la yid mi ches pa'i sems can de dag da dung yang 'jig rten na bla ma mthong nas lta'ang mi 'dod do/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang sems can gang dag phan par ston pa'i drung du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos la sangs rgyas kyis lung 
[\[153a.6\]]bstan pa la yid mi ches pa'i sems can de dag ni btsun pa gang po gang 'ug par gyur pa yid mi ches pa yin te/_mo mkhan gyi tshig bzhin no/_/btsun pa gang po sngon gram khrod du skyes pa shin tu don med pa'i gzhung gis gos pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la yid mi 
[\[153a.7\]]ches pa'i sems can de dag ni da dung yang bdag med pa zhes bya ba dgongs pa'i tshig tu mi shes pas/_sems can gram khrod pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la yid mi ches so/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang shin tu don med pa'i gzhung la chags pa'i ldem po dag tu 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]gsungs pa mi shes pa/_gram khrod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la yid mi ches pa de dag ni gzhan ma yin te/_btsun pa gang po nges par gram khrod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la yid mi ches pa yin no/_/gang sngon sgo gang yang rung ba na 'dug cing rkun po dma' 
[\[153b.2\]]ba'i sems can de dag ni khyi lta bu zhes bya ste/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang sems can gang gzhan gyi khyim du rgyu zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la yid mi ches pa'i sems can de dag ni gzhan ma yin te/_btsun pa gang po de dag ni khyi dang 'dra bar dma' ba yin 
[\[153b.3\]]no/_/sngon byi lar gyur pa'i sems can gang rtag tu sha za ba la chags shing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la yid mi ches pa'i sems can de dag ni da dung yang sha la chags shing /_srog gcod pa byi la'i gzugs su bsgyur ba'i srin por 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa 
[\[153b.4\]]na yang sems can gang byi la'i gzugs su bsgyur ba'i srin po gzhan gyi srog gcod cing sha za ba mi bzad pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po las phyir phyogs pa de dag ni gzhan ma yin te/_gzhan gyi srog gcod cing sha za ba byi la'i gzugs su bsgyur ba'i srin po'o/_/gang 
[\[153b.5\]]byi ba dang /_ma ning du gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po las phyir phyogs pa'i sems can de dag ni da dung yang chang 'thung zhing byi ba dang /_ma ning du gyur te/_shin tu mi gtsang ba 'thung ba yin no/_/ma 'ongs pa na yang sems can gang chang 'thung zhing ma ning lta bu dma' 
[\[153b.6\]]ba de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i ros ngoms pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mi 'dod de/_de dag ni gzhan ma yin gyi ma ning dang byi ba gang yin pa de dag tu blta'o/_/gang ce spyang du gyur pa'i sems can khrel med cing g.yo ngan pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po las 
[\[153b.7\]]phyir phyogs pa de dag ni da dung yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ldem po ngag tu bshad pa mi shes shing sems can g.yon can ce spyang lta bur gyur to/_/ma 'ongs pa na yang sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ldem po ngag tu bshad pa mi shes pa 'di 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]ltar gnang ngo zhes log par rtog pa de dag ni nges par ce spyang du gyur pa'o/_/sngon sems can gang srin bu mi sdug pa sdig par gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po las phyir phyogs pa'i sems can de dag ni da dung yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying 
[\[154a.2\]]po thos nas rab tu 'bar te/_snying zhe sdang bar gyur pa de ni nges par sdig pa dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/ma 'ongs pa na yang sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos na sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa ma yin no zhes yid mi ches pa de dag ni gzhan ma yin te/_
[\[154a.3\]]btsun pa gang po nges par sdig pa lta bu tsha ba'i las byed pa'o/_/gang sngon sbrul gdug pa mi zad par gyur pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la mi bsngags par smra ba'i sems can de dag ni da dung yang nga rgyal che zhing 'jigs pa'i gzugs sbrul gdug pa mi zad par 
[\[154a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa na yang sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po phan par bstan pa la mi bsngags par smra zhing sdig pa spyod pa'i sems can de dag ni gzhan ma yin te/_btsun pa gang po nges par sbrul gdug pa mi zad pa'o/_/sngon sems can 
[\[154a.5\]]gang lug tu gyur pa glen zhing kho re chung ba mi'i yon tan mi shes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po btsun par mi byed cing /_mdo sde la smod pa de dag da dung yang mdo sde la smod de/_sems can de dag ni nges par lug tu gyur pa glen zhing kho re chung ba yin te/_ma 'ongs 
[\[154a.6\]]pa na yang sems can gang gnyid che zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos na smod pa de dag ni gzhan ma yin te/_nges par kho re chung zhing zhan pa'o/_/sngon ma he kho re chung bar gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po las phyir phyogs pa'i sems can de dag ni da dung yang nges 
[\[154a.7\]]par zhen cing brkam ste/_lta ba gsum gyis 'jungs pa'i ma he lta bu'o/_/ma 'ongs pa na yang brkam zhing khro la zhen cing kho re chung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po las phyir phyogs pa'i sems can de dag ni gzhan ma yin te/_nges par lta ba gsum gyis 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]'jungs pa'i ma he'o/_/sems can gang sngon dom du gyur pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po las phyir phyogs shing yid mi ches te/_sems can de dag ni da dung yang yid du mi 'ong ba sgrogs te/_nges par dom dang ce spyang lta bu'o/_/ma 'ongs pa na yang sems 
[\[154b.2\]]can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po las phyir phyogs shing yid du mi 'ong bar sgrogs pa de dag ni gzhan ma yin te/_btsun pa gang po dom dang ce spyang lta bu'o/_/gang sngon bya ka lan da kar gyur pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po las phyir phyogs shing yid mi ches 
[\[154b.3\]]te/_da dung yang sems can gang mig rtul ba de dag ni nges par bya ka lan da kar gyur pa'o/_/ma 'ongs pa na yang sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po shes pa 'chab cing ma rungs pa sdig pa'i las byed pa de dag ni gzhan ma yin te/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[154b.4\]]pa'i snying po mi ston pa de ni nges par mig rtul ba'i bya ka lan da ka yin no/_/gang sngon bong bur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la mi dgos par sems bskyed pa de dag ni da dung yang dbul zhing bong bu lta bur zas rtsub po za bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa na yang 
[\[154b.5\]]dbul po gzhan gyis mngag pa'i rigs ngan par skye'o/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la yid mi ches shing bdag med pa la sgom pa de dag ni gzhan ma yin te/_btsun pa gang po 'dod ldan dang /_gdol pa dang /_bya pa dang /_bong bu lta bu'o/_/gang sngon 
[\[154b.6\]]lha ma yin lus thung ngur gyur cing mche ba ring ba mi sdug pa khog pa lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la kha zer ba de dag ni da dung yang lus thung zhing khog pa lta bur gyur te/_de dag ni nges par lha ma yin no/_/ma 'ongs pa na yang sems can gang khog pa lta bu thung zhing 
[\[154b.7\]]mche ba ring ba gtum po de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la kha zer ba de dag ni gzhan ma yin te/_btsun pa gang po lha ma yin gyi ris su gtogs pa'i sems can yin no/_/gang sngon [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kha nas me lce 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]smod cing 'phya ba'i sems can de dag ni da dung mchu dang rkan skams shing /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rid pa kha nas me lce 'byung ba'i srog chags su 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa na yang sems can gang lus shin tu rid pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la smod cing 'phya 
[\[155a.2\]]ba de dag ni btsun pa gang po gzhan ma yin te/_nges par [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kha nas me lce 'byung ba nyam chung ba yin no/_/de dag sngon yang sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rtag pa la mi rtag par lta ba rnams mdze na bar 'gyur te/_da dung yang sems can 
[\[155a.3\]]gang zhan cing mdze na bar 'gyur ba de dag ni nges par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rtag pa la smod pa yin no/_/ma 'ongs pa na yang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rtag pa la mi rtag par lta ba mdzen bar 'gyur ba de dag ni gzhan ma yin te/_btsun pa 
[\[155a.4\]]gang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rtag pa la smod pa yin no/_/sngon gang de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i sku la ma zhi bar lta ba rnams ni bong chen por gyur te/_da dung yang bong che zhing zhan pa de dag ni nges par de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i sku la ma zhi bar lta ba'o/_/ma 
[\[155a.5\]]'ongs pa na yang sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i sku la ma zhi bar lta ba de dag ni gzhan ma yin te/_btsun pa gang po bong chen po de dag ni nges par de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i sku la sun 'byin pa'o/_/gang sngon phun sum tshogs pa'i dus na rgud 
[\[155a.6\]]par gyur te/_nad mang ba'i sems can rnam pa mang po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yung drung gi sku la g.yung drung ma yin par lta ba yin no/_/da dung yang phun sum tshogs pa'i dus na rgud par gyur pa'i sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yung drung gi sku la 
[\[155a.7\]]g.yung drung ma yin par lta ba yin no/_/ma 'ongs pa na yang sems can gang phun sum tshogs pa'i dus na rgud par 'gyur ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yung drung gi sku la g.yung drung ma yin par lta ba ste/_btsun pa gang po de dag ni nges par gzhan ma yin gyi de bzhin 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]gshegs pa gsal ba'i sku mi gsal ba'o zhes sun 'byin pa'o/_/sngon gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ther zug la ther zug ma yin par lta ba'i sems can de dag ni rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skyes nas shi ste mi rtag par gyur to/_/da dung yang sems can gang la la 
[\[155b.2\]]rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skyes nas shi ba de dag ni nges par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ther zug dang /_gsal ba la smod pa'o/_ma 'ongs pa na yang sems can gang mi rtag cing tshe thung bar 'gyur ba de dag ni ther zug gi sku la smod pa yin te/_btsun pa gang po de 
[\[155b.3\]]dag ni gzhan ma yin gyi nges par de bzhin gshegs pa ther zug gi sku la smod pa'o/_/sngon sems can gang bu med par gyur pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shing zad pa'i me bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes mi rtag par 'dzin pa rnams te/_da dung yang 
[\[155b.4\]]sems can gang bu med par gyur pa de dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa la zhig par lta ba'o/_/ma 'ongs pa na yang sems can gang bu med pa ma rungs pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhig par lta ba rnams te/_gzhan ma yin gyi btsun 
[\[155b.5\]]pa gang po de dag ni nges par de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhig par lta ba rnams so/_/sngon sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa pha ma phrad pa las skyes par rtog pa'i sems can de dag ni pha ma dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/da dung yang sems 
[\[155b.6\]]can gang pha ma dang bral ba de dag ni nges par de bzhin gshegs pa la kha zer ba'o/_/ma 'ongs pa na yang sems can gang sangs rgyas la pha ma phrad pa las skyes par lta ba de dag pha ma med par 'gyur te/_de dag ni gzhan ma yin gyi/_btsun pa gang po de bzhin 
[\[155b.7\]]gshegs pa la kha zer ba pha ma dang bral ba'o/_/sngon sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rus pa dang /_rgyus pa dang /_rkang dang /_khrag can gyi mi'i lus so zhes [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zer zhing /_'jig rten dang 'thun par 'jug pa las phyir phyogs pa'i sems 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]can de dag ni 'jig rten na mi sdug pa'i skyon can du 'gyur ro/_/da dung yang sems can de dag ni yan lag thams cad ma tshang zhing kha mnam pa 'jig rten dang 'thun par 'jug pa las thams cad phyir phyogs par 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa na 
[\[156a.2\]]yang sems can gang kha mi gtsang ba'i dri mi zhim par mnam pa zha bo gzhogs nyams pa yan lag thams cad ma tshang ba 'jig rten dang 'thun par 'jug pa las phyir phyogs pa'i sems can de dag ni gzhan ma yin te/_btsun pa gang po 'jig rten thams cad kyis 
[\[156a.3\]]spangs pa'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi las sngar bshad pa rnams shin tu ya nga ba yin te/_gal te mi'i skye gnas su skye ba thob na yang 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_
[\[156a.4\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal gyi skal ba can du 'gyur ro/_/rang gis byas pas ma rig pa yun ring por myong zhing gnas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bdag nyid chen po las phyir phyogs pa de dag la dge ba yungs 'bru tsam yang rnyed par 
[\[156a.5\]]dka'o/_/sngon gang de bzhin gshegs pa mang po la mnyes par byas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba thos nas/_se gol gtogs pa'i srid du 'dzin na yang dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can de dag dbang po thul ba dang /_phyug cing rigs chen por 'gyur ro/_/
[\[156a.6\]]da ltar yang sems can gang dbang po thul cing bran bza' mang po'i khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu dang /_bram ze'i rigs chen por gyur pa'i sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rna ba la reg pa tsam gyis mnyes par byed cing bsod nams kyi 
[\[156a.7\]]las shin du byed do/_/ma 'ongs pa na yang sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos nas/_de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa dang /_mi gang bran bza' mang zhing rigs che ba'i sems can de dag ni gzhan ma yin te/_bsod nams byas pa'i sems can 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]don dang ldan pa/_yid dang 'thad pa/_gzugs dang /_mdog dang /_stobs dang /_snyems pa phun sum tshogs pa/_blo gros dang /_dran pa dang /_yid rno bar ldan pa/_dbyangs yid du 'ong zhing mthong na dga' ba/_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_rgyal bu dang /_'khor 
[\[156b.2\]]los sgyur ba dang /_de bzhin du dge zhing nga rgyal med pa'i sems can mig gnyid thul ba/_bshor ba bag yod pa/_de la sogs pa mtho ris dang /_sa'i steng gi phun sum tshogs pa lha'i dbang po dang /_tshangs pa'i dbang po dang /_'jig rten skyong ba la sogs 
[\[156b.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos pa'i bsod nams kyi rgyus nad med pa dang /_gtse ba med pa dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa g.yung drung ther zug ste/_yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[156b.4\]]'das pa yang 'chi ba med par thos pas thams cad 'byor cing yun ring du sra ba dang /_rtag par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas ni 'jig rten thams cad dang rjes su 'thun par 'jug pas rol pa yin par shes shing /_gang de bzhin gshegs pa 'khrig pa las byung ba 
[\[156b.5\]]ma yin no zhes ston pa de dag ni ye shes dang yon tan rnyed pa'i bsod nams kyis bu mang zhing pha ma ring du 'tsho ba rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rtag pa sems can thams cad la yod par shes pa'i rgyus 'jig rten na bde ba'i rnam pa'i mchog 
[\[156b.6\]]rnams dang /_phun sum tshogs pa ji snyed yod pa thams cad rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rtag par thos pas sngon byung ba dang /_da ltar dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_dus gsum du yang phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang mtho ris dang /_
[\[156b.7\]]sa'i steng gi bde ba thams cad rtag tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la brnyas pa'i rgyus ni 'gro ba lnga'i gnas thams cad na yan lag ma tshang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor ba sdug bsngal bar 'khyam pa na sdug bsngal ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]sems can gang sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /_sems can gang phan par ston cing bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la sems pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa gang po sangs 
[\[157a.2\]]rgyas mang po las phyir phyogs pa'i sems can gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos na smod pa'i sems can de dag ni bdag nyid kyi sa bon bsregs shing kye ma dus gsum du bsam gyis mi khyab par mya ngan du bya ba yin no/_/chos ston par 'dod pas 'di ltar bstan 
[\[157a.3\]]te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang /_yang dag pa nyid du shin tu bsngags par bya'o/_/de ltar mi ston te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'dor ba de dag ni dper na/_gdol pa la rgyal po'i bal glang lta bur de la seng ge'i khri yang mi 'os so/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[157a.4\]]thams cad kyis shin tu nan tan du btsal kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po skyes pa ma brnyes te/_sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi dbyings ma skyes pa mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa yod do/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu nan tan du bdag 
[\[157a.5\]]nyid kyis btsal kyang dbyings ma byung ba ma brnyes te/_sems can thams cad la ma byung ba'i dbyings sangs rgyas kyi dbyings mtshan dang /_dpe byad bzang po mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i dbyings yod do/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu nan tan du bdag nyid 
[\[157a.6\]]kyis btsal kyang dbyings mi rtag pa ma brnyes te/_sems can thams cad la rtag pa'i dbyings sangs rgyas kyi dbyings mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i dbyings yod do/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu nan tan du btsal kyang de 
[\[157a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ther zug ma yin pa ma brnyes te/_sems can thams cad la ther zug gi dbyings sangs rgyas kyi dbyings mtshan dang /_dpe byad bzang po mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i dbyings yod do/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]nan tan du btsal kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po g.yung drung ma yin pa ma brnyes te/_sems can thams cad la g.yung drung gi dbyings sangs rgyas kyi dbyings mtshan dang /_dpe byad bzang po mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i dbyings yod do/_/sangs rgyas thams 
[\[157b.2\]]cad kyis shin tu nan tan du btsal kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la nad ma brnyes te/_sems can thams cad la nad med pa'i dbyings sangs rgyas kyi dbyings mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i dbyings yod do/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 
[\[157b.3\]]shin tu nan tan du btsal kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la rga shi ma brnyes te/_sems can thams cad la rga shi med pa'i dbyings sangs rgyas kyi dbyings mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i dbyings yod do/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 
[\[157b.4\]]shin tu nan tan du btsal kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'jigs pa ma brnyes te/_mi 'jigs pa'i dbyings sangs rgyas kyi dbyings sems can thams cad la mtshan dang /_dpe byad bzang po mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i dbyings yod do/_/sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[157b.5\]]kyis shin tu nan tan du btsal kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po gzhig tu rung ba ma brnyes te/_mi shigs pa'i dbyings sangs rgyas kyi dbyings sems can thams cad la mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i dbyings yod do/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[157b.6\]]thams cad kyis shin tu nan tan du btsal kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la dri ma ma brnyes te/_sems can thams cad la dri ma med pa'i dbyings sangs rgyas kyi dbyings mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po mtha' yas pas brgyan pa'i dbyings yod do/_/dper na chu dang 
[\[157b.7\]]'bru mar 'dres pa mi dmigs pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi dbyings kyang nyon mongs pa bye bas g.yogs mod kyi/_nyon mongs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi dbyings 'dres par gyur pa'i gnas med do/_/dbyings kyang nyon mongs pa bye ba'i nang na 'dug mod kyi/_bum pa'i 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]nang na mar me 'dug pa bzhin du bum pa bcag na mar me rab tu 'bar zhing mdzes te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston par byed pa ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/_/yang na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos ni bum pa lta bu/_nyon mongs 
[\[158a.2\]]pa med pa ni mar me lta bu/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston par byed pa ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'am/_nyon mongs pa med pa'am/_su yang rung ste de nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa gang po sgrol ba lam du zhugs pas nyon mongs pa 
[\[158a.3\]]bye ba bum pa ltar bcag na/_phyis gdod dbyings thams cad lag mthil na skyu ru ra'i 'bru bzhin du mthong ngo /_/dper na zla ba dang /_nyi ma sprin gyis g.yogs na sa'i steng du mi snang zhing sprin las grol na/_zla ba dang /_nyi ma sa'i steng du snang ba de bzhin du/_de bzhin 
[\[158a.4\]]gshegs pa'i snying po nyon mongs pa bye bas khebs na mi snang ngo /_/zla ba dang /_nyi ma bzhin du nyon mongs pa las grol na/_sangs rgyas kyi dbyings kyi nyi ma dang zla ba yang snang ngo /_/kye ma btsun pa gang po khyod ni sbrang bu'i spyad pa lta bu la spyod de/_chos kyi 
[\[158a.5\]]gtam ston mi shes so/_/sbrang bu yang sgra 'byin na de yang shes pa yin nam/_lan gnyis su ma smra bar sbrang bu khyod myur du song shig/_/de nas gnas brtan mdzes [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_sor mo'i phreng ba la 
[\[158a.6\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/legs so legs so/_/sor mo'i phreng ba khyod kyis 'thun pa dang rjes su dgongs pa'i bsod nams byas pa nga yang dga'o/_/da sangs rgyas kyi gzugs 'dod par gyis la bram ze khyod de ltar shes par gyis shig_/de nas sor 
[\[158a.7\]]mo'i phreng bas/_mdzes dga' la slar 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa mdzes dga' khyod ni byad bzhin bzang ba'i mchog yin na/_'jig rten na rab tu byad bzhin bzang ba gang ji ltar na mi rnams kyi gzugs mdzes pa bzang por 'gyur/_myur du smros 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]te nga'i the tsom chod cig_/de nas sor mo'i phreng ba la mdzes [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]smras pa/_lag pa rab bkrus sor bcu thal sbyar te/_/de bzhin gshegs kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/rtag tu nad pa'i rim gro byed pa ni/_/de las skyes bu byad bzhin bzang por 'gyur/_/
[\[158b.2\]]sor mo'i phreng bas mdzes dga' la slar smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa la rus pa'ang med/_rgyus pa yang med na/_sku gdung dang ring bsrel lta ga la yod de/_ring bsrel med pa thabs kyi mchog chos kyi sku ni sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/_de 
[\[158b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/_/ma dad pa rnams dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir ring bsrel bzhag pa'i thabs mdzad de/_sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten bya ba'i phyir ring bsrel bzhag go/_/de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid de/_'jig rten gyi tshangs pa 
[\[158b.4\]]dang /_dbang phyug dang /_kA t+yA ya'i bu mo dang /_'gro skems gzhon nu'i gzugs khang pa dang /_so phag gi khyim gyi gnas su cha byad bcos pa'i gzugs rnam pa mang po byas te gzhag pa de dag skyabs ma yin par byas pa yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[158b.5\]]sku gdung de ltar thabs yin pa shes pa de ni/_'jig rten na byad bzhin bzang ba'i mi yin te/_thabs kyi ye shes rtsa ba des gzugs mdzes par 'gyur gyi/_rtog pa gzhan ni byis pa ltar 'khyam pa yin no/_/mdzes dga' khyod gzugs bzang por 'gyur ba'i 
[\[158b.6\]]sgo yang mi shes so/_/kye ma btsun pa mdzes dga' khyod ni sbrang bu'i spyad pa spyod de/_gzugs 'byung ba'i sgo yang mi shes so/_/sbrang bu yang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yod kyis sbrang bu lta bu khyod cang ma zer cig_/de nas gnas brtan nye sbyor gyis/_
[\[158b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/legs so legs so/_/sor mo'i phreng ba khyod kyis 'thun pa dang /_rjes su dgongs pa'i bsod nams byas pa nga yang dga'o/_/sor mo'i phreng ba da 'dul ba la 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]brtson par gyis shig_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/_gnas brtan nye sbyor la slar smras pa/_btsun pa nye sbyor khyod 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i mchog na/_'jig rten na 'dul ba 'dzin pa gang /_ji ltar na 'dul ba bca' ba la mkhas pa yin/_myur du 
[\[159a.2\]]smros te nga'i the tsom chod cig_/de nas gnas brtan nye sbyor gyis/_sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste/_/dge ba rnams ni rdzogs par bya/_/rang gi sems kyang yongs su gdul/_/de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang /_/'dul 
[\[159a.3\]]ba bsdus pa'i snying po'o/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/_gnas brtan nye sbyor la slar 'di skad ces smras so/_/skyon chags pa ya mtshan can rnams kyi nor dang /_chos gos la sogs pa dang /_glegs bam dang /_lhung bzed dang /_chu tshags dang /_ska rags dang /_
[\[159a.4\]]khab rnams thams cad du thams cad dgag cing blang bar bya ste/_mi bgrungs pa tshar gcad cing nan tur bya ba yin no/_/de thams cad ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i nor te/_skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can gyi nor ma yin no/_/dper na rgyal po'i ral gri gdol 
[\[159a.5\]]pa'i khyim na 'dug na ral gri de'i mthus phrogs kyang nyes pa med de/_de ni gdol pa'i nor ma yin gyi rgyal po'i dkor ro/_/de bzhin du de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i nor te/_bzung nas nan gyis khyer ba de ni/_'jig rten na 'dul ba 'dzin pa ste/_de la nyes 
[\[159a.6\]]byas tsam gyi ltung ba yang med do/_/cho ga dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' rdzogs pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin dang mtshungs par gzigs pa'o/_/kye ma btsun pa 
[\[159a.7\]]nye sbyor ni sbrang bu'i spyad pa lta bu spyod de/_'dul ba bsdus pa'i snying po mi shes so/_/sbrang bu yang bya ba shes kyis sbrang bu lta bu khyod cang ma zer cig_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/legs so legs so/_/sor mo'i phreng ba khyod kyis 'thun pa dang rjes su dgongs pa'i bsod nams byas pa nga yang dga'o/_/da ni chos la stong pa chen po ci yang med pa bsgom par bya'o/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng 
[\[159b.2\]]bas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la slar 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod stong pa chen po mthong ba'i mchog na/_'jig rten na stong pa mthong ba gang yin/_stong pa stong pa zhes bya ba'i don ci/_shes pa chen po dang ldan pa myur du smros te nga'i the tsom 
[\[159b.3\]]myur du chod cig_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_sor mo'i phreng ba la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_/sangs rgyas nam mkha' lta bu ste/_/nam mkha' mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas nam mkha' lta bu ste/_/nam mkha' mtshan ma med 
[\[159b.4\]]las skyes/_/sangs rgyas nam mkha' lta bu ste/_/nam mkha' gzugs med gyur pa'o/_/chos rnams nam mkha' lta bu ste/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku/_/ye shes nam mkha' lta bu ste/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sku/_/gzung du 
[\[159b.5\]]med cing reg tu med/_/chags med ye shes de bzhin gshegs/_/thar pa nam mkha' lta bu ste/_/nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/_/thar pa sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs/_/stong pa ci yang med pa dag_/sor phreng khyod kyis ga la shes/_/
[\[159b.6\]]de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la slar 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di lta ste dper na/_sprin chen po las char rab tu bab pa dang /_skyes bu byis pa'i rang bzhin can gyis/_ser ba'i 'bru blangs te/_nor bu rin po che 
[\[159b.7\]]bai dUr+yar bsams nas/_khyim du khyer ba dang /_ha cang grang ches nas gzung ma nus te gter du bya'o snyam nas/_bum pa'i nang du legs par bcug pa dang /_ser ba'i ril bu de zhu bar mthong nas/_stong pa'o snyam ste cang mi zer bar gyur pa de bzhin 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]du btsun pa 'jam dpal shin tu stong pa nyid la bsgoms shing /_stong par zab tu bsams pas chos thams cad zhig pa mi zad par mthong ngo /_/thar pa stong pa ma yin pa la yang stong par mthong zhing rtog go/_/'di lta ste dper na/_ser 
[\[160a.2\]]ba'i ril bu la nor bu snyam du bsams nas/_nor bu yang stong par bsgom pa de bzhin du/_khyod kyang stong pa ma yin pa'i chos la stong par sems te/_chos stong pa mthong nas stong pa ma yin pa'i chos la yang stong par 'jig par byed do/_/stong pa'i chos kyang 
[\[160a.3\]]gzhan/_stong pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan te/_ser ba'i ril bu lta bur nyon mongs pa bye ba ni stong pa'o/_/ser ba'i ril bu lta bur mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams ni myur du 'jig go/_/nor bu bai dUr+ya bzhin du sangs rgyas ni rtag pa ste/_thar pa'i 
[\[160a.4\]]mtha' yang nor bu bai dUr+ya bzhin no/_/nam mkha' yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi gzugs yin te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs med pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi thar pa yang gzugs yin te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[160a.5\]]kyi thar pa gzugs med pa yin na/_ji ltar thar pa'i mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya/_dbye ba med pa'i 'du shes su ma byed cig_/'jam dpal gang grong khyer brtsigs pa'i khyim stong pa ni mi med pas stong ngo /_/bum pa ni chu med pas stong ngo /_/klung ni chu mi 'bab 
[\[160a.6\]]pas stong ngo /_/ci grong gi bar skabs khyim med pa la stong pa stong pa zhes bya'am/_ci khyim thams cad stong pa yin nam/_thams cad stong pa ma yin gyi/_mi med pas stong pa zhes bya'o/_/ci bum pa thams cad stong pa yin nam/_thams cad stong pa ma 
[\[160a.7\]]yin gyi/_chu med pas stong pa zhes bya'o/_/ci klung thams cad stong pa yin nam/_thams cad stong pa ma yin gyi/_chu mi 'bab pa'i phyir stong pa zhes bya ste/_de bzhin du thar pa thams cad kyis stong pa ma yin gyi/_nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir thar 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]pa stong pa zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni stong pa ma yin te/_nyes pa thams cad dang bral zhing nyon mongs pa bye ba'i mi dang /_lha med pa'i phyir stong pa zhes bya'o/_/kye ma btsun pa 'jam dpal ni sbrang bu'i spyad pa spyod de/_stong pa dang mi stong pa'i don de 
[\[160b.2\]]kho na mi shes so/_/gcer bu pa yang thams cad stong par sgom ste/_gcer bu pa'i sbrang ma khyod cang ma zer cig_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_sor mo'i phreng ba la slar 'di skad ces smras so/_/sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'brog dgon pa na stag bzhin du 
[\[160b.3\]]nyan thos thams cad gsod na/_de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras rnams la ma brnyas shig_/sbrang bu khyod su zhig de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la slar 'di skad ces smras so/_/dper na/_'byam po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lta bur bkren 
[\[160b.4\]]pa dag lam du zhugs na/_stag gi dri mnam pa tsam gyis kun du 'bros pa de bzhin du nyan thos rnams kyang theg pa chen po mi shes pas 'byam po lta bur byang chub sems dpa'i dri mnam na kun du 'bros so/_/dper na/_seng ge'i rgyal pos ri khrod nas seng ge'i 
[\[160b.5\]]mthu rtsal gyis sgra bsgrags na/_seng ge'i sgra thos pas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang wa la sogs pa thams cad mi 'tsho zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgra bsgrags te/_seng ge'i mthu rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa na/_byang chub 
[\[160b.6\]]sems dpa'i sgra thos na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad ldem po ngag la kun du rmongs so/_/ngas kyang re zhig wa'i sgra phyung na yang nyan thos thams cad lan ldon mi nus na/_gal te seng ge'i sgra phyung na nyan thos rnams ji ltar 'gyur/_de nas 
[\[160b.7\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sor mo'i phreng ba la slar 'di skad ces smras so/_/sbrang bu lta bu khyod su zhig_/sor mo'i phreng bas shin tu gtum pa'i las byas so/_/khyod lta bu yang byang chub sems dpa' yin du zin na/_bdud sdig can dag ci 'dra/_
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]kye ma 'jig rten rnams ni bdag nyid mi shes te/_bdag gi nyes pa mi mthong gi_/gzhan gyi nyes pa mthong ngo /_/sor mo'i phreng bas sdig pa ji snyed cig byas/_de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[161a.2\]]so/_/kye ma 'jig rten na dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i skyes bu gnyis yod de/_gang shin tu stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /_gang 'jig rten na bdag tu smra ba 'di gnyis ni dam pa'i chos 'jig pa dang /_dam pa'i chos khas 'bub pa'o/_/kye ma btsun pa 'jam dpal ni sdig 
[\[161a.3\]]pa dang /_mi sdig pa mi shes so/_/kye ma byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang mi shes so/_/kye ma byang chub sems dpa' stag rnams 'jigs pa med pa'o snyam du sems na/_kye ma btsun pa 'jam dpal ni sbrang bu dang /_/seng ge'i bye brag kyang mi shes so/_/
[\[161a.4\]]btsun pa 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nyon cig_/dper na/_sgyu ma'i rgyal pos sgyu ma la 'dus pa'i dbung du ji ltar gcod pa dang /_gtub pa ston te sgyu ma byed pas bza' ba dang /_rnyis pa yang ston/_sgyu ma byed 
[\[161a.5\]]pa rnam pa mang po sgyu ma'i mchog sgyu ma byed pa'i sgyu ma ji lta ba de bzhin du/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa yang de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' stag rnams kyang bdag nyid skye ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba lta bur sgyu ma rnam pa mang po ston to/_/
[\[161a.6\]]nad kyi bskal pa bar ma la bdag la nad med do zhes sems can rnams na ba'i phyir zas kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/me'i bskal pa bar ma la sa rnams sreg cing rtag par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la mi rtag par ston to/_/mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma la sems can 
[\[161a.7\]]rnams kyi phyir bdag gis bstan to snyam ste/_thams cad mtshon dang /_lcags su byas nas/_sangs rgyas kyis phan tshun du gsod pa bstan kyang sems can gcig la yang gnod par mi 'gyur te/_de dag ni sgyu ma sprul pa bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas ni stong gsum 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang yungs 'bru'i sbu gur 'jug ste/_sems can gang la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/yang de nas phyung ste/_gnas ji lta ba bzhin du 'jog par yang ston to/_/rgya mtsho'i chu dang /_chu'i phung po dang /_ri'i phung po dang /_
[\[161b.2\]]ri rab la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi spu'i khung bu gcig tu 'jug kyang sems can gcig la yang gtses par mi 'gyur zhing phyis so so'i phyogs su 'god do/_/rkang pa'i mthe bos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams g.yo bar byas kyang sems can gcig la yang gtse ba byas 
[\[161b.3\]]par mi 'gyur te/_de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid kyi mdzad pa'o/_/rnam pa gang dang gang gis sems can la phan par 'gyur ba bran dang slob mar yang 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du grong mi dang /_ded dpon dang /_mdun na 'don du'ang 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po dang /_blon po 
[\[161b.4\]]dang /_gzhon nu dang /_grong dpon dang /_tshogs thams cad kyi nang du yang sems can rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir/_bdag nyid 'dum par sbyar ba dang 'thun par byed do/_/lha thams cad du'ang 'gyur te/_de dag gi lta ba bzlog pa'i phyir thams cad du skye ba ston 
[\[161b.5\]]pas/_de'i phyir skyes pa'i rabs zhes bya'o/_/sgyu ma byed pa'i sgyu ma mthong na/_kye ma sgyu ma byed pa ni sdig pa ste/_gcad pa dang /_gtub pa byed cing gzhan la gsod do zhes tshogs thams cad la mi brjod pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten na sgyu ma byed pa'i 
[\[161b.6\]]rang bzhin yin par blta ste/_de bzhin du ngas sems can rnams bsad pa yang shes par bya'o/_/sgyu ma byed pas sgyu ma byed pa'i skyes bu ji lta ba de bzhin du sgyu ma sprul pa nyis stong du gcig ma tshang ba yang de lta bus 'dul ba'i dbang gis sgyu ma sprul to/_/'jam dpal 
[\[161b.7\]]ji ltar mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma la ngas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgyu ma 'di dag sprul to/_/kye ma btsun pa 'jam dpal ni sbrang bu lta bu'i spyad pa spyod de/_mi'i glang po che shes kyang mi 'dod do/_/shes kyang mi 'dod pa de ni sbrang bu lta bu ste smad pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal sor mo'i phreng bas ji skad zer ba de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni de lta'o/_/'jam 
[\[162a.2\]]dpal sor mo'i phreng ba 'di ni tha mal pa ma yin te/_de lta bus 'dul ba'i dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' mi'i glang po ches bdag nyid de ltar sprul to/_/'jam dpal yud tsam zhig sdod cig dang /_sor mo'i phreng ba yang khyod dang 'dra ste/_sor mo'i phreng ba'i bdag 
[\[162a.3\]]nyid chen po shin tu rgyas par bstan gyis/_de'i gtam brjod pa las sor mo'i phreng ba'i che ba shes par gyis shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/mi'i glang po che sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du brtson 
[\[162a.4\]]'grus bstan pa legs so legs so/_/bdag nyid myur du dgra bcom pa thob par gyis shig dang /_de'i yon tan 'di 'dra'o/_/de'i las 'di 'dra'o/_/brtson 'grus 'di 'dra'o zhes sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir brjod par 
[\[162a.5\]]bya'o//_//bam po bzhi pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la phan pa dang thugs brtse ba'i slad du dgra bcom pa rang gi lus 'di nyid kyis thob par 
[\[162a.6\]]'tshal ba'i yon tan 'di 'dra/_las 'di 'dra/_brtson 'grus 'di 'dra'o zhes sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nam pha ma phrad de/_dus su ma'i rum du bu chags ma thag tu pha ma 
[\[162a.7\]]dag dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag gis myong ba'i yon tan gyis thob pas brtson 'grus dang /_gzi brjid gzhan du 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten kyang 'byor pa dang /_mod par 'gyur/_'jig rten khrag khrug med par 'gyur/_rgyal po yang shin tu bde bar 'gyur/_
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]mas bsod nams dam pa'i rmi lam yang rnyed de/_nam khye'u btsas pa de'i tshe/_rigs 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes mi mdza' ba rnams kyang shin tu byams par 'gyur ro/_/nam khye'u de lo bdun nam/_brgyad dam/_dgu lon nas/_yi ge'i grar zhugs pa'i tshe khyim na 
[\[162b.2\]]'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa mi 'byung /_bran po dang bran mo rnams kyang dga' mgu rangs par gyur nas/_yang dag pa'i las kyis khyim du 'phel bar byed do/_/nam khye'u de lo nyi shu lon pa de'i tshe khyim de'i ba lang dang /_ma he dang /_lug la sogs pa rkang pa bzhi pa 
[\[162b.3\]]rnams kyang 'thab pa med de/_pha ma lta bur sdug par 'gyur ro/_/ba yang zho bdam mo/_/khye'u de la 'dod chags dang /_phrag dog dang /_'tshig pa dang /_g.yo dang /_sgyu dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra ba dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_byis pa'i tshul dang /_cho ga ma yin pa 
[\[162b.4\]]med cing mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi bya ba thams cad mi 'byung ste/_pha ma la mchod pa dang /_slob dpon dang /_mkhan po la mchod pa'i sems skye'o/_/rgan rabs mthong na lag pa thal mo sbyor ro/_/bar ma mthong na pang gis mkhyud de dam du 'ju'o/_/khye'u dang 
[\[162b.5\]]bu mo bdag dang 'dra ba dang lhan cig tu bus pa'i rtsed mo rtse na sbyin pa dang /_ri mor bya ba dang /_gtong ba sems so/_/phongs pa la bu bzhin du byed do/_/bya ba kun la ngo tsha shes te/_'jigs shing skrag pa yin/_dam pa'i chos kyi bya ba la mos kyi/_gar dang sgyu ma 
[\[162b.6\]]byed pa la mos pa ma yin/_gnyid dang snyom las byed pa ma yin/_sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod cing rtag tu glegs bam klog_/bslab pa la sogs pa bzo rnam pa mang po la dga'i/_rgyan po dang /_rtsed mo dang /_chang 'thung ba la dga' ba ma yin/_lha las lhur 
[\[162b.7\]]byed pa'i skye bo dge ba rnams kyis bkur ba/_mig gnyid thul ba/_zas mang du mi za/_gtsang sbra chung ba ma yin/_phyi rol gyi 'gro ba thams cad kyang dga' ba/_chos kyi bya ba la snying stobs che zhing blo gros che ba la sogs pa de lta bu'i yon tan shin tu mang bas 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]rang gi lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa thob par 'gyur te/_yon tan de 'dra/_las de 'dra/_brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de 'dra ste/_sha ri'i bu sor mo'i phreng ba yang myur du dgra bcom pa thob par 'gyur bas/_sor mo'i phreng ba la sdig par ga la 'gyur/_
[\[163a.2\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu sor mo'i phreng ba la ngo mtshar dang /_yon tan gzhan yang yod de/_'jam dpal ji lta ba de bzhin du sor mo'i phreng ba byang chub sems dpa' mi'i glang po yang de bzhin no/_/sor mo'i phreng ba ni sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du blta'o/_/
[\[163a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sor mo'i phreng ba ni/_bdag grol nas 'jig rten thams cad dgrol lo/_/rgal nas bsgral bar bya'o zhes bdag dang 'jig rten gyi phyir skyes bu 'di rtag tu smon lam 'debs te/_'jig rten thams cad la phan zhing snying 
[\[163a.4\]]brtse ba sdig pa byed pa de ni gnas med do/_/de lta bu'i sems can dag gi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' mi'i glang po che rnams ni nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_tshangs pa lta bu dang /_skye dgu'i bdag por 'gyur ro/_/sa dang /_rlung dang /_nam mkha' dang /_chu dang /_me lnga pa 
[\[163a.5\]]dang /_de lta bu rnam pa mang por 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sor mo'i phreng ba ni gang zag ya rabs lags te/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ma thag tu bdag nyid srid pa 
[\[163a.6\]]thams cad las nges par brgal to/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/_gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa ma rnyed na/_'jig rten na chos la bdag po byed pa'i sems can su dag 
[\[163a.7\]]yod/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu chos mngon pa'i lung las bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu bstan te/_dge slong rnams na ba dang na ba lta bu gsum ste/_na ba gsum gang zhe na/_log par nges pa zhes bya ba dang /_yang dag pa nyid du nges pa zhes bya ba dang /_ma 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]nges pa'i gang zag ces bstan to/_/de la log par nges pa gang zhe na/_log par nges pa zhes bya ba ni/_skyes bu gang de bzhin gshegs pas kyang gdul mi nus pa'o/_/yang dag pa nyid du nges pa zhes bya ba ni dper na/_btsun pa 'jam dpal dang /_'od srung chen po 
[\[163b.2\]]lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir de kho na'i chos la rab tu zhugs pa'o/_/smras pa/_btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes par btsun pa gnas brtan 'od srung chen po bdag nyid de kho na'i chos la 
[\[163b.3\]]rab tu zhugs so zhes ma zer cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa ste/_gang chos la gnas pa de dag gi khyim na de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs so/_/dper na/_'bab chu thams cad ni char las byung ste/_char med kyang gal te chu 'bab pa 
[\[163b.4\]]de la mkhas pas 'di ltar bsam mo/_/char med par chu 'bab pa de ni gnas med kyis gzhan du char 'bab par rig par bya ste/_de las 'bab chu 'bab par rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin du maung gal gyi bu 'jig rten gyi dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog 
[\[163b.5\]]gi chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas las 'bab ste/_de bas na btsun pa 'od srung chen po yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du rab tu byung bar rig par bya'o/_/ji ltar skye bo thams cad kyis sgyu ma mi mthong zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyag gcig 
[\[163b.6\]]gis mkhyen pa ma yin gyi/_gzhan du char bab pa bzhin te/_de'i phyir sangs rgyas med pa'i dus kyi sems can rnams kyang bdag nyid nges par mi sgrol gyi rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi mngon sum du nges par sgrol bar rig par bya'o/_/gzhan yang btsun pa skyes bu 
[\[163b.7\]]la la zhig zla ba dang /_nyi ma mthong nas khyim gyi nang du zhugs te de gnyis kyis mi mthong ngo snyam du sems na/_ci zla ba dang nyi mas mi mthong ngam/_mthong mod kyi mi mi mkhas pa khyim gyi nang du zhugs ma thag tu zla ba dang /_nyi mas mi mthong ngo snyam 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]du sems te/_de bzhin du btsun pa maung gal gyi bu yang mi mkhas pa bzhin ma zer cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu sems can rnams nges par sgrol te/_rtag tu sems can rnams rab tu 'byung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dzin 
[\[164a.2\]]du 'jug go/_/de'i phyir gang zag log par nges pa dang /_yang dag pa nyid du nges pa ste/_ma nges pa zhes bya ba gsum pa med do/_/smras pa/_'jig rten pa la yang tshul khrims lnga yod do/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i dus na yang yod do/_/smras pa/_btsun 
[\[164a.3\]]pa maud gal gyi bu de skad ma zer cig_/ji tsam chos dang 'thun pa'i tshul khrims dang /_cho ga dang yon tan 'jig rten na/_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dag yod pa de dag thams cad du thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshig tu rig par bya'o/_/smras pa/_nad pa lta bu'i gtam 
[\[164a.4\]]rnam pa gsum ste/_nad pa kha cig sman pa rnyed na 'tsho ba yod do/_/nad pa kha cig sman pa ma rnyed kyang 'tsho ba yod do/_/nad pa kha cig sman pa rnyed kyang mi 'tsho ba yod do/_/smras pa/_na ba gsum du med de/_na ba kha cig sman pa ma rnyed kyang 'tsho'o/_/na ba kha 
[\[164a.5\]]cig ni sman pa rnyed kyang mi 'tsho ste/_gsor rung ba dang /_gsor mi rung ba dang /_rnam pa gnyis so/_/smras pa/_gsum ma yin te/_nad pa kha cig ni sman pa ma rnyed kyang 'tsho ba yod do/_/nad pa kha cig ni sman pa dang g.yog rnyed kyang mi 'tsho ba yod de/_gal te 
[\[164a.6\]]sman med na/_sman pas kyang ci zhig bya/_nad pa gang sman pa ma rnyed kyang 'tsho ba de/_sman pa rnyed na ci ltar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur te/_rgyu gcig gis sman pa bya ba shes pa ma yin gyi/_zas mi bza' ba'i cho ga dang /_btang ba yang mi shes so/_/gal te thams 
[\[164a.7\]]cad mi shes na/_dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir nad pa gsor rung ba dang /_gsor mi rung ba ste/_sman pa yang rnyed/_sman dang g.yog rnyed kyang /_gal te 'chi na ni de don med pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]te sman dang /_/g.yog dang /_sman pa yang ma rnyed/_sman pa rnyed la/_sman ma rnyed pa ste/_de'i phyir sman pa dang /_sman rnyed kyang mi 'tsho na/_sman dang sman pa'i bye brag kyang med do/_/ci'i phyir tshe'i rig byed las lus lci ba dang /_yang ba'i bya ba thams cad 'byung 
[\[164b.2\]]ste/_de'i phyir btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po gsor rung yang rung la/_mi rung yang mi rung zhes bya bar rnam pa gsum du rtog pa rnam pa gsum med do/_/de ni nyan thos kyi shes pa ste/_sbrang bu lta bu'i shes pa'o zhes mkhas pa rnams 'dzer to/_/mi mkhas 
[\[164b.3\]]pa rnams kyi phyir rnam pa gnyis su brtags te/_de la log par nges pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chen pa'o/_/yang dag par nges pa zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas so/_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu ngo mtshar rnam pa gnyis te/_rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/_
[\[164b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_'dod chen pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni mchog gi gnas su ngo mtshar du gyur pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa las mtho ba'i gnas gzhan mi snang ste ngo mtshar to/_/dma' ba'i gnas su yang 'dod [{]mangs [,]mang [}]las gzhan mi snang ngo /_/
[\[164b.5\]]dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed cing 'gro ba de bzhin du 'dod chen pa yang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed cing 'gro'o/_/dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi sbyin 
[\[164b.6\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag gi bu dang /_mig dang sha bye ba'i phung po'i ri rab bas che ba de bas lhag par gtong ba de bzhin du 'dod chen pa'ang 'dod chen gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/'dod chen pa'ang nam [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[164b.7\]]kyi 'jig rten du song ba de'i tshe der g.yem pa'i sems skye ste/_de'i tshe myur du bud med mang po 'byung ste/_bu mang po yang 'byung ste/_sems tsam gyis bde ba lta 'thob par ga la 'gyur/_de nas myur du bdag gi bu bza' ba'i sems skyes nas za'o/_/
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]yang las kyis bram ze'i gzugs su 'gyur te/_des slong ba rnams la yang bu rnams byin te byin pa de dag za'o/_/yang bdag nyid kyang thams cad za ste/_de ltar 'dod chen pa'ang 'dod chen gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par 'gyur te/_
[\[165a.2\]]de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de'i phyir mthon po'i gnas kyi mchog ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams so/_/dma' ba'i gnas na ni 'dod chen pa rnams so/_/btsun pa maung gal gyi bu de ltar ngo mtshar rnam pa gnyis te/_
[\[165a.3\]]log par nges pa'i gang zag ni 'dod chen pa yin par soms shig_/yang dag par nges pa'i gang zag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos yin par soms shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sor mo'i phreng ba la bka' stsal pa/_sor 
[\[165a.4\]]mo'i phreng ba tshur shog_/myur du rab tu byung la skyabs gsum du 'gro ba zung shig_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas slar gsol pa/_theg pa 'di ni theg chen te/_/chags med ye shes zhes kyang bgyi/_/theg pa gcig 
[\[165a.5\]]po skyabs gcig ste/_/de bzhin gshegs pa don dam skyabs/_/chos dang sangs rgyas don gcig ste/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku/_/dge 'dun de bzhin gshegs kyi ming /_/dge 'dun nyid ni de bzhin gshegs/_/chos dang dge 'dun 
[\[165a.6\]]gnyis ni thabs kyi skyabs lags te/_/de bzhin gshegs ni thabs med skyabs dang don dam skyabs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skyabs med rnams kyi skyabs lags te/_/de yi slad du de bzhin gshegs la skyabs su mchi/_/ji ltar shing kun za 'dod pas ni 
[\[165a.7\]]shing kun bza' bya zhes/_/shing kun yang dag bor nas shing kun bcos ma za ba ni/_/'jig rten dag na bdag la mi phan nad kyang sos mi 'gyur/_/'jig rten de 'dra'i phyugs med sman pa stong gis gso mi nus/_/de bzhin du ni skyabs gcig yongs 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]btang ste/_/thabs kyi skyabs su gang dag 'jug pa yang /_/de lta bu yi sbrang bu gzhan med de/_/de ni sangs rgyas stong gis gso mi nus/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'o na sor mo'i phreng ba khyod gzhon nu'i tshul khrims srungs shig_/de nas sor 
[\[165b.2\]]mo'i phreng bas/_bcom ldan 'das la slar 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'jig rten na gzhon nu gang lags/_bsnyen par rdzogs pa gang lags/_'jig rten na dge sbyong gsal ba gang lags/_'jig rten na sbyin gnas gang lags/_de nas bcom 
[\[165b.3\]]ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur pa dang /_sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang 'jig rten na skyabs gcig po don dam pa'i skyabs su ma 'tshal ba de dag thabs gnyis po la bkod do/_/de gnyis 
[\[165b.4\]]'jig rten na skyabs lags te/_gzhon nur gyur nas bsnyen par rdzogs pa mi gsal ba de dge sbyong lags sam/_gang skyabs gcig po ma 'tshal ba de dag skyabs sbyor ba lta ga la 'gyur/_gang bcom ldan 'das la don dam pa'i skyabs su ma 'tshal 
[\[165b.5\]]ba de dag thog ma nas skyabs su 'gro ba yang ma sbyangs na dge sbyong du lta ga la 'gyur/_de ltar skyabs su mchi ba yang gsal bar ma 'tshal na/_sbyin gnas su lta ga la 'gyur/_gang skyabs dang thabs kyi skyabs kyi bye brag ma 'tshal ba de ni 'jig rten na gzhon 
[\[165b.6\]]nu mi mkhas pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'o na sor mo'i phreng ba khyod srog gcod pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims srungs shig_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag ni srog gcod pa 
[\[165b.7\]]spangs pa'i tshul khrims mi 'dzin gyi/_nya pa ltar srog gcod pa'i tshul khrims 'dzin to/_/srog ces bgyi ba ni nyon mongs pa bye ba ste/_de dag bzung nas gang gsod pa de ni 'jig rten na srog gcod pa spangs pa 'dzin pa'o/_/de yang gsad pa 'am/_
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]yang na rgyags pa bcom ste/_bdag gi slob mar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'o na sor mo'i phreng ba khyod [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das la sor mo'i phreng bas slar 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[166a.2\]]to/_/bdag ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims mi 'dzin to/_/chos thams cad ni mi bden pa ste/_bdag ni mi bden par smra ba'i chos ston to/_/de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid de mi bden pa zhes bgyi'o/_/chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/_dgra bcom pa zhes 
[\[166a.3\]]bgyi ba'i chos thams cad kyang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zhes bgyi'o/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'jig rten dang 'thun pa'i rjes su 'jug pa rnams kyang mi bden pa'i chos zhes bgyi'o/_/bdag 'jig rten du skyes te rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par 
[\[166a.4\]]rdzogs nas/_bdag gis dgra bcom pa thob po/_/gzhan gyi sbyin pa'i dngos po la spyad do/_/bdag 'jig rten na 'chag go/_/bdag gis ni rma dgu nas de'i bgyi ba bgyi'o/_/bdag lha ma 'tshal lo/_/bdag gis so shing blang ngo /_/bdag gis 
[\[166a.5\]]mig rtsi byug go/_/bdag sgom mo/_/bdag gnyid gcag go/_/bdag gi mgo bo breg go/_/bdag mal du zhugs te nyal lo/_/rked pa na ba zhig byung ngo /_/bad kan dang mkhris pa dang /_rlung dang /_'dus pa zhig byung ste/_bdag gis sman btung ngo /_/
[\[166a.6\]]bdag ni shing zad pa'i me bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i chos thams cad ni mi bden pa ste/_ji tsam du thabs kyis bya ba dang /_'jig rten na thabs kyis bya ba la bdag yongs su spyod pa'i bar du [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra ba'i tshul khrims mi spyod do/_/
[\[166a.7\]]de kho na'i chos bden pa'i chos rab tu bshad kyis nga las nyon cig_/btsun pa maud gal gyi bu chen po gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bden pa yang dag pa nyid/_don dam pa'i sku rtag pa'i sku/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sku/_don 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]dam pa'i sku/_ther zug gi sku rtag pa'i sku/_don dam pa'i sku/_chos kyi sku/_zhi ba'i sku/_don dam pa'i sku/_chos kyi sku/_de kho na las skyes pa'i sku/_de ji ltar ston/_de bas na mi bden pa'i chos kyis 'byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa thams cad ni mi bden pa 
[\[166b.2\]]dang bral ba ste/_de bas na sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/dper na/_ba lang rdzi dag be'u shi ba'i pags pas be'u ltar byas te brid nas/_be'u gzhan len du 'jug pa de bzhin du/_'jig rten gyi rjes su 'brang zhing spyod pa na/_sangs rgyas ni 'on pa lta bur gyur nas chos ston te/_
[\[166b.3\]]ba lang rdzi dang ba ltar 'on pa rnams kyang bdag cag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'on pa yang 'jig rten du byung ste/_bdag cag kyang 'on pa'o snyam ste shin tu dga'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyang 'on pa snyam du sems shing 
[\[166b.4\]]bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gyi gtso bor 'gyur ro snyam du sems so/_/chos de kho na'i gnas la des bdag nyid bskul te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad chos la 'god pa de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes so/_/gal te be'u dngos po slar bstan na 
[\[166b.5\]]bzhor yang mi rung /_len du yang mi rung ste/_ba lang rdzis be'u gso ba bstan te/_rtswa spar gang byin nas mi bden pa'i chos la dul bar byed do/_/de bzhin du gal te sangs rgyas kyis ngo bo nyid don dam pa'i sku 'jig rten du bstan du zin na/_sku de sus mthong bar nus 
[\[166b.6\]]te/_ji ltar ba la rtswa'i chang pa ltar 'jig rten thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar byed pas chos rnams bden pa ma yin no/_/de bas na sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du yan lag gang dang gang gis sems can rnams chos la rtsom par sems can mang po yongs su smin par mdzad 
[\[166b.7\]]de/_de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid do/_/de'i phyir bdag kyang mi bden pa'i chos la spyod de/_ji tsam du sems can thams cad mi bden pa yin pa de tsam du bdag kyang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra ba spang ba'i chos mi 'dzin to/_/de'i tshe bdag gi tshul khrims yongs su dag par 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'o na sor mo'i phreng ba khyod chang 'thung ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims zung shig_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la slar tshigs su bcad pas gsol pa/_chang spong ba yi tshul khrims bdag 
[\[167a.2\]]mi 'dzin/_/chang las myos pa skyes pa'i tshul khrims 'dzin/_/chang 'thungs pa ni nga rgyal skye bar brjod/_/'gro 'chag rtag tu rab bde chang zhes bgyi/_/bde gshegs snying po theg pa che las skyes/_/khu ba 'thungs nas skyes bu ngoms par 'gyur/_/de bzhin 
[\[167a.3\]]gshegs pa rtag brtan ther zug ces/_/rab tu dga' ngoms ha ha legs brjod pa/_/phun sum tshogs pa de ni bdag thob shog_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'o na sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'khrig pa'i chos spangs pa'i tshul khrims zung shig_/
[\[167a.4\]]de nas sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas slar 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag ni 'khrig pa spangs pa'i khrims mi 'dzin/_/rtag tu gzhan gyi bud med g.yem chags 'dzin/_/ba dan lta bur smad tshong khyim na spyod/_/bud med kun 
[\[167a.5\]]gyi drung du'ang rab tu chags/_/ting 'dzin ro ni bdag gi chung ma ste/_/chos gzhan dga' ba gzhan gyi bud med chags/_/dpa' zhing bden la dga' ba bdag gi bu/_/snying rje byams pa bu mo mang po ste/_/stong pa 'di ni bdag gi khyim lags 
[\[167a.6\]]so/_/mtha' yas pha rol phyin pa bdag gi mal/_/nyon mongs rnams ni bdag gi g.yog lags te/_/zas ni ldem ngag gsang ba bstan pa lags/_/bdag gi skyed mos tshal ni gzungs rnams te/_/byang chub yan lag me tog dag gis brgyan/_/
[\[167a.7\]]rnam par grol ba'i ye shes 'bras bu ste/_/bdag gi chos kyi tshig ni sdong po lags/_/de la sogs pa khyim gnas rtse dga' mchog_/byis pa rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ma lags/_/'di ni mkhas pa rnams kyi rang bzhin chos/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_'o na sor mo'i phreng ba khyod ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims zung shig_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas slar gsol pa/_bdag ni ma byin len spong khrims mi 'dzin/_/gzhan nor rku ba'i tshul ni 
[\[167b.2\]]rtag tu 'dzin/_/ma byin pa ni byang chub lags zhes bgyi/_/de ni sus kyang su la'ang ma stsal te/_/byang chub shing drung bcom ldan bzhugs nas kyang /_/khyod kyis rnyed pa med cing bshig pa'ang med/_/de ni chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin te/_/de ni bla na med 
[\[167b.3\]]pa'i chos lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'o na sor mo'i phreng ba khyod gar dang /_rol mo spangs pa'i tshul khrims zung shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la sor mo'i phreng bas tshigs su bcad pas slar 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag 
[\[167b.4\]]ni gar mkhan bzhin du rtag tu gar bgyid de/_/dri za'i dbyangs snyan sgrog cing glu blangs bro brdungs te/_/legs so legs so de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston/_/legs brjod gar bgyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos/_/mi sbyin lta bur sgra snyan theg 
[\[167b.5\]]chen mdo sde bklag_/mi 'am ci dang dri za'i rnga dang rnga bran dang /_/sil snyan dag gis glegs bam la yang mchod par bgyi/_/sems can gang rnams de ltar rtag tu mchod bgyid pa/_/de dag 'jig rten du ni khor mor ming gcig par/_/phyi dus sangs rgyas 
[\[167b.6\]]'gyur zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsung /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'o na sor mo'i phreng ba khyod ci gcig ci zhes slobs shig_/sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la slar 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ci gcig ce na/_sems can 
[\[167b.7\]]thams cad ni zas la gnas so zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa las 'byung ba'i tshig ste/_theg pa chen po la de lta bu'i rnam pa ma mchis so/_/theg pa chen po pa rnams ni rtag tu mig mi 'dzums shing brtan pa'o/_/ci gcig ce na/_sems can thams cad ni de 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la gnas pa'o/_/ci gnyis zhe na/_ming dang gzugs kyi tshig nyan thos kyi theg pa las 'byung ba ste/_theg pa chen po la ma lags so/_/ming dang gzugs ni de lta lags te/_ming dang gzugs rnam pa gzhan ma lags 
[\[168a.2\]]so/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi thar pa ni ming tsam ste/_gzugs dang dbyibs mi rig go/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thar pa ni lag mthil na skyu ru ra'i gzugs bzhin no/_/ci gsum zhe na/_tshor ba gsum nyan thos kyi theg 
[\[168a.3\]]pa las 'byung ste/_theg pa chen po pa rnams kyi ma lags so/_/tshor ba 'di gsum ste/_gang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i mchog la mi rtag par 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba'i don thos pa ni tshor ba'o/_/dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba'i don thos pa 
[\[168a.4\]]ni tshor ba'o/_/dge 'dun mi snang bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba'i don thos pa ni tshor ba ste/_de gsum theg pa chen po'i tshor ba'o/_/ci bzhi zhe na/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/_theg pa chen po la de lta bu'i 
[\[168a.5\]]rnam pa ma mchis so/_/'di lta bu'i rang bzhin dang byed pa rnams ni bden pa bzhi ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rtag ces bgyi ba de ni theg pa chen po la shin tu bden pa ste/_sdug bsngal ni bden pa ma lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ther zug go zhes 
[\[168a.6\]]bgyi ba de ni shin tu bden te/_kun 'byung ba ni ma lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni ther zug gi mchog go zhes bgyi ba ni shin tu bden gyi 'gog pa ni ma lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'o zhes bgyi ba de ni shin tu bden gyi lam ni ma yin te/_
[\[168a.7\]]theg pa chen po la 'phags pa'i bden pa de bzhi'o/_/sdug bsngal gyi bya ba bden pa ma lags so/_/sdug bsngal gyi bya ba bden du lags na/_sdug bsngal rnam bzhi bden par 'gyur te/_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_lha ma yin dang /_gshin 
[\[168b\]]
