[\[168b.1\]]rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi de dag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhir 'gyur ro/_/ci lnga zhe na/_dbang po lnga zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/_theg pa chen po la ni ma lags so/_/dbang po lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa gsal bar blta'o/_
[\[168b.2\]]zhes ma tshang ba med par sgom pa de ni mig go/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'o zhes thos nas ma tshang ba med par sgom pa de ni rna ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i dri mnams nas ma tshang ba med par sgom pa de ni sna'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i ro 
[\[168b.3\]]myangs nas ma tshang ba med par sgom pa de ni lce'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku'o zhes sku de'i ro mchog thos shing reg nas ma tshang ba med par sgom pa de ni lus so/_/ci drug ce na/_skye mched drug ces nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/_theg pa 
[\[168b.4\]]chen po la skye mched drug gi rnam pa 'di med do/_/skye mched drug ces bya ba ni gang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa gsal bar blta ba'o zhes 'ong ba'i sgo nas rdzogs par sgom pa de ni mig gi skye mched do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtag go zhes thos pa 'ong ba'i sgo nas rdzogs 
[\[168b.5\]]par sgom pa de ni rna ba'i skye mched do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rtag pa'i dri thos pa 'ong ba'i sgo nas rdzogs par sgom pa de ni sna'i skye mched do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan pa thos pa 'ong ba'i sgo nas rdzogs par sgom pa de ni lce'i skye mched do/_/
[\[168b.6\]]gang de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o zhes sku de'i bro dam pa nyan pa dang /_reg pa 'ong ba'i sgo nas rdzogs par sgom pa de ni lus kyi skye mched do/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba gsal bar stan pa la 'khrugs pa med pa'i sems kyis rdzogs par dang 
[\[168b.7\]]ba 'ong ba'i sgo'i skye mched de ni yid kyi skye mched do/_/ci bdun zhe na/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/_theg pa chen po la yang bdun po de dag u dum bA ra'i me tog rgyas pa bzhin du rnyed par dka' ba'i tshig 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po dag ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas shin tu me tog rgyas pa bdun no/_/ci brgyad ce na/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ces nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/_theg pa chen po 'di las kyang 'phags 
[\[169a.2\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs pa'o/_/gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i mchog go zhes rab tu ston pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba thos shing rnam par reg pa tsam gyis mya ngan las 
[\[169a.3\]]'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam yang dag par 'thob bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa ther zug g.yung drung gi mchog bsil bar gyur pa/_shis pa ni sangs rgyas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rga ba med pa'o zhes bya ba 'di ni 
[\[169a.4\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/ci dgu zhe na/_mdo sde yan lag dgu zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/_theg pa chen po 'di la ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes la theg pa gcig ces bya'o/_/ci bcu zhe na/_de bzhin 
[\[169a.5\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa las grags pa'i tshig ste/_theg pa chen po 'di la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma yin gyi mtha' yas pa'i stobs zhes bya'o/_/de bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab cing 
[\[169a.6\]]bsam du med pa ste/_stobs mtha' yas par mnga' ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mdo sde mtha' yas pa ldem po ngag tu ston pa'o/_/'di ni lam gcig po ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni theg pa gcig_/skyabs gcig_/bden pa 
[\[169a.7\]]gcig gi phyir 'brang ba/_khams gcig pa/_'gro ba gcig pa/_kha dog gcig pa ste/_de bas na theg pa gcig ces bya'o/_/gzhan ni thabs kyi bya ba'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sor mo'i phreng ba la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_legs 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]so legs so/_/sor mo'i phreng ba legs so/_/sor mo'i phreng ba khyod de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong sor mo'i phreng ba khyod tshur shog_/dge slong sor mo'i phreng ba khyod tshur shog ces bka' stsal pa dang /_sor mo'i phreng ba dge slong lo mang du lon pa bzhin du 
[\[169b.2\]]thams cad dge sbyong dang 'thun par spyod lam mdzes par gyur to/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du mchi'o zhes kha'i sgo nas tshig byung ma thag tu der 'bras bu'i mchog dgra bcom pa thob bo/_/
[\[169b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sor mo'i phreng ba tshur shog_/dze ta'i tshal du sems can bye ba mang po sgrol zhing ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du 'dong ngo /_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sor mo'i phreng ba dang thabs cig tu shA ri'i bu dang /_maung gal gyi bu dang /_
[\[169b.4\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pas mdun du bdar cing bskor te/_nam mkha' la zla ba nya la gzas bskor ba bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa shing mya ngan med pa'i drung nas nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags te/_gang du de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[169b.5\]]dang /_sor mo'i phreng bar rtsod pa'i sa nas dze ta'i tshal gyi bar du gnag pa'i dgongs bzhi bcur 'dom gang med pa'i bar du gshegs so/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng ba'i ma dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen 
[\[169b.6\]]pos mchod pa cher byas te/_dze ta'i tshal du 'ongs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar gshegs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/_/de nas stong gsum 
[\[169b.7\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lag mthil bzhin du gyur cing /_gos ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can bzhin du gyur to/_/de nas phyogs thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' so so'i de bzhin gshegs pas/_deng de bzhin 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]gshegs pa shAkya thub pa seng ge stag chen po dang /_thab mo chen po bkye nas sems can bye ba mang po sgrol zhing chos kyi gtam ston te/_sor mo'i phreng ba'i bdag nyid chen po mthong bar 'gyur gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa dag deng shig_/tshe dang ldan pa dag deng shig 
[\[170a.2\]]ces bkye ste/_sor mo'i phreng ba bltar lhags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag phyogs cha gang nas 'ong ba'i phyogs cha de dang de nas me tog sil ma shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam gyi char bab po/_/sems can gang dang gang gis pad mo'i dri la reg par gyur pa'i sems can de 
[\[170a.3\]]dag thams cad nyon mongs pa med par gyur to/_/de nas lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_dri za dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_lha'i bu mo mang pos lha'i mchod pa mang po byas te/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi char yang dag par bsgrubs nas 
[\[170a.4\]]mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pas tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/brgyad bzhi mtshan 'chang yon tan rgya chen mnga'/_/pad mo mchog rgyas bzhin du zhal yang mdzes/_/nam mkha' la ni zla ba mdzes pa ltar/_/mdzod spu thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thub 
[\[170a.5\]]pa dam pa bdun mtho gzugs mchog mnga'/_/byams mchog phan pa'i yon tan mang po 'chang /_/pad mo mchog rgyas bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal/_/nam mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar/_/mdzod spu thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rtag dge mtshungs med 
[\[170a.6\]]mchog yangs yon tan mnga'/_/thub pa dam pa lha mi mchog gis mchod/_/pad mo mchog rgyas bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal/_/nam mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar/_/mdzod spu thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/brtan dge mtshungs med mchog yangs 
[\[170a.7\]]yon tan mnga'/_/thub pa dam pa lha mi mchog gis mchod/_/pad mo mchog rgyas bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal/_/nam mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar/_/mdzod spu thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ther zug dge mchog yon tan rgya chen mnga'/_/thub 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]pa dam pa lha mi mchog gis mchod/_/pad mo mchog rgyas bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal/_/nam mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar/_/mdzod spu thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhi dge mtshungs med mchog yangs yon tan mnga'/_/thub pa dam pa lha mi mchog gis 
[\[170b.2\]]mchod/_/pad mo rgyas pa bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal/_/nam mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar/_/mdzod spu thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bzod 'chang tshul khrims yon tan mtha' yas 'chang /_/sor mo'i phreng thogs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/theg pa gcig 
[\[170b.3\]]'dzin theg pa chen po ston/_/byams 'chang sor phreng thogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mtha' yas lus 'dzin dag kyang mtha' yas 'dzin/_/mtha' yas gsung 'dzin mtha' yas blo gros 'chang /_/sor mo'i phreng thogs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mtha' yas 'od 
[\[170b.4\]]'chang mtha' yas ldem ngag ston/_/sor mo'i phreng thogs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mtha' yas sgyu 'chang mtha' yas bdud rnams 'dul/_/nyon mongs bye ba rnam par smin byed 'chang /_/sor phreng thogs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mtha' yas yongs su mya ngan 
[\[170b.5\]]'da' byed cing /_/mtha' yas skye ston 'jig rten rjes su 'jug_/dpa' bo mchog 'chang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la sor mo'i phreng bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nga ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas so zhes gsungs 
[\[170b.6\]]na/_de'i don ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das khyod yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas te bzhugs pa ji lta bu lags/_nga ni thar pa'i sa la gnas so zhes bka' stsal pa/_tshig de la dad par bgyir mi rung na/_'di la de'i gtan tshigs bshad du gsol/_bcom 
[\[170b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig tu deng la/_'di nas byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba bskyed du med pa zhes 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blo gros bskyed du med pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas sa'i dbang phyug rgyal po da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das mi mjed kyi 
[\[171a.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams na/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bzhugs bzhin mi skye ba'i mtha' la gnas so zhes gsungs na ji lta bu lags zhes zhus shig_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_sor mo'i phreng bas legs so legs so zhes gsol nas/_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[171a.3\]]gyi rkang pa'i stobs kyis ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar dga' ba bskyed du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der dong nas/_bcom ldan 'das blo gros bskyed du med pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas sa'i dbang phyug rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong ste nye bar phyin nas/_de bzhin 
[\[171a.4\]]gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis 'dir mchis pa de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas bkye ste 'dir mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[171a.5\]]gshegs pa shAkya thub pa yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das par de nyid na bzhugs bzhin du ma skyes pa'i mtha' thar pa la ji ltar gnas zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs 
[\[171a.6\]]kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa gang yin pa nga nyid de bzhin gshegs pa de yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid ston gyis/_rigs kyi bu khyed deng la/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag cag 'di ltar bkye'o zhes smros shig_/de nas 'jam 
[\[171a.7\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_sor mo'i phreng ba gnyis langs te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_dge'o zhes smras te/_ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du slar 'ongs so/_/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag tu ma mchis so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mtha' yas so/_/kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid bdag cag gis mthong ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[171b.2\]]blo gros bskyed du med pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas sa'i dbang phyug rgyal po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de yin te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid ston to zhes tshig brjod nas bdag cag slar bkye na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di na bzhugs bzhin du ji ltar ma skyes 
[\[171b.3\]]pa'i mtha' la gnas pa bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nga ji ltar blo gros bskyed du med pa'i yon tan gyi 'byung gnas sa'i dbang phyug rgyal por gyur cing dga' ba bskyed du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ji ltar gnas 'di na 'dug 
[\[171b.4\]]bzhin du de na ji ltar gnas 'di na 'dug la ma skyes pa'i mtha' la ji ltar gnas zhes ma zer cig_/sangs rgyas kyi sku ni mtha' yas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtha' yas par rgyu ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mtshungs pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[171b.5\]]pa ni mtshungs pa med par rgyu ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni dpag tu med de/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag tu med par rgyu ba'o/_/sor mo'i phreng ba ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ma skyes par gyur pa de'i don de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang /_sangs 
[\[171b.6\]]rgyas ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba dang /_phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du legs par bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[171b.7\]]bka' stsal pa/_sor mo'i phreng ba ngas bskal pa brgya stong phrag bcur pha rol tu phyin pa spyad pas sems can yang dag par bsdus te sems can byang chub kyi sems ma skyes pa'i sems can bye ba mang po byang chub la bkod de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga'i lus bskal pa 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]bye ba mang po grangs med par pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_de'i dge ba'i rtsa bas ma skyes pa'i skur gyur to/_/sor mo'i phreng bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung ba'i skur gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[172a.2\]]pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs su gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams ma byung ba'i glog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba de na rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[172a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/sor mo'i phreng ba khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig tu ma byung ba'i glog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[172a.4\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs par deng la/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs te/_yang dag pa'i mtha' la ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang 
[\[172a.5\]]sor mo'i phreng bas legs so zhes gsol nas/_ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi rkang pas ma byung ba'i glog gi phreng ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der dong nas/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[172a.6\]]sangs rgyas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin du zhus pa dang /_snga ma bzhin du 'dir lhags nas/_sor mo'i phreng ba dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[172a.7\]]gshegs pa ji ltar na ma byung ba'i mtha' la gnas pa bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sor mo'i phreng ba ngas bskal pa brgya stong mang por pha rol tu phyin pa bcus sems can yang dag par bsdus te/_sngon ma byung ba'i bde ba la rab 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]tu bkod pas nga'i lus bskal pa bye ba mang por tshad med grangs med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las ma byung ba'i lus su gyur to/_/sor mo'i phreng bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na 'dus ma bgyis kyi mtha' la gnas/_bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 
[\[172b.2\]]nas byang phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yid 'phrog ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blo gros mi zad pa zhes bya ba da ltar 
[\[172b.3\]]bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[172b.4\]]'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs zhes bya ba na rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das 
[\[172b.5\]]shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams zab mo'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de na/_zab mo'i 
[\[172b.6\]]mchog ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs 
[\[172b.7\]]rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rlung zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi 'tsho ba 'byung ba zhes bya 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bdun snyed kyi 
[\[173a.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i blo gros zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom 
[\[173a.3\]]ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de na/_de bzhin 
[\[173a.4\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs 
[\[173a.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams zla ba can zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba mchog ces bya ba da ltar 
[\[173a.6\]]bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[173a.7\]]khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma shar ba zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs bdal ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o//_//bam po lnga pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams bro dam pa zhes bya 
[\[173b.2\]]ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bro mchog dam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[173b.3\]]'di nas shar phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rtsa lag 'tsho zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtsa lag 'tsho ba'i 'od ces 
[\[173b.4\]]bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das 
[\[173b.5\]]pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams phreng bas bsgos pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phreng ba'i dri mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom 
[\[173b.6\]]ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams ta ma la'i 'dab ma zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[173b.7\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ta ma la'i 'dab ma'i dri zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs 
[\[174a.2\]]te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams a ga ru dang 
[\[174a.3\]]ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a ga ru'i dri zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[174a.4\]]zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams phye mas bsgos pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phye ma'i spos zhes bya ba 
[\[174a.5\]]da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_
[\[174a.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams skar ma zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma'i 'od ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris 
[\[174a.7\]]shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i blo gros zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]mtshos byin pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das 
[\[174b.2\]]pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams klu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas klu'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas 
[\[174b.3\]]pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mtshan can zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan gyi 
[\[174b.4\]]'od ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[174b.5\]]'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams sprin chen po zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin chen po'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom 
[\[174b.6\]]ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams glog gi phreng ba can zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[174b.7\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas glog sbyin zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su gang gA'i 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i blo gros zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes 
[\[175a.2\]]kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams 'gro ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/_de 
[\[175a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gro ba 'dzin pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 
[\[175a.4\]]lho phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams nor bu 'dzin ces bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu 'dzin 'chang zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing 
[\[175a.5\]]gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/_lho phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' 
[\[175a.6\]]dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/
[\[175a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams 'dul ba zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dul ba'i mchog ces 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[175b.2\]]khams dpal gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/
[\[175b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams seng ge'i blo gros zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i snying po zhes 
[\[175b.4\]]bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[175b.5\]]'jam pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snyan pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[175b.6\]]'di nas nub phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i phreng ba zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gAs byin zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 
[\[175b.7\]]'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams kun 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]du bzang po zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu blo gros zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/
[\[176a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog dam pa zhes bya ba 
[\[176a.3\]]da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[176a.4\]]mtha' yas zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs 
[\[176a.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams bzang po can zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzang po'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar 
[\[176a.6\]]bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[176a.7\]]mig gi bdag po zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mig gi rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ke'i la sa'i snying po zhes bya ba da 
[\[176b.2\]]ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rnga sgra 
[\[176b.3\]]zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnga dbyangs zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 
[\[176b.4\]]nas nub phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sdug pa'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs 
[\[176b.5\]]te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten 
[\[176b.6\]]gyi khams dga' ba 'phel ba zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba 'phel ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 
[\[176b.7\]]ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mdzes sdug ces bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mdzes pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub byang gi phyogs 
[\[177a.2\]]mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rgyu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyu'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing 
[\[177a.3\]]gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams spyod 
[\[177a.4\]]pa yid 'phrog ces bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod pa'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/
[\[177a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams sems can dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[177a.6\]]sems can gyi mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed 
[\[177a.7\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams glog ces bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas glog gi bla ma zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[177b.2\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams 
[\[177b.3\]]logs su gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de 
[\[177b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams brtan pa zhes bya ba de 
[\[177b.5\]]na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtan pa'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 
[\[177b.6\]]nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams chu'i ro zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chu'i mchog ces bya ba da 
[\[177b.7\]]ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]'jig rten gyi khams tog can zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i tog la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[178a.2\]]'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i 'od ces bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bsil ba zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 
[\[178a.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mchog ces bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang 
[\[178a.4\]]gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams gser 'od ces bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa gser mchog dpal zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs 
[\[178a.5\]]mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams gser mdog ces bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od dpal zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 
[\[178a.6\]]nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams gser can zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser mchog ces bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du 
[\[178a.7\]]bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams dra ba can zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya ba la dris shig pa'ang 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i chu zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa chu'i rgyal po zhes bya 
[\[178b.2\]]ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin 
[\[178b.3\]]gshegs pa tshul khrims kyi snying po zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[178b.4\]]rin po che'i gling zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung zhes bya ba la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung 
[\[178b.5\]]gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i blo gros zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams 
[\[178b.6\]]logs su gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi blo gros tog ces bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/
[\[178b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams blo gros grub pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa don grub dpal zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i chu zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med 
[\[179a.2\]]pa'i bai dUr+ya zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams skyes bu klu la dga' ba zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin 
[\[179a.3\]]gshegs pa skyes bu klu'i snying po la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi ro zhes bya ba de na/_
[\[179a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa spos brtsegs zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams spos ldan 
[\[179a.5\]]zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi snying po zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten 
[\[179a.6\]]gyi khams drang po'i 'od ces bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa drang po'i dpal zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa 
[\[179a.7\]]na/_'jig rten gyi khams rin thang med pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin thang med pa zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas gtsug phud can zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 
[\[179b.2\]]nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams 'od dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa 
[\[179b.3\]]zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa'i mig ces bya ba de na/_de bzhin 
[\[179b.4\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[179b.5\]]khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams me'i gzi brjid ces bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me'i 'od ces bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs 
[\[179b.6\]]mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mun pa sel ba zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mun pa sel ldan zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang 
[\[179b.7\]]gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams byin pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig 
[\[180a.2\]]rten gyi khams mi skye ba zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi skye ba'i dbang phyug la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i 
[\[180a.3\]]klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi glang po che zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi glang po che'i rnam par gnon pa la dris shig pa'ang gong ma 
[\[180a.4\]]bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi snod ces bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[180a.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi snod kyi rgyal po la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[180a.6\]]dga' ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye 
[\[180a.7\]]ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal dam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams 'jig rten mthong ba dang 
[\[180b.2\]]bcas pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad mthong na dga' ba cher 'phags pa'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rnam par sprul pa'i bkod pa go cha chen po bgos pa/_sa'i dbang phyug rgyal po 
[\[180b.3\]]thams cad la 'od byed snang ba'i sgo zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 
[\[180b.4\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de 
[\[180b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams chus me tog kha 'bye ba zhes bya 
[\[180b.6\]]ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kha 'byed pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[180b.7\]]'di nas steng gi phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan thams cad med pa zhes bya 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]ba da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[181a.2\]]'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams ud pa la mthing ka zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i ud pa la'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la 
[\[181a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams pad ma can zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[181a.4\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs 
[\[181a.5\]]logs su gang gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams ku mu da dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ku mu da'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 
[\[181a.6\]]'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[181a.7\]]khams sa ki'i spos zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa ki'i spos zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams ko kang si ka zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[181b.2\]]bkra shis thams cad kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 
[\[181b.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams bsod nams kyi stegs can zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsod nams kyi stegs kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing 
[\[181b.4\]]gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams seng ge'i tshul 
[\[181b.5\]]zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_
[\[181b.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams stag gi phug ces bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stag sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 
[\[181b.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams shing sa ha ka ra zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa ha ka ra'i me tog klung zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]logs su gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ldan zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad las rgyal bar 'dul ba zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[182a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams ye shes mi chags pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[182a.3\]]theg pa chen po rnam par sgrogs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams mkha' 'bigs 'byung gnas zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[182a.4\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkha' 'bigs rtse mo zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams ltad mo che ba zhes bya 
[\[182a.5\]]ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri mo thams cad kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig 
[\[182a.6\]]rten gyi khams blo gros 'dzin pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig 
[\[182a.7\]]rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams sa'i blo gros zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas the tsom dang yid gnyis thams cad gcod pa'i 'byung gnas rgyal po zhes bya ba da 
[\[182b.2\]]ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das par bzhugs shing /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshig gi dpes brgyan pa'i thar pa'i 
[\[182b.3\]]mtha' la ji ltar gnas pa/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_sor mo'i phreng ba khyod deng la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de la dris shig_/khyod kyi the tsom dang yid gnyis thams cad gcod par 'gyur te/_de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan the tsom 
[\[182b.4\]]dang /_yid gnyis thams cad gcod pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so zhes gsol nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[182b.5\]]gyi rkang pa'i stobs kyis ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar dong ste/_rtag tu dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa the tsom dang yid gnyis thams cad gcod pa zhes bya ba'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs 
[\[182b.6\]]gcig tu 'khod nas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas 'dir mchis so/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcu'i zhabs kyi drung du'ang phyin te/_bcom 
[\[182b.7\]]ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs te/_mya ngan las ma 'das bzhin du thar pa'i mtha' la ji ltar gnas pa de dag thams cad la zhus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'di skad du bka' stsal te/_de bzhin 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de/_de bzhin gshegs pa nged dang gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa de la zhus shig ces gsungs nas/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pas kyang rigs kyi bu khyed gnyis nged la the tsom dang /_yid gnyis thams cad 
[\[183a.2\]]gcod pa'i rnam pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig ces bdag cag 'dir bkye ste mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs shing mya ngan las ma 'das par ji ltar na thar pa'i mtha' la gnas zhes zhus 
[\[183a.3\]]pa dang /_de gnyis kyi tshig gsan nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu myur du slar log shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa des the tsom dang yid gnyis thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid nga yin te/_tha 
[\[183a.4\]]dad pa ni ma yin no/_/de ltar shAkya thub pa ni tshad med do zhes gsungs nas slar bkye'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so zhes gsol te/_sor mo'i phreng ba dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos 
[\[183a.5\]]phyag 'tshal te/_dong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni tshad med grangs med par 'dzin pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid nga yin te/_shAkya 
[\[183a.6\]]thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa des khyod kyi the tsom thams cad gcod par 'gyur gyis/_khyed deng shig ces de dag gis kyang bdag cag slar bkye'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nga nyid de bzhin gshegs pa de yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pa de gsung ngam/_
[\[183a.7\]]de dag gis gsol pa/_de gcig gsung ba bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad gsung ste/_tha mar bdag cag gis zhus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nga nyid de bzhin gshegs pa de yin te/_gcig go zhes gsung ngo /_/bka' stsal pa/_
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ci 'dra/_de gnyis kyis gsol pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su/_bdag cag gis phyin pa thams cad ni gram pa dang /_gyo mo thams 
[\[183b.2\]]cad ma mchis pa/_lag mthil bzhin du mnyam pa/_ka tsa lin di ka bzhin du reg na bde ba/_bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams ltar snyigs ma lnga dang bral ba/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_bud med ma mchis pa theg pa dam pa gcig ste/_theg pa gzhan 
[\[183b.3\]]la mi 'jug go/_/bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi mtshan rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang kha ton legs par byed dam/_'dri'am/_nyan kyang rung ste/_bsting ngam/_brjod dam/_gzhan gyi phyir 'phya'am/_bdag gis brjod na/_bdag 
[\[183b.4\]]'jigs pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/lha thams cad kyang de la gnod par mi byed do/_/de bzhin du klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_dri za la sogs pas kyang mi tshugs so/_/thos nas la la srung bar 
[\[183b.5\]]'gyur/_des 'gro ba bzhi bcad pa yin/_byang chub kyi sems ma skyes pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi rgyu thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo /_/sor mo'i phreng ba gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid ngo mtshar ni gzungs mtshungs pa med pa'i mdo sde chen po las 
[\[183b.6\]]sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig ste/_nga nyid de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid yin no zhes rgya cher bshad do/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsngags pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'ang tshad med pa ste/_de ltar de bzhin 
[\[183b.7\]]gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku yang mtha' yas grangs med de/_de lta bu'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la mi rtag pa dang /_nad lta ga la 'byung /_da de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rtag pa dang /_mtha' yas pa rtsa ba dang bcas/_rgyu dang rkyen du 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]bcas pa'i gtan tshigs thams cad khyed la rgya cher bstan to/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'di na skye bo rnams mi dge bas na/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rgyal po mi bzhed do/_/mi dge ba dge ba la bkod pa'i phyir lus yang dang 
[\[184a.2\]]yang btang bas na/_nga'i lus ma skyes pa'i skur gyur to/_/nga'i lus bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa mang por dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir/_nga'i lus gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi lus re re yang bcad gtubs bcom nas byin pas nga'i lus mi shigs pa 'dus ma 
[\[184a.3\]]byas kyi lus mtshungs pa med par gyur to/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por dpa' bo ltar 'dug ste/_gnas mang por gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi lus mang po btang ste/_lus re re yang bskal pa bye ba mang por dpa' bo ltar 'dug cing dka' ba spyad pas nga'i lus rga ba med pa'i skur 
[\[184a.4\]]gyur to/_/bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par nga nad kyi bskal pa bar mar skyes te/_nga'i lus re re yang sman dam par gyur nas/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams la phan btags pas na/_nga'i lus nad med pa'i skur gyur to/_/nga tshe rabs mang po 
[\[184a.5\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par sems can bye ba mang po ltogs pa'i nad zhi bar byas te/_theg pa gcig pa'i khu ba blud pas na/_nga'i lus mi 'chi ba'i skur gyur to/_/ngas bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par sems can bye ba mang 
[\[184a.6\]]po nyon mongs pa bye ba mang po'i dri ma bsal nas/_shin tu dka' ba bstan te de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan pas na/_nga'i lus nyon mongs pa med pa'i skur gyur to/_/nga tshe rabs gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par sems can yi 
[\[184a.7\]]dgas bye ba mang po skom zhing ltogs pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byas te/_theg pa gcig pa'i chos tshim par byas pas na/_gang gA'i klung mang po'i bye ma snyed du nga'i lus zag pa med pa'i skur gyur to/_/nga tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]mang po grangs med par lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po la ma dang /_sring mo dang /_bu bzhin du sdug par byas pas na/_nga'i lus gnod pa med pa'i skur gyur to/_/nga tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par lha 
[\[184b.2\]]dang /_mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po la mi bden par smra ba rnams theg pa chen po'i bden pa la bkod pas na/_nga'i lus bden pa rtag pa'i skur gyur to/_/nga tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par lha dang /_mir bcas 
[\[184b.3\]]pa'i sems can bye ba mang po chos ma yin pa byed pa rnams 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi rnam pa la bkod pas na/_nga'i lus chos kyi skur gyur to/_/nga tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par lha dang /_mir bcas 
[\[184b.4\]]pa'i sems can bye ba mang po log par lta ba'i dbang du gyur pa rnams yang dag par lta ba la bkod pas na/_nga'i lus shin tu bde ba'i skur gyur to/_/nga tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems 
[\[184b.5\]]can bye ba mang po 'jigs skrag par gyur pa rnams 'jigs pa med pa la bkod pas na/_nga'i lus dge ba'i skur gyur to/_/nga tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po mya ngan 
[\[184b.6\]]chen por gyur pa rnams mya ngan med pa'i chos la bkod pas na/_nga'i lus mya ngan med pa'i mya ngan dang bral ba'i skur gyur to/_/nga tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can mang po gzhan gyi 
[\[184b.7\]]chung ma la chags pa rnams tshul khrims chen po'i go cha la bkod pas na/_nga'i lus rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i skur gyur to/_/nga tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par sems can bye ba mang po skyon chags pa'i ya 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]mtshan can rnams bsdus te/_rab tu sbyangs pas dam pa'i chos la bkod pas na/_nga'i lus shag shig med de/_shag shig med pa'i chos kyi skur gyur to//_//bam po drug pa/_/nga tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa 
[\[185a.2\]]bye ba mang po grangs med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po dbul por gyur pa rnams chos kyi nor dang gter byin pas na/_nga'i lus tshul med pa las tshul gyi chos kyi skur gyur to/_/nga tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med 
[\[185a.3\]]par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po 'dod pa'i dbang du gyur pa rnams nyon mongs pa med pa la bkod pas na/_nga'i lus gtse ba dang bral zhing gtse ba med pa'i chos kyi skur gyur to/_/nga tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs 
[\[185a.4\]]med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po nyon mongs pa sprugs shing /_sbrul gdug pa'i dug med par byas pas na/_nga'i lus nad 'go ba med cing nad 'go ba dang bral ba'i chos kyi skur gyur to/_/nga tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po 
[\[185a.5\]]grangs med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po 'jig rten na rtsa lag med pa la pha rol du phyin pa'i chos kyis rtsa lag tu byas pas/_nga'i lus ma byas pa'i chos gsal ba'i skur gyur to/_/nga tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po 
[\[185a.6\]]grangs med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi gtam bsnyad pas na/_nga'i lus ci yang med pa'i skur gyur to/_/nga tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba 
[\[185a.7\]]mang po grangs med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po rnams/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsal ba dang ngo mtshar la bkod pas na/_nga'i lus ngo mtshar gyi skur gyur to/_/nga tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]grangs med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po rnams sangs rgyas su sbyor du btsud pas/_nga'i lus tshad med dpag tu med pa'i mchog dam pa'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par lha dang 
[\[185b.2\]]mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po rnams bsgral ba'i phyir rigs de dang der skye ba bstan te/_rab tu bsgral bas na/_nga'i lus mchog dam pa'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par lha dang mir bcas 
[\[185b.3\]]pa'i sems can bye ba mang po rnams 'jigs pa thams cad las bsgral te/_byang chub pa la bkod pas na/_nga'i lus bla na med pa'i chos kyi skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par sems can bye ba mang 
[\[185b.4\]]po rnams yan lag ma tshang ba'i lus kyis 'jig rten gyi phyir 'gro bar byas te/_sems can mang po byang chub la bkod pas na/_nga'i lus bla na med pa'i chos kyi skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par ngas 
[\[185b.5\]]'jig rten rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rtag pa'i dbyings ma bcabs te/_sems can thams cad la phan par bstan pas na/_nga'i lus rtag pa'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med 
[\[185b.6\]]par ngas tshul khrims srung ba na/_lha'i bu mo dang /_bdud kyi bu mo dang /_'jig rten pa bzang mo mthong yang sems ma btang bas nga'i lus mi 'jig pa'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par sems can 
[\[185b.7\]]bye ba mang po thams cad kyi bla ma'i chung ma dang /_phu nu bo'i chung ma dang /_bud med thams cad la chags par ma byas pas na/_nga'i lus mi 'jig pa'i chos kyi skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par lha 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po rnams kyi nyes pa mtha' yas pa zad par byas pas na/_nga'i lus mtshungs pa med pa mtha' yas pa'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par 
[\[186a.2\]]sems can bye ba mang po dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba rnams chos zab mo la bkod pas na/_nga'i lus zab mo'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nam mkha'i bya rjes 
[\[186a.3\]]bzhin du bstan te/_sangs rgyas kyi dbyings gsal bar byas pas na/_nga'i lus bltar mi mthong ba'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par sems can bye ba mang po bdag med par 'dzin pa las bzlog ste/_
[\[186a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po blta dka' ba bstan pas na/_nga'i lus sems can thams cad kyis blta dka' ba'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can rnams srog 
[\[186a.5\]]gcod pa las bzlog ste/_dam pa'i chos la bkod pas na/_nga'i sku shin tu phra ba'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po chos kyi dga' ba bskyed pas na/_nga'i 
[\[186a.6\]]lus mkhas pa'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs mang po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'jam dpal lta bur dbyings bstan pas na/_nga'i lus blta 
[\[186a.7\]]dka' ba'i skur gyur to/_/bskal pa grangs med pa mang por ngas sems can bye ba mang po rnams bcings pa thams cad dang bral bar byas te/_thar pa'i gnas su rab tu bkod pas/_de las nga'i lus blta dka' ba'i skur gyur to/_/grangs med pa mang por ngas lha 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]dang mi dang /_sems can dmyal ba pa rnams la sems can bye ba mang po dag srid pa thams cad du gnas su ma bcug ste/_thar pa de kho na nyid la bkod pas/_de las nga'i lus thams cad du kun gzhi med pa'i skur gyur to/_/grangs med pa mang por ngas sems can 
[\[186b.2\]]bye ba mang po la bdag dang 'jig rten snyam du ma bsams te/_sems can thams cad sgra gcan zin bzhin du bltas pas/_de las nga'i lus nyon mongs pa med pa'i skur gyur to/_/grangs med pa mang por ngas lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po bslab 
[\[186b.3\]]pa'i gnas lnga la rnam par dag par byas pas nga'i lus rus pa dang /_rgyus pa dang /_yan lag rnam par dag pa'i skur gyur to/_/grangs med pa mang por ngas sems can thams cad dgrol lo zhes dam bcas te/_legs par bya ba'i smon lam btab pas sems 
[\[186b.4\]]can rnams bsgral te/_de'i phyir nga'i lus thams cad las grol ba'i skur gyur to/_/grangs med pa mang por ngas sems can bye ba mang po rnams ngan par lta ba'i nad zug rngu rnam pa mang po phyung ste/_de kho na'i chos la rab tu bkod pas/_de las nga'i lus zhi ba rtag pa'i skur 
[\[186b.5\]]gyur to/_/grangs med pa mang po tshe rabs mang por sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa sgra gcan 'dzin ltar nges par lta zhing /_de bzhin du gzhan yang btsud pas de las nga'i lus zhi gnas kyi skur gyur to/_/grangs med pa mang por ngas sems can bye ba mang po 
[\[186b.6\]]rnams rtog pa thams cad spangs nas rab tu bzung ste/_dgra mthong na yang bsten cing chog shes pa dang /_yo byad bsnyungs shing gzhan yang de la btsud pas de'i phyir nga'i lus nye bar zhi ba'i skur gyur to/_/tshe rabs grangs med pa mang por ngas sems can bye ba mang 
[\[186b.7\]]po zang zing spangs nas nyan thos kyi chog shes pa tsam bstan pas de las nga'i lus nem nur gyi tshul thams cad bcad pa pha rol du phyin pa'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs grangs med pa mang por sems can bye ba mang po nya dang /_sha dang /_tshil dang /_gsod pa'i 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]zas rnams spangs te/_sems can rnams kyang de bzhin du spong du bcug pas/_de las nga'i lus bzang po'i skur gyur to/_/tshe rabs grangs med pa mang por ngas lha dang mir bcas pa'i sems can bye ba mang po nyon mongs pa bye ba mang po thams cad sbyong du 
[\[187a.2\]]bcug pas/_de las nga'i lus spros pa med pa'i skur gyur to/_/tshe rabs grangs med pa mang por ngas sems can skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can bye ba mang po rnams la lce 'bab pa lta bur de dag gi go skabs bcom ste/_skye bo med par byas pas de las nga'i lus 
[\[187a.3\]]kun gzhi bcom pa'i skur gyur to/_/grangs med pa mang por ngas phyin ci log bzhis 'khyams pa'i sems can bye ba mang po chos kyi khu ba zhim po blud pas/_de las nga'i lus sprul pa'i tshangs pa ltar lha'i lus su gyur to/_/grangs med pa mang por ngas sems can bye ba mang 
[\[187a.4\]]po rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dben pa dang /_rtag pa'i tshol ba la nyes pa dang ma bsre shig ces drang por byas pas/_de las nga'i lus dben zhing rnam par grol ba'i skur gyur to/_/tshe rabs mang po grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/_ngas sems 
[\[187a.5\]]can bye ba mang po rnams la sangs rgyas kyi tshig go zhes sor mo'i rtse mos zla ba bstan pa bzhin du bkod pas/_de las nga'i lus so sor bral ba'i skur gyur to/_/tshe rabs grangs med pa mang por yongs su mya ngan las bzla bas yongs su mya ngan las zlo zhing shin tu 
[\[187a.6\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas kyang /_yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas te/_de'i phyir nga'i lus chos nyid kyis chos kyi skur gyur to/_/tshe rabs grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma mang po snyed du/_ngas sems can bye ba mang po rnams la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[187a.7\]]pa'i snying po la shin tu nan tan du btsal kyang dri ma med do zhes bstan pas/_de las nga'i lus dbyings kyi skur gyur to/_/dbyings de yang sems can thams cad la yod de/_grangs med pa mang por ngas theg pa chen po chags pa med pa'i ye shes bdag med pa bdag 
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]dang bral ba'i sgo bstan pas/_de'i 'bras bus nga'i lus skye mched med pa'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma mang po snyed du/_sems can bye ba mang po dag rtag par rab tu nyon mongs pa mang po btul ba la btsud pas/_de las 
[\[187b.2\]]nga'i lus dge ba 'jig rten las 'das pa bla ma'i skur gyur to/_/nga tshe rabs grangs med pa mang por sems can thams cad kyi rten du gyur te/_skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs/_gnyen med pa rnams kyi gnyen du gyur pas/_de las nga'i lus chu bo sin d+hu rgya mtsho la 
[\[187b.3\]]'bab pa lta bu'i skur gyur to/_/nga tshe rabs grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma mang po snyed du/_mdo sde 'chad pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston pa la 'jigs pa'am/_skrag pa'i sems ma bskyed pas/_de las nga'i lus brtan pa'i skur gyur to/_/
[\[187b.4\]]nga tshe rabs grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma mang po snyed du/_ngang pa ltar dkar ba'i khang pa yang thog nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i srid dang /_bde ba mang po spangs te/_nags khrod du zhugs pas de las nga'i lus gnas lta bu'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs 
[\[187b.5\]]grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma mang po snyed du lhod pa rnams kyi spyod pa rtag tu gdol pa ltar ring du spangs te/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa dam pa rnams dang /_gnas cig na 'khod pa'i tshe chu phor gang tsam yang blangs par mi dran te/_de'i phyir de las ngas 'gyod pa 
[\[187b.6\]]med pa'i sku thob po/_/ngas tshe rabs grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma mang po snyed du/_nyon mongs pa'i khur yang bar byas pas/_de las nga'i lus rab tu sbyangs pa dang gsal ba'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma mang po snyed 
[\[187b.7\]]du/_rgyal po'i bu dper byas te/_khyim na gnas pa'i nyes pa spangs pas/_de las nga'i lus mi tshol ba'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma mang po snyed du/_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /_gti mug spangs shing nyon mongs pa'i 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]phung po zad par byas pas/_de las nga'i lus nad med pa dang /_'jigs pa med pa dang /_nga rgyal med pa'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs grangs med pa'i gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/_sems can lha mi mang po rnams la bud med dang rtse ba'i nyon mongs pa bye 
[\[188a.2\]]ba ni sbrul gdug pa'i dug lta bur smad pas/_de las nga'i lus 'gog pa'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma mang po snyed du/_de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas byis pa'i spyod pa lta bu bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas/_
[\[188a.3\]]de bzhin nyid du nan tan byas te/_mdo sde la smod pa rnams la theg pa chen po bshad pas/_de las nga'i lus gnas med pa'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma mang po snyed du/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos nas/_bskal pa bye ba mang 
[\[188a.4\]]por sems can rnams kyis nyon mongs pa gzhig par byas nas sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar yid ches pa'i phyir/_sems can bye ba kun gyi skyabs su 'gyur bar spyad pa brtsams te/_de'i 'bras bus nga'i lus skyabs kyi skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs grangs med pa gang gA'i 
[\[188a.5\]]klung gi bye ma mang po snyed du/_byang chub sems dpa'i bzod par smra ba'i drang srong du gyur pa'i tshe/_tshad med pa bzhi la bsgoms pas/_de'i 'bras bus nga'i lus da dung yang sems can thams cad kyi skyabs kyi skur gyur to/_/theg pa chen po/_theg pa gcig pa/_bla na 
[\[188a.6\]]med pa'i ye shes/_chags pa med pa'i ye shes 'od chen po sems can thams cad kyi dpung gnyen gyi ye shes ngas bstan pas/_sdig pa grangs med par byas pa yang theg pa chen po thos nas 'byang bar 'gyur te/_de'i phyir nga'i lus ni dpung gnyen gyi skur gyur to/_/ngas 
[\[188a.7\]]tshe rabs grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma mang po snyed du dbyings dang /_bde ba'i dbyings sems can thams cad kyi dbyings dri ma med pa'i snying po gnod pa med pa rab tu bsngags so/_/rab tu bsngags pa'i 'bras bu des nga'i lus gnod pa med pa'i skur gyur to/_/
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]ngas tshe rabs grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma mang po snyed du/_sems can lha mi bye ba mang po rnams gnas med pa'i thar pa'i go 'phang la bkod pas/_de las nga'i lus go skabs med cing gtso bo'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi 
[\[188b.2\]]bye ma snyed du/_sems can skyes pa dang /_bud med mang po rnams pha ma dang /_sring mo lta bur 'du shes pa'i sems la bkod pas/_nga'i lus thams cad du pha bzhin du bla ma'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/_mu ge chen 
[\[188b.3\]]po'i bskal pa bar ma la bdag gzhan gyi longs spyod rnam pa mang po byas pas/_de las nga'i lus thams cad du skom pa med cing dang ba'i rnam pa lha'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma mang po snyed du/_sems can bye ba rnam pa mang po 
[\[188b.4\]]gsod par 'dod cing smra ba tshe rabs mang por smad pas de las nga'i lus phung po thams cad dang bral ba'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs mang por thabs dam pa'i sku chos kyi sku sman pa'i mchog gis brtan pa'i sku mtha' yas pa bstan pa ltar dge ba'i rgyu rnam par spel ba 
[\[188b.5\]]de las nga'i sku 'du byed zhi ba'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma mang po snyed du/_sems can bye ba mang po rnams bsgral cing /_rang gi nyon mongs pa rnams zad par byas te/_bdag nyid kyi dbyings skyu ru ra'i 'bru bzhin du bstan pas/_
[\[188b.6\]]de las nga'i lus chos ma yin pa bcad pa'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma mang po snyed du/_sems can bye ba mang po thams cad la khams bzhi po ni sbrul gdug pa'i dug bzhin du ste/_rtag tu snod stong pa bzhin du stong ngo zhes 
[\[188b.7\]]rab tu smad pas de las nga'i lus thos pa'i rgyu 'dra bar skyes pa sha dang /_rgyus pa med pa'i skur gyur to/_/ngas tshe rabs grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma mang po snyed du/_srid pa'i sems can bye ba mang po thams cad nyon mongs pa bye ba las 'dod chags dang 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]bral ba 'gog pa mya ngan las bzla bar yongs su mya ngan las bzlas so/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas/_de las nga'i lus mya ngan las 'das pa mi g.yo ba bde ba'i skur gyur to/_/sor mo'i phreng ba bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba mang por 'di nyid na 
[\[189a.2\]]'dug bzhin du nga ni thams cad na gnas te/_mya ngan las 'das pa gang yin pa de ni thar pa'o/_/thar pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid do/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng bas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye ma'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[189a.3\]]'das ni dka' ba mdzad pa ste/_sems can thams cad la rjes su thugs brtse ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sor mo'i phreng ba de bzhin gshegs pa yang shin tu dka' ba mdzad pa yin te/_nam ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos lo brgyad cu'i 
[\[189a.4\]]bar du gnas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/_theg pa chen po'i mdo sde de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston pa de ni sems can thams cad la phan par ston cing shin tu bya dka' ba byed pa'o/_/sems can gang dag de'i phyogs 'dzin pa de dag kyang shin tu bya dka' ba byed par bstan 
[\[189a.5\]]to/_/sems can gang rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos nas/_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa'i sems can de dag kyang shin tu bya dka' ba byed pa'o/_/sor mo'i phreng bas gsol pa/_shin tu dka' ba bgyid pa de ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[189a.6\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di lta ste dper na/_sa chen po ni khur chen po bzhi khyer te/_khur bzhi gang zhe na/_chu'i phung po chen po'i khur dang /_ri'i khur dang /_phyi rol gyi rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_shing gi khur dang /_sems can thams cad khur du khyer ba ste/_
