[\[189a.7\]]de ltar na sa ni khur chen po bzhi khyer ba'o/_/sor mo'i phreng bas gsol pa/_lci'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sa ni khur chen po khyer ba ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sa bas gzhan lhag par khur khyer ba yod do/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]'das skyes bu dam pa de gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_nam dam pa'i chos lo brgyad cu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/_sems can thams cad la phan par ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston na/_khur bzhi khyer 
[\[189b.2\]]bar 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can rnams gsad do zhes rab tu rgyu spyod de/_'jigs pa khyad du bsad nas rang gi srog kyang btang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston pa de ni ri'i phung po bas ches lci ba'i khur dang po'o/_/de dag la sogs 
[\[189b.3\]]pa'i skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan can mang po rjes su ston pa la khro ba dang /_'dod chen po'i tshig thos nas de dag la bzod pa ni chu'i phung po las lhag pa'i khur de ni gnyis pa'o/_/rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_dmag dpon dang /_dbang phyug rnams chos mnyan pa dang /_chos 
[\[189b.4\]]kyi gtam mnyan pa mi rnyed pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rgyas par ston cing gang de'i phyogs 'dzin pa dbang phyug dang /_dmag dpon dang /_blon po chos mi thos pa de dag la yang 'chi ba'i chos ston cing 'gro ba ngan pa 'chal pa'i blo can dang 'on pa dang /_long ba thos pa 
[\[189b.5\]]mi rnyed pa la chos rnams ston pa ni sems can thams cad kyi khur bas lci ba'i khur gsum pa'o/_/kla klo'i yul gnas par dka' ba mal stan rnyed par dka' zhing kha zas ngan pa/_gos ngan pa/_mal cha ngan pa/_mu ge dang /_'khrug pa mang po dang /_'gro ba rnams 
[\[189b.6\]]rtsod pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_bud med la bag med pa tsam gyi yul la sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa la bzod pa byed par byed pa la sogs te/_sdug bsngal thams cad kyis reg cing /_grong dang /_ri brags kyi grong dang /_lung pa'i nang dang /_tshong dus dang /_rtsed mo'i sa 
[\[189b.7\]]dang /_bu ram shing dang /_'bras thub po che dang /_sA lu dang /_gro dang /_nas dang /_ka ra sa dang /_bya ra dza dang /_bram ze'i gnas na 'dug pa mi rnyed pa'i gnas la dam pa'i chos ston pa de ni rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_shing dang /_rdo bas lhag par khur lci ba'i khur chen po bzhi 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]pa'o/_/khur chen po de bzhi gang ston pa de ni khur chen po khyer ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te/_dam pa'i chos lo brgyad cu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe rang gi srog kyang bor te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rab tu ston pa dang /_gang de'i phyogs 'dzin 
[\[190a.2\]]pa'i 'gro ba de dag kyang shin tu dka' ba byed pa'o/_/'gro ba gang rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos nas yid ches pa de dag kyang shin tu dka' ba byed pa'o/_/gzhan yang sor mo'i phreng ba de bzhin gshegs pa ni dka' ba byed pa ma yin gyi/_yang rab tu dka' ba byed pa yod 
[\[190a.3\]]de bstan to/_/'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu la la zhig tshe dpag tu med par gyur te/_lo bye ba tshad med pa snyed du skra'i rtse mo tsam gyis rgya mtsho'i chu phyags te 'dug nas/_yang lo bye ba dpag tu med pa 'das shing skra'i rtse mos rgya mtsho'i chu phyags te/_de lta bu'i rgya mtsho thams 
[\[190a.4\]]cad phyags te/_ba lang gi rjes kyi chu tsam du byas na de dka' ba byed pa yin nam/_'on te ma yin/_gsol pa/_de ni shin tu dka' ba bgyid pa'i mthar phyin pa ste/_dka' ba bgyid pa'o zhes mchi mi nus so/_/bka' stsal pa/_de ni dka' ba byed pa ma yin te/_de ci'i 
[\[190a.5\]]phyir zhe na/_gzhan yang shin tu dka' ba byed pa yod do/_/de gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_nam dam pa'i chos lo brgyad cu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/_gang bdag gi srog kyang btang nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston pa de ni shin tu dka' ba byed 
[\[190a.6\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o/_/gzhan yang sor mo'i phreng ba de bzhin gshegs pa ni dka' ba byed pa ma yin te/_shin tu dka' ba byed pa gzhan yang yod do/_/'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu la la zhig gis ri rab ri'i rgyal po dang /_sa dang rgya 
[\[190a.7\]]mtsho chen por bcas te/_bdag gi phrag pa la thogs nas lo bye ba'i bar du 'dug na skyes bu de ci 'dra/_stobs dang ldan pa yin nam/_'on te ma yin/_de shin tu dka' ba byed pa ci 'dra/_gsol pa/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul te/_nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi yul ma lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_de ni stobs dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/_dka' ba byed pa'ang ma yin te/_rgya mtsho'i chu thams cad rdul phra mo'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyis/_lo bye ba dang /_bskal pa mang por phyags te/_ba lang gi rjes kyi chu tsam du byed 
[\[190b.2\]]nus shing /_sa dang /_ri rab dang /_chu bo dang /_rgya mtshor bcas te/_bskal pa mang por khur khyer nus kyang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_nam dam pa'i chos lo brgyad cu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe skye bo phal pas kyang dam pa'i chos ston mi nus/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[190b.3\]]pa'i snying po yang 'chad mi nus pa de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' mi'i glang po sems can thams cad la phan par ston pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston cing /_dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur te/_de ni shin tu dka' ba byed par bstan to/_/gzhan yang 
[\[190b.4\]]sor mo'i phreng ba stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams me'i phung po rab tu 'bar ba la khyor ba'i chus zhi bar nus sam/_gsol pa/_ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du zhe na/_rgya mtsho'i chab kyis kyang me de zhi bar mi nus te/_khyor ba'i chab 
[\[190b.5\]]kyis ni khyim rab tu 'bar ba la yang zhi bar mi nus na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po lta ga la nus/_bka' stsal pa/_sor mo'i phreng ba de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i phyogs bri/_ngang tshul ngan pa'i phyogs 'phel ba'i dus 
[\[190b.6\]]na/_nam dam pa'i chos lo brgyad cu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi srog kyang btang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he la sogs pa'i nor ngan pa rnam pa mang po yang byin nas 
[\[190b.7\]]dam pa'i chos phyung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston pa'i skyes bu dam pa de ci 'dra/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das nyid mkhyen te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis mi rig go/_/de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi chos rnam par dag pa yang bshad 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]dka' na/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnam par dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan pa lta ci smos/_de ltar skyes bu dam pa de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i me'i phung po rab tu 'bar ba khyor ba'i chus zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du der mchi 
[\[191a.2\]]zhing /_shin tu dka' ba bgyid pa de ni skyes bu de gzhan ma lags kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid lags pa snyam bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/ngas kyang tshig de skad smras so/_/skyes bu de shin tu 
[\[191a.3\]]dka' ba byed pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskal pa bye ba snyed du yon tan bshad kyang de'i mtha' mi rnyed do/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung por chu bo thams cad 'bab pa mi mngon pa de bzhin du skyes bu de'i blo'i nang du 
[\[191a.4\]]'jig rten thams cad kyi blo de'i nang du zhugs par mi snang ngo /_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu rgya mtsho chen po ni sems can gyi ro thams cad mthar 'byin pa de bzhin du skyes bu dam pa de yang mig zur yang mi lta/_khyim la chags pa yang med/_chos dang mi ldan pa 
[\[191a.5\]]rnams dang rigs 'dres pa yang med/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la smod pa byed pa rnams kyang spangs te/_skyes bu dam pa de lta bu ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa'o/_/gang de'i phyogs 'dzin cing nyan pa de dag kyang /_nga'i nyan thos shin tu dka' ba byed pa yin no/_/
[\[191a.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid du dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsar lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu mtshan nyid brgyad dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsar yin 
[\[191a.7\]]no/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_chos la sems pa dang /_rtog cing gzhig pa dang /_len cing 'dzin pa dang /_pha ma la sri zhu che ba dang /_rang gi slob dpon la byas pa gzo ba dang /_lta ba thams cad dang mi 'thun pa dang /_mtshan ma thams cad la khyad du gsod cing 'dul 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]ba la mkhas pa dang /_mi rung ba thams cad spong ba dang /_'dod pa med pa'i sems 'di lta ste/_rmi lam na yang khu ba mi 'byung zhing tshul khrims la gus par byed pa'i mtshan nyid de dag dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' gsar yin no/_/yang mtshan nyid brgyad 
[\[191b.2\]]dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' gsar yin te/_brgyad gang zhe na/_theg pa chen po ston pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po gsal bar ston cing gtong ba dang ldan pa dang /_zang zing la mi brkam pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_
[\[191b.3\]]btang snyoms su ldan pa dang /_sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du lta ba dang /_de dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong ba dang /_rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chog shes pa ste/_mtshan nyid brgyad po de dag dang ldan 
[\[191b.4\]]na/_byang chub sems dpa' gsar yin no/_/yang mtshan nyid brgyad dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' gsar yin te/_brgyad gang zhe na/_phan pa dang /_ran pa dang /_'jam par smra ba dga' ba dang /_nyon mongs pa chung ba dang /_bzod pa dang ldan pa dang /_
[\[191b.5\]]mdo sde'i mtha' thams cad nyan pa la bzod pa dang /_mig gnyid thul ba dang /_snyom las med de ldang zhing bag yod pa dang /_bslab pa la mos pa ste/_mtshan nyid brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' gsar yin no/_/yang mtshan nyid 
[\[191b.6\]]brgyad dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' gsar yin te/_brgyad gang zhe na/_bden pa dang gtsang ba dang /_gtsang sbra byed pa dang /_mkhas pa dang /_'od dang ldan zhing gzugs bzang ba dang /_bud med dang 'grogs pa spong ba dang /_gnyen gyi khyim nas 
[\[191b.7\]]ring du lta ba dang /_gtse ba de dang des sdig pa'i dge sbyong thams cad la 'jigs pa dang /_thos ma thag tu lus kyi spu langs par 'gyur ba dang /_srog chags thams cad la byams shing snying brtse ba ste/_mtshan nyid brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/_byang chub 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]sems dpa' gsar yin no/_/yang mtshan nyid brgyad dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' gsar yin te/_brgyad gang zhe na/_bdud kyis bshad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i bye brag shes pa dang /_mdo sde shes pa la bkur 
[\[192a.2\]]sti byed pa dang /_'dul ba dang /_'dul ba ma yin pa'i bye brag shes te mi 'chab pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa la mkhas pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa shes/_'jig rten gyi phyir 'brang bar bya ba shes/_de bzhin 
[\[192a.3\]]gshegs pa rtag pa nyid du shes pa/_sdig pa dang /_sdig pa med pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba la mkhas pa/_yul dang /_dus dang /_ye shes dang /_bdag gi nus pa dang /_rab tu shes pa ste/_mtshan nyid brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/_byang chub sems 
[\[192a.4\]]dpa' gsar yin no/_/mtshan nyid bzhi bcu po de dag dang ldan te/_lus dran pa'i chos dang ldan pa de gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' gsar zhes bya'o/_/gang la yon tan bzhi bcu med de phyed dam/_phyed kyi yang phyed yod pa de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag 
[\[192a.5\]]par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mor rig par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpar brtse bar mi gtogs so/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa'o/_/de la yon tan gyi mchog gang zhe na/_g.yem pa'i 'du shes med cing 
[\[192a.6\]]rmi lam na yang khu ba mi 'byung ba de ni rgyu dang bcas pa'i mir rig par bya ste/_byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad kyi yon tan gyi mchog go/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po de bzhin 
[\[192a.7\]]gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bshad pa de'i don ci/_gal te sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod na/_sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/_sems can thams cad kyis srog gcod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra ba dang /_chang 'thung 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]ba dang /_'khrig pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_mi dge ba'i las kyi lam thams cad byar rung ngam/_gal te sangs rgyas kyi dbyings sems can thams cad la yod na gang gi tshe bsgral zhing rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/_gal te sangs rgyas kyi dbyings yod na/_thams cad 
[\[192b.2\]]kyis kyang mtshams med pa dang /_'dod chen pa'i las bya bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te sems can thams cad la bdag gi dbyings yod na/_bdag nyid sgrol bar 'gyur te/_las kyi rnam par smin pa la bdag gi dbyings med pas na/_de'i phyir 'jig rten dang bdag la dbyings 
[\[192b.3\]]med de/_thams cad la bdag med pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod de/_nyon mongs pa bye bas g.yogs nas bum pa'i nang gi mar me bzhin du 
[\[192b.4\]]'dug go/_/gzhan yang 'jam dpal 'dul sbyong byed pa'i bu gcig bcom ldan 'das 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis de ring nas lo bdun na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal 
[\[192b.5\]]por 'gyur ro/_/nga yang zhag bdun na yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes lung bstan nas/_'dul sbyong byed pa'i bu de rab tu dga' ba skyes nas/_bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung bstan te/_gdon mi za bar 'gyur snyam nas dga' 
[\[192b.6\]]ches te/_rang gi ma la smras pa/_ma nya dang /_sha dang /_'o ma dang /_til gyi la du dang /_zho dang /_do ba dang /_khu ba dang /_'bru drus pa dag stsol cig_/stobs chen por bya'o zhes thams cad bsres te zos nas/_dus ma yin pa tsam gyis shi nas bdag nyid shi ba/_bdag 
[\[192b.7\]]nyid kyis nyams par byas na/_ci bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gsung ngam/_de ste thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin/_'on tam de la 'khor los sgyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_bsod nams rnam par smin pa med dam/_gsol pa/_de sngon las ngan pa 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]bgyis pas gum mo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de skad ma zer cig_/de ni dus ma yin pa tsam bab pa ste/_sngon las ngan pa byas pa ma yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lung ston pa na/_des sngon las 
[\[193a.2\]]byas pa mi mkhyen par lung bstan re skan/_de ni sngon las ngan pa byas pas shi ba ma yin gyi/_bdag nyid kyis nyes te/_bdag gis bsad do/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du skyes pa'am bud med kyang rung ste/_gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bdag la yod pas 
[\[193a.3\]]de nyid sgrol bar 'gyur gyis sdig pa bya'o snyam ste sdig pa byas na de ci bdag gi dbyings sgrol bar 'gyur ram/_sngar bshad pa bzhin te/_'dul sbyong byed pa'i bu ltar dbyings yod kyang mi sgrol lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de nyid bag med pa mang ba dag bag med pa'i phyir chos 
[\[193a.4\]]kyi dbyings kyis mi sgrol lo/_/ci sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi dbyings med dam/_sangs rgyas kyi dbyings ni rgyal thabs kyi rnam par smin pa bzhin du sems can thams cad la yod do/_/sangs rgyas [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gsung ba yin nam/_sangs rgyas ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]
[\[193a.5\]]gsung ba ma yin te/_sems can [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra ba rnams bag med par myos shing bstan pa thos nas kyang de dag rang gi nyes pas sangs rgyas thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_sems can thams cad la sngon bgyis pa'i las ma mchis zhes bgyi'am/_bka' stsal pa/_
[\[193a.6\]]mdo sde las yod ces 'byung mod kyi/_thos pa tsam gyis grangs med pa'i yang grangs med par byas pa'i las rnams zad par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa mang po nas/_'jig rten gyi phyir dam bcas te bdag 
[\[193a.7\]]grol nas sems can thams cad dgrol lo/_/bdag brgal nas sems can thams cad bsgral lo zhes de ltar dam bcas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyis las byas pa ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]yang 'di lta ste dper na/_'jam dpal sprin dang /_khug rna dang /_ba mo'i dri ma dang /_nyes pa rnams ni ji tsam du nyi ma ma shar ba de tsam du 'jig rten la sgrib kyi/_nyi ma shar ma thag tu se gol gtogs pa srid kyis zad par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sdig 
[\[193b.2\]]pa'i phung po grangs med par byas pa yang mdo sde 'di'i nyi ma ma shar ba de tsam du sems can thams cad 'khor ba bye bar kun du 'khor gyi mdo sde 'di'i nyi ma shar ma thag tu sdig pa'i phung po grangs med par byas pa yang se gol gtogs pa srid kyis zad par 'gyur 
[\[193b.3\]]ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la 'phyas pa'am/_sting ba'am/_kha gcus pa'am/_gzhan gyi phyir 'brang ba'am/_'di las phyi rol par gyur pa'am/_phas pham pa'am/_mtshams med pa byas par gyur pa/_grangs med par sdig pa byas pa de 
[\[193b.4\]]yang thang cig tsam gyis zad par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems ma bskyed pa yang byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa de'i smon lam gyi bye 
[\[193b.5\]]brag gis bdag dang 'jig rten gyi phyir bdag grol nas dgrol lo/_/'khor ba bye ba na gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can rnams dam pa'i chos bye bas sad par byas te/_'jam dpal de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pas/_byang chub sems dpar 
[\[193b.6\]]'gyur te/_bdag nyid kyis nyon mongs pa bye ba gcad pa'i phyir rings par bya'o/_/de las nga'i lus 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal ngas bshad pa/_ngas ni mya ngan gyi zug rngu bcad pa'i lam bstan te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa yin gyis da khyed kyis 
[\[193b.7\]]nan tan gyis shig ces ngas lam bstan to/_/lam bstan pa rnam pa gnyis te/_rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'i lam dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam mo/_/de la nyan thos kyi theg pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/_/
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i lam zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod de/_nga'i dbyings su ngas mi g.yo ba thob pa ltar/_bde bar gshegs pas dgongs pa'i tshul gyis/_nyon mongs pa bye ba gcad par bya'o/_/gal te 
[\[194a.2\]]ma bcad na nges par 'khor ba'i 'khor lor yongs su 'phyan to zhes mya ngan gyi zug rngu gcad pa'i lam ngas bstan to/_/mya ngan ces bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i don to/_/zug rngu 'byin pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/bdag gis nyon mongs pa 
[\[194a.3\]]bye ba gzhom pa ni sman pa ltar skyug pa dang /_bkru ba dang /_brtol ba'i don byed pa ste/_khyed kyang rang bzhin gyis nga la bsnyen bkur gyis shig dang ngas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to/_/da khyed kyis nan tan gyis shig ces bya ba de ni dgongs 
[\[194a.4\]]te gsungs pa'i don to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni ston pa'o zhes bya ba yang skye ba 'di chod cig chod cig_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin no/_/dad pa phun sum tshogs pa ni gser gyi gram bu bzhin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[194a.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mnyes par byed pa ni rus sbal zhar ba gnya' shing gi bu gar 'jug pa bzhin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mdo sde 'di don med par ma byed cig_/tshe dang 'tsho ba'i 'bras bu yod par gyis shig_/bdag nyid srid 
[\[194a.6\]]pa thams cad dang /_nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad las sgrol cig_/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni ston pa ste/_bsod nams la g.yel bar byed kyang sdig pa la yid mi dga'o/_/ngas nyan thos kyi theg pa las bstan te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying 
[\[194a.7\]]po ni shin tu rnyed par dka'o/_/'jig rten na dpe med de de ltar shin tu rnyed par dka'o/_/'jig rten na dpe med kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la myur du ltos te/_de ltar gyis shig pa'i don to/_/sdig pa la yid mi dga' zhes bshad pa de'i don ci/_de'i 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]don bshad par bya'o/_/sems ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa ste/_dge slong rnams mi dge ba'i grogs po'i sten gyi nyes pas dri ma lnga la sogs pa dri ma mang pos mdun du byas shing bskor to/_/dri ma lnga la sogs pa gang zhe na/_'dod pa dang /_sred pa dang /_gnod 
[\[194b.2\]]sems mang ba dang /_rmugs pa dang /_gnyid dang gsum ste/_rgod pa dang /_the tsom de lnga ni sems sun 'byin pa'o/_/dri ma lnga la sogs te/_dri ma mang po rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o/_/sems rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i dbang du 
[\[194b.3\]]brtson par bya'o/_/rings par rings par zhes bya ba ni ji tsam du mdo sde spong bar ma gyur pa dang /_ji tsam du 'dod chen par ma gyur pa de tsam du bdag nyid bsgral ba'i phyir brtson par gyis shig_/tshig de'i don ni 'di yin te/_sems bzhin du nyon mongs pa blo bur gyi 
[\[194b.4\]]dri ma bye ba rtsa ba nas brko ba ni rings par rings par zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to/_/yid ni chos kyi sngon du 'gro/_/yid gtso yid kyi rang bzhin te/_/yid ni rab tu dang ba yis/_/byed pa dang ni smra ba dag_/de dag bde dang ldan par 'gyur/_/grib ma bzhin du rjes 
[\[194b.5\]]su 'gro/_/nyan thos kyi theg pa las yid ces bya ba bstan pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i don te/_yid rang bzhin gyis dag pa zhes bya ba de gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o/_/de ni chos thams cad kyi gtso bo ste/_chos 
[\[194b.6\]]thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rang bzhin no/_/yang yid rab tu dang bas byed pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa bye ba thams cad bcad de bdag gi dbyings bstan nas gang rab tu dang ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyid do/_/de nas phyis smra ba dang 
[\[194b.7\]]byed pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas thob nas gang smra ba dang /_gang byed pa de thams cad 'jig rten rab tu sgrol ba ste/_de'i tshe ji ltar mis grib ma mthong ba bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mthong ngo /_/de bas na grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'brang zhes 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]bya ste/_tshigs su bcad pa de'i don ni 'di'o/_/yid ni chos kyi sngon du 'gro/_/yid gtso yid kyi rang bzhin te/_/yid ni rab tu 'khrugs pa yis/_/smras pa dang ni byas pa dag_/de ni sdug bsngal ldan par 'gyur/_/shing rta rab tu drangs 
[\[195a.2\]]pa bzhin/_/tshigs su bcad pa de'i don ni nyon mongs pa bye ba'i don to/_/yid kyang rab tu 'khrugs zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa bye bas g.yogs pas 'khrugs zhes bya'o/_/sems gang gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyon mongs pa bye ba'i nang du zhugs pa'i 
[\[195a.3\]]don to/_/de nas smra ba dang byed pa thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyir 'gro ste/_shing rta rab tu drangs pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'khor lo ba lang gi rjes su 'gro ba de bzhin du/_sdig pa'i phung pos 'khor ba'i 'phang lo sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su 
[\[195a.4\]]sems can rnams rab tu 'khyam mo/_/de bas na bsod nams la g.yel bar byed kyang sdig pa la yid mi dga' ba zhes bya bar grub bo/_/gzhan yang 'jam dpal ba'i 'o ma la mar yod par rtogs pas mi rnams srub la/_ci'i phyir chu la mi rnams mi 
[\[195a.5\]]srub ce na rdzas med pa'i phyir te/_de bzhin du 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod pa'i phyir mi rnams tshul khrims srung zhing tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/_/gzhan yang 'jam dpal mi gser 'dod pa rtog pa dang ldan pa brag la rko la/_ci'i phyir 
[\[195a.6\]]shing la mi rko/_rdo ba gser gyi dbyings yod pa la ni rko'i/_shing gser med pa la mi rko'o/_/de bzhin du 'jam dpal dbyings yod pa la rtog pa'i mi rnams bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro snyam ste/_tshul khrims srung zhing tshangs par spyod do/_/gzhan 
[\[195a.7\]]yang 'jam dpal dbyings med na ni tshangs par spyod pa don med par 'gyur ro/_/lo bye bar chu la bsrubs kyang snum mi 'byung ba de bzhin du/_gal te bdag gi dbyings med na/_bdag la chags pas tshangs pa dang /_tshul khrims spyod pa rnams don med 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_tshangs par spyod pa tshangs par spyod pa zhes bgyi ba de'i don ci lags/_ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod pa'i yon tan la rol pa spangs/_sor mo'i phreng bas kyang gsol pa/_lha dang mi mang po nges par 
[\[195b.2\]]des ltung ba'i chos su mkhyen nas 'dod pa'i 'du shes spangs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sor mo'i phreng ba de skad ma zer cig_/sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod pas/_sems can thams cad chos kyi spun 
[\[195b.3\]]yin no/_/bud med thams cad ni sring mo yin no/_/sor mo'i phreng bas gsol pa/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang /_lha mo sgyu ma yang lcam dral na/_ji ltar yab yum du 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ni 'jig rten gzhan bsgral ba'i phyir sgyu 
[\[195b.4\]]ma'i bya bas bstan to/_/'di lta ste/_rgyal po'i gyad gnyis skugs stong btsugs te/_dam bcas pas gcig la gcig brdeg cing mi btsam pa'i tshul gyis skugs stong phrog par ston pas rgyal po dang /_'khor thams cad dga' bar byed na 'gro ba rnams kyis de'i bye brag 
[\[195b.5\]]mi shes so/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis thabs byas te yab yum dang bdag nyid skyes bu brtan por ston te/_de nas phyis 'gro ba mang po yang srid pa'i rgya mtsho mi zad pa las sgrol na/_sems can rnams kyis de'i bye brag mi shes so/_/'di 
[\[195b.6\]]lta ste/_rol mo la 'dus pa'i nang du skyes bu gar mkhan gar byed cing gar dang gtam gyi tshigs su skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_ma ning du 'gyur te/_'gro ba mang po myur du mgu bar byed pa de bzhin du/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bdag gi 
[\[195b.7\]]lus gar mkhan chen po lta bur lus bstan te/_sems can bye ba mang po sgrol ba/_sems can rnams kyis skyes bu'i thabs su mi shes so/_/'di lta ste/_rol mo la 'dus pa'i dbus su sgyu ma byed pas/_bdag nyid rnam pa mang por gcod cing rtse bas 'gro ba 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]mang po dga' bar byas pa yang snad pa'am/_phog pa yang med do/_/de bzhin du sgyu ma byed pa ltar bdag nyid sems can mang po la phan par bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid sgyu ma sprul pa ston to/_/yang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad 
[\[196a.2\]]mkhyen pa'i ye shes thams cad dang ldan pas/_'jig rten kun la legs par rab tu gzigs na/_thog ma med pa tshun chad 'khor bar 'pho zhing 'khyam pa na/_mar ma gyur pa med/_sring mor ma gyur pa med de/_ma yang chung mar gyur/_bran yang phar gyur/_
[\[196a.3\]]pha yang bran du gyur te/_tshe rabs bye ba mang por 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten ni gar mkhan bzhin pas na/_de bzhin gshegs pas tshangs par spyod pa mdzad do//_//bam po bdun pa ste tha ma'o/_/gzhan yang 'jam dpal rang gi dbyings dang lhan cig 
[\[196a.4\]]tu 'dod chen pa'i rtsed mo byas pa gang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]bde ba rang gis bzung ste/_smra ba bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid ma ning du skyes na/_bde ba de dang sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'byung ngo /_/bud med la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod de/_skyes pa yang de 
[\[196a.5\]]bzhin no/_/bdag nyid kyis bzung nas smra ba bzhin du ci rung bar 'gyur ram/_de'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi dbyings ni dbyings gcig go/_/tshangs par spyod pa brtsams te/_bdag nyid gzhag par mi 'gyur ba'i gan du de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[196a.6\]]phyin to/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas dge bsnyen pha dang /_dge bsnyen ma thams cad tshangs par spyod pa la rab tu ma bkod/_ci'i slad du dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma rnams 
[\[196a.7\]]ni ka ba bzhi pa'i khang ba lta bus dam pa'i chos kyi rgyur dpe bstan na/_sdig pa chen po yang rab tu 'byung bar gda' ste/_ci'i slad du dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dag de ltar sdig pa rab tu gda' bar gyur/_ci'i slad du yang dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]kyi 'dul ba'i chos bcas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de ni 'du shes gzhan te/_'jig rten gyi 'du shes kyi ming du btags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gnas la bkod kyang sgra gcan 'dzin gyi 
[\[196b.2\]]tshul du 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes dang /_'jig rten gyi 'du shes kyang tha dad pa de dri ba 'di ni mi dri ba zhes bya'o/_/'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyi dbyings yin pas na/_srog gcod pa spangs pa ni sangs rgyas so/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar 
[\[196b.3\]]bdag gsod pa ltar 'jig rten na srog gcod pa yang de bzhin te/_bdag nyid kyi dbyings 'joms pa'o/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du sgra gcan 'dzin bzhin du mtshungs par gzigs la/_bdag nyid kyi dbyings 'chang ba skyon chags pa 
[\[196b.4\]]ya mtshan can rnams chad pas bcad cing bsad par bstan/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de skad ma zer cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni sgra gcan 'dzin dang mtshungs par gzigs so/_/'di lta ste/_'jam dpal skyes bu chos 'dod pa 
[\[196b.5\]]zhig bdag nyid dus gnyis su za ba las la la zhig gis bstan te/_zas lan cig par gyur na/_srin bu'i rigs brgyad cu gsod par 'gyur ro/_/ji ste de ltar gyur na de dag la srog gcod pa dag par mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang 'jam dpal shin tu bde ba 'dod 
[\[196b.6\]]pa'i bde ba de las phyir phyogs pa'i 'phags pa 'dod pa 'joms pa ni bdag gsod pa'o/_/gal te 'phags pa rnams de ltar gyur na/_bdag gsod pa'i sdig par 'gyur ro/_/gal te 'dod pa'i sems skyed cing gzhan gyi drung du gnas te/_bdag 'dod pa'i 
[\[196b.7\]]sems skyes na ji ltar bya zhes ma zer cig_/de las ngo tsha ba skye bar 'gyur ro/_/nga'i lus gcig yod kyang rung /_med kyang rung dpa' bo ltar 'dug pas bdag gsod pa ni bdag gi khams 'joms par 'gyur ram/_de ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]de ni bsod nams kyi phung po'o/_/de bzhin du 'jam dpal 'phags pa yang 'di ltar bdag gsod de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyon mongs pa'i dug gi phyir te/_gzhan gsod par ni mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshig ni skyon chags pa'i ya 
[\[197a.2\]]mtshan can dam pa'i chos 'jig pa rnams bdag gi nyon mongs pa mi zad pa ltar de dag med par byed cing /_tshul ma yin par gnod pa'ang byed du 'jug ste/_de dag ni bdag la mchod pa yin no/_/ji ltar bdag sdug par 'dod pa dang /_bde ba dang /_zas 
[\[197a.3\]]dang /_srog 'dor ba de bzhin du/_bdag spong bar 'dod pas skyon chags pa'i ya mtshan rnams chad pas gcod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rig pa yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i slad du sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[197a.4\]]sha mi gsol lam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal shin tu de bzhin te/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i 'khor bar 'khor ba'i tshe rabs de dag la sems can thams cad mar ma gyur pa dang /_sring mor ma gyur pa gang yang med do/_/khyir gyur 
[\[197a.5\]]pa yang phar gyur te/_'tsho ba'i 'jig rten ni bro mkhan bzhin no/_/de bas na bdag gi sha dang /_gzhan gyi sha yang sha gcig pa yin pas/_sangs rgyas rnams sha mi gsol lo/_/gzhan yang 'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyi dbyings ni chos kyi 
[\[197a.6\]]dbyings te/_dbyings gcig tu gyur pa'i sha za bar 'gyur bas/_sangs rgyas rnams sha mi gsol lo/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_sbrang rtsi dang /_dung dang /_lham dang /_dar gyi srin bu la sogs pa rang gi dbyings kyi sha ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[197a.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de skad ma zer cig_/sangs rgyas ni 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi lus spangs pa yin te/_sangs rgyas ni zang zing med pa yin na chags pa'i rdzas ci la'ang sten pa de ni gnas ma yin te/_zang zing la bsnyen pa ni thabs kyi chos nyid 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]do/_/'di rdzas gcig nas gcig tu 'ongs pa la bsnyen par byed de/_rdzas gang nas 'byung ba de dang der bsnyen par mi bya'o/_/gsod pa'i lag ma yin par gcig nas gcig tu 'ongs pa ni bsnyen du rung ngo /_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_tshong 'dus gcig na lham 
[\[197b.2\]]mkhan gyis ko ba las lham drubs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phul na/_gcig nas gcig tu mchis pa de bzhes sam/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_gal te ma he rang chos bzhin du gum nas ma he bdag 
[\[197b.3\]]po gdol pa las ko ba blangs te/_lham mkhan btsal nas lham du drubs te/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa la stsal na/_de gcig nas gcig tu mchis pa lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma he chos bzhin du shi bar gyur la/_ma he'i bdag pos 
[\[197b.4\]]lham 'drub tu bcug nas tshul khrims dang ldan pa la byin na blang bar bya'am/_'on te ma blangs na dge slong dang 'thun nam/_snying rje med pa yin te/_tshul khrims ral bar mi 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_rmo brko yang bgyir mi rung ngo /_/
[\[197b.5\]]chu mi gtsang bas btsos pa'i zas kyang mi blang ngo /_/de lta lags na dge slong dag la de lta bu gda'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ni 'jig rten gyi 'du shes zhes bya ste/_gal te dge bsnyen yod na ni zas dang skom chu gtsang ma dang sbyor cig_/gang 
[\[197b.6\]]na dge bsnyen yod par rmo brko mi bya'o/_/gang na dge bsnyen med pa der sangs rgyas kyis kyang ji ltar bya/_thang la yang srog chags yod/_chu'i nang na yang srog chags yod/_nam mkha' la yang srog chags yod do/_/gal te de ltar rnam par dag pa 
[\[197b.7\]]grub pa rnams la sdig par mi 'gyur ram/_rnam par dag pa grub pa de dag ji ltar rgyu/_de ni 'jig rten na mi 'dri ba zhes bya ba'i dri ba'o/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'ang ring zhig tshun chad bdag nyid sha za ba 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]la mi gnas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang 'jig rten pa la sangs rgyas kyi tshig dang 'thun pa yod pa de yang thams cad du thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshig tu rig par bya'o/_/'jam dpal 'jig rten pa rnams kyang thar pa brjod 
[\[198a.2\]]de/_de dag la thar pa med kyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la thar pa yod do/_/de dag la yang rab tu 'byung ba yod de/_de dag gi rab tu 'byung ba ma yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba yod do/_/'jig rten pa la yang sha za ba 
[\[198a.3\]]ni bdag nyid za ba'o zhes brjod de/_de yang bdag nyid bdag nyid kyi sha la mi za ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la ni bdag nyid kyi sha za bar nges so/_/'jam dpal 'jig rten du ya mtshan can thams cad byung ba mdo sde 'di las bstan pa nyan 'dod dam/_
[\[198a.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal sngon 'das pa'i dus na byung ba grangs med pa'i bskal pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa bskal pa yangs pa bas kyang ches yangs pa/_dpag tu med pa 
[\[198a.5\]]bas kyang ches dpag tu med pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ko san ta bzang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du grong 'dir byung ste/_/de'i tshe ya mtshan can med cing ya mtshan can gyi ming yang med do/_/sems can theg pa chen po par gyur te/_sems 
[\[198a.6\]]can rnams shin tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir lo mang du bzhugs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa yang lo mang du gnas nas/_dam pa'i chos 
[\[198a.7\]]nub par gyur pa'i tshe/_dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa bri ba'i dus na/_chos ma yin pa'i phyogs 'phel ba'i tshe/_dge slong sangs rgyas kyi blo gros zhes bya ba zhig dgon pa na gnas te/_dge slong de la sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa gcig gis/_rin 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]thang med pa'i gos byin nas/_dge slong des rjes su gzung ba'i phyir blangs te/_i shin 'da'i ra ba'i drung nas phar bstan te song ba dang /_i shin 'da'i mis gos de mthong nas sems bzlog ste/_nub mo mun khung na dge slong de'i thad du song ste/_gos de phrogs 
[\[198b.2\]]nas ri khrod du khrid de/_gcer bur phyung nas/_shing la lag pa gyen du dam por bcings te song ngo /_/de'i nub mo mun khung na me tog thu ba'i bram ze skon pa thogs te/_'brog dgon par 'ongs nas nam langs te/_tsam pa ka zhig gi drung na stag 'dug pas skrag 
[\[198b.3\]]ste/_stag des bsad la thug pa dang /_ci thar du bros te/_bdag nyid rab tu mi dga' zhing song song na dge sbyong gcer bur bcings pa mthong nas/_/kye ma dge sbyong dgon pa pa ngur smrig can 'dir 'ongs na/_ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyis ni thar bar mi 'gyur ba lta 
[\[198b.4\]]zhig snyam ste/_lag pa bsgreng nas lus gcer bur byung la dka' thub spyad par bya'o snyam nas/_lam 'di nges par thar ba'i lam du legs par bsgrub pa yin nam zhes dam pa'i chos gzhig pa'i phyir bdag gi gos ngan pa bor te/_skra btogs nas mgo reg gcer 
[\[198b.5\]]bu pa'i dge sbyong du gyur te/_de las dge sbyong gcer bu pa byung ngo /_/dge slong de bdag nyid bcings pa khrol nas shing shun blangs te sa ser pos byugs nas/_thang la 'gro ba bram ze zhig gis mthong nas/_sngar bshad pa bzhin du mthong ba dang /_'di ni ngur 
[\[198b.6\]]smrig gyon pa'i dge slong ste/_ngur smrig bor la/_btsag gis byugs te song na/_thar pa'i lam ni 'di yin pa snyam ste/_/'di ni dge bar 'gro ba'am/_ci zhes de kun du rgyu bar gyur te/_/de las mur 'dug kun du rgyu ba byung ngo /_/dge slong phye ma red tshur zhugs 
[\[198b.7\]]te/_rang gi klad pa'i rma chus bkrus nas skra 'jam pos klad pa'i rma g.yogs te/_sbrul bsad pa'i ras ba lang rdzis bor ba gyon te/_khrus byed pa de skyes bu shing thu ba gzhan zhig gis mthong ste/_snga ma ltar dge slong de nyon mongs pa mthong nas/_dge sbyong 'di ni 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]ngur smrig gyon te/_rgyal mtshan ngur smrig gis ni thar par mi 'gyur ba snyam du bsams nas/_ral pa ring por byas te/_rtswa gos gyon nas dus gsum du khrus byed pa'i dka' thub spyod pa yin du bzung nas/_de dge ba yin nam zhes 'di nyid thar 
[\[199a.2\]]pa'i lam ste/_gzhan ma yin no zhes dka' thub can du gyur te/_de tshun chad ya mtshan can dka' thub byed pa byung ngo /_/dge slong de tshur zhugs te rma mang po thams cad la rnag gis yog ste/_rang gi lus rdul gyis gang zhing sbrang ma 'du zhing dge slong de skra 'jam 
[\[199a.3\]]pos g.yogs pa mthong nas/_mur 'dug spyod pa dang /_phyugs bdag pa rnams de ltar byung ngo /_/dge slong de ba lang gi lci ba yar ke ma'i me bus te bsro ba skyes bu nyon mongs pa gzhan zhig gis mthong nas/_ba lang gi lci ba'i ril bu can thog ma de nas 
[\[199a.4\]]byung ngo /_/dge slong de rma la sdug bsngal reg par shes nas/_dpa' bo ltar 'dug pa skyes bu nyon mongs pa gzhan zhig gis snga ma bzhin du mthong ste/_ngur smrig gyon pa ni thar par mi 'gyur ro snyam nas ci legs par 'gro'am snyam ste/_mi g.yo ba'i sar 
[\[199a.5\]]'gro ba thar pa yin snyam du bsams nas/_mi g.yo ba'i sa mya ngan du 'gro bar gyur to/_/de ltar ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug gi bar du gyur pa rnams kyang so so nas der lhags te/_dge slong de ci dang ci lta ba mthong nas log pa'i lta bas gzhan dang gzhan 
[\[199a.6\]]du brtags so/_/'di lta ste dper na/_phan tshun du [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]su mthong nas/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gsad snyam du bsams te/_gcig la gcig gsod pa de bzhin du ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug kyang de ltar byung ngo /_/dper na dbyar zla ra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams smig 
[\[199a.7\]]rgyu ba la chu yin snyam du bsams te/_mchi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus na dge slong gi gzhi las gzhan du gyur te/_'jam dpal de ltar 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims dang /_spyod pa dang /_bya ba'i mchog thams cad kyang sangs 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]rgyas kyis sprul pa'o/_/dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus na de lta bu byung na chos nub par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du bdag gi de kho na ni 'di 'dra de 'dra'o zhes log par lta ba bzhin du 'di lta ste/_thar pa dang bdag dang 'jig rten las 'das pa la ldem 
[\[199b.2\]]po ngag mi shes pas bdag med pa sangs rgyas kyi tshig go zhes mur 'dug byung ba ltar rnam par rtog go/_/rjes su dpag pas tshugs pa'i 'jig rten pa la yang gti mug gi chos kyi dbang du song ngo /_/'jig rten las 'das pa la yang ldem po ngag tu bshad pa mi 
[\[199b.3\]]shes pas shes pa nyams te/_de'i phyir phyogs gnyis spangs te/_bdag tu gtogs pa'i chos kyi de kho na nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa dbu ma'i lam du bstan to/_/dbu ma'i lam zhes bya 
[\[199b.4\]]ba ni theg pa chen po'i [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/sor mo'i phreng bas smras pa/_dbu ma'i lam mi shes pas sems can rnams dbu ma'i lam gzhan du rtog go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sor mo'i phreng ba mdo sde 'di bshad pa thos nas sems can mang 
[\[199b.5\]]du mdo sde 'di la yid ches par 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can mang du mdo sde 'di la smod par 'gyur ro/_/sor mo'i phreng bas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang du mdo sde la smod pa ji snyed 'byung ba dang /_'dod chen pa ji snyed 'byung 
[\[199b.6\]]ba bshad du gsol/_phyogs gang du sems can thams cad la phan par 'gyur ba ston pa yang de bzhin gshegs pas bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yul gyi dbus 'dir mdo sde la smod pa'i sems can bye ba 
[\[199b.7\]]brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'byung ngo /_/'dod chen pa bye ba phrag bdun 'byung ngo /_/shar phyogs su mdo sde la smod pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'byung ngo /_/'dod chen pa bye ba phrag bdun 'byung ngo /_/lho phyogs su mdo sde la smod pa stong phrag dgu 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]bcu rtsa brgyad 'byung ngo /_/'dod chen pa bye ba phrag drug cu 'byung ngo /_/nub phyogs su mdo sde la smod pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'byung ngo /_/'dod chen pa bye ba phrag lnga bcu 'byung ngo /_/byang phyogs su mdo sde la smod pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa 
[\[200a.2\]]brgyad 'byung ngo /_/'dod chen pa bye ba phrag bzhi bcu 'byung ngo /_/kha che ba'i yul du yang nga'i bstan pa glegs bam lhag ma'i mdzod dang gter mi stor to/_/b+ha ru ka tsar yang nga'i glegs bam lhag ma'i mdzod du 'gyur ro/_/ri b+hin d+h+ya la yang de bzhin no/_/
[\[200a.3\]]kha che'i yul gyi dge slong rnams bsgrub pa'i don mi shes nas theg pa chen po thams cad la smod pa 'byung ste/_nga la skur pa de ji lta bya zhes nga yang ngo tsha ba skye'o/_/lho phyogs pa'i rgyud du theg pa chen po ston par 'gyur te/_/nan tan snying por byed pa de bzhin 
[\[200a.4\]]gshegs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dngos po chen po brgyad dang bral ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang /_ther zug dang /_zhi ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po brtan pa'o zhes ston par 'gyur ro/_/nga'i nyan thos dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_
[\[200a.5\]]dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams nan tan snying por byed par 'gyur ro/_/nga'i bstan pa khur du thogs par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das lho phyogs su bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa gnas par 'gyur ram/_
[\[200a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin te/_lho phyogs pa'i rgyud du nga'i bstan pa lo du ma zhig gnas par 'gyur ro/_/khyod lta bu shin tu dka' ba byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rang gi srog btang nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa 
[\[200a.7\]]dang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa ther zug dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa g.yung drung ngo zhes sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston par 'gyur te/_dper na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]rgyal po'i srid chen po mi bzhed cing khur chen po thogs te/_stong gsum pa rnams bsgral lo zhes bskal pa bye ba mang por bsgral ba de bzhin du nga'i nyan thos thams cad kyang bskal pa bye ba mang por nga'i dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus na/_nam dam pa'i chos lo brgyad cu'i 
[\[200b.2\]]bar du gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshe/_dam pa'i chos kyi khur khyer bar mi 'dod do/_/yang 'jam dpal khyod lta bu'i dam pa'i chos lo brgyad cu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ba'i tshe/_dam pa'i chos kyi khur chen po khyer te/_bdag gis dam pa'i chos phrag la bskur ro 
[\[200b.3\]]snyam nas/_'dzam bu'i gling dang /_gling phran thams cad kyi sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rtag pa ther zug zhi ba/_g.yung drung yin no zhes rang gi srog kyang btang ste rab tu bstan par bya'o/_/sems can rnams yid ches kyang rung /_mi ches 
[\[200b.4\]]kyang rung /_nga'i lus bsad dam/_dum bur byas kyang rung /_gdod bdag gi lus rtag pa'i skur 'gyur te/_khur khyer ba rab tu dka' ba byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lho phyogs kyi rgyud nas 'byung ngo /_/nga'i nyan thos de lta bu dang /_khyod la sogs 
[\[200b.5\]]pa sems can bye ba mang po yod de de'i phyir lho phyogs kyi rgyud rab tu bsngags so/_/nga'i chos tha ma der ston par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mthu dang /_gzi brjid kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi skye bo ma lus par 'dzem pa dang /_'jigs pa dang /_
[\[200b.6\]]nga rgyal gyi rgyus nan tan du byed par 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste dper na/_rgyal po dag rgyal po gzhan gyi khrims byas pa thos nas/_bdag nyid kyang skye dgu skyong ba de bzhin du kha che'i yul gyi 'khor dang /_yul b+ha ru ka tsa ba rnams kyang ngo tsha ba dang /_nga rgyal bskyed nas 
[\[200b.7\]]theg pa chen pos 'jigs shing skrag pas gsangs te ston par 'gyur gyi/_de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_sog bur gyi phung po'i nang du me bcug na/_sog ma'i phung po'i dbus tshig 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]pa'i lhag ma lus te/_mtha' 'khor mi tshig pa de bzhin du 'jam dpal dang po nga skyes pa'i sa na nan tan lhur byed pa zhig ste/_tshig pa las lho phyogs kyi rgyud du lhag ma lus te/_mtha' 'khor na gnas pa'i sa der byang chub sems dpa' skyes nas dam 
[\[201a.2\]]pa'i chos 'byin par 'gyur ba der rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang bar grags pa yin no/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i g.yog mang po dang bcas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la mgo bos 
[\[201a.3\]]phyag 'tshal nas/_lha'i mchod pa chen po byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mdo sde 'di bsrung zhing rjes su gtad par bgyi'o/_/sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/_de bzhin gshegs pas mdo 
[\[201a.4\]]sde 'di'i ming bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka mdo sde 'di'i ming sor mo'i phreng ba la phan pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/kau shi ka mdo sde 'di ni 'jig rten na shin tu rnyed par dka' ste/_u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin no/_/de nas dbang 
[\[201a.5\]]po'i bu thu bo mngon du khro zhes bya ba sdug pa dga' ba yid du 'ong ba des/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag gi pha nam lha ma yin dang 'thab pa'i tshe/_kha lo sgyur ba bsam 'dzin 
[\[201a.6\]]zhes bgyi ba la/_lha rnams 'phel ba dang /_lha ma yin bas par 'gyur ba de ltar shing rta drongs shig ces bgyis pa dang /_lha gzhan du ma dgongs shig_/bdag ni sngar gum ste/_khyod ni slad kyis so/_/grub kyang rung /_ma grub kyang rung ste/_bdag gi 
[\[201a.7\]]srog kyang bor/_gzhan dang mdza' ba'ang spangs nas go cha chen po bgos pa de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang ma mchis pa'i dus na/_dam pa'i chos lo brgyad cu'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/_bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa' gang de bzhin 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]gshegs pa rtag pa nyid dang /_ther zug nyid dang /_g.yung drung nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston pa las de slad kyis 'di snyam du sems skyes te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan par bya ba'i bstan pa'i sems can mang por mi 'dug gis/_/da ni mi bstan to snyam ste/_
[\[201b.2\]]de'i thabs byas pa thos nas/_bdag kyang skyes bu bsam 'dzin ces bgyi ba de 'dra bar chos kyi shing rta sbyar te/_ci nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rtag pa nyid dang /_ther zug pa nyid dang /_g.yung drung nyid dang /_zhi ba nyid du 'jig rten du rgyas par 'gyur ba de 
[\[201b.3\]]ltar bdag gi srog kyang btang ste/_bdag gi dge slong gi tshul gyis bstan cing bskal pa thams cad du rnam par dag par bgyis par gyur cig_/de nas dbang po'i bu mang po dang /_bud med dang /_bu mo dang /_lha gzhan dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos 
[\[201b.4\]]phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang srog kyang btang ste/_dge slong gi tshul dang /_dge slong ma'i tshul dang /_dge bsnyen gyi tshul dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i tshul gyis skyes bu dam pa de'i g.yog 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_legs 
[\[201b.5\]]so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu dam pa'i chos 'dod pa khyed thams cad de bzhin gyis shig_/ngas kyang dam pa'i chos 'dod pa de dag bsrung bar bya'o/_/de dag gi thad du nga rtag tu 'chag cing gnas so/_/khyed rnams ci nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba dang /_nga'i byas pa 
[\[201b.6\]]shes shing brtan par gyis la/_de nas khyed thams cad kyis rtag pa'i gnas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas yin no zhes ston cig_/de nas yul mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis blon po dang /_dmag dpon la bsgo ba/_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig dong la/_
[\[201b.7\]]mi'i gzugs su srin po mi nyis stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba bsad de/_sor mo'i phreng ba byas nas byang khrag gis bskus shing stobs dang rtsal chen po rab tu 'khyam zhing grong khyer 'di nas gnag pa'i dgongs bzhi bcu tsam na 'dug cing /_bdag gi ma yang deng gsad de 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]mi nyis stong du tshang bar bya'o snyam nas/_de rab tu dga'o zhes grag gis ma rungs pa sdig can gtum po 'di bsad na/_gdod bdag cag grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_ri khrod kyi grong dang /_lung pa'i gnas na dmag mi thams cad kyang rang gi khyim nas 'byung ngo /_/
[\[202a.2\]]de bas na bya khras bya rog dang /_bya bran skrag pa bzhin du bdag cag gi skye bo thams cad dang /_shing thun dang /_rtswa rnga ba dang /_yul gzhan gyi mi dang /_skye bo 'dron pa'i rnams kyang de'i ming tsam gyis mi rgyu zhing mi smra bar gyur cing 'dug gis myur du sbron pa khyer te/_yul mdzod 
[\[202a.3\]]'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs dang lhan cig tu chas te/_srin po ma rungs pa gtum po sor mo'i phreng ba bsad par byin gyis bkrabs pa thams cad kyang ral gri dang /_gzhu dang /_rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /_mdung thung dang /_phub lag na thogs te/_
[\[202a.4\]]mtshon cha dang /_lag cha thams cad rnon por byos te/_legs par chos la gshegs shig_/gang gis srin po ma rungs pa sor mo'i phreng ba bsad dam/_mtshon gyis btab bam/_bal glang zhon pa dag smas sam/_gang dag smas kyang g.yul las phyir mi ldog na bal 
[\[202a.5\]]glang 'dod na yang bal glang gi mchog sbyin no/_/rta 'dod na yang rta bzhon pa sbyin no/_/gser 'dod na yang gser dang gser gyi dong tse dang nam sa ya sbyin no/_/dngul 'dod na yang dngul sa ya sbyin no/_/rdo rje dang /_nor bu dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_rin 
[\[202a.6\]]po che sna bdun sa ya snyed sbyin no/_/gos 'dod pa la yang lha'i gos dang /_dar dang /_ras phran ko tam pa dang /_yul bang gi ras dang /_yul ma tu ra dang /_ba ru ka tsa dang /_ba ring dra dang /_lho phyogs pa dang /_sang ka shi ka dang /_ku ru pan tsa la'i ras bam rnam pa mang po 
[\[202a.7\]]sbyin no/_/zhing dor dang /_grong dang /_ma he dang /_bud med 'dod pa'ang thams cad kyi mchog sbyin no zhes bsgrags so/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng ba'i ming tsam gyis zham ring ba la gtogs so cog skrag ste/_gcig kyang phyir ma byung ngo /_/btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_zham ring pa yang 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]khyi dang 'dra bar gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pas 'tsho ba 'chi ba la thug par gyur te/_rang rang gi lag cha thogs nas/_bal glang pa dang /_rta pa dang /_dpung bu chung ba rnams rab tu brgyan te/_rgyal po ga la ba der 'ongs so/_/de nas btsun mo yang kyi hud 'bod cing sdig can 
[\[202b.2\]]de'i gan du ma bzhud cig_/skye bo thams cad dang gzhan gyi yul 'khor rnams ni ma mchis kyang mi mdo'i/_lha la [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]nongs pa byung nga re/_de nas mo 'debs pa dang /_lo rtsi ba dang /_mdun na 'don pa dang /_rig pa dang /_ltas 'debs pa rnams la sor mo'i phreng ba de 
[\[202b.3\]]ring sod dam mi sod dris na/_mo 'debs pa dang /_lo rtsi ba rnams kyis de ring sor mo'i phreng ba thal bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so/_/de nas rgyal po de dag gi tshig la yid ma ches nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der yan lag bzhi'i dpung gi tshogs kyi dmag dang lhan cig 
[\[202b.4\]]tu song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_rgyal po 'jigs shing skrag pas gdong dang dpral ba rdul nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thams cad dang ldan pas/_yul mdzod 
[\[202b.5\]]'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po khyed kyi gdong dang dpral ba rab tu rdul na ci/_rgyal pos gsol pa/_lag pa 'di rkang pa 'di lags na/_bcom ldan 'das sor mo'i phreng ba zhes bgyi ba srin po mi stong dgu brgya bkum 
[\[202b.6\]]nas/_sor mo'i phreng ba brgyus te phreng ba thogs nas/_bdag dang 'thab ces sdod cing mchis so/_/bdag la 'du ba thams cad kyi sgo yang bcad de shing a sho ka'i drung na gcig pu mchis pa bya rog dang /_khra 'khor ba de'i ming tsam gyis skrag ste/_bdag gi gsol pa de 
[\[202b.7\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po ci thab mo byed par 'dod dam/_rgyal pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal snga nas tshad ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]po chen po nga'ang 'gro'am/_rgyal pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gshegs so zhes bka' stsal pa ni sems can mang po la skal ba mchis pa lta ste/_da ni sor mo'i phreng ba de yang gum lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po gal te 
[\[203a.2\]]sor mo'i phreng ba 'dir 'ongs na ji ltar bya/_de nas yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs snying rab tu dngangs skrag nas rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid shes pas snying dga' ste/_mi 'jigs nas rgyal pos gsol pa/_sor mo'i phreng ba gal te 'dir mchis na/_
[\[203a.3\]]gcig pu lus par 'gyur lags grang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po sor mo'i phreng ba 'di'i dpal la ltos/_de nas mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sor mo'i phreng ba la ring zhig tu mig mi 
[\[203a.4\]]'dzums par bltas na/_sor mo'i phreng ba mig dmar la bdag nyid che ba'i gzugs mthong nas/_mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal shin tu 'jigs shing skrag ste ba spu yang langs nas/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'dul ba ltar go cha rnams zhig cing mtshon thams cad shubs nas byung 
[\[203a.5\]]ste/_mda' ste'u ka ltar thams cad du ltung ba yang byi la ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri'i drung du mchis so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgra gcan 'dzin bzhin du snyoms par gzigs pa la skyabs su mchi'o/_/de nas yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs thams cad 
[\[203a.6\]]sgra de thos nas/_glang po dang /_rta dang /_bal glang dang /_rkang thang pa'i dmag de rnams sde gyes pa bzhin du nyams te/_la la ni brgyal/_la la ni 'gyel/_la la ni 'chi la thug par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal 
[\[203a.7\]]pa/_rgyal po chen po tshigs su bcad pa 'di nyon cig dang /_gnod pa med par 'gyur gyis ma skrag cig_/gang zhig snga na bag med pa/_/bag yod par ni phyis gyur na/_/sprin las byung ba'i zla ba bzhin/_/'jig rten 'di na snang bar byed/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]skye bo thams cad dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir 'jigs pa med pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer btang ste/_sems can gang 'od zer des reg pa'i sems can de dag thams cad bde bar gyur te/_mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_bu dang /_grong gi skye bo sems can 
[\[203b.2\]]thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas sor mo'i phreng ba btul lo snyam ste thams cad der lhags so/_/de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye ma 'o bcom ldan 'das ni mi 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba lha dang mir bcas pa rnams ston pas sdig pa'i chos 
[\[203b.3\]]can 'di lta bu yang dam pa'i chos la bzhag pas na/_kye ma bcom ldan 'das ni 'jig rten thams cad la phan par mdzad pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtan pas/_sngar bag med pa lta bur bstan la/_phyis bdag gi che ba 
[\[203b.4\]]nyid kyang ston pas de 'jig rten na sprin las grol ba'i zla ba lta bur mdzes par gyur te/_sems can bye ba mang po bsgral nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid kyang ston to/_/rgyal po chen po sor mo'i phreng ba ni sdig can ma yin te/_thabs 'chang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[203b.5\]]dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/rgyal po chen pos gsol pa/_mkhan po'i mchis brang dang lhan cig tu las ngan pa spyod cing mkhan po'i dmod pa'i chos kyi 'drer gyur na ci'i slad du sdig par mi 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sor mo'i phreng ba mkhan po'i chung ma dang 
[\[203b.6\]]lhan cig tu las ngan pa spyod pa ma yin gyi/_mkhan po'i chung mas gzugs mthong nas sems gyur te/_sdig pa rab tu byed pa ltar mkhan po'i chos kyis rtse bar thams cad rtog par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di lta ste dper na/_glang po 
[\[203b.7\]]che brdeg pa ni bong bus mi bzod do/_/de bzhin du rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mi mchog glang po che'i dgongs te gsungs pa'i gsang ba'i sos phog pa'ang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi bzod do/_/de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa'i 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]gsang bas phog pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bzod do/_/rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyis 
[\[204a.2\]]brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad mthong na dga' ba mngon par 'phags pa brtson pa chen po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs pa 'tsho zhing gzhes te/_de na nyan thos dang rang 
[\[204a.3\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyang med/_theg pa gcig las theg pa gzhan gyi ming yang med/_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_sdug bsngal yang med/_yid mi bde ba yang med/_rab tu bde ba thams cad dang ldan te/_sems can de dag tshe dpag tu med/_sems can de dag thams cad 
[\[204a.4\]]gzi brjid dang /_kha dog tshad med de/_'gro ba de dag gi dpe dang rgyu dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa lta bu dpe med de/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams 
[\[204a.5\]]cad mthong na dga' ba mngon par 'phags pa brtson pa chen po de la rgyal po chen po thal mo sbyor la rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa de ni sor mo'i phreng ba 'di nyid yin te/_de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi che ba de 'dra ste/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis 
[\[204a.6\]]mi khyab bo/_/de nas lha dang mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams dang /_nyan thos dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /_yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs dang bcas pas mo 'debs pa dang /_lo rtsi ba rnams 
[\[204a.7\]]la/_kye ma [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]smra ba khyed nga'i drung na ma gnas shig ces brgyad cing smad nas bskrad do/_/de nas lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /_grong dang 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]grong khyer dang /_tshong 'dus dang /_lung pa'i mi rnams dang /_ri khrod pa dang /_mnyan du yod pa'i yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus lhags te/_sor mo'i phreng ba'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_mgrin gcig tu tshigs 
[\[204b.2\]]su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/mtha' yas sku mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thabs kyi sku mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sor phreng khyod kyi zhabs la mgos gtugs nas/_khyod kyi 'jam pa'i zhabs la bzod par gsol/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sor phreng 
[\[204b.3\]]mtshan 'dzin pa/_/bram ze'i gzugs kyis bdag cag don phyir gshegs/_/sangs rgyas sku mdog dpal 'bar deng 'dir gshegs/_/dpal ldan gzi brjid mthu mnga' bzod par gsol/_/tshig gis mngon du gsung ba mtha' yas sku/_/khyod ni yang dang 
[\[204b.4\]]yang bying mang po yi/_/yang dag sangs rgyas skyabs byed skyabs su gyur/_/gnyen med rnams kyi gnyen du gyur pa khyod/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'das pa gnyis mdzes te/_/'di na chos spyod shin tu ngo mtshar rmad/_/me las pad mo skye ba ngo mtshar bzhin/_/'jig 
[\[204b.5\]]rten sangs rgyas gnyis ston mchog de 'dra/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa/_ltos rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/_byang phyogs logs su gang gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[204b.6\]]khams 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rtag par rab tu dga' ba sdug cing mos pa zhes bya ba de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mos pa rab tu dga' ba'i snying po nor bu rin po che brtsegs pa'i rgyal po da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing 
[\[204b.7\]]gzhes pa de na nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad med/_theg pa gcig las theg pa gzhan gyi ming yang med/_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_sdug bsngal yang med/_bde ba thams cad dang rab tu ldan par gyur te/_sems can de dag tshe dpag tu med/_gzi brjid 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]dang /_kha dog dpag tu med/_'jig rten na dpe dang /_rgyu dang byed pa med de/_rtag tu dga' zhing mos pa dang /_dpe med pa de na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mos pa rab tu dga' ba'i snying po nor bu rin po che brtsegs 
[\[205a.2\]]pa'i rgyal po da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa de la rgyal po chen po thal mo sbyor te rjes su yi rang bar byos shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa de gzhan ma yin gyi/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid yin no/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_sor mo'i phreng ba gnyis kyi ming 
[\[205a.3\]]gang gis thos sam/_de la rtag tu phyag 'tshal na/_sems can de dag gi khyim nyid du dga' ba can gyi 'jig rten mthong ste/_ngan 'gro rnam pa bzhi'i sgo gcad par 'gyur ro/_/de gnyis kyi ming thos nas phyi rol pa rnams dang /_phas pham pa dang /_mtshams med par gyur 
[\[205a.4\]]pas 'phya ba'am/_sting ba'am/_'dran tor ram/_gzhan gyis bzlas sam/_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs bcad kyi phyir yang rung ste/_de dag gis ngan 'gro bzhi'i sgo gcad par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis 'di gnyis kyi ming 
[\[205a.5\]]gis bsrung bar byas na dgon pa thams cad dang /_'jigs pa'i dus thams cad du'ang bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/phyis 'jigs pa thams cad kyang bsrung bar 'gyur/_'jigs pa byung ba thams cad kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri 
[\[205a.6\]]za dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_sha zas kyang mi tshugs so/_/yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas kyi tshig ni che ba'i bdag nyid do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid ni de lta'o/_/
[\[205a.7\]]sor mo'i phreng ba dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid glang po che 'di gnyis la rjes su yi rang bar gyis la/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang skyed cig_/sor mo'i phreng ba'i ma yang ma brjed par gsos shig_/ngas sor mo'i phreng ba'i lag nas de'i 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]ma rgan mo thar bar byas te sor mo'i phreng ba khyod kyis ma ma bsad cig_/bsad pas mtho ris su mi 'gro'o zhes byas pa dang /_ral gri thogs te 'ongs nas skad cig de nyid la de'i bar du 'dug pa ni chos la gzhug pa'i thabs so/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng ba'i ma ta la bdun tsam gyi 
[\[205b.2\]]nam mkha' la 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di zhes smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs kyi sgyu ma sprul pa ni/_/sems can mang po dag gis mi shes te/_/sangs rgyas sgyu ma'i rgyal po'i sku che zhing /_/de bzhin gshegs pa thabs kyi sku mnga'o/_/de 'di skad ces smras 
[\[205b.3\]]nas/_de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ci sgyu ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po ma 'di ni sprul pa yin no/_/sprul 
[\[205b.4\]]pa'i mas ji ltar smras pa bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgyu ma yang de bzhin no/_/de nas sor mo'i phreng ba'i mkhan po nor bu bzang po zhes bya ba ta la bdun tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'dug nas tshig 'di zhes smras so/_/seng ge dang wa 'dre yun ring zhig tu mdza' bor byas 
[\[205b.5\]]kyang /_des seng ge'i nga ro'i sgra 'dzin par mi nus te/_wa 'dre yang thos pa tsam gyis mchi'o/_/yang ci wa 'dre de dom gyi skad du 'byin na/_seng ge'i rgyal po chen po sgra skad 'byin pa yin nam/_seng ge yang wa dang dom gyi sgra skad du'ang nga ro mi 'byin gyi/_seng ge'i sgrar sgrogs 
[\[205b.6\]]so/_/de bzhin du wa 'dre lta bu bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge lta bu'i mkhan po byas te/_yun ring mo zhig tu lhan cig 'khod kyang byang chub sems dpa'i sgra skad 'dzin lta ga la nus te/_gal te 'di thabs ma yin na de'i rtsal gyis 'chi bar 'gyur te/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lta bu 
[\[205b.7\]]bdag gi glen pa'i chos la spyod pa dang /_nyan du gzhug pa lta ci smos/_byang chub sems dpa' ni glen pa'i chos mi spyod pa ste/_spyod pa yang thams cad la bu gcig pa lta bu'i byams par spyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa sgyu ma mang po ni sems can bye ba dang /_bram ze'i mkhan 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]pos mi shes te/_sangs rgyas nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi sgyu ma mkhyen te/_de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas ni sgyu ma'i rgyal po'o/_/mkhan po'i chung ma dga' byed mas smras pa/_kye ma sems can 'di bram ze'i bu mo 'jo ma'i dku mthong yang sangs rgyas kyi che ba yin par mi shes so/_/ji ltar tsan 
[\[206a.2\]]tsa sgyu ma yin pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyis sgyu ma sprul pa'o/_/de bas na mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal la bdag gis bsnyad do/_/gdol pas khyod la bsnyen par mi nus na/_rgyal po sems can mang po dang 'gro ba'i dpal dang /_byin gyis brgyal bar 'gyur na/_mdun du 
[\[206a.3\]]'dug pa lta ci smos/_de ltar mis mi'i drung du bstan par mi nus na/_lha dang mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstan par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs bsgyur bar lta ga la nus te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro byed pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_
[\[206a.4\]]lto 'phye chen po dang /_sha za dang /_lha ma yin tshad med pa dang /_nam mkha' lding gis de la gnod par byed do/_/gal te 'di lta bu'i sems 'byung na/_bcom ldan 'das kyang sdig byed pa rnam pa mang po ston te/_ma 'ongs pa'i sems can 'di lta bu'i sdig ma rungs pa byed pa 'byung ba dag la yang de 
[\[206a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sgyu ma chen po'i thabs kyi sku ston to zhes zer nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas yang rgyal po shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci sgyu ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po mkhan po dang /_mkhan 
[\[206a.6\]]po'i chung ma dang /_de'i ma sgyu ma gsum gyis smras pa bzhin te/_nga'i sgyu ma ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas na rnam pa de gsum du sprul pa yin te/_sems can bye ba mang po bsgral ba'i phyir sor mo'i phreng ba de ltar byon pa yin no/_/rgyal pos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dgung bdun nas sbyin pa chen 
[\[206a.7\]]po stsal na/_de bzhin gshegs pa sor mo'i phreng ba lho phyogs logs kyi sbyin gnas su gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de bzhin du gyur cig_/de nas lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]dag smras so/_/sgyu ma'i rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' chen thabs kyi sku/_/thabs kyi mtshan nyid rab tu phun sum tshogs/_/thabs mchog dam pa'i chos rnams rab tu ston/_/thabs kyi dbyings rnams su yang 'jog par mdzad/_/thabs kyis sprul pa dag ni yongs su 
[\[206b.2\]]ston/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtha' yas te/_/blo gros mtha' yas grags pa'ang mtha' yas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzi brjid mtha' yas te/_/bde gshegs mtha' yas stobs chen ston mdzad pa/_/gsang ba mtha' las mtha' yas dgongs dag ston/_/'jig rten rab tu snang 
[\[206b.3\]]mdzad mtha' yas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer mtha' yas pa/_/yon tan mtha' med grangs las shin tu 'das/_/de bzhin gshegs ni mtshungs med dpag tu med/_/chags med ye shes nam mkha' lta bur ston/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni nam mkha' bzhin/_/'jam dpal 
[\[206b.4\]]gzhon gyur phan byed zhi bar byed/_/sor phreng slad du bde gshegs gshegs pa ni/_/gshegs dang ma gshegs shes kyang brjod mi nus/_/bde gshegs sgra gcan zin ltar snyoms par gzigs/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das dgyes so/_/lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri 
[\[206b.5\]]zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_nyan thos de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_mdzod 'dzin gyi rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de dag thams cad kyang sor mo'i phreng ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[206b.6\]]dpa'i spyod pa dang /_de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/shin tu rgyas pa'i lung theg pa chen po'i mdo las me tog u dum bA ra ltar rab tu rnyed dka' ba/_
[\[206b.7\]]'phags pa sor mo'i phreng ba la phan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya pra b+ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de d+harma tA shI la dang /_rgya'i lo ts+tsha ba ban de tong A tsar+ya la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]{D214}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_rA dza de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_rgyal po la gdams pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 
[\[207a.2\]]'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/_de ring rgyal po gzugs can 
[\[207a.3\]]snying po gdul bar bya ba'i dus la bab kyis yul ma ga d+hAr 'gro bar bya'o zhes gsungs nas/_'khor dang bcas pa ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la ldings te gshegs pa blon po zla ba bzang pos mthong nas rgyal po la smras pa/_lha lags sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa 'o skol gyi yul du 
[\[207a.4\]]byon pas grong khyer brgyan pa dang bsnyen bkur bya bar rigs so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'dzam bu'i gling na nga las che ba med par su la bsnyen bkur byed ces slar nyid du dregs par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i pho brang gi sgor gdan bshams pa la bcom ldan 'das 
[\[207a.5\]]'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs so/_/de ltar bzhugs par shes nas rgyal pos gyad chen po'i 'degs pa zhes bya ba rbad de rdo shin tu che ba bcom ldan 'das la 'phangs so/_/rdo de nam mkha' la lding zhing de las sgra 'di skad ces grag go/_/kye ma 'dus byas rtag pa med/_/skye zhing 'gog 
[\[207a.6\]]pa'i chos can yin/_/skye ba yod na 'chi ba yod/_/'du ba yod na 'bral ba yod/_/bsags pa yod na 'dzad pa yod/_/lang tsho'i mdog kyang nad kyis 'phrog_/'tsho ba'i tshe yang 'chi bas 'phrog_/chags par gyur na sdug bsngal 'phel/_/skyo bar byas na thar bar 'gyur/_/zhes 
[\[207a.7\]]pa de rgyal po gzugs can snying pos thos pas mos par gyur te thad du song nas thal mo sbyar te 'khod pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po chos la mos par bya/_khong du chud par bya/_bsgo bar bya/_yid 'byung bar bya'o/_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]ldan 'das gang la skyo bar bgyi/_yid 'byung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'khor ba las skyo zhing yid 'byung bar bya'o/_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_ci'i phyir 'khor ba las skyo zhing yid 'byung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'khor 
[\[207b.2\]]ba 'di mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i phyir ro/_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'di ji skad mi rtag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_snod kyi 'jig rten 'di yang mi rtag la/_bcud kyi sems can yang mi rtag go/_/rgyal pos 
[\[207b.3\]]gsol pa/_snod kyi 'jig rten ji ltar mi rtag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_snod kyi 'jig rten ri rab gling khams kyang /_/'jig pa'i dus tshe bskal pa'i me byung nas/_/thal ba'i lhag ma tsam yang ma lus so/_/chu dang rlung gis 'jig pa de bzhin no/_/
[\[207b.4\]]gzhan yang dbyar drod skye la dgun grang skam/_/lo legs lo nyes than zhod nges pa med/_/lo zla 'das shing 'jig pa'i dus dang nye/_/de la sogs te mi rtag mngon sum ni/_/rtag pa yin na ci phyir 'gyur zhing 'gro/_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_bcud kyi sems can ji ltar mi 
[\[207b.5\]]rtag pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bcud kyi sems can tshe 'di nyid la yang /_/nyin zhag lo zla rim gyis gcod byed pas/_/nyin zhag 'das shing 'chi dang phar phar nye/_/mi shir 'dod kyang rang la rang dbang med/_/skye rga na 'chi rang thag ri mo 'dra/_/'chi 
[\[207b.6\]]bdag bdud ni so bya nya sdod 'dra/_/'chi ba'i rkyen ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/'chi rkyen ma song dngos po gang yang med/_/lus 'di zas kyis 'tsho yang brnangs nas 'chi/_/'jig rten 'di na che chung phyug dbul kun/_/'chi bdag dbang du mi 'gyur gang yang med/_/snga ma shi ba'i 
[\[207b.7\]]mi rnams kun gyis kyang /_/rtag tu re nas bu dang nor bsags kyang /_/bu nor phyir lus bdag la phan pa med/_/rang gi dge sdig gnyis dang 'grogs te 'chi/_/da ltar rang gi gnas pa'i ring 'di la'ang /_/dga' bshes gnyen 'dun mdza' dang mi mdza' dang /_/na tshod 'thun dang 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]rgan gzhon ji snyed cig_/shi ba mthong zhing thos pa ma yin nam/_/sa steng gnas pa'i sems can 'di kun yang /_/lo brgya tshun chad sdod kyang ma lus 'chi/_/de bas rang re'ang 'chi ba'i chos can yin/_/deng 'chi sang 'chi sus kyang mi shes te/_/tshod 
[\[208a.2\]]'dzin pa yang mi 'jigs sbyin med pas/_sang phod deng sang bdag nyid ji ltar 'gyur/_/'chi ba'i tshe na pha ma bu tsha dang /_/phu nu mdza' bshes bran khol nor kun kyang /_/bdag nyid 'chi ba'i phyi na 'ong med pas/_/sdug bsngal skal len 'ga' yang yod ma yin/_/de bas skyes 
[\[208a.3\]]kyang bdag nyid gcig pu skyes/_tha ma 'chi yang bdag nyid gcig pu 'chi/_/skad cig tshe las 'thun pa nye gzhi rnams/_/'gron po gnas 'thun tsam ste so sor 'gro/_/skad cig tsam yang 'bral bar mi phod pa'i/_/gnyen dang nor rdzas yul mkhar kun bor nas/_/bdag 
[\[208a.4\]]nyid gcig pu 'jigs pa'i lam du 'gro/_/ji tsam sdig dang bsdos nas nor bsags kyang /_sdig pa'i rnam smin rmongs pa bdag nyid 'khur/_/bsags pa'i nor ni khong dag bu tshas 'khyer/_/de phyir bsags pa'i nor gyis ci zhig phan/_/bdag la shin tu phangs pa'i 
[\[208a.5\]]lus 'di yang /_/shi ba'i dus su rdza zhig bzhin du 'bor/_/lhan cig skyes pa'i sha rus gnyis kyang 'bye/_/dbang med bdag nyid gcig pu 'khyams nas ni/_/las kyi dbang gis gang du skyes gyur na/_/de bas lus kyi phyir ni sdig mi bya/_/lus 'di sa gting 
[\[208a.6\]]'gro ste chog mi shes/_/mi gtsang las byung mi gtsang phung po yin/_/na rga 'chi sogs sdug bsngal kun gyi gnas/_/shi nas lus bor sa yi phyogs tsam btsog_/bya dang khyi spyang la sogs rnams kyis za/_/bsnyen bkur 'bad kyang 'chi bdag srin pos 'phrog_/mkhas 
[\[208a.7\]]pas smod cing blun po chags pa'i gnas/_/de bas mkhas pa lus la su zhig chags/_/lus kyi phyir ni ya ngar 'jug mi bya/_/'di la gla rngan gos zas byin nas su/_/yun gyi phan phyir bsod nams sog tu gzhug_/bdag gi grogs ni dge sdig gnyis las med/_/
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]de yang dge ba mtho ris thar pa'i rgyu/_/sdig pa ngan song sdug bsngal 'byung ba'i rgyu/_/ma shi bar du'ang lus ni mi rtag ste/_/bu chung byis pa gzhon nu nyid du 'gyur/_/de nas dar la bab dang dar yol dang /_/rgas par gyur te lus 'di rtag na ni/_/gnas skabs de snyed cig ni 
[\[208b.2\]]cis te 'gyur/_/longs spyod bde sdug rnams kyang mi rtag ste/_/btsan phyug 'dzom pa sdug phongs can du 'gyur/_/sdug phongs can yang btsan phyug 'dzom par 'gyur/_/lang tsho longs spyod na rga 'chi bas 'joms/_/'jig rten chos 'di thams cad mi rtag go/_/rgyal 
[\[208b.3\]]po gzugs can snying pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba pa 'di'i sdug bsngal ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'khor ba pa la nam yang bde ba med/_/byas pa thams cad don med sdug bsngal rgyu/_/sdug bsngal gtso bo skye rga na 'chi 
[\[208b.4\]]bzhi/_/dmyal bar skyes na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra'o/_/dmyal srungs dang ni dmyal ba'i me mthong nas/_/shin tu skrag dngangs cho nges cher 'debs shing /_/rang la rngan 'grang sngon gyi sdig pa la/_/shin tu 'gyod kyang phan pa ci yang med/_/lus 'di shin tu che la 
[\[208b.5\]]gzhon sha can/_/tshor ba che zhing drag po'i lus thob nas/_/kha cig rang lus me yi phung por 'bar/_/kha cig lcags mkhar khang pa sbrum mar rdung /_/'gre ldog byed cing phyogs ni kun nas sreg_/kha cig lcags las byas pa'i snod chen du/_/spyi tshugs 'bru 
[\[208b.6\]]nyungs chu khol thug bzhin 'tshed/_/kha cig sog les 'dra zhing gtun la rdung /_/kha cig gnas dang khang par srung zhing sreg_/me ma mur dang thal tshan chu la sogs/_/sdug bsngal mang po bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/mi yi lo ni 'bum dang brgyad khri la/_/dmyal ba kha 
[\[208b.7\]]cig na ni nyin zhag gcig_/de la sogs pa bskal pa'i bar du gnas/_/shi bar dga' yang 'chir ni mi btub bo/_/las ma zad pa kha cig 'jig chags tshe/_/'jig rten brgyud cing 'jig chags med par skye/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]skyes pa bkres dang skom pas gdungs/_/mgo 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]bo ri tsam kha ni khab mig tsam/_/ske rtsa rab phra gsus pa yul ljongs tsam/_/bza' btung mthong yang gzhan gyis bsrungs pa dang /_/rnag khrag ngan skyugs la sogs gzhan du mthong /_/kha cig zos kyang khro chu khol mar 'gro/_/byol song skyes na gcig la 
[\[209a.2\]]gcig za dang /_/rang la dbang med bkol btags rdeg 'tshog dang /_/gzhan gyis gsod sogs gti mug rmongs pas sdug_/mir skyes na yang mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/_/ma ni 'grangs tshe brag bar btsir ba 'dra/_/bkres pa'i tshe na spyang la btang ba snyam/_/drag shul 
[\[209a.3\]]byed tshe gtun la rdung ba snyam/_/btsas pa'i tshe na pags pa bshus nas ni/_/rtsig pa'i logs la drud pa bas kyang rtsub/_/tsha 'brum bkres skom rkang lag na nas sdug_/cher skyes na yang so nam brel phongs dang /_/nye du bral dang dgras bcom bu lon dang /_/bkres 
[\[209a.4\]]skom tsha grang don la sogs pas sdug_/phongs pa rnams ni btsal thabs med nas sdug_/yod pa rnams kyang 'tsho skyong mel tshes sdug_/zhing rmo tshong byed 'du byed las kyi sdug_/de la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab/_/sdug bsngal gzhi ni phal cher lto rgyab 
[\[209a.5\]]gnyis/_/'jig rten 'di yi bde ba'i longs spyod kyang /_/phal cher phyi ma'i ngan song sdug bsngal rgyu/_/lha min skyes na nga rgyal phrag dog dang /_/khro gtum 'thab rtsod la sogs dbang gis sdug_/lhar skyes kyang ni 'chi 'pho ltung ba dang /_/'chi ltas lnga dang 'du 
[\[209a.6\]]byed dbang gis sdug_/rgas pa yang ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal te/_/mgo dkar gnyer 'dus gzhan gyis mthong mi mos/_/kha sna chu 'dzag rkang lag kun kyang 'dar/_/sems kyis dran yang lus la nyam stobs med/_/bu tsha kun kyang shi na rung snyam sems/_/zhal ta 
[\[209a.7\]]byas kyang mi nyan dbang yang shor/_/kha cig srin rgan shi 'phyis zhes kyang zer/_/kha cig ber dbyug thogs nas rdung bar byed/_/de ltar mthong thos shir 'dod shir ma btub/_/na ba rnams ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal te/_/lus kyi 'byung chen bzhi ni ma snyoms pas/_/rlung mkhris bad 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]kan 'dus pas lus gdungs te/_/longs spyod mthong yang 'di la 'dod pa med/_/lus kyi nyam stobs shor bas ldang mi nus/_/mdzes pa'i gzi mdangs shor bas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'dra/_/'chi ba rnams kyang 'di ltar sdug bsngal te/_/gnyen bshes tshogs kyis cho nge 
[\[209b.2\]]'debs byed kyang /_/de la nyan lta bsam pa'i yul med de/_/gnad gcod pa ni mtshon chas gtub pa 'dra/_/mdza' dang mi mdza'i don du sngar byas pa'i/_/dge sdig las ni rmi lam yul bzhin snang /_/gshin rje'i pho nya shin tu 'jigs pas bskor/_/bred sha thon nas 
[\[209b.3\]]kun tu bltas byas kyang /_/mgon skyabs byed pa su yang ma mthong nas/_/shin tu 'jigs bzhin kun tu yi mug ste/_/bdag nyid gar 'gro gtol med bar do 'byung /_/mi rtag sdug bsngal mi zad yun ring 'di/_/thog ma med nas da lta'i bar du yang /_/'phags lam ma 
[\[209b.4\]]thob bar du rtag tu gdung /_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'di shin tu sdug bsngal ba lags na bde legs dang ldan pa gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa ni bde legs phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/rgyal pos 
[\[209b.5\]]gsol pa/_ji ltar bde legs phun sum tshogs pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba bde ba'i mchog_/rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin dang nyon mongs med/_/ngan song gsum sogs bkres skom grang dro dang /_/skye rga na 'chi la sogs sdug 
[\[209b.6\]]bsngal med/_/'khor ba mi rtag sdug bsngal gtan zad nas/_/las su gzhan don 'ba' zhig spyod byed cing /_/mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'khor ba las yid byung nas rgyal srid mchil ma'i 
[\[209b.7\]]thal ba ltar bor te/_mya ngan las 'das pa bsgrub pa la gzhol bar gyur to/_/de ltar gyur pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po legs so legs so/_/rjes thams cad kyi nang na glang po che'i rjes mchog go/_/me tog rnams kyi nang na pad ma dkar 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]po mchog go/_/'du shes thams cad kyi nang na mi rtag pa'i 'du shes mchog go/_/bsam pa rnams kyi nang na 'khor ba las yid byung ba mchog go/_/rgyal po chen po 'khor ba las yid byung ba legs so/_/skyo ba skyes pa legs so/_/chags na 'khor ba 
[\[210a.2\]]yin no/_/ma chags na mya ngan las 'das pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying po la sogs pa thams cad yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/rgyal po gzugs can snying 
[\[210a.3\]]po la gdams pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la dang /_ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_/[{D215}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_rA dza de sha nA 
[\[210a.4\]]ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_rgyal po la gdams pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po bA rA Na sI na 'khor 
[\[210a.5\]]rnams la chos ston pa na/_bad sa la'i rgyal po 'char byed 'dul ba'i dus la bab par gzigs nas 'khor dang bcas pa bad sa la'i yul du gshegs pa dang /_bad sa la'i rgyal po 'char byed grong khyer chen po gser can zhes bya ba gzhom pa'i phyir dmag bzhi dang chas pa dang phrad
