[\[210a.6\]]pas rgyal po 'char byed khros te/_'di 'dra ba'i bkra mi shis pa dang phrad pas bsad par rigs so zhes nas mda' ste'u kha nya rnga ma blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'phangs so/_/de nas mda' de nam mkha' la 'khor zhing 'di skad ces grag go/_/zhe sdang gis ni sdug bsngal 
[\[210a.7\]]skyed/_/'dir yang sha thang 'thab dang rtsod/_/phyi mar dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung /_/des na zhe sdang 'thab rtsod spang /_/zhes bya ba'i tshig de rgyal po 'char byed kyis thos par gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la mos par gyur te phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po 'thab rtsod ni 'dir sha thang la phyi mar ngan song du skye na ci'i phyir rtag tu 'thab rtsod 'ba' zhig byed/_rgyal pos gsol pa/_gauta ma bdag gis gang dang 'thabs kyang pham ma myong ste rgyal bas bdag ni dmag dang 'thab pa la 
[\[210b.2\]]mos pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po dgra 'di ni dgra chung ngu yin te/_rgyal po chen po 'di ma yin pa'i dgra chen po shar gnyer ba zhig yod do/_/rgyal pos gsol pa dgra de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[210b.3\]]dgra chen po nyon mongs pa bdag tu 'dzin pa zhes bya ba zhig yod do/_/rgyal pos gsol pa dgra de ji lta bu lags bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa'i dgra chen po/_/'di ni rgyu bzhin dngos po med bzhin du/_/thog ma med nas 
[\[210b.4\]]bdag la gnas nas ni/_/bdag gi chos sku yid bzhin rin chen de/_/gzod ma'i mu nas dgra yis brkus nas su/_/mtshan ma'i tshang tshing gseb tu sbas nas bdag_/da rung 'ching zhing 'khor bar 'khyam du 'jug_/'jig rten dgras ni bsad nas nor 'phrog tsam/_/
[\[210b.5\]]de la bzod byas bsod nams tshogs kyang rdzogs/_/dgra 'di zhi bde thar pa'i srog kyang gcod/_/de bsten bsod nams 'khor bar 'dam du 'ching /_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_dgra chen po de dang ji ltar 'thab par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rnam 
[\[210b.6\]]rtog dgra la rgol ba'i shom ra yang /_/dad pas sbyin dang tshul khrims mkhar brtsigs te/_/dge ba'i dpung byas bzod pa'i go gyon la/_/brtson 'grus lcag thogs bsam gtan gzhu bdungs te/_/bdag med stong pa'i mda' yis bdag 'dzin bsad/_/rgyal pos 
[\[210b.7\]]gsol pa bdag med pa zhes pa de bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang zag bdag med rgyal po mnyan par gyis/_/gang zag lnga phung rgyun yin ci phyir na/_/rgyu ni las dang nyon mongs pas gang nas/_/'bras bu phung por zag ste de yi bdag_/
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]bdag ni sems can so so'i lus 'di la/_/nga dang bdag tu bzung nas chags gyur te/_/bdag ni na dang shi bkres grang gis dogs/_/bstod na dga' zhing smad na mi dga' ste/_/de la dmigs nas mu stegs lnga rnams 'jug_/nga 'am bdag de yod pa ma yin te/_/
[\[211a.2\]]phung po 'di la brtags nas 'khrul pa yin/_/ming ni bdag ma yin te btags pa tsam/_/lus ni bdag ma yin te sha rus rnams/_/'byung chen 'dus pa phyi rol rtsig pa 'dra/_/sems kyang bdag ma yin te dngos po med/_/chos la bdag med rgyal po mnyan par gyis/_/
[\[211a.3\]]chos ni gzugs sogs dngos po thams cad yin/_/byed pa med la mtshan nyid 'dzin phyir ro/_/de dag log rtog mtshan mar bcas pa dang /_/lta mi 'thun pa yin te de med do/_/ci phyir zhe na phyi nang chos 'di la/_/dngos 'di spangs nas stong nyid mi btsal gyi/_/snang ba nyid na 
[\[211a.4\]]stong pa nyid yin phyir/_/gzhig bcom mi rtag tsam la stong ming gdags/_/snang la rang bzhin med par cis mngon na/_/yod med dbus dang gsum du mi gnas te/_/yod par grags pa 'khor ba mya ngan 'das/_/'khor ba'i rang bzhin yul sems rnam gnyis te/_/yul 'di 
[\[211a.5\]]dngos po med par 'di ltar brtag_/rang snang rdul bshig rdul yang chas gzhig med/_/dngos snang thams cad sems yin rmi lam bzhin/_/sems kyang kha dog dbyibs sogs rnams dang bral/_/des na 'khor ba stong zhing bdag med do/_/'khor ba med pas mya ngan 'das pa'ang 
[\[211a.6\]]med/_/yod pa ma grub pas na med pa'ang med/_/mtha' gnyis med phyir dbus kyang med pa yin/_/de ltar rgyal pos bdag med bsgom byas na/_/bdag 'dzin 'khor ba rtsad nas chod par 'gyur/_/rgyal pos gsol pa/_snga gong yan chad dgra ma yin pa la dgrar bzung ste bdag zhe sdang 
[\[211a.7\]]gis mnar bar gyur to/_/da ni bdag gis yang dag pa'i dgra ngo shes pas dgra de dang 'thab pa'i phyir bdag med pa la mos par gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po legs so/_/bdag tu 'dzin pa'i dgra pham par byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed la sogs pa yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/bad sa la'i rgyal po 'char byed la gdams pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na shI la dang /_
[\[211b.2\]]ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/_/[{D216}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a dzA ta sha tru kau kr-it+t+ya bi no da na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa ma skyes dgra'i 'gyod pa bsal ba zhes 
[\[211b.3\]]bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi ri bya rgod kyi phung po la/_dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong 
[\[211b.4\]]gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas lhags pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/_gzungs thob pa/_spobs pa thogs pa med pa/_mi skye ba'i chos la 
[\[211b.5\]]bzod pa thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs sgrub pa shes shing mkhas pa/_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa ji ltar mos pa bzhin du chos ston pa rnams dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang /_tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po dang /_de ma yin 
[\[211b.6\]]pa gzhan lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po brgya stong mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/yang de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ri zhig gi bang rim gyi 
[\[211b.7\]]ngos la skyes bu dam pa nyi shu rtsa lnga dang lhan cig tu gnas pa 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' klu dpal dang /_klus byin dang /_dpal 'byung dang /_dpal gyi snying po dang /_pad ma bla ma'i dpal dang /_pad ma dpal 'byung dang /_skye bo 'dzin dang /_sa 'dzin dang /_lag 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]na rin chen dang /_lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang /_seng ge'i blo gros dang /_seng ge'i 'gros bsgrags dbyangs dang /_nam mkha' mdzod dang /_sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang /_tshig gi rab tu tha dad pa thams cad la spobs pa dang /_spobs 
[\[212a.2\]]pa'i phung po dang /_blo gros rgya mtsho dang /_lhun po chen po dang /_mthong na dga' ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang /_mtha' yas mthong ba dang /_mtha' yas dmigs par gnas pa dang /_bdud kyi lta ba yang dag par 'joms pa dang /_mya ngan med sbyin dang /_don thams cad grub 
[\[212a.3\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_skyes bu dam pa nyi shu rtsa lnga po de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas so/_/dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu bzhi yang chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur te/_lha'i bu kun nas me tog ces bya ba dang /_
[\[212a.4\]]lha'i bu me tog 'od zer can zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu me tog man dA ra ba'i dri zhes bya ba dang /_lha'i bu chos la gnas par rtag tu brtson pa zhes bya ba de dag dang /_lha'i bu mang po gzhan dag kyang 'di lta ste/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar 
[\[212a.5\]]gyur to/_/'di lta ste/_skyes bu dam pa de dag dang /_lha'i bu de dag tshogs shing 'khod pa las bar skabs su kye grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni rgya che ba/_dpag tu med pa/_tshad med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_mnyam pa med pa/_gzhal du med pa/_mi rtogs 
[\[212a.6\]]pa/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/_bla na med pa yin te/_de ni go cha dam pa ma yin pas rtogs par mi nus na go cha ji tsam zhig bgos na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ye shes chen po de rtogs par nus zhes de lta bu'i gtam rjod par gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' klu dpal 
[\[212a.7\]]gyis smras pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa bsngo ba la chog mi shes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la gzhog par gnas shing mi brjed pa'i go cha bgos pas ye shes chen po de rtogs par nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' klus byin gyis smras pa/_sems snyoms pa dang /_sems 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]dul ba dang /_sems 'jam pa dang /_sems drang ba dang /_sems mnyen pa dang /_sems cang shes pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yi dam brtan po snying po la gnas pa'i go cha bgos pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes/_ye shes chen po de rtogs par nus so/_/byang 
[\[212b.2\]]chub sems dpa' dpal 'byung gis smras pa/_kye grogs po dag bskal pa'i grangs kyis ye shes chen po de rtogs par mi nus kyi/_bskal pa dpag tu med par go cha bgos pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de rtogs par nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi 
[\[212b.3\]]snying pos smras pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi bde ba la chags shing gnas pas ye shes chen po de rtogs par mi nus kyi/_bdag gi bde ba la ma chags pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de rtogs par nus te/_gang zang zing med pa lan du bya ba ma yin pa'i bde 
[\[212b.4\]]ba de sems can thams cad la bstabs so zhes sems can thams cad bde zhing bde ba dang ldan pa la gzhog par byed pa des thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de rtogs par nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' pad ma bla ma'i dpal gyis smras pa/_bdag nyid ma dul/_ma bsrungs/_
[\[212b.5\]]ma byang ba des pha rol ma dul ma bsrungs/_ma byang ba dul bar bya ba dang /_zhi bar bya ba'i gnas de ni med kyis/_bdag nyid shin tu dul/_shin tu bsrungs/_shin tu byang ba des pha rol ma dul/_ma bsrungs/_ma byang ba/_dul bar bya ba dang /_zhi bar bya ba'i gnas de ni yod do zhes 
[\[212b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de skad gsungs te/_de bas na dul ba dang zhi gnas kyi rnal 'byor la zhugs shing pha rol dul ba dang /_zhi gnas dang 'thun par bya ba la mkhas pas ye shes chen po de rtogs par nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' pad ma dpal 'byung gis smras pa/_
[\[212b.7\]]kye grogs po dag 'jig rten gyi chos dang 'brel pas 'jig rten las 'da' bar mi nus kyi/_gang 'jig rten gyi chos dang ma 'brel ba de ni 'jig rten las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' gang rnyed pa dang /_ma rnyed pa dang /_grags pa dang /_ma grags pa dang /_
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]bstod pa dang /_smad pa dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal bas mi 'phrogs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma khengs pa/_ma dud pa des ni ye shes chen po de rtogs par sla'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' skye bo 'dzin gyis smras pa/_kye grogs po dag gzhan 
[\[213a.2\]]la klan ka tshol bas ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen po de rtogs par mi nus kyi/_gcig pu gnyis su med la bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi phyir go cha chen po bgos pas sems can thams cad kyi gang ci yang rung /_yongs su thob par bya ba de thams cad bdag 
[\[213a.3\]]gis yongs su thob par bya'o zhes/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du sems bskyed de/_yud tsam du yang brtson 'grus mi gtong zhing de ltar brtson 'grus la gnas pa'i byang chub 
[\[213a.4\]]sems dpas ye shes chen po de rtogs par nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin gyis smras pa/_kye grogs po dag 'di lta ste/_dper na sa ni rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal thams cad kyi gnas yin te/_de la gnas shing rtswa dang /_shing 
[\[213a.5\]]gel pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal gyi sa bon thams cad skye bar 'gyur mod kyi sa chen po de ni lan re ba yang med do/_/sems can thams cad kyang sa chen po las 'tsho mod kyi/_sa chen po ni skyo bar yang mi byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chags pa dang /_
[\[213a.6\]]zhe sdang ba'i sems dang bral ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba dang lan re ba med pa'i phyir sa dang 'dra bar sems bskyed na ye shes chen po de rtogs par nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen gyis smras pa/_kye grogs po dag shes par gyis shig 'di ni go 
[\[213a.7\]]cha chen po yin te/_dman pa la mos pas ni ye shes chen po de rtogs par mi nus kyi/_gang gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na yang theg pa gnyis la sems mi 'jug cing rin po che'i sems thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de pha rol dag kyang 'dod par byed du 'jug la rin po che'i 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]sems de la ser sna mi byed kyi/_sems can thams cad kyang theg pa chen po'i go cha de skon par byed cing sems mnyam pa med pa de 'ang gang ba'am bri bar yang mi mthong zhing /_de ltar ser sna med pa'i sems kyis ye shes chen po de rtogs par nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' lag na 
[\[213b.2\]]rin chen phyag rgyas smras pa/_kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni 'gro ba drug tu lhung gis/_de dang de dag tu snying rje chen po bskyed de/_sems can thams cad la chos kyi phyag rgya rin po che'i phyag rgya gsum gyis btab pa sbyin par bya ste/_sems can thos pa nyung ba rnams la ni 
[\[213b.3\]]thos pa'i lag pa sbyin par bya'o/_/sems can ser sna can rnams la ni gtong ba'i lag pa sbyin par bya'o/_/sems can ngang tshul ngan pa can rnams la ni tshul khrims kyi lag pa sbyin par bya'o/_/sems can gnod sems can rnams la ni bzod pa'i lag pa sbyin par 
[\[213b.4\]]bya'o/_/sems can le lo can rnams la ni brtson 'grus kyi lag pa sbyin par bya'o/_/sems can dran pa nyams pa rnams la ni bsam gtan thob pa'i lag pa sbyin par bya'o/_/sems can shes rab 'chal pa rnams la ni shes rab kyi lag pa sbyin par bya ste/_sems 
[\[213b.5\]]can dag chos dkar po gang dang gang dag las bral bar gyur pa'i chos de dang de dag nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir lag pa sbyin par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i lag pa yang rin po che'i phyag rgya gsum gyis gdab par bya'o/_/gsum gang 
[\[213b.6\]]dag yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bsngo ba rin po che'i phyag rgyas gdab par bya ba dang /_bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'grub pa rin po che'i phyag rgyas gdab par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad 
[\[213b.7\]]nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgyas gdab par bya ba ste/_rigs kyi bu de 'dra ba'i gnas la gnas pas ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen po de rtogs par nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i blo gros kyis smras pa/_kye ma'o grogs po dag 'di ni mi 'jigs 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]pa'i go cha'o/_/'di ni mi skrag pa'i go cha'o/_/'di ni ma zhum pa'i go cha'o/_/'di ni le lo med pa'i go cha'o/_/kye grogs po dag de bas na mi 'jigs pa dang /_sems mi skrag pa dang /_ma zhum pa dang /_le lo med pa dang /_'jigs shing skrag pa skyi bung zhes byed pa 
[\[214a.2\]]dang bral ba dang /_'khor ba'i nyes pa mi skyed pa dang /_mya ngan las 'da' ba'i yon tan yang dag par mthong ba dang /_bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba'i chos la snyoms par gnas pa dang /_mi gnyis pa la gnas pa dang ldan pas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par sla'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[214a.3\]]dpa' seng ge'i 'gros bsgrags dbyangs kyis smras pa/_kye grogs po dag 'gros de ni skyes bu ngan pa'i ma yin gyi/_de ni skyes bu dam pa'i 'gros yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_skyes bu dam pa dag ni sdig pa'i lta ba dang bral bas yang dag pa la zhugs pa yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa 
[\[214a.4\]]dag ni rtag par drang ba'i rang bzhin dang ldan pas g.yo med pa yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni bla ma la rim gro skyes pas nga rgyal bcom pa yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni bstan na 'thun par len pas tshig bzang ba yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba la gnas pas las 
[\[214a.5\]]kyi mtha' grags pa yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni skyo ba dang bral bas 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni khong khro ba dang bral bas zhe sdang dang bral ba yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni zhi ba rab tu zhi ba nye bar zhi bas mun pa mun nag dang bral ba yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa 
[\[214a.6\]]dag ni sdug bsngal ba dang dbul po la snying rje bar gyur pas 'jam pa rnams yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su dag pas 'dzem pa dang bcas pa yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni de dag bya ba la yang dag par zhugs pas ji skad smras 
[\[214a.7\]]pa bzhin du byed pa yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni rtag tu brtul ba brtan pas lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni log pa'i chos dang bral bas bden pa la gnas pa yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni chos kyi dga' bas dga' zhing mgu bas chos 'dod pa yin 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni lus dang srog gtong bas dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni sems can thams cad dang 'brel bas mi gtong ba yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni don dam pa'i rjes su 'jug pas nyes pa mthong ba yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa 
[\[214b.2\]]dag ni sdig pa'i chos rnam par spangs pas dge ba'i chos la zhugs pa yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni dbul po rnams kyi gter yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni nad pa rnams kyi sman pa yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni 'jigs pa rnams kyi mgon yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni 
[\[214b.3\]]dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi skyabs yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor zhugs pa rnams kyi gnas yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni rten med pa rnams kyi rten yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni mun pa mun nag tu zhugs pa rnams kyi snang bar byed pa yin no/_/skyes bu 
[\[214b.4\]]dam pa dag ni lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams kyi 'dren pa yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni chos smra ba rnams kyi yongs su 'dren pa yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag ni bzod pa dang dul ba'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas tha ba'i nyes pa dang /_gnod sems dang /_gnong ba 'chab pa dang /_khro 
[\[214b.5\]]ba'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad dang bral ba yin te/_de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa dag de 'dra ba'i chos la gnas pas ni ye shes chen po de rtogs par nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/_nam mkha' dpag tu med pa bzhin du byams pa sgom pa'i 
[\[214b.6\]]rnal 'byor dang ldan pa/_snying rje chen po la gnas pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/_dbang po rtag tu dga' zhing dgod pa/_'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad la btang snyoms su gtong ba/_sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_bzod pa nam mkha' 
[\[214b.7\]]dang mtshungs pa/_brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor los sgyur bas 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]smras pa/_sems bskyed pa gang las bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par mi 'gyur ba dang /_lha mi dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_bdag gi dge ba'i phyogs yongs su 'bri bar 'gyur ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni byang chub 
[\[215a.2\]]sems dpas mi bskyed par bya'i/_sems bskyed pa gang las bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par 'gyur ba dang /_lha dag dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_bdag gi dge ba'i phyogs yongs su 'bri bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems bskyed pa 
[\[215a.3\]]de dag ni bskyed par bya ste/_de de ltar zhugs na sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' des sems bskyed ma thag tu rgyu dang dmigs pa'i rkyen ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang /_de bzhin 
[\[215a.4\]]gshegs pa'i byang chub kyang ma skyes pa las rtogs par 'gyur la/_byang chub ji lta bar chos kyi 'khor los sgyur ba yang de bzhin du shes te/_sems kyi bsam pa'i go cha de dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi rab tu tha dad pa thams 
[\[215a.5\]]cad la spobs pas smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa dag byang chub ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba ste/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rjes su song ba/_rnam par byang ba'i rjes su song ba/_'dus byas kyi rjes su song ba/_'dus ma byas kyi rjes su song ba/_zag pa dang bcas pa'i rjes su song 
[\[215a.6\]]ba/_zag pa med pa'i rjes su song ba/_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i rjes su song ba/_kha na ma tho ba med pa'i rjes su song ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rjes su song ba/_mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rjes su song ba/_'jig rten gyi chos kyi rjes su song ba/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi rjes 
[\[215a.7\]]su song ba/_'khor ba'i rjes su song ba/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes su song ba/_chad pa dang rtag pa'i rjes su song ba/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched kyi rjes su song ba ste/_skyes bu dam pa dag byang chub ni sa dang chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_nam mkha'i rjes 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]su song ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin te/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/de dag ni brjod pa gang dang gang gis brjod par bya ba'i rnam pa de thams cad stong pa nyid smos par byed pa'o/_/'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i dbyings ni thams 
[\[215b.2\]]cad kyi rjes su song ngo /_/de bzhin du byang chub kyang thams cad kyi rjes su song ste/_skyes bu dam pa dag byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i ye shes la mos pa ni dmigs pa thams cad la spobs pa 'byung zhing de ni tshig gi rab tu tha dad pa shes pa thams cad kyang 'thob par 
[\[215b.3\]]'gyur te/_tshul gcig la 'jug pa des thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i phung pos smras pa/_kye grogs po dag brjod pa thams cad ni brjod du med pa ste/_sgra thams cad bsnyad du med pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ye 
[\[215b.4\]]shes de la mos pa ni sems mi g.yo bar 'dug pa yin te/_snyan par smras pa dang /_mi snyan par smras pa la dga' ba dang zhum pa med do/_/'di lta ste/_dper na ri lhun po'i phung po la rlung bab pa las slar log na ri lhun po ni g.yo ba'ang med/_rab tu g.yo ba'ang med do/_/
[\[215b.5\]]rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de 'dra ba'i ye shes rtogs pas thams cad kyi sgra dang brjod pa kun bzod de/_g.yo bar mi byed/_rab tu g.yo bar mi byed cing pha rol mu stegs can gyi smra ba gang la yang chags par mi 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang /_mu 
[\[215b.6\]]stegs can gyi tshig kyang chos mnyam pa nyid du mthong /_mnyam pa nyid la'ang 'gal bar mi byed/_mu stegs can thams cad kyi spobs pa thams cad kyang zad pa'i chos su mthong /_zad pa'i chos kyi chos la nga rgyal chen por yang mi byed de/_skyes bu dam pa dag byang chub 
[\[215b.7\]]sems dpa' de 'dra ba'i ye shes la mos pa ni myur du thams cad mkhyen pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa dag byang chub sems dpas thos pa thams cad gzung ba'i phyir blo gros rgya mtsho la sems 'jug pa rtogs par 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]bya'o/_/chos nyid la sna tshogs med pa'i phyir des chos ro gcig pa la mos par bya'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi 'gal ba'i phyir des chos nyid la brtag par bya'o/_/thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir chos gang yang ma bri ba dang ma 'phel bar bya'o/_/
[\[216a.2\]]bsod nams mi zad pa'i phyir sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya'o/_/chad pa dang rtag pa las dben pa'i phyir des mtha' gnyis rtogs par bya'o/_/sems kyi sgom pa tshad med pa'i phyir des chos thams cad la brtag par bya'o/_/chos yang dag 
[\[216a.3\]]par mi brjed pa'i phyir bdag gi dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa yang yongs su gzhag par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad la snyoms par chos 'chad pa'i phyir des snyems pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lhur 
[\[216a.4\]]byed pa'i phyir mi dge ba'i chos thams cad dang mi 'grogs par bya'o/_/skyes bu dam pa dag dran pa'i ye shes kyi go cha des ni thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' lhun po chen pos smras pa 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes de ni 'jig rten thams 
[\[216a.5\]]cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i ye shes te/_de ni tshad yod pa'i spyod pas rtogs par mi nus so/_/de bas na bsam pa 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /_thos pa 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /_dad pa 'jig rten thams cad 
[\[216a.6\]]las mngon par 'phags pa dang /_sbyin pa 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /_de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang /_bsod 
[\[216a.7\]]nams ri rab lhun po bzhin du mngon par 'phags pas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthong na dga' bas smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa dag gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi gzugs kyi sems yongs su dag pas gzugs su 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]snang ba yid du mi 'ong ba gang yang mig gis mthong zhing snang bar mi 'gyur/_bdag gi rna ba'i sems yongs su dag pas sgra yid du mi 'ong ba gang yang rna bas thos shing grag par mi 'gyur/_de bzhin du dri yang ma yin/_ro yang ma yin/_reg kyang ma yin/_rang gi yul gyi sems 
[\[216b.2\]]yongs su dag pas chos yid du mi 'ong ba gang yang yid la snang bar mi 'gyur/_rang gi sems yongs su dag pas yid dga' ba dang /_mi dga' ba dang /_ma 'brel cing sems can gang yang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod ma yin par ma mthong ste/_gang log par nges pa de dag 
[\[216b.3\]]kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du 'gyur bar mthong zhing /_gang bdag shin tu dga' bar gyur pa'i dngos po de dga' zhing yongs su gtong la byin nas kyang mi 'gyod pa yin te/_de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par nus so/_/byang chub 
[\[216b.4\]]sems dpa' rab du dga' ba'i rgyal pos smras pa/_gang gi tshe na spyos pa dang /_brgyad pa dang /_smad pa dang /_brnyas pa dang /_brdegs pa dang /_tshar bcad na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba skyed cing gang zag de la yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes 
[\[216b.5\]]skyed la/_bzod par byed/_bzod pa'i mthu ston cing rab tu dga' ba skyes nas spyo bar byed pa 'di su/_gang la spyo bar bya zhes de chos nyid kyi rjes su 'jug par byed/_nang gi stong pa nyid la mos shing phyi'i stong pa nyid la the tsom med pas bdag tu lta ba'ang mi skyed cing bzod la/_
[\[216b.6\]]rkang pa dang lag pa yongs su gtong ba dang /_mig dang mgo yongs su gtong ba dang /_chung ma dang /_bu pho dang bu mo yongs su gtong ba dang /_rgyal srid yongs su gtong bas rab tu dga' ba yin/_lus dang srog yongs su gtong bas dga' ba yin te/_'khor los 
[\[216b.7\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob pas dga' ba ma yin gyi/_legs par bshad pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig thos pas shin tu dga' ba yin/_brgya byin thob pas dga' ba ma yin gyi/_gzhan chos 'chad pa la shin tu dga' ba yin/_tshangs pa thob pas dga' ba ma yin gyi/_
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]sems can gcig kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na rab tu dga' ba yin/_stong gsum rin po ches bkang bas dga' ba ma yin gyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas rab tu dga' ba yin te/_de ni gzhar yang dbang po nyams par mi 'gyur 
[\[217a.2\]]zhing dga' bar gyur nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dga' zhing mgu ba'i spyod pa 'dis sgrub par byed pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas mthong bas smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa dag gang gi tshe na byang chub sems dpa' chos thams 
[\[217a.3\]]cad mthong mod kyi/_bdag tu lta bar yang mi ltung /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shes mod kyi/_rnam par rtog pa spyod pa yang ma yin/_sangs rgyas thams cad mthong mod kyi/_gzugs la dmigs pa'i 'du shes kyang mi skyed/_sems can thams cad mthong mod kyi sems 
[\[217a.4\]]can du 'du shes kyang mi skyed/_las kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir sha'i mig gsal bar gyur pa yin/_mngon par shes pa thob pas lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin/_nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bas shes rab kyi mig rtogs par khong du chud pa yin/_sangs 
[\[217a.5\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa sgrub pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan la mos pa yin/_stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs pas chos kyi spyan snang ba thob pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu de 'dra ba'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su rdzogs pas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[217a.6\]]mtha' yas dmigs par gnas pas smras pa/_byang chub ni thams cad dmigs pa ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dmigs pa thams cad ni nang na yang mi gnas/_phyi rol na yang mi gnas/_dbus na yang mi gnas par brtag par bya'o/_/
[\[217a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa la mi gnas pa ni nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa dang /_las la dmigs pa dang /_bdud la dmigs pas nyams par mi 'gyur te/_las dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_bdud la dmigs pa las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]so/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lta ba yang dag par 'joms pas smras pa/_rigs kyi bu bdag tu lta ba ni bdag tu lta ba las ldang zhing byung ba yin/_bdud kyi las ni lta ba las ldang zhing byung ba ste/_bdag tu lta ba yongs su shes na lta ba 'byung bar mi byed do/_/lta ba yongs su shes na phung 
[\[217b.2\]]po 'byung bar mi byed do/_/phung po yongs su shes na bdud mi mthong ngo /_/bdud kyi yul las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la reg par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob na thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so/_/byang chub 
[\[217b.3\]]sems dpa' mya ngan med sbyin gyis smras pa/_las nyes pa byed pa ni phyis 'gyod par 'gyur/_las legs par byed pa ni phyis mya ngan byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpas las legs pa byed pa/_las mi smad pa byed pa/_las mi 'gyod pa byed pa/_las 
[\[217b.4\]]kha na ma tho ba med pa byed par bya'o/_/sems can mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug pa rnams kyang mya ngan zhi bar bya ba dang /_zug rngu dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir chos bshad par bya ste/_de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' don 
[\[217b.5\]]thams cad grub pas smras pa/_rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu gang zag tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems kyi smon pa 'grub/_smon lam 'grub par 'gyur la/_tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba la yang bag byed pa rten/_bag byed pa'i rtsa ba la yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams rten/_
[\[217b.6\]]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi rtsa ba la yang thams cad mkhyen pa rten to/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' bag byed pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la rten pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so/_/lha'i bu kun nas me tog gis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/_
[\[217b.7\]]dper na shing me tog gis brgyan pa ni 'gro ba mang po'i nye bar 'tsho ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i chos kyi me tog rgyas pa ni 'gro ba mang po'i nye bar 'tsho ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/_dper 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]na lha rnams kyi shing pa ri ya tra ka ko ba di ra me tog rgyas na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu rnams mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i chos kyi me tog rgyas na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[218a.2\]]mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/_dper na lha'i nor bu rin po che skyon thams cad dang bral la yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa de bzhin du/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa yongs su dag pa skyon thams cad dang bral la yon tan thams cad dang 
[\[218a.3\]]ldan pas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so/_/lha'i bu me tog 'od zer can gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na nyi ma'i 'od zer btang na mun pa bsal cing gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' shes 
[\[218a.4\]]rab kyi snang ba'i 'od zer dang ldan pa yang gang gi tshe na chos kyi snang ba gtong ba de'i tshe/_ma rig pa dang glen pa'i mun pas bsgribs pa'i sems can rnams la snang ba chen po byed cing chos kyi rang bzhin yang ston te/_mun pas ni snang ba zil gyis non par mi 'gyur gyi/_snang 
[\[218a.5\]]bas ni lam rtogs par nus pas byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas na sems can lam ngan par zhugs pa'i rnams la yang dag pa'i lam ston te/_byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas na thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so/_/lha'i bu me tog man dA ra ba'i dris smras pa/_/
[\[218a.6\]]rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste dper na/_me tog man dA ra ba'i kho ra khor yug dpag tshad gcig tu dris khyab par byed de/_dri de yang rnam par rtog pa med do/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gtong ba dang /_tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[218a.7\]]dang /_shes rab la gnas pa yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dris khyab par byed de/_dri de yang nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad sel bar byed do/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dri dang ldan na thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so/_/lha'i bu chos la gnas 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]pa rtag tu brtson pas smras pa/_kye grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' brtson pas byang chub par 'gyur gyi/_mi brtson pas ni ma yin no/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' rtag par brtson zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba la chog mi shes par bya'o/_/des chos brgyad la brtson par bya'o/_/brgyad po gang 
[\[218b.2\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi sbyor ba la brtson par bya ba dang tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgrub pa la mngon par shes pa lnga shes shing rtogs par khong du chud pa'i ye shes dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ste/_bzhi po gang zhe na/_sbyin pa dang /_
[\[218b.3\]]tshig 'jam po dang /_don spyad pa dang /_don mtshungs par bya ba dag dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la bzod pa thob pa dang /_gzhan sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhog pa dang /_bdag byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang /_thabs mkhas pas sngo bar byed pa dang /_gus par byas shing dam 
[\[218b.4\]]pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ste/_chos brgyad po de dag la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas skyes bu dam pa de dag dang /_lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye grogs po dag byang chub sems 
[\[218b.5\]]dpa' gang ma 'brel pa dang /_mi brtson pa des thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ma 'brel ces bya ba ni khams gsum dang ngo /_/mi brtson zhes bya ba ni rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa thams cad la'o/_/ma 'brel ces bya ba ni nang 
[\[218b.6\]]dang ngo /_/mi brtson zhes bya ba ni phyi la'o/_/ma 'brel ces bya ba ni nyan thos kyi sa dang ngo /_/mi brtson zhes bya ba ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la'o/_/ma 'brel ces bya ba ni 'khor ba na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang ngo /_/mi brtson zhes bya ba ni byis pa lta bu so 
[\[218b.7\]]so'i skye bo'i chos thams cad la'o/_/ma 'brel ces bya ba ni ming dang ngo /_/mi brtson zhes bya ba ni gzugs la'o/_/ma 'brel ces bya ba ni rgyu dang ngo /_/mi brtson zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu la'o/_/ma 'brel ces bya ba ni lta ba'i rnam pa dang ngo /_/mi brtson zhes bya ba ni lta ba dang 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]bral ba la'o/_/ma 'brel ces bya ba ni chags pa dang ngo /_/mi brtson zhes bya ba ni khong khro ba la'o/_/ma 'brel ces bya ba ni ngar 'dzin pa dang ngo /_/mi brtson zhes bya ba ni bdag gir 'dzin pa la'o/_/ma 'brel ces bya ba ni ser sna dang ngo /_/mi brtson zhes bya ba ni sbyin 
[\[219a.2\]]pa'i snyems pa la'o/_/ma 'brel ces bya ba ni ngang tshul ngan pa dang ngo /_/mi brtson zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims snyems pa la'o/_/ma 'brel ces bya ba ni gnod sems dang ngo /_/mi brtson zhes bya ba ni bzod pa'i snyems pa la'o/_/ma 'brel ces bya ba ni le lo dang ngo /_/mi brtson zhes 
[\[219a.3\]]bya ba ni brtson 'grus snyems pa la'o/_/ma 'brel ces bya ba ni dran pa nyams pa dang ngo /_/mi brtson zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan snyems pa la'o/_/ma 'brel ces bya ba ni shes rab 'chal pa dang ngo /_/mi brtson zhes bya ba ni shes rab snyems pa la'o/_/ma 'brel ces bya ba ni dge 
[\[219a.4\]]ba dang ngo /_/mi brtson zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba sgro 'dogs pa la'o/_/ma 'brel ces bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi chos dang ngo /_/mi brtson zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mngon par bya bar chags pa la'o/_/ma 'brel ces bya ba ni 'dus byas dang ngo /_/mi brtson zhes 
[\[219a.5\]]bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa'i chos la yongs su rtog pa la'o/_/ma 'brel ces bya ba ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang ngo /_/mi brtson zhes bya ba ni kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos sgro 'dogs pa la'o/_/ma 'brel ces bya ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang ngo /_/mi brtson zhes bya ba ni zag pa 
[\[219a.6\]]med pa'i zad pa'i chos su snyems pa la'o/_/kye grogs po dag de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'brel pa dang /_ma 'brel par lta ba dang bral bas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs mod kyi/_yang kye grogs po dag thams cad mkhyen pa ni mi rtogs 
[\[219a.7\]]so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byed pas thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byed pa dang bral ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin te/_thams cad mkhyen pa la rtogs par byed pa su yang med do/_/thams cad mkhyen pa ni gzugs kyis kyang mi rtogs 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]tshor bas ma yin 'du shes kyis kyang ma yin/_'du byed kyis kyang ma yin/_rnam par shes pas mi rtogs so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa ni chos kyis kyang mi rtogs/_chos ma yin pas kyang mi rtogs so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa ni sbyin pas kyang mi rtogs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[219b.2\]]sbyin pa nyid thams cad mkhyen pa'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa ni tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyis kyang mi rtogs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab nyid thams cad mkhyen pa'o/_/yang kye grogs po dag 
[\[219b.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa ni 'das pa ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa ma yin/_da ltar byung ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye grogs po dag thams cad mkhyen pa ni dus gsum las 'das pa'i phyir ro/_/yang kye grogs po dag thams cad mkhyen pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas 
[\[219b.4\]]rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin no/_/kye grogs po dag thams cad mkhyen pa ni rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye grogs po dag thams cad mkhyen pa ni yul thams cad 
[\[219b.5\]]las 'das pa'o/_/kye grogs po dag thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par 'dod pas thams cad mkhyen pa ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du gnas par bya'o/_/smras pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa ji ltar gnas pa lags/_smras pa/_gang chos thams cad la mi gnas pa de 
[\[219b.6\]]ni thams cad mkhyen pa'o/_/chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid de ni thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_so so'i skye bo'i sa mnyam pa nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos su mnyam zhing de ltar chos thams cad mnyam pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpas 'byung ba chen 
[\[219b.7\]]po bzhi las byung ba'i lus de nyid ma gtogs par gzhan du thams cad mkhyen pa btsal bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lus de ni dngos po med pa'o/_/lus zhes bya ba de ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos la lhun gyis grub pa'o/_/lus zhes bya ba de ni bdag ma yin pa dang 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]bdag med pa'o/_/lus zhes bya ba de ni ma byung ba yang dag par ma byung ba ste/_de la gdags pa med do/_/gang de la gdags pa de yang ma byung ba'o/_/gang de mthong ba de'ang ma byung ba'o/_/gang ma byung ba de ni yang dag par ma byung ba'o/_/gang yang dag par 
[\[220a.2\]]ma byung ba de ni mi shes pa dang mi rtogs pa'o/_/gang mi shes pa dang mi rtogs pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'o/_/bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe lha'i bu nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/lha'i bu khri nyis stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[220a.3\]]tu sems skyes so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa'i phung pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal tshur spyon/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar dong la/_byang chub sems dpas ji lta bur bya ba de bzhin 
[\[220a.4\]]gshegs pa la/_mngon sum du zhu'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sa'i phyogs de nyid du/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i kha dog dang /_dbyibs dang /_chu zheng 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa zhig mngon par sprul to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[220a.5\]]pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa'i phung po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas ji lta bur bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du bzhugs pa 'di la zhus shig_/de nas sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de la byang chub sems 
[\[220a.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa'i phung pos bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ji lta bur bgyi zhes de skad gsol pa dang /_des bka' stsal pa/_nga ci 'dra ba ltar byang chub sems dpas kyang de bzhin du bya'o/_/gsol pa/_'o na bcom ldan 'das ji 'dra/_
[\[220a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_sbyin pa ma spyad/_tshul khrims ma spyad/_bzod pa ma spyad/_brtson 'grus ma spyad/_bsam gtan ma spyad/_shes rab ma spyad/_'dod pa'i khams su ma spyad/_gzugs kyi khams su ma spyad/_gzugs med pa'i khams su ma spyad/_lus kyis ma 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]spyad/_ngag gis ma spyad/_yid kyis ma spyad pa ste/_thams cad du ma spyad cing ma zhugs pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/_ji sprul pas spyad dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sprul pas ma spyad do/_/bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas de ltar bya'o/_/
[\[220b.2\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa'i phung pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa 'di sprul pa ma yin grang /_des smras pa/_rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni sprul pa'i rang bzhin du nges te/_
[\[220b.3\]]sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid las mi ldog go/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin no/_/chos thams cad ni sprul pa'i rang bzhin can te/_sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid las mi ldog go/_/smras pa/_chos thams cad sprul pa'i rang bzhin can yin na/_khyod ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'di sprul pa ma yin 
[\[220b.4\]]grang snyam du byed par gyur/_smras pa/_sus sprul/_smras pa/_bdag gis las kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pas sprul gyis/_'di la rang bzhin gyis bdag gam/_sems can nam/_srog gam/_gang zag dag sangs rgyas su gnas pa'am/_so so'i skye bor 
[\[220b.5\]]gnas pa ni ma yin no/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa'i phung pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gang la bslabs nas byang chub thob par gyur/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu mi slob pa ni 
[\[220b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa'i slob pa'o/_/mi sdom pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i slob pa'o/_/mi 'jigs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i slob pa'o/_/mi rtog pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i slob pa'o/_/mi dpyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i slob pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gnas med pa dang /_
[\[220b.7\]]mi snyems pa dang /_ma spros pa dang /_mi len pa dang /_mi gtong ba dang /_mi rgyu ba dang /_yi ge med pa dang /_mi skye ba dang /_mi 'gag pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_ma song ba dang /_mi gnas pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_dngos po med pa dang /_mi dmigs 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]dang /_'du shes thams cad dang bral ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi slob pa ste/_gang de ltar slob pa de dag ni yang dag par slob pa'o/_/gang de ltar slob pa de dag ni gang la'ang zhe sdang ba med do/_/gang de ltar slob pa de dag ni gang du'ang 
[\[221a.2\]]chags pa med do/_/gang de ltar slob pa de dag ni gang du yang zhen pa med do/_/gang las kyang grol ba med do/_/gang de ltar slob pa de dag ni gang du yang 'dod chags pa med do/_/gang nas kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba med do/_/zhe sdang med do/_/gti mug med do/_/gang de ltar 
[\[221a.3\]]slob pa de dag ni slob 'dod pa zhes bya'o/_/gang slob 'dod pa de dag ni 'gro ba gang du yang mi 'gro'o/_/mi 'ong ngo /_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas nga ji lta 
[\[221a.4\]]ba bzhin du 'khor ba yang med/_mya ngan las 'da' ba yang med/_gtong ba yang med/_len pa yang med/_tshul khrims kyang med/_ngang tshul ngan pa yang med/_bzod pa yang med/_gnod sems kyang med/_brtson 'grus kyang med/_le lo yang med/_bsam 
[\[221a.5\]]gtan yang med/_g.yeng ba yang med/_shes rab kyang med/_shes rab 'chal pa yang med/_slob pa yang med/_mi slob pa yang med/_spyod pa yang med/_mi spyod pa yang med cing /_nga ji lta ba bzhin du thob pa yang med/_ma thob pa yang med/_mngon par bya ba yang 
[\[221a.6\]]med/_byang chub kyang med/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang med/_bdag tu 'du shes pa yang med/_sems can du 'du shes pa yang med/_srog tu 'du shes pa yang med/_gang zag tu 'du shes pa yang med/_chos su 'du shes pa yang med/_'du shes pa nyid kyang med/_'du shes 
[\[221a.7\]]med pa'ang ma yin par nga'i rjes su bslab par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pa dang /_tha dad par gyur pa med pas mi 'gyur ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni so so tha dad pa med pas gnyis su med pa'o/_
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni mig gi lam las 'das pas bltar mi snang ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni khyad par med pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa med pa'i phyir glen pa ste/_de dag la gdags pa med do/_/gdags pa 
[\[221b.2\]]med pa'i chos rnams ni shin tu ma skyes pa'o/_/gang de ltar mos pa de dag ni grol bas mi snyems/_spyod pas mi snyems/_byang chub kyis mi snyems so/_/rigs kyi bu de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di 'dra ba'i slob pa dang /_spyod pa bshad pa'i 
[\[221b.3\]]tshe mi 'jigs/_mi dngang /_skrag par mi 'gyur te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha'i dbyings ni mes mi 'jigs/_rlung gis mi 'jigs/_char pas mi 'jigs/_than pas mi 'jigs/_rdul gyis mi 'jigs/_
[\[221b.4\]]du bas mi 'jigs/_sprin gyi phung pos mi 'jigs/_glog gis mi 'jigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nam mkha'i dbyings ni gzung du med pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang chos thams cad kyis mi 'jigs par bya'o/_/bde ba dang 
[\[221b.5\]]sdug bsngal ba thams cad la mi bsam par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas bdud kyi sde las rgyal bar nus so/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus so/_/sems can rnams 
[\[221b.6\]]kyi don byed nus so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa des de skad gsungs nas/_de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa'i phung pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[221b.7\]]de gar gshegs/_smras pa/_gang nas gshegs par ro/_/smras pa/_'o na de gang nas gshegs/_smras pa/_gang du gshegs pa nas so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal sprul pa ni song ba yang med/_'ong ba yang med do/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu ji ltar sprul pa song 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]ba yang med/_'ong ba yang med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de'i 'gros can nyid do/_/sems can thams cad kyang de'i 'gros can nyid do/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ji lta bu'i 'gros can lags/_smras pa/_rang bzhin gnas pa'i 'gros can no/_/
[\[222a.2\]]smras pa/_yang sems can thams cad ji lta bu'i 'gros can lags/_smras pa/_las kyi rnam par smin pa ji lta bu'i 'gros can pa de bzhin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal 'o na chos thams cad las kyi rnam par smin pa ma mchis pa ma lags sam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu chos nyid 
[\[222a.3\]]la ni las kyi rnam par smin pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni chos nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_'o na ji ltar na las kyi rnam par smin pa ji lta bu'i 'gros can pa de bzhin pa lags/_smras pa/_las de ji lta ba rnam par smin pa yang de bzhin/_de'i 
[\[222a.4\]]'gro ba yang de bzhin no/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal las ji lta bu lags/_rnam par smin pa ji lta bu lags/_'gro ba ji lta bu lags/_smras pa/_de bzhin nyid ji lta bar las kyang de bzhin/_rnam par smin pa yang de bzhin/_'gro ba yang de bzhin no/_/smras pa/_
[\[222a.5\]]'jam dpal de bzhin nyid la ni las kyang ma mchis/_rnam par smin pa yang ma mchis/_'gro ba yang ma mchis so/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu ji ltar de bzhin nyid la las kyang med/_rnam par smin pa yang med/_'gro ba yang med pa ltar las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'gro ba 
[\[222a.6\]]yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'gro ba ni 'ong ba med pa can 'gro ba med pa can yin te/_de ni de bzhin nyid kyi 'gros las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan 
[\[222a.7\]]pa dga' bo dang /_nyan thos chen po gzhan dag kyang /_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan snga na bstan pa 'di la nyan to//_//bam po gnyis pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos nyid ni 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]gcig pa kho na lags na/_skyes bu dam pa skyes bu chen po de dag brjod pa sna tshogs kyis ston kyang chos nyid dang yang mi 'gal bar bgyid pa ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi skye bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 
[\[222b.2\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dag ni de ltar ma chags pa'i slob pa la slob cing mi chags bzhin du ston te/_shA ri'i bu sa bon ji lta ba bzhin skyed kyang de bzhin no/_/shA ri'i bu de dang 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ji lta ba de 
[\[222b.3\]]bzhin du de dag gi ye shes so/_/de bzhin du de dag gi ston pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu khyod kyis bslab pa ji lta bu la bslabs pa khyod kyi ye shes kyang de bzhin no/_/spobs pa yang de dang 'dra bar khyod kyis thob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od bkod pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[222b.4\]]nyan thos kyi bslab pa ji lta bu lags/_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu nyan thos kyi bslab pa ni tshad yod pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ni tshad med pa ste/_rigs kyi bu ji ltar nyan thos kyi 
[\[222b.5\]]bslab pa tshad yod la chags pa dang bcas pa de bzhin du de'i ye shes kyang tshad yod la chags pa dang bcas pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa tshad med la chags pa med pa de bzhin du de'i ye shes kyang tshad med la chags pa med pa'o/_/de nas bcom 
[\[222b.6\]]ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bkod pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di nas su yang chos nyan pa mi spong bar bgyi na/_skyes bu dam pa de dag 'dir mchi bar mtshan ma zhig mdzad du gsol/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_
[\[222b.7\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni zab mo la mos pas de'i chos bshad pa yang zab mo lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir mtshan ma mdzad do/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa skyes bu dam pa nyi shu rtsa lnga po 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]de dag dang 'grogs/_lha'i 'khor de dag dang 'grogs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od bkod pas 'jam 
[\[223a.2\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor nas byung la phyogs gcig tu song ste chos ston/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag ni mnyes par dka' ste/_gtam thams cad kyis mnyes par mi 
[\[223a.3\]]nus so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal gtam ji lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par 'gyur/_smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das nyid mkhyen te thugs su chud mod kyi/_bdag ji ltar spobs pa de bzhin du ston to/_/rigs kyi bu gtam gang chos kyi dbyings dang yang mi 'gal/_de bzhin 
[\[223a.4\]]nyid dang yang mi 'gal/_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang yang mi 'gal ba de 'dra ba'i gtam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par 'gyur ro/_/gtam gang 'thab pa med pa/_rtsod pa med pa/_rtsom pa med pa/_klan ka med pa/_sgro 'dogs pa med pa/_de 'dra ba'i gtam gyis de bzhin 
[\[223a.5\]]gshegs pa mnyes par 'gyur ro/_/gtam gang bdag la sgro mi 'dogs/_gzhan la sgro mi 'dogs/_chos la sgro mi 'dogs/_chos ma yin pa la sgro mi 'dogs/_'khor ba la sgro mi 'dogs/_mya ngan las 'da' ba la sgro mi 'dogs pa de 'dra ba'i gtam gyis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[223a.6\]]pa mnyes par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas legs so legs so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyi tshig 'di legs par bshad pa yin te/_'di 'dra ba'i gtam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par 'gyur 
[\[223a.7\]]mod kyi/_'jam dpal gtam gang spros pa thams cad las 'das pa/_ha cang yang mi zhib pa/_ha cang yang mi rtsing ba/_mtshan ma med pa'i gtam de brjod na ting nge 'dzin kyang mi gtong /_rtag tu shin tu sems mnyam par yang gzhog cing ston par byed la chos gang yang 'phel ba'am/_
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]'bri bar yang mi mthong ba de 'dra ba'i gtam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par 'gyur ro/_/ston pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/'khor de nas lha'i bu sngon spyod pa dang ldan pas byang chub kyi sems rab tu stor ba nyis 
[\[223b.2\]]brgya 'di snyam du gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang de ltar tshad med pa byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa yang de ltar shin tu bslab dka' ba/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang de tsam du bsgrub dka' ba yin na bdag cag gis slob pa 'di bslab mi nus kyis/_gang bdag cag ni nyan 
[\[223b.3\]]thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/_kye ma'o lha'i bu 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya ba'i 
[\[223b.4\]]skal ba yod do zhes lha'i bu de dag gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir 'khor gyi phyi rol du khyim bdag gcig mngon par sprul nas khyim bdag des lhung bzed kha zas ro brgyas gang ba zhig lag pa g.yas pa na thogs par gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song 
[\[223b.5\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lhung bzed kha zas kyis bkang ba de bcom ldan 'das la phul nas/_bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du zhal zas 'di bzhes par gsol zhes de skad gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung 
[\[223b.6\]]bzed zas kyis bkang ba de bzhes so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das zhal zas 'di las bdag la ma stsal bar gsol na ni 
[\[223b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das byas pa gzo ba mi mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du gyur te/_kye ma'o 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sngon bcom ldan 'das la ji lta bu zhig tu phan btags na de'i phyir da byas pa gzo ba med pas rgol snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems kyi rtog pa mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dus mkhyen te/_khyod la bka' stsol gyis sdod cig_/des bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed de sa chen po'i nang du btang ba 
[\[224a.2\]]dang /_btang ma thag tu 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan sngar lhung bzed de song ngo /_/de nas lhung bzed de 'og gi phyogs kyi cha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i 
[\[224a.3\]]klung gi bye ma snyed 'das nas 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na lhung bzed de ma bzung bar bar snang la 'dug par gyur to/_/sangs 
[\[224a.4\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang bdag bdag gi bsnyen bkur byed pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das lhung bzed 'di ga las mchis zhes zhus nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang steng gi phyogs kyi cha 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba nas bcom ldan 
[\[224a.5\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i drung nas 'ongs te/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gdul ba'i phyir btang ba yin no zhes bstan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA 
[\[224a.6\]]ri'i bu lhung bzed de phyung shig_/gang na 'dug pa ga la na 'dug pa de'ang tshol cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu la zhugs nas/_bdag gi shes rab kyi stobs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcur song yang lhung bzed de'i 
[\[224a.7\]]gnas sam gzhi yang ma mthong nas de slar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lhung bzed de'i gnas sam gzhi yang ma mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maung gal gyi bu chen po la 'di 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]skad ces bka' stsal to/_/maung gal gyi bu khyod kyis lhung bzed de tshol cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maung gal gyi bu chen pos ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu la zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'og gi phyogs kyi cha sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bcur 
[\[224b.2\]]song yang lhung bzed de'i gnas sam gzhi'ang ma mthong nas de slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lhung bzed de'i gnas sam gzhi'ang ma mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[224b.3\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor khyod kyis lhung bzed de tshol cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu gnyis la zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'og gi phyogs kyi cha sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[224b.4\]]stong phrag bcu gnyis su song yang lhung bzed de ma mthong nas de slar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lhung bzed de'i gnas sam gzhi'ang ma mthong ngo /_/de bzhin nyid du nyan thos chen po lnga 
[\[224b.5\]]brgya tsam bdag bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang /_lha'i mig gis lhung bzed de btsal kyang ma rnyed do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/byams pa khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[224b.6\]]pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs par lung bstan na/_lhung bzed de gang na 'dug gal na 'dug tshol cig ces de skad smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor bdag ni de bzhin 
[\[224b.7\]]gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs par lung bstan mod kyi/_bdag gis ni ting nge 'dzin de dag gi ming yang ma 'tshal te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni ting nge 'dzin de dag la mnyam par yang gzhog_/ldang bar yang bgyid do/_/yang btsun pa rab 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]'byor bdag gis byang chub thob pa na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar gom pa 'dor/_ji ltar 'jog par mdzad ces gom pa gcig 'dor zhing 'jog pa yang mi shes pa'i dus dang tshe yang mchis par 
[\[225a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/de bas na btsun pa rab 'byor 'jam dpal nyid la gsol cig dang /_des ni lhung bzed de tshor ba dang 'byin par nus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ci nas kyang lhung bzed de phyung 
[\[225a.3\]]ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dbul bar bsgor gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal lhung bzed de phyung shig_/lhung bzed de gang na 'dug pa dang /_ga la na 'dug pa yang shes par gyis shig_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[225a.4\]]gyur pa 'di snyam du gyur te/_gang bdag ni stan las kyang mi ldang zhing 'khor 'di nas mi snang bar yang ma gyur par lhung bzed de dbyung ngo snyam mo/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa kun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/_'og gi sa chen po la lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ngo /_/de nas 
[\[225a.5\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lag pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa de dang de dag tu lag pa de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal zhing song nas/_lag pa de las bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[225a.6\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa snyung ba ma mchis sam/_'o ma brgyal tam/_bzhengs pa yang ngam/_so bzhin nam/_mthu mnga' 'am/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsung ngo zhes zer ba'i sgra phyung ngo /_/de nas lag pa'i spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od 
[\[225a.7\]]zer bye ba brgya stong byung ste/_'od zer thams cad las me tog pad ma brgya stong byung zhing pad ma de thams cad kyi snying po dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dag bzhugs par snang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i bsngags 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]pa brjod do/_/lag pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad snang ba chen pos kyang khyab par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_
[\[225b.2\]]ba dan gyis kyang brgyan par gyur to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lag pa g.yas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bdun cu rtsa gnyis thams cad las 'das nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal zhing snyung ba chung ngam zhes bya ba'i 
[\[225b.3\]]sgra 'byin bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang ba dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su phyin par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 
[\[225b.4\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa snyung ba ma mchis sam/_'o ma brgyal tam/_bzhengs pa yang ngam/_so bzhin nam/_mthu mnga' 'am/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsung ngo zhes sgra phyung ngo /_/lag pa de las kyang 'od zer brgya stong 
[\[225b.5\]]byung ngo /_/me tog pad ma brgya stong yang byung bar gyur te/_'od zer de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer de dag dang yang ma 'dres par gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de la bsnyen bkur byed pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od kyi dpal zhes bya ba des de 
[\[225b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lag pa de las 'od zer bye ba brgya stong 'di dag kyang byung zhing me tog pad ma brgya stong yang byung bar gyur la/_pad ma thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dag bzhugs shing bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bsngags pa rjod 
[\[225b.7\]]par gyur pa'i lag pa 'di ltar blta na sdug pa/_'di ltar dga' bar bgyid pa de su'i lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'od kyi dpal steng gi phyogs kyi cha sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bdun cu rtsa gnyis 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so 'tsho gzhes so/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[226a.2\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa/_mngon par shes pa dang /_stobs dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad thob pa zhig yod de/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa des lhung bzed 'di blang ba'i phyir stan las ma langs bzhin du lag pa 'di btang ngo /_/de nas 
[\[226a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag yongs su skom par gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de blta bar 'tshal 
[\[226a.4\]]lo zhes de skad gsol to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal pos smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od phyung nas/_'od des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bdun cu rtsa gnyis po de dag thams cad brtol te/_thams cad yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab 
[\[226a.5\]]par gyur to/_/sems can gang dag gi lus la 'od des phog par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa gang dag gi lus la 'od des phog par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/slob pa gang dag gi lus la 'od des phog par 
[\[226a.6\]]gyur pa de dag thams cad ni rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi lus la 'od des phog par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni ting nge 'dzin nyi ma lta bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba thob par gyur to/_/'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 
[\[226a.7\]]zer gyi rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed pa 'di dang /_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od kyi dpal gyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed pa 'di mthong nas ngu zhing mchi ma phyung ste 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na rin thang ma mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya 'dam du stsal bar gyur pa de bzhin du/_bcom ldan 
[\[226b.2\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed par skyes pa de dag la blta bar bgyi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod de skad ma zer cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 
[\[226b.3\]]bskal pa bcur bsam gtan la gnas shing spyod pa bas gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed par snga dro gcig sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems bskyed na de bas 'di'i bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[226b.4\]]dpa' chen po gang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na dam pa'i chos srung ba de dag ni las kyi sgrib pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed pa 'di na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'od des reg par gyur pa de dag gis bcom 
[\[226b.5\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar dga' zhing rab tu mgu bar bgyid pa nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong bar bgyid pa'i 'od zer 'di su'i lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad 
[\[226b.6\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'og gi phyogs kyi cha 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bdun cu rtsa gnyis 'das pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[226b.7\]]'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes pa zhig yod de/_de bzhin gshegs pa des smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od btang ba dang /_'od des 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed pa 'di snang bar byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba dang ldan pa de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de blta bar 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas zhabs kyi 
[\[227a.2\]]mthil 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong yod pa gnyis las 'od zer gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bdun cu rtsa gnyis po de dag thams cad las 'das shing brtol nas 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba dang ldan pa de thams cad 'od zer de dag gis khyab par 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i 
[\[227a.3\]]'od zer 'og tu btang nas byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi lus la 'od zer des phog par gyur pa de thams cad ting nge 'dzin ri rab lhun po lta bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba thob par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas snang bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[227a.4\]]'di yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas snang bar gyur to/_/'di lta ste/_dper na 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nas nyi ma dang zla ba snang ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa mthong bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis kyang bcom 
[\[227a.5\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po de mthong bar gyur to/_/'di lta ste/_dper na lha'i bu dag ri rab lhun po'i spyi bo la gnas shing 'dzam bu'i gling du lta ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[227a.6\]]'od zer gyi rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa de dag mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lag pa g.yas pa des de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba dang ldan 
[\[227a.7\]]pa de nas nam mkha'i steng gi lam las lhung bzed de bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor cing mdun du bdar te steng du phyung bar gyur to/_/gang dang gang dag nas lag pa de phyung bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag tu 'od zer de dag 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]nub par gyur to/_/me tog pad ma de dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to/_/'di lta ste/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lag pa g.yas pa des lhung bzed de blangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed pa 'dir phyin par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar lhung bzed de 
[\[227b.2\]]nam mkha' la 'phangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lhung bzed blangs pa 'di lags kyis de bzhin gshegs pas bzhes su gsol/_bcom 
[\[227b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis kyang lhung bzed de bzhes so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lag pa dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed pa 'dir 'ongs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bdag bdag gi de bzhin 
[\[227b.4\]]gshegs pa'i mtshan nas brjod de/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa che ge mo zhig bcom ldan 'das la snyung ba ma mchis sam/_'o ma brgyal tam/_bzhengs pa yang ngam/_so bzhin nam/_mthu mnga' 'am/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsung ngo zhes de skad 
[\[227b.5\]]gsol te/_sangs rgyas kyis gnang nas bdag bdag gi stan la 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_de bas na shA ri'i bu nga la sngon 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gang phan btags pa de'i phyir da byas pa mi gzo bas rgol bar gyur 
[\[227b.6\]]pa bshad kyis nyon cig/_shA ri'i bu sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa de'i pha rol gyi'ang pha rol du gyur pa de'i tshe/_de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten 
[\[227b.7\]]gyi khams mi smod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur te/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i nyan thos kyi tshogs ni brgyad khri bzhi stong byang chub sems dpa' ni khri nyis stong du gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de theg pa gsum po nyid las brtsams te chos 'chad cing /_
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]theg pa gsum bshad pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_thabs mkhas pa bshad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de skyes par gyur to/_/shA ri'i bu yang de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong chos smra ba ye shes rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/_de nang par sham thabs 
[\[228a.2\]]bgos/_chos gos dang /_lhung bzed khyer te bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyal po'i pho brang rgya chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar song ba las/_de de nas zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i bza' ba mang po khyer te byung bar gyur to/_/yang de'i tshe na tshong dpon gyi bu dri ma med pa'i dpung pa zhes bya ba ma 
[\[228a.3\]]ma'i pang pa na 'dug par gyur pa las khye'u des dge slong de rgyang ma nas 'ong ba mthong ngo mthong nas ma ma'i pang pa nas babs te/_dge slong de ga la ba der brgyugs nas bza' ba bslangs pa las/_dge slong des de la mod ka gcig byin pa dang /_de bza' ba des brnyogs nas dge slong 
[\[228a.4\]]de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur pa las/_de rim gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan ga la ba der song ste phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas dge slong ye shes rgyal pos bsod snyoms ci rnyed pa khye'u de la 
[\[228a.5\]]byin nas/_kye khye'u bsod snyoms 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol cig ces byas so/_/de nas khye'u des bsod snyoms de blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das de'i lhung bzed bkang yang bsod snyoms de yongs su zad par ma gyur to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste bsod snyoms gcig po 
[\[228a.6\]]de las khye'u des nyan thos brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong po de dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan de zhos par byas shing bstabs kyang bsod snyoms de yongs su zad par ma gyur to/_/de nas khye'u 
[\[228a.7\]]de dga' mgu rangs rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/dge slong dge 'dun zhos byas kyang /_/lhung bzed nam yang ma zad pas/_/sbyin gnas bsod nams zhing gyur pa/_/
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]bdag gis nges par mchod par gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po zhos byas kyang /_/'bras can zad par ma gyur pas/_/sangs rgyas la ni phul gyur na/_/sbyin pa mi zad the tsom med/_/ji ltar 'bras can mi zad cing /_/phyi phyir 'phel bar 'gyur ba ltar/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[228b.2\]]dag la gang gus pa'i/_/dge ba dag ni de bzhin 'phel/_/shA ri'i bu de lta ste/_khye'u des bsod snyoms gcig po de las de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa nyi ma bdun du zhos par gsol nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_khye'u de'i sems kyi bsam pa 
[\[228b.3\]]dad pas zas de yongs su zad par ma gyur to/_/de nas dge slong ye shes rgyal pos khye'u de sangs rgyas la skyabs su btang /_chos la skyabs su btang /_dge 'dun la skyabs su btang ngo /_/khrims kyang phog go/_/nyes pa yang mthol du bcug go/_/rjes su yi rang bar 
[\[228b.4\]]bya ba dag kyang rjes su yi rang bar byed du bcug go/_/gsol ba gdab par bya ba dag kyang gsol ba 'debs su bcug nas phyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed du bcug go/_/shA ri'i bu de lta ste/_khye'u de'i pha dang ma khye'u de tshol zhing de bzhin 
[\[228b.5\]]gshegs pa mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas khye'u des pha ma de dag gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/lus can kun la bde ba'i 
[\[228b.6\]]phyir/_/bdag ni byang chub rab zhugs kyis/_/khyed kyang legs par gnas par gyis/_/dal 'byor shin tu dkon pa'o/_/sangs rgyas sku ni 'bar ba dang /_/mtshan dag gis kyang brgyan la ltos/_/ye shes kyis ni pha rol phyin/_/byang chub de la su mi smon/_/
[\[228b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dkon/_/bdag ni khyim nas khyim med par/_/'di nyid du ni rab tu 'byung /_/khyed cag gnyis kyis gnang bar mdzod/_/pha dang mas smras pa/_bdag cag gnyis ni khyod 'dod kyis/_/byang chub rab la smon par bgyid/_/rab tu 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]'byung bar bgyi ba'i phyir/_/bu khyod kyi ni rjes su slob/_/shA ri'i bu de lta ste/_khye'u de dang /_khye'u de'i pha ma dang /_gang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i srog chags lnga brgya tsam po de dag thams cad rab tu byung ngo /_/shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong 
[\[229a.2\]]chos smra ba ye shes rgyal po zhes bya ba de gzhan yin snyam du shA ri'i bu khyod de ltar ma lta shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong chos smra ba ye shes rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu dri ma 
[\[229a.3\]]med pa'i dpung pa zhes bya ba de gzhan yin pa snyam du the tsom mam/_yid gnyis sam/_som nyi za na/_shA ri'i bu khyod de ltar ma lta shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga ni de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu dri ma med pa'i dpung pa zhes bya ba der gyur te/_shA ri'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[229a.4\]]nur gyur pas nga la bsod snyoms byin nas byang chub tu sems skyed du bcug ste/_de ni ngas byang chub kyi phyir thog ma sems bskyed pa yin te/_shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar shes par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang /_stobs bcu dang /_
[\[229a.5\]]mi 'jigs pa dang /_ye shes chags pa med pa dang /_ci'ang rung ste/_de thams cad 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byed du bcug pa las gyur par blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems bskyed pa de las thams cad mkhyen pa thob pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu ngas ni 
[\[229a.6\]]phyogs bcu na nga bdag ci lta ba de dang 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub la bzhag pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba dpag tu med grangs med pa dang /_de bzhin du ti sha zhes bya ba dang /_rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang /_gtsug ldan zhes 
[\[229a.7\]]bya ba dang /_mar me mdzad ces bya ba dag mthong ste/_gang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub la bzhag nas da ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan kyang bskal pa'am/_bskal pa'i lhag ma ma lus par brjod par gyur na gang 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag lta ci smos/_gang dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa dag lta ci smos/_gang skye ba dag lta ci smos/_gang khyim nas 'byung ba dag lta ci smos/_gang dka' ba spyod pa dag lta ci smos/_gang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dag lta ci smos te/_shA ri'i 
[\[229b.2\]]bu rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_gang dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma'o/_/skyed pa'o/_/thugs rje ba'o/_/byed du 'jug pa'o zhes yang dag par smra zhing ston pa ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyid la de dag smra zhing ston te/_shA ri'i bu rgyu de dang rkyen de yin te/_
[\[229b.3\]]sngon phan btags pa'i phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nga la byas pa mi gzo bas rgol lo/_/de nas lha'i bu nyis brgya po dag 'di snyam du gyur te/_chos thams cad ni rgyu'i rjes su 'gro ba'o/_/rkyen la rag las pa'o/_/sred pa'i rtsa ba can no/_/smon lam gyis thog drangs pa can 
[\[229b.4\]]yin te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di yang gzhan gyis byed du bcug pa yin na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par bzhugs bzhin du bdag cag dman pa la sems pa de ni mi rigs so snyam mo/_/de nas lha'i bu nyis brgya po de dag lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[229b.5\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/'dir lag pa brkyang zhing rdzu 'phrul bstan pa'i cho 'phrul 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan cing lhung bzed blangs pa dang /_'di la sngon byung ba'i chos bstan pa bstan pa'i tshe 'og gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /_'di nas sems can 
[\[229b.6\]]grangs las 'das pas byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa nas kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba dang /_chos kyi g.yog bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis rin po che'i gdugs bskur bar gyur te/_
[\[229b.7\]]rin po che'i gdugs de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khebs par gyur to/_/rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang de bzhin no/_/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gsungs pa bzhin te/_bdag cag thams cad kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]la bkod do zhes de skad zer ba'i sgra byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu myur du mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[230a.2\]]phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu sems can gang 'khor bas skrag nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi skyed cing /_nyan thos kyi theg pa la gnas la nyan thos su 'gyur bar bya'o snyam du sems pa de dag ni da dung du'ang 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur la/_byang chub 
[\[230a.3\]]sems dpa' gzhan brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa dag gis ni thams cad mkhyen pa thob par ngas mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_/shA ri'i bu sngon 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[230a.4\]]thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bar gyur te/_shA ri'i 
[\[230a.5\]]bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i nyan thos ni bye ba phrag brgya yod par gyur to/_/tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum thub par gyur to/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i nyan thos kyi mchog shes rab dang ldan pa ni dge slong mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo /_/nyan thos kyi mchog 
[\[230a.6\]]gnyis pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog ni shugs chen po zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo /_/de lta ste/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs mnabs chos gos dang /_lhung bzed bsnams te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas rgyal po'i 
[\[230a.7\]]pho brang grags ldan zhes bya bar bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs so/_/de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yas phyogs nas ni nyan thos shes rab dang ldan pa'i mchog 'gro'o/_/g.yon phyogs nas ni nyan thos rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog 'gro'o/_/rgyab nas ni 
[\[230b\]]
