[\[275a.7\]]dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang dag gnas pa de dag thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/_bdag ni gtong ba bgyid de/_shin tu gtong ba dang /_gtong ba'i yang gtong ba dang /_bdag nyid gtong ba bgyid do/_/bdag gi bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag yongs su gtong 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]ba ni rgyal po'i slad du ma lags/_longs spyod kyi slad du ma lags/_mtho ris kyi slad du ma lags/_brgya byin nyid kyi slad du ma lags/_bdud kyi slad du ma lags/_tshangs pa'i slad du ma lags/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i yul gyi slad du ma lags te/_gzhan du bdag 
[\[275b.2\]]ji ltar/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba dang /_sems can ma dul ba gdul bar bgyi/_ma grol ba dgrol bar bgyi/_dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung bar bgyi/_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya 
[\[275b.3\]]ngan las bzla bar bgyi ba'i slad du ste/_bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag yongs su gtong ba 'bras bu ma mchis par ma gyur cig_/ces smras nas bdag nyid me dong chen po der mchongs so/_/dge bsnyen ri bong des me dong der mchongs ma thag tu me dong de'i me shi ste 
[\[275b.4\]]pad ma can gyi rdzing du gyur nas/_ri bong de bung ba zi zi zer bar gyur pa'i pad ma 'dab ma stong yod pa'i steng na 'dug cing chos ston te/_tshangs par spyod pa/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs 
[\[275b.5\]]pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba yang dag par ston to/_/drang srong gis de mthong ste/_mthong nas kyang dga' mgu yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_ri bong de la thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal to/_/dge bsnyen de'i tshe de'i dus na nags 
[\[275b.6\]]stug po de na gnas pa'i drang srong de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tsom za na de ltar mi blta ste/_dge slong 'od srung de'i tshe de'i dus na nags stug po'i drang srong du gyur to/_/dge bsnyen de'i tshe de'i dus na nags stug po'i ri bong du gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 
[\[275b.7\]]khyod dogs shing the tsom za na de ltar mi blta ste/_nga de'i tshe de'i dus na ri bong du gyur to/_/dge bsnyen nga dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa de'i tshe yang nga'i lus la mes ma tshugs na/_da ltar byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa lta la ci smos te/_nga'i lus la mes tshugs 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge bsnyen de dang /_skye bo phal po che la chos kyi gtam yang dag par ston/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug_/yang dag par gzengs stod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/chos kyi gtam 
[\[276a.2\]]yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas khyim bdag dpal sbas kyi khyim ga la ba der gshegs so/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i skye bo phal po che rnams 'di ji ltar 'gyur snyam ste/_
[\[276a.3\]]khyim bdag dpal sbas kyi phyi sgo'i sgo gang ga la ba der dong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das me dong chen po ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas me dong chen po der zhabs g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can thog mar bzhag ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis me dong der zhabs g.yas pa gser 
[\[276a.4\]]gyi kha dog can de bzhag ma thag tu me dong de'i me shi bar gyur te pad ma'i rdzing bur gyur nas bung ba zi zi zer bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can me dong der bzhag ma thag tu lha rnams lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la 'thor/_
[\[276a.5\]]mngon par 'thor/_mngon par rab tu 'thor ro/_/lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la 'thor/_mngon par 'thor/_mngon par rab tu 'thor ro/_/lha'i rol mo'i sgra yang 
[\[276a.6\]]'byin to/_/sil snyan gyi sgra yang 'byin to/_/dung dang /_rnga bo che dang /_rdza rnga dang /_khar rnga la sogs pa'i sgra yang phyung ngo /_/rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i skye bo phal po che rnams ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du byung bar gyur te/_gsang bstod nas sgra drag po dang /_sgra chen por 
[\[276a.7\]]ha ha zhes bya ba dang /_hi hi zhes bya ba dang /_ca co dang ga zha 'thon to/_/bcom ldan 'das la gos kyang 'thor ro/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag dpal sbas ni gcer bu pa nye du'i bu dang lhan cig tu khang steng na 'dug go/_/khyim bdag dpal sbas kyi chung ma khyim gyi nang na 'dug pas rgyal po'i khab tu 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]sgra drag po dang /_sgra chen po phyung ba thos so/_/thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po 'dir sgra mthon po dang /_sgra drag po dang /_sgra chen po byung ba las bcom ldan 'das me dong chen po der lhung ste grongs par ma gyur grang /_bde bar 
[\[276b.2\]]gshegs pa grongs par ma gyur grang snyam nas bsgrims te stobs gtugs nas sgo phye ste/_bang thag par sgo khang ga la ba der song ba dang /_khyim bdag dpal sbas kyi chung ma des me dong de'i me shi ste pad ma'i rdzing du gyur nas bung ba zi zi zer ba'i pad ma la bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[276b.3\]]zhabs bzhag ste dpal sbas kyi khyim du gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas dga' mgu yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te khyim bdag dpal sbas ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_khyim bdag dpal sbas la 'di skad ces smras so/_/jo bo 
[\[276b.4\]]zhugs dong gi zhugs gum nas pad ma'i rdzing bur gyur te bung ba zi zi mchi ba'i pad ma la bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs bzhag nas khyod kyi khyim du byon pa la gzigs shig_/gzigs shig_/de nas khyim bdag dpal sbas 'jigs/_dngangs/_skrag ste spu zing zhes byed nas [{]rings [,]ring [}]
[\[276b.5\]]shing myur bar la gor du khang steng nas babs te sgo gang ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nongs/_bde bar gshegs pa bdag gis nongs te slar 
[\[276b.6\]]'chags so/_/byis pa ji lta ba dang /_rmongs pa ji lta ba dang /_mi mkhas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bdag mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bsten pa'i dbang gis bcom ldan 'das la rnam pa 'di lta bu bgyi bar bsams na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag nongs pas nongs pa can du gzung 
[\[276b.7\]]du gsol/_slan chad kyang sdom par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i phyir khyim bdag khyod byis pa ji lta ba dang /_rmongs pa ji lta ba dang /_mi mkhas pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bsten pa'i dbang gis khyod kyis rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di byas 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]pa nyes pas nyes pa can du rtogs shig_/khyim bdag khyod gang gi tshe nyes pas nyes pa can du mthong la/_nyes pas nyes pa can du mthong nas 'chags/_mthol/_phyin chad kyang sdom na de'i phyir ngas khyod la nyes pas nyes pa can du bzung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyim 
[\[277a.2\]]bdag chos 'dul ba 'di la 'di ni 'phel ba ste/_nyes pas nyes pa can du mthong nas 'chags shing mthol te phyin chad kyang sdom pa'o/_/khyim bdag khyod longs/_'di ltar 'dir sems dad pas mchod pa byas so/_/de nas khyim bdag dpal sbas kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 
[\[277a.3\]]la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mdun du bdar to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das steng gi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa la dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas khyim bdag dpal sbas kyis bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong 
[\[277a.4\]]gi dge 'dun bzhugs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_pus mo gnyis ka'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud do/_/thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun 
[\[277a.5\]]pa bcom ldan 'das [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]cig gzhes su gsol/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du bshos gtsang gzhan bgyid du stsal to/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bsten pa'i dbang gis bdag gis bshos gtsang ci sbyar ba de thams 
[\[277a.6\]]cad kyi nang du dug drag po stsal bas/_des bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]gnod par 'gyur du glo ba chud lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag de snyam du ma sems shig_/khyim bdag nga dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa'i tshe 
[\[277a.7\]]yang lus la dug gis ma tshugs na/_da byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa lta la ci smos te/_nga'i lus la dug gis tshugs par 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/bcom ldan 'das dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa na ji ltar sku la dug gis ma tshugs lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyim bdag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA rA Na sI'i rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba phyug pa/_nor che ba/_longs spyod che ba nas/_bang mdzod yongs su gang ba'i bar dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo /_/khyim bdag rgyal po tshangs pas byin la 
[\[277b.2\]]btsun mo dpe med ces bya ba gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod do/_/btsun mo dpe med ni rgyal po tshangs pas byin la sdug pa/_mngos pa/_phangs pa/_yid du 'ong ba/_'dod pa/_blta ba dang 'thun pa'o/_/
[\[277b.3\]]khyim bdag de'i tshe na ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya ba 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa/_yan lag bkra ba/_lus bkra ba/_rin po che'i mchu can zhig gnas te/_de gang dang gang du 'gro yang rma bya de dag thams cad kyi thog ma nyid 
[\[277b.4\]]la 'gro'o/_/de'i tshe dus gzhan zhig na rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba nam phyed kyi dus nam gyi gung thun la grong khyer bA rA Na sI'i steng du skad phyung ste/_skad des grong khyer de khyab par grag go/_/de'i tshe rgyal po tshangs pas byin btsun mo dpe med dang khang steng na 'dug par gyur 
[\[277b.5\]]to/_/de nas btsun mo dpe med kyis sgra de thos nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin de la dris pa/_lha 'di ltar chags par bgyid pa/_'di ltar 'dod par bgyid pa/_'di ltar dregs par bgyid pa/_'di ltar zhen par bgyid pa/_'di ltar 'ching bar bgyid pa/_'di ltar dga' bar 
[\[277b.6\]]bgyid pa/_'di ltar ro myang bar 'os pa/_'di ltar snyan cing yid du mchi la mnyan par 'os pa'i sgra gda' ba 'di su'i lags/_rgyal pos smras pa/_lha mo ngas kyang ma mthong ste/_gtam du thos na ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba yan lag 
[\[277b.7\]]bkra ba/_lus bkra ba/_rin po che'i mchu can 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa zhig gnas te/_de gang dang gang du 'gro yang rma bya de dag thams cad kyi thog ma nyid la 'gro ste lha mo de'i sgra ni 'di ltar chags par byed pa/_'di ltar 'dod par byed pa/_'di ltar dregs par byed pa/_'di ltar zhen 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]par byed pa/_'di ltar 'ching bar byed pa/_'di ltar dga' bar byed pa/_'di ltar ro myang bar 'os pa/_'di ltar snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan par 'os par grag ce'o/_/btsun mo dpe med kyis smras pa/_lha rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba myur du 'dir blang bar gsol/_
[\[278a.2\]]rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis smras pa/_lha mo nam mkha' la rgyu ba 'di lta bu ngas kyang mthong bar ga la nus/_btsun mo dpe med kyis smras pa/_lha gal te rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba ma mthong du lags na bdag 'gum par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po tshangs pas byin btsun mo dpe med la 
[\[278a.3\]]kun tu chags pa'i sems su gyur te/_sems zhen pas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis smras pa/_lha mo ngas rngon pa dang bya ba dgyes re zhig sdod cig_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis rngon pa dang bya ba'i mi rnams bos te 'di skad smras so/_/mchog rnams ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i lho 
[\[278a.4\]]phyogs kyi ngos la rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya ba yan lag bkra ba/_lus bkra ba/_gser gyi mchu can zhig gnas zhes grag gis/_khyed kyis rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba bya rgya dang rnyis zung la 'dir 'on cig_/gal te 'dir blang nus na de lta na ni legs so/_/ji ste mi 
[\[278a.5\]]nus na khyed thams cad kyi srog yal lo/_/de nas rngon pa dang bya pa'i mi rnams srog gis 'jigs skrag_/'chi bas 'jigs skrag ste/_bya rgya dang rnyi rnams thogs nas ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba gang na gnas 
[\[278a.6\]]pa'i phyogs der rgya bres rnyi btsugs pa dang /_rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba de gang dang gang du lta ba de dang der rgya ral rnyi chad de/_phyogs der zhag bdun gyi bar du sha thang yang rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba de bya rgya dang rnyis gzung bar ma nus pa dang /_rma bya'i rgyal po des snying rje nye bar bzhag nas 
[\[278a.7\]]rngon pa dang bya pa rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/zho shas 'tsho ba khyed rnams ci'i phyir phyogs 'di na sha thang zhing 'khod/_de dag gis smras pa/_rma bya'i rgyal po shes par gyis shig_/rgyal po tshangs pas byin des bsgo ba/_mchog rnams shes par gyis shig_/ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]lho phyogs kyi ngos la rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya ba yan lag bkra ba/_lus bkra ba/_rin po che'i mchu can/_'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa zhig gnas kyis/_de khyed kyis bya rgya dang rnyis zung la 'dir 'on cig_/gal te 'dir blang bar nus na ni shin tu legs so/_/ji ste ma nus na 
[\[278b.2\]]khyed thams cad kyi srog yal lo/_/zhes bsgo ste/_bdag cag srog gis 'jigs skrag nas khyod kyi phyir 'di lta bur 'bad par byed do/_/rma bya'i rgyal po des smras pa/_zho shas 'tsho ba dag khyed kyis rnyi dang bya rgyas nga gzung ba ni mi nus so/_/zho shas 'tsho ba dag gal te rgyal po tshangs pas 
[\[278b.3\]]byin nga blta bar 'dod na grong khyer bA rA Na sI'i nang shin tu phyag dar byos te/_spos chus chag chag thob la me tog sil ma khrom ste/_gdugs dang ba dan bres shig_/rgyal mtshan sgreng la/_pog phor nas bdug pas bdugs la rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta gyis te/_zhag bdun gyi nyin par dpung 
[\[278b.4\]]gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu 'dir shog shig dang /_nga nyid der 'gro bar bya'o/_/de ltar bya'o zhes te/_rngon pa dang bya pa'i mi dag rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba'i ltar mnyan nas mthar gyis grong khyer bA rA Na sI der rgyal po tshangs pas byin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po 
[\[278b.5\]]tshangs pas byin la 'di skad smras so/_/lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_bdag cag 'di nas bya rgya dang rnyi thogs te ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos ga la ba der mchis pa dang /_phyogs gang na rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba gnas pa'i phyogs der rnyi btsugs/_rgya bres na/_rma 
[\[278b.6\]]bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba gang dang gang du lta ba de dang der rgya ral rnyi chad de/_bdag cag phyogs de na dgung bdun gyi bar du sha thang yang rma bya'i rgyal po de rgya dang rnyis bzung ba'i rngo ma thogs pa dang /_rma bya'i rgyal po des snying rje nye bar bzhag ste bdag cag la 'di skad ces mchi'o/_/kye mi dag 
[\[278b.7\]]ci'i phyir phyogs 'di na sha thang zhing 'khod/_bdag cag gis smras pa/_rma bya'i rgyal po shes par gyis shig_/rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis bdag cag la bsgo ba/_ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya ba yan lag bkra ba/_lus bkra ba/_
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]rin po che'i mchu can 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa de gang dang gang du 'gro bar rma bya de dag thams cad kyi dang po la 'gro ba zhig gnas zhes grag gis/_khyed kyis bya rgya dang rnyis rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zung la 'on cig_/gal te rma bya'i rgyal po de 'dir blang nus na de lta na ni 
[\[279a.2\]]legs so/_/ji ste ma nus na khyed thams cad kyi srog yal lo zhes bsgo ste/_bdag cag srog gis 'jigs skrag_/'chi bas 'jigs skrag nas khyod kyi phyir 'di ltar 'bad par byed do/_/des smras pa/_kye zho shas 'tsho ba dag khyed kyis bya rgya dang rnyis bzung bar ni mi nus so/_/zho 
[\[279a.3\]]shas 'tsho ba dag gal te rgyal po tshangs pas byin nga mthong bar 'dod na grong khyer bA rA Na sI'i nang shin tu phyag dar byos te/_spos chus chag chag thob la me tog sil ma khrom ste/_gdugs dang ba dan bres shig_/rgyal mtshan sgreng la/_pog phor nas bdug pas bdugs la rin po che 
[\[279a.4\]]sna bdun gyi shing rta gyis te/_zhag bdun gyi nyin par dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu 'dir shog shig dang /_nga nyid der 'gro bar bya'o zhes mchi'o/_/de ltar bya'o zhes te rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis rngon pa dang bya pa de dag gi ltar mnyan nas/_grong khyer bA rA Na sI'i nang 
[\[279a.5\]]shin tu phyag dar byed du bcug_/spos chus chag chag 'debs su bcug_/me tog sil ma 'grems su bcug_/gdugs dang ba dan 'brer bcug_/rgyal mtshan sgreng du bcug_/pog phor nas bdug pas bdug tu bcug_/rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta byed du bcug nas zhag bdun 
[\[279a.6\]]'das pa dang /_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go gyon du bcug ste/_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bgos nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta drangs te/_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos ga la ba der song ba dang /_rma bya'i rgyal po 
[\[279a.7\]]gser du snang ba de bdag nyid rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te skad phyung ba dang /_de'i skad kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa khyab par grag nas/_rgyal po tshangs pas byin dga' mgu yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba de la 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]bkur sti byed du bcug_/bla mar byed du bcug_/rim gro byed du bcug_/mchod pa byed du bcug nas rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba dang lhan cig grong khyer bA rA Na sI ga la ba der song ba dang /_grong khyer bA rA Na sI'i sgor 'dug nas skad phyung ste/_de'i skad des grong khyer de thams cad 
[\[279b.2\]]khyab par grag go/_/de nas grong khyer bA rA Na sI na skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo gang dag gnas pa de dag grong khyer gyi sgo ga la ba der rab tu rgyug go/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba la bkur sti byed du bcug_/bla mar byed 
[\[279b.3\]]du bcug_/rim gro byed du bcug_/mchod pa byed du bcug nas/_rang gi khyim ga la ba dang /_btsun mo dpe med ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_btsun mo dpe med la 'di skad ces smras te/_lha mo rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba 'di ni khyod kyi gan du rang 'ongs so zhes smras so/_/
[\[279b.4\]]rgyal po tshangs pas byin de bdag nyid rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba la me tog dang 'bras bu rnams kyis rim gro byed do/_/de'i tshe dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po tshangs pas byin brel ba zhig byung nas des 'di snyam du bsams te/_sus rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba la rim gro byed 
[\[279b.5\]]nus snyam nas/_des yang 'di snyam du bsams te/_btsun mo dpe med ni mkhas pa/_shes rab chen po dang ldan pa ste/_des nus so snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis btsun mo dpe med la bos te 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mo khyod kyis rma bya'i rgyal po gser du 
[\[279b.6\]]snang ba 'di ngas ji ltar rim gro byas pa bzhin du bdag nyid kyis rim gro gyis shig_/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi btsun mo dpe med bdag nyid kyis me tog dang 'bras bu rnams kyis rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba de la bsnyen bkur byed do/_/de'i tshe dus gzhan zhig na btsun 
[\[279b.7\]]mo dpe med skyes pa gzhan la chags par gyur te/_de nas btsun mo dpe med kyis 'di snyam du bsams so/_/rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba 'di ni mi'i skad du smra bas des gtam 'di rgyal po tshangs pas byin la mi bsnyad grang /_rgyal po tshangs pas byin des kyang bdag bzung ste mi 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]bsad grang snyam nas/_de nas bud med des bya'i rgyal po de la zas dug can dang /_skom dug can byin no/_/bud med des rma bya'i rgyal po de la ji lta ji ltar zas dug can dang /_skom dug can byin pa de lta de ltar rma bya'i rgyal po de'i lus gzugs ches bzang ba dang /_ches mdzes 
[\[280a.2\]]pa dang /_ches blta na sdug pa dang /_ches 'od gsal bar gyur to/_/de nas btsun mo dpe med kyis 'di snyam du sems te/_rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba la bdag gis ji lta ji ltar zas dug can dang /_skom dug can byin pa de lta de ltar 'di'i lus gzugs ches bzang ba dang /_ches 
[\[280a.3\]]mdzes pa dang /_ches blta na sdug pa dang /_ches 'od gsal bar gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas btsun mo dpe med la rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang bas 'di skad ces smras so/_/rkun ma rkun ma khyod kyi ngas shes te/_khyod 'di snyam du bdag ni skyes pa gzhan la chags par gyur la/_bya 'dis 
[\[280a.4\]]shes te 'di yang mi skad smra bas 'dis gtam 'di rgyal po tshangs pas byin la mi bsnyad grang /_rgyal pos bdag bzung ste mi bsad grang snyam du bsams nas/_de'i phyir khyod kyis nga la zas dug can dang /_skom dug can byin te/_khyod kyis nga gsad par mi nus so/_/de nas btsun mo dpe 
[\[280a.5\]]med des tshig de thos nas kha bub tu 'gyel te khrag dron po skyugs nas nad tshabs chen pos btab ste/_nad de nyid kyis shi ba'i dus byas so/_/de shi nas sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod du skyes par gyur to/_/khyim bdag de'i tshe de'i dus na grong khyer chen po bA rA Na sI'i rgyal po tshangs pas 
[\[280a.6\]]byin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tsom za na de ltar mi blta ste/_dge slong shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya bar gyur to/_/khyim bdag de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun mo dpe med ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs 
[\[280a.7\]]shing the tsom za na de ltar mi blta ste/_bram ze'i bu mo g.yo ma de de'i tshe de'i dus na btsun mo dpe med du gyur to/_/khyim bdag de'i tshe de'i dus na ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la gnas pa'i rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs shing 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]the tsom za na de ltar mi blta ste/_nga de'i tshe de'i dus na ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la gnas pa rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya bar gyur to/_/khyim bdag de'i tshe de'i dus na rma bya lnga brgyar gyur pa de dag gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tsom za na de ltar mi blta ste/_
[\[280b.2\]]dge slong mchog lnga brgya po 'di dag de'i tshe de'i dus na rma bya lnga brgyar gyur to/_/khyim bdag nga dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa de'i tshe yang lus la dug gis ma tshugs na/_da ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa lta la smos kyang ci dgos te/_nga'i lus la dug gis tshugs par 'gyur 
[\[280b.3\]]ba 'di ni gnas med do/_/de bas na khyim bdag tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa byas/_de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas khyod la bshad kyis legs par rab tu zung la zas la lan gsum bzlas pa gyis te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun la brims shig_/'dod chags 
[\[280b.4\]]zhe sdang gti mug rnams/_/de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/_/bcom ldan sangs rgyas dug med pa/_/sangs rgyas bden pas dug bcom mo/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/_/de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/_/bcom ldan chos ni dug med pa/_/chos kyi bden 
[\[280b.5\]]pas dug bcom mo/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/_/de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/_/bcom ldan dge 'dun dug med pa/_/dge 'dun bden pas dug bcom mo/_/bden pa gang gis nga sangs rgyas/_/'jig rten kun la bla na med/_/bden pa'i tshig ni de 
[\[280b.6\]]yis su/_/nga lus dug gis mi tshugs shog_/bden pa gang gis nga yi chos/_/'jig rten kun la bla na med/_/bden pa'i tshig ni de yis su/_/nga lus dug gis mi tshugs shog_/bden pa gang gis nga'i dge 'dun/_/'jig rten kun la bla na med/_/bden pa'i tshig ni de 
[\[280b.7\]]yis su/_/nga lus dug gis mi tshugs shog_/shing gang dug dang bcas rnams dang /_/srog chags gang dag dug bcas pa/_/de kun 'dod chags dug las byung /_/'dod chags 'di ni dug gi mchog_/shing gang dug dang bcas rnams dang /_/srog chags gang dag dug 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]bcas pa/_/de kun zhe sdang dug las byung /_/zhe sdang 'di ni dug gi mchog_/shing gang dug dang bcas rnams dang /_/srog chags gang dag dug bcas pa/_/de kun gti mug dug las byung /_/gti mug 'di ni dug gi mchog_/drag po'i dug gis dug bcom ste/_/
[\[281a.2\]]bsrung dang yongs su gzung ba byas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis dug bcom pas/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong /_/de de bzhin bgyi'o zhes te khyim bdag dpal sbas kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa de dag legs par rab tu blangs te/_blangs nas zas de dag 
[\[281a.3\]]la lan gsum bzlas te/_rang gi lag gis zhal zas bsod pa mang po dge slong gi dge 'dun la bstabs te tshim par byas so/_/de nas khyim bdag dpal sbas kyis bcom ldan 'das dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol zin te/_phyag bcabs lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan 
[\[281a.4\]]zhig blangs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/khyim bdag dpal sbas phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam rim gyis mdzad pa 'di lta ste/_gang 'di sbyin pa'i gtam dang /_tshul khrims kyi gtam dang /_mtho ris kyi gtam dang /_'dod pa'i nyes dmigs dang /_de'i 
[\[281a.5\]]'og tu zag pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_mngon par 'byung ba'i phan yon dang /_rnam par byang ba'i phyogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag dpal sbas la rgya cher rab tu bstan/_rab tu 'jog_/rnam par 'grel/_rnam par 'byed/_gsal bar mdzad do/_/bcom 
[\[281a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe khyim bdag dpal sbas sems dga' ba dang /_sems mnyen pa dang /_sems dge ba dang /_sgrib pa med pa'i sems su gyur par mkhyen pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yang dag phul gyi chos gang ston pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim 
[\[281a.7\]]bdag dpal sbas la rgya cher rab tu bstan/_rab tu bzhag_/rnam par bkrol/_rnam par phye/_gsal bar mdzad/_rab tu bshad do/_/de nas khyim bdag dpal sbas stan de la 'dug bzhin du chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes te/_'di lta ste/_dper na 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]ras nag po'i bag med pa/_kha bsgyur bar 'os pa tshon gyi nang du bcug na tshon legs par 'jen pa de bzhin du khyim bdag dpal sbas kyang stan de la 'dug bzhin du chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de nas khyim bdag dpal sbas kyis chos 
[\[281b.2\]]mthong /_chos thob/_chos yongs su bskyed/_mngon du yang dag par rtogs/_nem nur med/_the tsom dang bral/_som nyi dang bral/_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog_/ston pa'i bstan pa kun tu shes/_mi 'jigs pa thob nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[281b.3\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag la dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_/deng nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi skyabs khyod lags te skyabs su mchi'o/_/de nas dge 
[\[281b.4\]]slong de dag ngo mtshar du gyur/_rmad du byung bar gyur te/_'di ltar khyim bdag dpal sbas bcom ldan 'das me dong du bsreg pa dang /_sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'dod pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can dmyal ba chen po nas bzlog ste/_chos rnams la chos 
[\[281b.5\]]kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'o snyam pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyim bdag dpal sbas da ltar 'ba' zhig nga me dong du bsreg pa dang /_sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'dod la/_ngas de sems 
[\[281b.6\]]can dmyal ba chen po de las bzlog ste/_chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes par yang ma zad de/_dge slong dag gzhan gyi tshe yang khyim bdag dpal sbas nga me dong du bsreg pa dang /_sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'dod de/_ngas de sems can dmyal ba 
[\[281b.7\]]chen po de las bzlog go/_/dge slong de dag gis gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/_khyim bdag dpal sbas gzhan gyi tshe bcom ldan 'das zhugs kyi dong du bsregs te/_sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar ma mchis par ltung bar 'tshal la/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de sems can 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]dmyal ba chen po de las thar bar mdzad pa ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod ces bya ba tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_yon tan dang ldan pa/_'dod pa chung ba/_chog shes pa/_rab tu dben 
[\[282a.2\]]pa/_dge ba'i chos can zhig byung ste/_bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod ni gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa'o/_/bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod de bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas te 
[\[282a.3\]]mchod nas gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad bzang po mang po rnyed par gyur to/_/bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod ni stong phrag brgyas tshigs su bcad pa gcig tshol lo/_/de nas bram ze zhig bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod kyi rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs 
[\[282a.4\]]su bcad pa ma bzod nas bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ngas bram ze'i khye'u khyod la legs par bshad pa bsgrag par bya'o/_/bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod kyis smras pa/_'phags pa legs par bshad pa 
[\[282a.5\]]bdag la legs par bsgrag tu gsol/_bram zes smras pa/_chos 'dod ngas khyod la de bzhin du legs par bshad pa bsgrag tu mi rung ngo /_/chos 'dod kyis smras pa/_'phags pa 'o na khyod kyis legs par bshad pa bdag la ji ltar bsgrag par bgyi/_bram zes smras pa/_gal te 
[\[282a.6\]]chos 'dod khyod kyis dong chen po rkor bcug la/_brkos nas mes 'gengs su bcug ste/_me mi 'bar zhing du ba mi 'thul bas bkang nas mchod sdong mthon po 'dzugs su chug la/_'dzugs su bcug nas me dong der bdag nyid mchongs na de lta na ngas khyod la legs par bshad pa 
[\[282a.7\]]bsgrag par bya'o/_/bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod kyis smras pa/_'phags pa bdag 'di na legs par bshad pa gang ci tshol ba de thams cad ni sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du lags na/_slob dpon bdag gis legs par bshad pa sems can rnams la ma bsgrags par ji ltar me dong du mchong 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]bar bgyi/_de nas bram ze des bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_sngags tshol bde ba ga la yod/_/ga la bde yod sngags tshol ba/_/sngags btsal phyir ni bde ba 'or/_/bde ba 'or cig sngags btsal phyir/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod kyis bram ze de la tshigs su 
[\[282b.2\]]bcad de slar smras pa/_byang chub tshol ba ga la bde/_/ga la bde yod byang chub tshol/_/byang chub btsal phyir bde ba 'or/_/bde 'or byang chub btsal ba'i phyir/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod kyis bram ze la 'di skad ces smras so/_/slob dpon bdag la legs par bshad pa legs par 
[\[282b.3\]]bsgrags su gsol/_'on tang khyod gang bzhed pa de bgyi'o/_/bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod legs par bshad pa'i don gyi phyir bdag nyid dor bar 'dod do zhes bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis thos nas de dag thams cad ngu zhing gdong la mchi ma zag bzhin du bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod ga la 
[\[282b.4\]]ba der dong ste phyin nas bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod la 'di skad ces smras so/_/chos 'dod khyod bdag nyid ma dor cig_/chos 'dod khyod ni khyim na 'dug bzhin sbyin pa sbyin pa dang /_bsod nams bya bar nus so/_/bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod kyis bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[282b.5\]]btsun pa dag de skad ma gsung shig_/bdag gis slob dpon gyi dgongs pa nges par bskang bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod kyis mchod sdong chen po 'dzugs su bcug ste/_mchod sdong chen po btsugs nas de'i drung du dong chen po rkor bcug ste/_brkos nas mes 'gengs su bcug go/_/me 
[\[282b.6\]]mi 'bar zhing du ba mi 'thul bas bkang nas bram ze de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/slob dpon bdag la legs par bshad pa legs par bsgrag tu gsol/_de nas bram ze des bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod la tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu bstan to/_/sbyin pa la ni rtag tu dga' bar gyis/_/rtag 
[\[282b.7\]]tu tshul khrims yongs su rdzogs par spyod/_/brtson 'grus mchog gi gnas ni brtsam par gyis/_/shes rab kyis ni chos mchog dam pa thob/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod kyis bram ze de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di legs par rab tu bzung ste/_skye bo phal po che bsogs so/_/skye bo 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]phal po che bsogs nas mchod sdong mthon po'i khar 'dzegs te/_skye bo phal po che la tshigs su bcad pa 'di bsgrags so/_/sbyin pa la ni rtag tu dga' bar gyis/_/rtag tu tshul khrims yongs su rdzogs par spyod/_/brtson 'grus mchog gi gnas ni brtsam par gyis/_/shes 
[\[283a.2\]]rab kyis ni chos mchog dam pa thob/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod kyis skye bo phal po che de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di bsgrags nas 'di lta bu'i bden pa'i tshig 'di byed de/_sa'i phyogs 'di na lha rgya chen po gang dag gnas pa rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/_klu dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[283a.3\]]dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad kyang bdag la dgongs su gsol/_bdag ni gtong ba bgyid de/_shin tu gtong ba dang /_gtong ba'i yang gtong ba dang /_bdag nyid yongs su gtong ba bgyid do/_/bden pa dang bden 
[\[283a.4\]]pa'i tshig gang gis bdag yongs su gtong ba bgyid pa ni rgyal po'i slad du ma lags/_longs spyod kyi slad du ma lags/_mtho ris kyi slad du ma lags/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i slad du ma lags kyi/_gzhan du na bdag ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[283a.5\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can ma dul ba rnams gdul bar bgyi/_ma rgal ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi/_ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi/_dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung bar bgyi/_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bgyi snyam pa'i 
[\[283a.6\]]slad du ste/_bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi yongs su gtong ba 'bras bu med par ma gyur cig ces byas nas me dong der bdag nyid mchongs so/_/dge slong dag bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod me dong der mchongs ma thag tu me dong de'i me shi ste/_pad ma'i rdzing du gyur nas bung ba sgra zi zi zer 
[\[283a.7\]]ba'i pad ma la bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod 'dug nas chos ston te/_tshangs par spyod pa/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba yang dag par ston te/_bram ze de ni lus thams 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]cad nas me byung ste tshig nas tshig go zhes smras te sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung ngo /_/de la bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/slob dpon ma bsnyengs shig_/bdag gis khyod bskyab par bgyi'o/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod kyis de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i bden 
[\[283b.2\]]pa'i tshig 'di byas te/_bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub la spyod pa'i bden pa dang /_bden pa'i tshig des bram ze 'di'i lus tshig pa rab tu zhi bar gyur cig_/sems can dmyal ba las kyang log par gyur cig ces byas so/_/bram ze'i khye'u 
[\[283b.3\]]chos 'dod kyis bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig byas ma thag tu bram ze de sems can dmyal ba de nas thar bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tsom za na de ltar mi blta ste/_dge slong dag 
[\[283b.4\]]nga de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod ces bya bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na bram zer gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tsom za na de ltar mi blta ste/_khyim bdag dpal sbas de'i tshe de'i dus na bram zer gyur to/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe yang khyim 
[\[283b.5\]]bdag dpal sbas nga me dong du bsregs la sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'dod pa las/_ngas de sems can dmyal ba chen po de nas bzlog cing /_'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la bzhag ste 'di dang de yang de bzhin du zung shig_/dge slong dag da ltar yang dpal sbas nga me dong du 
[\[283b.6\]]bsregs la sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'dod pa las/_ngas de sems can dmyal ba chen po de las bzlog cing 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la bzhag ste/_de dang 'di yang de bzhin du zung shig_/dge dang mi dge sngon byas chud mi za/_/mkhas pa rnams la bsten pa chud mi za/_/
[\[283b.7\]]'phags pa'i tshogs kyis legs bshad chud mi za/_/byas la byas gzo nam yang chud mi za/_/legs par byas pa dge ba'i las/_/nyes par byas pa mi dge yin/_/de la'ang rnam par smin yod de/_/gdon mi za bar 'bras bu smin/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma de dag dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang bcas pa dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[284a.2\]]kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa dpal sbas zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[284a.3\]{D218}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya karma A ba ra Na bi shud d+ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_
[\[284a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi a mras bsrungs pa'i tshal na/_dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sum khri nyis stong la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[284a.5\]]nga rgyal rnam par 'joms dang /_'od kyis rnam par rtse ba mngon par shes pa dang /_me tog dam pa lta bu dang /_'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i rgyal po dang /_rtag tu bu don ltar bris pa'i lus can dang /_som nyi thams cad mgu byed dang /_rin chen bkod pa'i rgya mtsho blo gros dang /_me tog sna tshogs 
[\[284a.6\]]gnas dang /_sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po dang /_'od zer rgyal po'i sgron ma dang /_dpal gyi snying po'i gser 'od dang /_dbang po dang /_yul thams cad rab tu 'dul ba dang /_sgra dbyangs mngon par sgrogs pa'i rgyal po dang /_gzi brjid yid 'ong kun bsdus dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[284a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sum khri nyis stong dang yang thabs cig go/_/de nas de'i tshe dge slong dri med 'od ces bya ba yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ste/_
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]mthar chags su bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na khyim gyi rgyus mi shes pas smad 'tshong ma'i khyim zhig tu song ngo /_/dge slong de smad 'tshong ma'i khyim gyi nang du song ma thag tu smad 'tshong ma des bdag dge slong 'di dang mi nyal du mi gtong ngo /_/gal te ma grub na ni bdag 'chi bar 'gyur 
[\[284b.2\]]ro snyam du de la 'dod chags kyi sems bskyed do/_/des dge slong de nang du 'ongs ma thag tu sgo bcad nas dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag dang lhan cig tu mi nyal du mi rung ngo /_/gal te ma nyal na ni kho mo 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so/_/de nas dge slong dri med 'od kyis 
[\[284b.3\]]smad 'tshong ma de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sru mo kho bos ni sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa chen po bcas pa la bslab dgos te/_'khrig pa'i chos byed mi phod kyis thong shig_/kho bo ni shi yang sla'i 'khrig pa'i chos ni mi byed do zhes smras so/_/de nas smad 'tshong ma de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag 
[\[284b.4\]]gis gsang sngags dang /_sman gang gis dge slong 'di 'dug nas gdon mi za bar bdag dang lhan cig tu dga' ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i gsang sngags dang /_sman dag dge slong 'di la sbyin gor ma chag go snyam mo/_/de nas des dge slong de la smras pa/_bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyis bcas 
[\[284b.5\]]pa'i bslab pa gzhig pa'am nyams par ni bgyi bar mi 'tshal gyis/_thugs brtse ba'i slad du bsod snyoms bzhes shig ces byas nas de nang du song ste rig sngags dang gsang sngags stobs bskyed pa dag gis zas de la bsngags nas dge slong de'i lhung bzed kyi nang du blugs so/_/zas blugs 
[\[284b.6\]]ma thag tu dge slong de de'i mod la tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa skyes te/_de kun tu rtog cing shas cher gdung ba skyed do/_/de nas smad 'tshong ma des dge slong de'i bzhin gyi mdog gyur par mthong nas lag pa g.yas pas dge slong de bzung ste mal du khrid nas de dang lhan cig tu nyal po 
[\[284b.7\]]byed do/_/de nas dge slong de smad 'tshong ma de dang lhan cig tu dga' ba'i rtsed mo de nyams su myong nas bsod snyoms de blangs te/_gtsug lag khang du song nas/_kye ma bdag ni tshul khrims kyi phung po chen po las nyams par gyur gyis/_bdag tshul khrims nyams pas dad pas byin pa longs spyod 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]pa'i 'os ma yin te/_bdag ni sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro snyam nas de dge slong grogs po rnams kyi thad du 'ongs nas bdag ni tshul khrims 'chal par gyur te/_dge sbyong ma yin par gyur pas bdag ni sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes smras 
[\[285a.2\]]so/_/dge slong grogs po de dag gis de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod ci'i phyir tshul khrims 'chal par gyur/_des kyang de dag la ji ltar gyur pa bzhin du bsnyad do/_/de nas dge slong grogs po de dag gis dge slong dri med 'od de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dri med 'od byang 
[\[285a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba nyes pa thams cad las 'byin pa la mkhas pa/_sgrib pa thams cad sel ba la mkhas pa/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bstod cing bsngags la snyan par brjod pa yod kyis 
[\[285a.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog_/'o bu cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der 'dong ngo /_/des ni khyod kyi 'gyod pa de bsal nus so/_/de nas dge slong dri med 'od de zas de ma zos par dge slong grogs po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags 
[\[285a.5\]]nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig tu mngon du yang dag par mgu ba dang /_yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la ji ltar gyur pa de bsnyad do/_/de skad smras pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 
[\[285a.6\]]dge slong dri med 'od de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge slong khyod zas 'di je zo shig dang /_zas zos zin pa'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad lung bstan pa'i don bzhin du gzung bar bya'o/_/de nas dge slong dri med 'od dang /_dge slong de dag zan 
[\[285a.7\]]zos zin pa'i 'og tu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas dge slong dri med 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]'od ngo tsha ste bcom ldan 'das la gsol ma nus so/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la ji 
[\[285b.2\]]ltar gyur pa de thams cad gsol to/_/de skad ces gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dri med 'od de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong khyod kyis de lta bu byas pa bden nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de mad lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[285b.3\]]stsal pa/_dge slong khyod kyis ci bdag gis 'dod chags spyad do snyam du snga nas bsams sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 'dod chags yid la byed pa ma skyes par khyod kyis 'dod chags ji ltar spyad/_gsol 
[\[285b.4\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'dod chags kyi sems ni slad kyis skyes lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_dge slong sems des khyod kyi 'dod chags spyad dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ci sems kun 
[\[285b.5\]]nas nyon mongs pas sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur la/_sems rnam par dag pas rnam par dag par 'gyur ro zhes ngas chos ma bstan tam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni de lta lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ji snyam du sems/_
[\[285b.6\]]ci khyod kyis gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na kun tu rtog pa'i tshe 'dod chags spyad pa myong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das myong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong sems kyis 'dod chags spyad par khyod kyis mi sho dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[285b.7\]]de ni de lta ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ci khyod kyis rmi lam gyi sems dang /_gnyid ma log pa'i sems 'di la bye brag dang tha dad du bya ba zhig yod par mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni rmi lam gyi sems sam/_gnyid ma log 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]pa'i sems la tha dad du bgyi ba cung zad kyang ma mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 'di ji snyam du sems/_chos thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu'o zhes ngas ma bstan tam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni de lta lags so/_/bcom 
[\[286a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci rmi lam de yang dag pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci rmi lam gyi sems gang yin pa dang /_gnyid 
[\[286a.3\]]ma log pa'i sems gang yin pa 'di gnyis med pa ma yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma mchis lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci med pa de gang zhig na yod dam/_
[\[286a.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci med pa gang yin pa de la skye ba yod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[286a.5\]]ji snyam du sems/_ci skye ba med pa skye ba'am/_'gags pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa can nam/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci skye ba med pa'i chos 
[\[286a.6\]]rnams sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ram/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis pa nyid kyang ma mchis pa lags na ngan 'gror mchi bar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[286a.7\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong chos thams cad ni de ltar 'od gsal ba yin na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la brtags/_phyin ci log la brtags/_gsob dang /_gsog lta bu'i chos thams cad la brtags pas sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gzhan yang chos thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa ste/_rnam par bsgrubs nas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni sbyar ba ste/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams kyang 
[\[286b.2\]]byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag gis kun nas bskyed pa yin no/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni brtags pa ste/_phyin ci log las byung ba yin no/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni med pa ste/_smig rgyu lta bu'i ngo bo nyid yin no/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni ya ma brla ste nam mkha' dang 'dra'o/_/dge 
[\[286b.3\]]slong chos thams cad ni dngos po dang bral ba'i phyir dngos po med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni nam mkha' ltar zab pa'i phyir zab pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni dngos po mi dmigs pa'i phyir yangs pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni shin tu dben pa'i phyir mi gnas pa'o/_/dge 
[\[286b.4\]]slong chos thams cad ni yul thams cad gsog yin pa'i phyir mi rten pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni shin tu gsog yin pa'i phyir rtsa ba med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni nyon mongs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir kun nas dkris pa med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis 
[\[286b.5\]]ma skyes pa'i phyir yongs su gdung ba med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni dben pa'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis ldang ba med pa'i phyir zhe sdang med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir gti mug med pa'o/_/dge slong chos 
[\[286b.6\]]thams cad ni mig yor lta bu ste rnam par smin pa med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni log par snang ba'i phyir sgyu ma lta bu'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin par kun tu brtags pa'i phyir gnas pa med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis med bzhin du sgro btags 
[\[286b.7\]]pa'i phyir rnam par rmongs par byed pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni rkyen phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir skye ba med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni lam chad pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni nyon mongs pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]ni nam mkha' ltar yongs su dag pa'i phyir dri ma med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni ci las kyang dben pa'i phyir ci yang ma yin pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pa'i phyir dul ba'o/_/dge slong chos thams 
[\[287a.2\]]cad ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_dbus yongs su bcad pa'i phyir mi bden pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni gcig la gcig rgyur 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir grol ba'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni rtswa dang /_shing dang /_rtsig pa 
[\[287a.3\]]pa dang /_bong ba dang 'dra ba'i phyir bems po yin no/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang tshul 'dra ba'i phyir ngo bo med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni chags pa med pa'i phyir mnyam pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i lus 
[\[287a.4\]]dang /_chang pa stong pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir gzung du med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni ye shes dang ldan pa rnams kyis yongs su btsal ba'i phyir thob pa med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni dus gsum yongs su dag pa'i phyir dus med pa'o/_/
[\[287a.5\]]dge slong chos thams cad ni mun par chags pa med pa'i phyir sbyor ba med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni sgrib pa las dben pa'i phyir zug rngu med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs pa'i phyir bde ba'o/_/dge slong 
[\[287a.6\]]chos thams cad ni 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i phyir 'jigs pa med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni tshu rol mi dmigs pa'i phyir pha rol ma yin no/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni grangs su bgrang ba med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa'o/_/dge slong chos 
[\[287a.7\]]thams cad ni mtshan ma gsob yin pa'i phyir mtshan ma med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni smon pa chad pa'i phyir smon pa med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni 'du byed [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'o/_/dge 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]slong chos thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir spros pa med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni gnas dang bral ba'i phyir gnas pa med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni rtag tu dang ba'i phyir rnyog pa med pa'o/_/dge slong chos thams cad ni 
[\[287b.2\]]skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /_skye ba gsob yin pa dang /_skye ba gsog yin pa dang /_skye ba stong pa yin pa dang /_skye bzhi ba yin pa'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/dge slong de'i phyir chos 'di dag ni ji skad bstan pa de kho na bzhin te/_dge slong nga byang chub 
[\[287b.3\]]kyi snying po la 'dug pas ni chos gang gis skye ba'am/_'jig pa'am/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba'am/_sgrib pa'am/_kun nas dkris pa'am/_'gyod pa'am/_yid la gcags pa'i chos rdul tsam yang mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[287b.4\]]dge slong chos thams cad ni rtag tu kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas dge slong dri med 'od kyis chos kyi rang bzhin 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes 
[\[287b.5\]]te/_sgrib pa med par shin tu dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_kye ma kye ma sangs rgyas mthu che ba/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten skyabs ni khyod lags te/_/ma bslabs 
[\[287b.6\]]bzhin du yon tan kun gyis 'phags/_/sdug bsngal kun 'grel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/skyabs ma mchis pa rnams kyi skyabs khyod mdzod/_/'dren pa ma mchis rnams kyi 'dren khyod mdzod/_/zhir gyur bde ba'i lam la gnas pa po/_/sangs rgyas mthu chen khyod 
[\[287b.7\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod ni 'jig rten long ba'i sgron ma lags/_/mig ma mchis pa rnams la mig stsol khyod/_/sems can ma grol rab tu grol mdzad khyod/_/dpa' bo mthu chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chags dang sdang la khyod ni chags mi mnga'/_/sred la 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]chags rnams sdug bsngal 'grel pa khyod/_/'khor ba'i 'khor lo mi bden thugs su chud/_/ye shes stobs 'phags khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rtog dang rnam rtog rnams kyis rtag mi chags/_/ye shes bsam mi khyab pas grol ba po/_/'jig rten 
[\[288a.2\]]gsum mchog dri med nyon mongs grol/_/dri med dag pa'i sems can khyod phyag 'tshal/_/byang chub la ni bdag kyang zhugs bgyis la/_/sems can sdug bsngal skyabs ma mchis rnams dgrol/_/'di 'dra'i ye shes bdag gis thob gyur cing /_/theg pa dman pas zag pa 
[\[288a.3\]]bas ma gyur/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas kyis/_/sdug bsngal bas bgyi byang chub yong mi spong /_/skar ma'i tshogs kyi nang na dgung zla ltar/_/'jig rten mgon po bdag gis de 'drar mthong /_/ji ltar bsam pa dman pa'i mi 'ga' zhig_/rgya mtsho chen po'i 
[\[288a.4\]]nang du phyin gyur kyang /_/rin chen mang po mi len spong bgyid cing /_/mching bu'i nor bu blangs nas mchi bar bgyid/_/de bzhin gang dag sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul stobs/_/thos kyang 'dir ni byang chub sems mi skyed/_/byang chub spangs nas nyan thos 'tshal ba gang /_/de dag 
[\[288a.5\]]ye shes yangs la 'jug mi 'gyur/_/'dir ni mi zhig byis pa'i rang bzhin can/_/rgyal po 'bangs kyis bskor ba mthong gyur kyang /_/de ni blon po'i thabs la sems bskyed na/_/de yi shes pa yangs par mi 'jug ltar/_/de ltar sangs rgyas yon tan che nyid dang /_/ye shes 
[\[288a.6\]]rnam par 'phrul pa thos gyur kyang /_/shes pa dman pa la ni 'dun skyed pa/_/de ni le lo can te sems kyang zhum/_/theg pa dman pas 'jig rten ma chags pa/_/mtshan mo srin bu me khyer snang ba 'dra/_/nyi ma'i gzi brjid kyis ni las bgyid pa/_/snang ba thob nas mun dang 
[\[288a.7\]]bral bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas sgras ni mtho ris mchi bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas sgras ni bzang 'gror mchi bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten 'di na sangs rgyas sgron ma'i mchog_/lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di ni snang bar mdzad/_/wa yi khrod na seng ge mthong gyur na/_/wa yi skad la 'dun 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]pa skyed pa dang /_/seng ge rnam par 'phrul ba spong bgyid cing /_/wa yi chos kyi dga' ba skyed pa ltar/_/de bzhin gang dag nyan thos khrod dag tu/_/skyes bu khyu mchog seng ge rnam 'phrul mthong /_/theg pa dman la dga' ba skyed pa ni/_/de dag phyogs gcig pa yi rdzu 'phrul 
[\[288b.2\]]lags/_/ye shes 'tshal ba'i mis ni dus kun tu/_/'jig rten kun tu sdug bsngal mang 'grel ba/_/nyan thos mang po'i sa min gang lags pa/_/ye shes dam pa mchog ni btsal bar bgyi/_/de nas dge slong dri med 'od kyi tshigs su bcad pa spobs pa smras pa 'di thos nas/_
[\[288b.3\]]lha'i bu bzhi khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_dge slong dri med 'od la me tog man dA ra ba dag gis gtor te/_tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge slong 
[\[288b.4\]]legs so legs so/_/'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rjes su 'dzin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo ba nyid yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/_nam 'dzum pa mdzad 
[\[288b.5\]]pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od 'phro ba 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu kha dog du ma dang /_kha dog sna tshogs byung ste/_de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas 
[\[288b.6\]]mu med pa dag 'od kyis khyab par byas nas/_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du song ste/_nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang mog mog por byas nas phyir log ste/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang 
[\[288b.7\]]ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dge slong dri med 'od 'dis lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bus 
[\[289a.2\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_de'i phyir ngas dge slong dri med 'od 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bya ste/_kun dga' bo dge slong dri med 'od 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa bcu 'das pa na sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis la mchod pa byed par 'gyur te/_de bzhin 
[\[289a.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa las mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la yang mchod pa byed par 'gyur te/_de'i 'og tu mngon par byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan pad ma 
[\[289a.4\]]rnam par grags spyod seng ge'i sgra sgrogs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan pad ma rnam par grags spyod seng ge'i sgra sgrogs de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang rin po che sna bdun las grub par 'gyur la/_nyan thos 
[\[289a.5\]]dang rang sangs rgyas med de/_byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yang phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i chos bstan par 'gyur ro/_/de dag kyang myur ba nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 
[\[289a.6\]]'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang ye shes kyi khyad par gyis yongs su sbyang bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams de yang rnam grags mtha' yas ldan zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na 
[\[289a.7\]]nyi ma shar ba na mun pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin du gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag gis kun nas snang ba thob par 'gyur te/_chos thams cad la yang sgrib pa med pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na sgrib pa dang /_sgrib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo thong shig gnas 'di 'dri bas khyod la ci zhig bya/_kun dga' bo gal te de bzhin gshegs pas sgrib pa dang sgrib pa med pa 
[\[289b.2\]]thams cad bshad du zin na lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten rmongs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sgrib pa dang /_sgrib pa ma mchis pa gang thos na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams lnga brgya pa tha ma la bab pa'i 
[\[289b.3\]]tshe/_'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la 'dod pa skyed pa mi 'gyur bar de bshad du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal sgrib pa zhes bya ba la 'dod chags ni sgrib pa'o/_/zhe sdang ni sgrib pa'o/_/gti mug ni sgrib pa'o/_/sbyin pa ni sgrib pa'o/_/tshul khrims 
[\[289b.4\]]ni sgrib pa'o/_/bzod pa ni sgrib pa'o/_/brtson 'grus ni sgrib pa'o/_/bsam gtan ni sgrib pa'o/_/shes rab ni sgrib pa'o/_/sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o/_/chos su 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o/_/dge 'dun du 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o/_/stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o/_/mtshan 
[\[289b.5\]]ma med par 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o/_/smon pa med par 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o/_/mngon par 'du byed pa med par 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o/_/skye ba med par 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o/_/byang chub tu 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o/_/'jam dpal mdor na kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang bar dmigs 
[\[289b.6\]]pa de dag thams cad ni de'i sgrib pa yin par blta bar bya'o/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa ji ltar sgrib pa lags/_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab ji ltar sgrib pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[289b.7\]]stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad la ni sgrib pa med mod kyi/_'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi rang gi rtog pas sbyin pa yang sgrib pa'i bya ba byed do/_/tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyang sgrib pa'i bya ba byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]'jam dpal byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_sems can ser sna can rnams la ma dad par byed de/_de dag ma dad pa des khong khro ba dang /_tha ba'i nyes pa skyed par byed do/_/khong khro ba dang /_tha ba'i nyes pas sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/de 
[\[290a.2\]]dag tshul khrims srung ba na tshul khrims 'chal pa la smod cid brnyas par byed la bsngags pa ma yin pa rjod do/_/de dag las de dag gi bsngags pa ma yin pa thos pas so so'i skye bo mang po dag ma dad par byed de/_de dag ma dad pa des ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag bzod pa sgom pa na 
[\[290a.3\]]bdag cag ni bzod par smra ba yin gyi gzhan 'di dag ni gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin no zhes bzod pa'i rgyags pas myos pa de dag bag med pa'i gzhi las byung ba'i sdug bsngal rnams skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de dag brtson 'grus rtsom pa na bdag sgrogs shing dge slong 'di dag ni le lo can 
[\[290a.4\]]du gnas pa yin te/_brtson pa med par dad pas byin pa longs spyod par byed do/_/de dag gis ni chu ra'i chu yang longs spyod par mi 'os so snyam ste/_de dag brtson 'grus rtsom pas bdag la ni stod par byed/_gzhan la ni smod par byed de/_de dag ni byis pa yin zhes nga smra'o/_/de dag bsam 
[\[290a.5\]]gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa na/_bsam gtan gyi dga' ba de la chags pa skyed par byed cing de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag ni mnyam par bzhag pas gnas pa yin gyi/_dge slong gzhan 'di dag ni sems g.yengs pas gnas pa yin te/_'du 'dzi la dga' bas gnas pa 
[\[290a.6\]]yin no/_/'du 'dzi la dga' bas 'di dag sangs rgyas su ga la 'gyur te/_'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las ring ngo snyam mo/_/de dag 'du shes yid la byed pa des ji tsam du brnyas par gyur pa'i sems skyed par byed pa de snyed kyi bskal par 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/phyis 
[\[290a.7\]]de dag gis gang du byang chub la spyod pa na gal te de dag mang du thos pa yin du zin kyang de dag gis chos thams cad yi ge med pa la rnam par shes pa yod par brtags te/_shes rab tu dmigs nas pha rol khyad du gsod par byed pa de dag ni mi shes pa'o zhes nga smra'o/_/mi shes bzhin du smra'o zhes nga 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]smra'o/_/skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'o zhes nga smra'o/_/rnam par rtog pas nyams pa'o zhes nga smra'o/_/gal te de dag theg pa chen po la zhugs par gyur na yang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag ni 'jig rten na gtso bo yin no/_/bdag cag ni 'jig rten na phul yin no/_/bdag cag ni 
[\[290b.2\]]'jig rten na mchog yin no snyam mo/_/gal te de dag gis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag mthong na/_de dag la ma dad pa skyed cing smod pa dang /_'phya ba dang /_bsngags pa ma yin pa rjod par byed de/_bsam pa ngan pa dang /_nyes par brjod pa des na ngan 'gror 'gro ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[290b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis bsngags pa brjod par mi bgyi lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci byang chub 
[\[290b.4\]]sems dpa' sems can thams cad la dga' bzhin du blta ba dang /_phan pa'i dngos po'i rang bzhin bskyed par mi bya'am/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni de lta lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_byang chub 
[\[290b.5\]]sems dpa' sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/_theg pa chen po pa 'ga' tsam yang yongs su spangs sam/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa lags pas byang chub 
[\[290b.6\]]sems dpa' ni sems can 'ga' yang yongs su ma btang ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na sman pas ni rgyal po'am/_tshong dpon nam/_khyim bdag gam/_mi dbul po'am/_sems can 'ga' tsam yang yongs su spangs pa med do/_/sman 
[\[290b.7\]]pa de ni 'di ltar sems snyoms pas nye bar gnas pa yin te/_ji ltar byas na sems can 'di dag nad dang bral bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la snying rje 'jug cing sems snyoms pas nye bar gnas pa 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]yin te/_'di snyam du sems can 'di dag thams cad ji ltar byas na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam mo/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na sman pa ni sman dpyad kyi rgyud rgyun ma chad na/_dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs par 'gyur ro/_/'jam 
[\[291a.2\]]dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyud ma chad na dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal sems can thams cad ni sman pa dang 'dra ba ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gso bar byed pa'i sman pa ni dkon no/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du sems 
[\[291a.3\]]can thams cad ni sangs rgyas dang 'dra ba ma yin te/_byang chub kyi sems ni dkon no/_/byang chub kyi phyir go cha bgo ba ni sems can thams cad kyis mi bzod do/_/dper na le lo can rnams ni bdag gis sman pa bya'o snyam du sman pa'i chos rnams la lhag par dmigs pa med do/_/de bzhin du 
[\[291a.4\]]sems can thams cad ni byang chub tu sems bskyed mi nus te/_le los bdag nyid nad par byed do/_/'jam dpal rang byung ni dkon no/_/gzhan la rag las pa ma yin pa'i ye shes ni dkon no/_/sems rgya che ba ni dkon no/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la lhag par dmigs pa ni dkon 
[\[291a.5\]]no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la sgrib pa ma mchis par rnam par dag par 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam 
[\[291a.6\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad 'dod chags kyi chos su mthong ba gang yin pa des ni las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad zhe sdang gi chos su mthong ba des ni las kyi sgrib pa 
[\[291a.7\]]rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad gti mug gi chos su mthong ba des ni las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag la mngon par dga' zhing mi gtong mi spong la/_sangs rgyas 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]kyi chos rnams kyang 'dod pa'i ngo bo nyid du mthong ba des ni las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sgrib pa lnga po dag gis byang chub tshol bar byed de/_tshol ba dang byang chub kyang 'thob pa med cing sgrib pa rnams kyang med pa des ni 
[\[291b.2\]]las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang kun nas mnar sems kyi gzhi dgu po dag la byams pa thob par 'gyur la/_gang la de'i kun nas mnar sems kyi gzhi skye bar 'gyur ba de dang de la tshul bzhin du so sor rtog par 
[\[291b.3\]]byed cing bdag nyid kyang mi dmigs/_gzhan yang mi dmigs/_byams pa yang mi dmigs te/_'di ltar chos thams cad mi dmigs pa de ni byams pa'i mchog yin no/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa dang ldan pa ni sgrib pa med pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gzhan 
[\[291b.4\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' gang ltung ba la ltung ba med par mthong ba dang /_'dul ba ma yin pa la 'dul bar mthong ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa la rnam par byang bar mthong ba dang /_'khor ba'i khams la mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mthong ba des ni las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur 
[\[291b.5\]]ro/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dod chags kyi khams la mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mthong ba dang /_zhe sdang gi khams la mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mthong ba dang /_gti mug gi khams la mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mthong ba des ni las 
[\[291b.6\]]kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos su yang dag par mthong ba des ni las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[291b.7\]]dpa' gang chos thams cad nam mkha'i gzhi las byung bar mthong ba des ni las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang ser sna'i chos rnams dang /_sbyin pa'i chos rnams la gnyis su mi 'byed pa dang /_'chal pa'i tshul 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]khrims kyi chos rnams dang /_tshul khrims kyi chos rnams la gnyis su mi 'byed pa dang /_gnod sems kyi chos rnams dang /_bzod pa'i chos rnams la gnyis su mi 'byed pa dang /_le lo'i chos rnams dang /_brtson 'grus kyi chos rnams la gnyis su mi 'byed pa 
[\[292a.2\]]dang /_rnam par g.yengs pa'i chos rnams dang /_bsam gtan gyi chos rnams la gnyis su mi 'byed pa dang /_'chal pa'i shes rab kyi chos rnams dang /_shes rab kyi chos rnams la gnyis su mi 'byed pa des ni las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_'jam dpal 
[\[292a.3\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang nyon mongs pa thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams su mos pa des ni las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems 
[\[292a.4\]]dpa' ji ltar nyon mongs pa thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'jug par bgyid pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_chos 'ga' tsam yang chos 'ga' tsam la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bya ba byed dam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[292a.5\]]ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_chos 'ga' tsam yang chos 'ga' tsam la rnam par byang ba'i bya ba byed dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[292a.6\]]'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_khyod kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ji ltar thob/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni nyon mongs pa thams cad la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa thams 
[\[292a.7\]]cad ni nam mkha'i gzhi las byung ba'i slad du ste/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni chos 'ga' tsam yang yongs su ma 'tshal cing ma spangs la/_ma bsgoms shing mngon sum du ma bgyis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]bral ba yang ma lags/_rtogs pa yang ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa spang ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la dmigs pa de dag ni phongs par 'gyur ba lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_
[\[292b.2\]]'jam dpal gnyis su med pa'i chos la gnas pa bstan pa 'di ni legs so/_/legs so/_/'jam dpal sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i gzhal du med pa/_tshad med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_dpag tu med pa'i pha rol bas kyang ches pha rol du gyur pa de'i 
[\[292b.3\]]tshe de'i dus na/_'jig rten gyi khams shin tu dri ldan zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi 
[\[292b.4\]]ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i snying po 'od zer dri ma med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i snying po 'od zer dri ma med pa de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa dgu stong thub par gyur to/_/
[\[292b.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can gang yin pa de dag ni dman pa la mos par gyur te/_rgya chen po la mos pa ni nyung bar gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos ni lo stong gi bar du gnas par gyur to/_/de'i sku gdung rnams kyang 'di lta ste dper na 
[\[292b.6\]]nga'i sku gdung ji ltar rgyas par 'gyur ba bzhin du rgyas par gyur to/_/'jam dpal de'i tshe dge slong dpas byin zhes bya ba tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa/_ngo tsha shes shing bslab pa 'dod pa/_mang du thos pa zhig byung ste/_dge slong de mdzes shing blta na sdug la/_kha dog bzang 
[\[292b.7\]]po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan no/_/de nang par smad g.yogs bgos nas lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te/_grong khyer chen po rnam par rgyal bar bsod snyoms kyi phyir song ngo /_/de grong khyer de na bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhing tshong dpon gyi khyim zhig tu song ba dang /_tshong dpon gyi khyim de na 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]yang tshong dpon gyi bu mo gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa mi la ma btang ba zhig yod do/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des dge slong dpas byin mthong nas 'dod chags kyi sems skyes te de 'di snyam du sems so/_/gal te bdag gis dge slong dpas byin 'di bdag gi 
[\[293a.2\]]khyim thab tu ma thob na ni bdag 'chi bar 'gyur ro snyam nas su la yang bsnyad ma nus te/_de 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdungs pa de nyid kyis nad zhugs par gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dpas byin bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba byas nas gtsug lag khang du song ngo /_/bu mo de'i pha yang 'chi 
[\[293a.3\]]ba'i dus byas so/_/de nas bu mo de'i mas bu mo de la khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar na bar gyur ces smras na/_de cang mi smra zhing kha zas mi za bar 'dug go/_/de nas bu mo de'i ne'u ldangs bde ba dang sdug bsngal mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis bu mo de la khyod ci'i phyir 'di ltar na bar gyur ces dris 
[\[293a.4\]]so/_/des smras pa/_bdag gis dge slong che ge mo zhig mthong nas/_de la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags skyes te/_bdag dge slong de dang phrad na ni nad 'di las sos par 'gyur ro/_/ci ste phrad par ma gyur na ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bu mo de dag gis bu mo de las thos nas de'i ma la 
[\[293a.5\]]bsnyad do/_/de nas de'i ma 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te dge slong dpas byin dang phrad par ma gyur na ni ci byar yang med kyis bu mo 'di ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/yang 'di snyam du bsams te/_bdag gis bu mo 'di dge slong dpas byin las lung nod du gzhug gor ma chag 
[\[293a.6\]]go/_/'on tang dge slong dpas byin de khyim 'dir rtag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas dge slong dpas byin yang grong khyer rnam par rgyal bar bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhing tshong dpon gyi khyim der yang bsod snyoms kyi phyir song ste/_de nang du zhugs pa dang /_tshong dpon gyi bu mo nyam 
[\[293a.7\]]chung bar gyur pa mthong nas/_des bu mo 'di ci'i phyir nyam chung zhing na bar gyur ces smras so/_/bu mo de'i mas smras pa/_bu mo 'dis chos nyan par 'dod pa las bdag gis bgegs byas nas de'i phyir 'di na bar gyur to/_/de skad ces smras nas/_dge slong dpas byin des bu mo de'i ma 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod bu mo 'di chos nyan pa la bgegs ma byed cig/_des smras pa/_gal te slob dpon gyis bu mo 'di la lung dbog na ni bdag bu mo 'di chos nyan pa la bgegs mi bgyid do/_/dge slong dpas byin gyis smras pa/_bu mo 'di la bdag gis lung dpog par bya'o/_/
[\[293b.2\]]bu mo'i mas smras pa/_slob dpon rtag tu khyim 'dir gshegs shig_/dpas byin gyis smras pa/_'ong bar bya'o/_/de nas bu mo des dge slong gi tshig thos nas tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa de las rtse zhil bar gyur te/_bdag gis kyang ci nas bdag 'dod pa bzhin byed par 'gyur bar 
[\[293b.3\]]chags par 'gyur bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas bu mo des dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du slob dpon khyim 'dir gshegs par gsol lo/_/de nas dge slong dpas byin des cang mi smra bas khas blangs nas bsod snyoms khyer te gtsug lag khang du song ngo /_/de nas bu mo de'i 
[\[293b.4\]]mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu mo khyod da phyin cad rgyan gyis brgyan par gyis la/_tsan dan gyis lus byug pa dang /_gos kha dog sna tshogs bgo bar gyis la ci nas khyod kyi dbang du 'gyur ba de bzhin du khyod kyis nan tan byos shig/_des kyang de bzhin du nan tan byas so/_/de nas 
[\[293b.5\]]dge slong dpas byin yang dang yang du khyim der 'ong zhing yid brtan par gyur to/_/des rtag tu mthong bas bu mo de la 'dod chags kyi sems bskyed de/_de 'dod chags yid la byed pa de dang lhan cig gnas nas 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris par gyur to/_/de bu mo de dang lhan cig tu 
[\[293b.6\]]shin tu 'dres par gnas shing 'dug par gyur te/_de 'dres shing der mngon par dga' nas yang dang yang du gnas par gyur to/_/de nas dge slong dpas byin de bu mo dang lhan cig tu 'du zhing 'dug 'dug pa sngon bu mo de gang gis bslangs pa'i khyim thab des thos so/_/dge slong dpas byin 
[\[293b.7\]]de bu mo de dang lhan cig tu yang dang yang du 'dug pa dang /_de 'di snyam du sems te/_dge slong dpas byin 'di bdag gis thabs kyis bzung ste gsad do snyam mo/_/dge slong dpas byin des kyang bu mo de'i khyim thab kyis bdag gsad par byas zhes thos nas/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]bdag gis bu mo 'di'i lag tu gang gis tshong dpon gyi bu de 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i dug bskur gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas dge slong dpas byin des bu mo de'i lag tu dug byin te/_de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te bdag khyod kyi snying du sdug na ni dug 'dis khyim thab 
[\[294a.2\]]'di gsod cig_/de nas bu mo des dge slong de las dug de blangs nas kha zas dang sbyar te bran mo'i lag tu bskur nas khyod song la nga'i khyim thab de la 'di byin cig ces byas so/_/de nas bran mo des dug dang sbyar ba'i kha zas de tshong dpon gyi bu de la byin no/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu des kha 
[\[294a.3\]]zas dug dang sbyar ba de zos nas shi'o/_/de nas dge slong dpas byin des tshong dpon gyi bu de shi'o zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang de 'gyod pa chen po skyes te/_bdag gis ni 'jigs su rung ba'i las byas so/_/bdag gis ni las mi zad pa byas te/_'di ltar bdag gis 'dod pa yang yongs 
[\[294a.4\]]su spyad la/_mi yang gsod du bcug na/_bdag gi 'gro ba ni gang yin/_bdag gi tshe phyi ma ni gang yin zhig gu/_bdag ni sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro snyam nas de'i lus yongs su gdung bar gyur te/_bdag ni shi nas gdon mi za bar sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur 
[\[294a.5\]]ro snyam nas/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar par byed nus pa su zhig yod snyam mo/_/de gtsug lag khang nas gtsug lag khang du 'gro zhing rgyu ste/_shing bcad pa bzhin du sa la sgyel nas/_kyi hud kyi hud bdag ni sems can dmyal ba par gyur to zhes tshig tu smra'o/_/
[\[294a.6\]]de'i tshe gtsug lag khang gangs zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de gtsug lag khang de ga la bar song ste phyin nas/_gtsug lag khang gi sgor song ste/_sa la sgyel nas kyi hud kyi hud bdag ni sems can dmyal ba par gyur to zhes tshig tu smra'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[294a.7\]]'jigs sgrol gtsug lag khang de'i nang du 'gro bas dge slong de sa la sgyel ba mthong nas des de la smras pa/_dge slong khyod ci'i phyir sa la sgyel/_des de la smras pa/_bdag ni sems can dmyal ba par gyur to/_/bdag gis ni 'jigs su rung ba'i las byas te/_bdag gis 'khrig 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]pa yang byas la/_mi yang bsad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs sgrol gyis dge slong dpas byin de la smras pa/_dge slong ma 'jigs shig dang /_ngas khyod 'jigs pa med par bya'o/_/de nas dge slong dpas byin des 'jigs pa med pa'i sgra thos nas/_dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs 
[\[294b.2\]]par gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs sgrol gyis dge slong dpas byin de sa las bslangs nas lag pa g.yas pa nas bzung nas nags stug po zhig gi nang du song nas/_de nags stug po der 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jigs sgrol ta la'i srid 
[\[294b.3\]]tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'dug nas dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge slong khyod nga la yid ches sam/_de nas dge slong des thal mo sbyar nas tshig tu smras pa/_bdag ni bcom ldan 'das dang mjal to/_/bdag ni bde bar gshegs pa dang mjal to/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems 
[\[294b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jigs sgrol sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i sgo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de'i lus las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi mdog 
[\[294b.5\]]can skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba de dag phyung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag gis kyang nags stugs po de dag thams cad khyab par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag gis gsung 'thun par tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/chos rnams 'di dag 
[\[294b.6\]]gzugs brnyan 'dra ba ste/_/chu nang zla ba snang la med pa bzhin/_/byis pa'i sems ni rmongs shing skrag gyur nas/_/'dod chags dug dang de bzhin zhe sdang rtog_/chos rnams mkha' 'dra rtag tu dag cing gsal/_/mya ngan 'das shing gnas med zhi ba yin/_/'di na tshor ba po dang byed pa med/_/
[\[294b.7\]]chos rnams 'di dag zhi gsog snying po med/_/nang du btsal kyang 'dod chags ma rnyed de/_/zhe sdang sus kyang rnyed par ma gyur na/_/byis pa'i skye bo dag ni chags snyam sems/_/su yang 'di na chags par gyur pa med/_/rmi lam du ni bdag gi gzugs mthong snyam/_/de la chags shing 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]sdang la rmongs par gyur/_/mtshon cha thogs shing gsad par gsol pa na/_/gsod pa po dang mtshon cha ci yang med/_/de bzhin 'di na byis pa 'dod pa spyod/_/thab mo dag kyang 'gyed cing gsod par byed/_/gti mug dbang gis skrag cing rmongs par gyur/_/bdag ni chags so snyam ste
