[\[295a.2\]]dga' bar 'dzin/_/'jig rten 'di dag thams cad rmi lam bzhin/_/chos rnams gsog ste stong zhing snying po med/_/smig rgyu 'dra zhing sprin dang mtshungs pa ste/_/'dod chags mtshan nyid med cing gti mug zhi/_/chos rnams 'di dag rtswa dang rtsig pa bzhin/_/sems ni nang na med cing phyi rol med/_/
[\[295a.3\]]'dod chags srog dang sems can gso ba min/_/zhe sdang gang zag ma yin dngos po med/_/chos rnams 'di dag rkyen dang rgyu las grub/_/sgyu de la ni rmongs shing byed pa med/_/chu zla 'dra bar byas pa ma yin te/_/lus kyang med de 'dod chags gsog yin no/_/sgyu mas bsgrubs pa yin te stong pa 
[\[295a.4\]]nyid/_/byis pa dngos por 'dzin pas dpyad cing brtags/_/sgyu ma gsog ste med cing stong pa yin/_/'di na 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug med/_/chos 'di thams cad mtshan nyid med pa ste/_/rtsa ba mi dmigs gzod nas rab tu zhi/_/mtha' ma gzung med dben zhing snying po med/_/'dod chags 'od 
[\[295a.5\]]gsal gti mug rab tu zhi/_/'di na byis pa gzugs brnyan mthong ba na/_/'di ni bdag yin snyam du sems par byed/_/gsog dang gzung du med la yod min dang /_/snying po med pa de la log par rtog_/chos rnams 'di dag mig yor 'dra ba ste/_/'dod chags gti mug zhe sdang gzung du med/_/sgyu 
[\[295a.6\]]ma rmi lam chu zla lta bu ste/_/'di la su yang chags shing sdang ba med/_/yul 'di dag ni dug med stong pa ste/_/dngos por dmigs pa thams cad gzung du med/_/'di dag brtags pa'i chos can yod ma yin/_/dngos po mi dmigs rtsa nas rab tu zhi/_/sgyu ma 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug med/_/'di la 
[\[295a.7\]]nams kyang yod par 'gyur ma yin/_/chos rnams sgyu ma 'dra zhing rmi lam 'dra/_/thog ma mi dmigs thams cad yod ma yin/_/ji ltar chu la zla ba snang bzhin du/_/der ni nams kyang zhugs par gyur pa med/_/de bzhin byis pa sdang zhing chags gyur kyang /_/'di na 'dod chags med cing zhe sdang 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]med/_/'dod chags gzung du med cing zhe sdang med/_/gti mug 'od gsal rkyen rnams stong pa ste/_/sems can dmigs su med cing srog kyang med/_/chos 'di gsog ste zhi la snying po med/_/mig kyang med de rna ba med pa yin/_/sna yang mi snang lce yang de bzhin te/_/'di dag bems po'i chos 
[\[295b.2\]]can snying po med/_/byis pa'i skye bo rmongs byed myos par byed/_/nam mkha' la ni ji ltar mtha' med cing /_/zad par mi 'gyur skye ba med pa bzhin/_/chos rnams 'di dag thams cad de bzhin te/_/nam mkha'i chu ltar dag cing rnam par dag_/chos rnams rnam pa sna tshogs brtags pa ste/_/
[\[295b.3\]]brtags na de yang nams kyang yod ma yin/_/byis pa phung po 'di dag 'dra bar 'dzin/_/de yang de la nams kyang yod ma yin/_/shes ldan dngos dang dngos min rnam 'jig cing /_/chos nyid 'di dag thams cad zhi bar mthong /_/thams cad ma skyes gzung du med par mthong /_/de yi lus ni nams 
[\[295b.4\]]kyang yod pa min/_/chos rnams 'od gsal grol zhing rab tu grol/_/zhi zhing mi gnas mya ngan 'das gyur la/_/de la nams kyang gzung du med pa ste/_/shes ldan de ltar rtogs na grol bar 'gyur/_/de nas nags khrod der byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs sgrol las chos mnyan pa'i phyir 
[\[295b.5\]]lha'i bu bzhi khri nyis stong lhags par gyur pa de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa de dag thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/dge slong dpas byin de yang kun nas dkris pa dang bral bar gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa bkod pa de dag mthong nas byang chub 
[\[295b.6\]]kyi tshul dang ldan pa'i sems kyis chos kyi rang bzhin rab tu rnam par 'byed pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs sgrol zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems 
[\[295b.7\]]dpa' byams pa de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs sgrol zhes bya bar gyur to/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dpas byin zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam na de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa de/_de'i 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]tshe de'i dus na dge slong dpas byin zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong dpas byin de byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[296a.2\]]stsal pa/_'jam dpal mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zin te/_de ni nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer rtag pa zhes bya ba der de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba zhes bya bar gyur to/_/
[\[296a.3\]]'jam dpal chos 'di dag gi sgrub pa byed pa dag ji tsam 'dod pa dag kyang yongs su longs spyad la/_srog gi bar chad kyang byas bzhin du mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa la ltos/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des khams gsum pa thams cad yang dag pa ma yin par shes shing sems 
[\[296a.4\]]can thams cad mig yor dang 'dra bar shes pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal sgyu ma lta bu'i sems la gnas pa la ni chos gang la yang sgrib pa med do/_/'jam dpal yang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni rang gi rtog pas sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 
[\[296a.5\]]ltung bar 'gyur te/_med pa'i chos rnams la yongs su brtags pas sdug bsngal 'bum phrag mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 
[\[296a.6\]]'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_bsti stang bgyid pa des tshe 'di nyid la yon tan ji snyed cig thob par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba na 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams la yon tan gyi 
[\[296a.7\]]phan yon ji tsam du 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi phan yon dpag tu ma mchis shing snang ba tshad ma mchis par 'gyur te/_des ni mi rnams sug las bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin du chos kyi rnam 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]grangs 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal nas/_shes rab kyi snang ba tshad med pa skyed par byed do/_/chos thams cad la yang sgrib pa med pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/yongs su gdung ba dang bral zhing kun nas dkris pa yang med par 'gyur ro/_/de la chags pa med pa'i spobs pa 
[\[296b.2\]]yang myur du mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad kyis kyang mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro/_/chos kyang ston te/_spobs pa mthar thug pa med pas ston par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na me byung na rtswa dang shing thams cad sreg par byed do/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du chos kyi rnam 
[\[296b.3\]]grangs 'dis yang nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg par byed do/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_ri'i rgyal po gangs kyis ri nag po thams cad zil gyis gnon to/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mkhas pas ni pha rol rgol ba thams cad chos dang ldan pas tshar 
[\[296b.4\]]bcad nas zil gyis gnon par byed do/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos ni khams kyi rgyal po rnams zil gyis gnon to/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gnas pas ni gang zag tshig dang yi ge'i 'bru sna tshogs 
[\[296b.5\]]thams cad la mkhas pa rnams zil gyis gnon to/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_dge slong 'dul ba 'dzin pa ni ltung ba thams cad 'dul ba la mkhas pa yin no/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[296b.6\]]'gyod pa sel bar byed do/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar na mun pa mun nag thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mkhas pa ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa sel bar byed de ye shes kyi snang 
[\[296b.7\]]ba yang byed par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la slob pa gang yin pa de ni lhag pa'i shes rab la slob pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bdud sdig can bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das khyod ni thugs 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]rje dang ldan pa lags te/_sems can thams cad la sman pa dang /_thugs brtse ba can lags na/_bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi gnas thams cad rab tu g.yos te/_bdag kyang mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug lags kyis/_bcom ldan 'das yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi bshad par gsol/_bcom 
[\[297a.2\]]ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas 'dzam bu'i gling du spyod par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o/_/ci nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di su yang 'dzin par mi 'gyur/_'chang bar mi 'gyur/_kun chub par bgyid par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur yang bgyi'o/_/ci nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la lam ngan 
[\[297a.3\]]par 'du shes par 'gyur bar yang bgyi'o/_/de dag shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde dag la log par lta ba'i 'du shes su 'gyur bar yang bgyi'o/_/dge slong de dag ci nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar 'gyur ba'i kun nas dkris pa 'ga' 'byung bar yang bgyi'o/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i dbang 
[\[297a.4\]]po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/_des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la me tog man dA ra ba dag gis gtor nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdud sdig can chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub 
[\[297a.5\]]par bgyid pa'i slad du rtsol bar gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi/_bcang bar bgyi/_kun chub par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das dang btsun pa kun dga' bo yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i 
[\[297a.6\]]gling du spyod par 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/chos smra ba de la yang rgyal po chen po bzhi gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bgyid du stsal bar 'tshal te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa gang lags 
[\[297a.7\]]pa de la bdag gis kyang bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston cig_/
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo 'di ni chos thams cad kyi chos kyi me long yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis gzung lags na/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar 
[\[297b.2\]]gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na dge slong drug cus len pa med par 
[\[297b.3\]]zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' brgyad cus ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin 
[\[297b.4\]]dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_pradz+nyA barma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde 
[\[297b.5\]]la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D219}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya karma A ba ra Na pra ti pra sra bi ti nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_
[\[297b.6\]]sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[297b.7\]]dpa' bdun khri dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[298a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas las kyi sgrib pa rnams ji ltar so sor bshags par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa 
[\[298a.3\]]la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas nyin lan gsum mtshan lan 
[\[298a.4\]]gsum du bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshig 'di skad du skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba'i 
[\[298a.5\]]slad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu ston pa/_chos kyi tshul rab tu 'dzin pa/_chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa/_chos kyi 
[\[298a.6\]]sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad pa/_chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/_chos kyi rnga rab tu rdung ba/_chos kyi rnga bo che rab tu rdung ba/_chos kyi dung rab tu 'bud pa/_chos kyi srog shing sgreng ba/_sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad pa/_nyam bag tu spyod du 'dzud pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag 
[\[298a.7\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i gnas/_phyag bgyi ba'i gnas/_ri mo bgyi ba'i gnas/_mkhyen par gyur pa/_spyan du gyur pa/_dpang du gyur pa/_tshad mar gyur pa/_mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/_gzigs pa dang ldan pa/_de dag la bdag lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]thog ma dang /_tha ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/_bdag 'dod chags kyis gzir ba'am/_zhe sdang gis gzir ba'am/_gti mug gis gzir ba'i lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las kyi sgrib pa gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pa/_sangs rgyas su ma 'tshal ba dang /_chos su ma 'tshal ba dang /_dge 'dun 
[\[298b.2\]]du ma 'tshal ba dang /_dge ba dang /_mi dge bar ma 'tshal ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang /_chos spangs pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang /_dge slong dgra bcom pa bkum pa dang /_pha ma bkum pa dang /_lus kyi rnam gsum/_ngag gi rnam bzhi/_yid kyi rnam gsum 
[\[298b.3\]]ste/_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bgyis pa dang /_bgyid du stsal ba dang /_bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba dang /_sems can kha cig la ngag rtsub po smras pa dang /_skur pa btab pa dang /_srang la g.yo bgyis pa dang /_gzhal ba la g.yo bgyis pa dang /_'gro ba drug tu 'khor bar 'khor ba na pha ma mi dga' bar 
[\[298b.4\]]bgyis pa dang /_gang zag gi'am/_mchod rten gyi'am/_dge 'dun gyi'am/_phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nor brkus pa dang /_ci ltar bslab pa'i gzhi bcas pa rnams kyi 'dul ba dang 'gal bar bgyis pa dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon gyis bsgo ba ma mnyan pa dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang 
[\[298b.5\]]dag par zhugs pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams la mi snyan par bgyis pa dang /_spyos pa dang /_brdegs pa dang /_de dag la tha ba dang /_zhe sdang bskyed pa dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna 
[\[298b.6\]]las byung ba'i sems kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la tshig rtsub po smras pa dang /_chos la chos ma lags zhes bgyis pa dang /_chos ma lags pa la chos lags zhes bgyis pa de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen par gyur pa/_spyan du gyur pa/_dpang du gyur pa/_tshad mar gyur 
[\[298b.7\]]pa/_mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/_gzigs pa dang ldan pa de dag gi spyan sngar so sor 'chags so/_/mthol lo/_/mi 'chab po/_/slan chad kyang mi bgyid do/_/bdag las kyi sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs te/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul dang /_lha ma yin gyi tshogs 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]kyi nang du mchi bar 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun mnyes par bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /_mi khom pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba'i las de lus 'di nyid la rnam par smin te gzhan du mi myong bar shog shig_/de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen par 
[\[299a.2\]]gyur pa/_spyan du gyur pa/_dpang du gyur pa/_tshad mar gyur pa/_mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/_gzigs pa dang ldan pa de dag gi spyan sngar so sor 'chags so/_/mthol lo/_/mi 'chab bo/_/slan chad kyang mi bgyid do/_/ji ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sngon byang chub kyi 
[\[299a.3\]]phyir spyod pa na las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags pa dang /_ma bcabs pa de bzhin du bdag kyang las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'chags so/_/mthol lo/_/mi 'chab bo/_/slan chad kyang mi bgyid do/_/ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 
[\[299a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'chags par 'gyur ba dang /_mi 'chab par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag kyang las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'chags so/_/mthol lo/_/mi 'chab bo/_/slan chad mi bgyid do/_/ji ltar da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na byang 
[\[299a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'chags pa dang /_mi 'chab pa de bzhin du bdag kyang las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'chags so/_/mthol lo/_/mi 'chab bo/_/slan chad mi bgyid do/_/ji ltar 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs 
[\[299a.6\]]pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags pa dang /_so sor 'chags pa dang /_so sor 'chags par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag kyang las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'chags 
[\[299a.7\]]so/_/mthol lo/_/mi 'chab bo/_/slan chad mi bgyid do zhes brjod par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa rnam par dag pa 'thob par 'dod pas 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o/_/mi bcab 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]par bya'o/_/phyin cad kyang mi bya'o/_/su rgyal rigs kyi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu phyug pa/_nor che ba/_longs spyod che ba/_sa le sbram dang /_nor dang /_yo byad mang ba/_shin tu skyid pa/_bzhon pa chen po la zhon pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa 
[\[299b.2\]]rnams so sor bshags par bya'o/_/mi bcab par bya'o/_/phyin cad kyang mi bya'o/_/su bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu phyug pa/_nor che ba longs spyod che ba/_sa le sbram dang /_nor dang /_yo byad mang ba/_shin tu skyid pa/_
[\[299b.3\]]bzhon pa chen po la zhon pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o/_/mi bcab par bya'o/_/phyin cad kyang mi bya'o/_/su rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs dang mtshungs par skye bar 'dod pa des kyang 'di 
[\[299b.4\]]bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o/_/mi bcab par bya'o/_/phyin cad kyang mi bya'o/_su sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs dang mtshungs par skye bar 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o/_/mi bcab par 
[\[299b.5\]]bya'o/_/phyin cad kyang mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du su 'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge 
[\[299b.6\]]chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che dang /_sems can 'du shes med pa dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs dang mtshungs par 
[\[299b.7\]]skye bar 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o/_/mi bcab par bya'o/_/phyin cad kyang mi bya'o/_/su gzugs med pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba rnams dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba rnams dang /_
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba rnams dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs dang mtshungs par skye bar 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o/_/mi bcab par 
[\[300a.2\]]bya'o/_/phyin cad kyang mi bya'o/_/su rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o/_/mi bcab par 
[\[300a.3\]]bya'o/_/phyin cad kyang mi bya'o/_/su rig pa gsum mam/_mngon par shes pa drug gam/_stobs rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_nyan thos kyi pha rol du phyin pa'am/_nyan thos dbang che bar grags pa'am/_rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin 
[\[300a.4\]]du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o/_/mi bcab par bya'o/_/phyin cad kyang mi bya'o/_/su thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /_rnam par dag pa'i ye shes dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes dang /_mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes dang /_yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[300a.5\]]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par bsgrub par 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o/_/mi bcab par bya'o/_/phyin cad kyang mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 
[\[300a.6\]]'byung ba'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir te/_rgyu dang rkyen gzhan dang gzhan gyis gzhan skye'o/_/gzhan 'gag go/_/de la 'das pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag ni 'gags pa/_zad pa bral ba rnam par gyur pa ste/_de dag la yang las kyi sgrib pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang med do/_/de ltar na 'du 
[\[300a.7\]]byed pa gang yin pa rnams kyang med pa las byung ba ste/_de dag la yang las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ni stong pa/_sems can med pa/_srog med pa/_gang zag med pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]pa/_'dus ma byas pa zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu chos thams cad bdag las byung yang bdag kyang yod pa ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'di lta ste/_sems can med pa'i mtha'i chos kyi tshul 'di la 'jug pa 'di ni las kyi 
[\[300b.2\]]sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya ste/_shA ri'i bu 'di ni so sor bshags pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_rang sangs 
[\[300b.3\]]rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la rjes su yi rang bar 
[\[300b.4\]]bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la 
[\[300b.5\]]btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na sems can gang su dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang /_tshul khrims las byung ba dang /_bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po mngon par 'dus bgyis pa de 
[\[300b.6\]]dag thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/rjes su yi rang ba dam pa dang /_gtso bo dang /_khyad par can dang /_rab dang /_phul dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla ma dang /_bla na med pa dang /_ltag na med pa dang /_mnyam pa med pa dang /_mi mnyam 
[\[300b.7\]]pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang ngo /_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na sems can gang su dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang /_tshul khrims las byung ba dang /_bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bgyid par 'gyur ba de 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]dag thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na sems can gang su dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang /_
[\[301a.2\]]tshul khrims las byung ba dang /_bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bgyid pa de dag thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/byang chub 
[\[301a.3\]]sems dpa' gang dag da lta na sems dang po bskyed pa de dag gis dang po byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa brgyas byung ba rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[301a.4\]]dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa de dag thams 
[\[301a.5\]]cad la yang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon 
[\[301a.6\]]par 'dus bgyis pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/rjes su yi rang ba'i dam pa dang /_gtso bo dang /_khyad par can dang /_rab dang /_phul dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla ma dang /_bla na med pa dang /_ltag na med 
[\[301a.7\]]pa dang /_mnyam pa med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang ngo /_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po mngon par 'du bgyid par 'gyur ba gang 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]lags pa de dag thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/rjes su yi rang ba dam pa dang /_gtso bo dang /_khyad par can dang /_rab dang /_phul dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla ma dang /_bla na med pa dang /_ltag na med pa dang /_mnyam pa med pa dang /_mi mnyam 
[\[301b.2\]]pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po mngon par 'du bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang 
[\[301b.3\]]rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/rjes su yi rang ba dam pa dang /_gtso bo dang /_khyad par can dang /_rab dang /_phul dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla ma dang /_bla na med pa dang /_ltag na med pa dang /_mnyam pa med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes 
[\[301b.4\]]su yi rang ngo /_/skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de 
[\[301b.5\]]dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bstan pa/_chos kyi tshul rab tu bzung ba/_chos kyi char rab tu phab pa/_chos kyi char rab tu btang ba/_chos kyi rnga rab tu 
[\[301b.6\]]brdungs pa/_chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs pa/_chos kyi dung bus pa/_chos kyi srog shing bsgreng ba/_chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad pa/_sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad pa/_nyam bag tu spyod du btsud pa gang lags pa dang /_de la nyan thos kyi theg 
[\[301b.7\]]pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'am/_de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas rjes su yi rang ba mi 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba'i slad du ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi 
[\[302a.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur ba'i bar dag gang lags pa dang /_de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/_byang chub 
[\[302a.3\]]sems dpa'i theg pa pa'am/_de las gzhan pa'i sems can dag dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/skye 
[\[302a.4\]]bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba'i slad du da ltar na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[302a.5\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu ston pa/_chos kyi tshul rab tu 'dzin pa/_chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/_chos kyi char rab tu gtong ba/_chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa/_chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar 
[\[302a.6\]]mdzad pa/_chos kyi rnga rdung ba/_chos kyi rnga bo che rdung ba/_chos kyi dung 'bud pa/_chos kyi srog shing sgreng ba/_sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad pa/_nyam bag tu spyod du 'dzud pa gang lags pa dang /_de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs 
[\[302a.7\]]rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'am/_de las gzhan pa'i sems can dag dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]gyis rjes su yi rang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ni rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'dis rjes su yi rang na bsod nams kyi phung po mang po grangs med/_dpag tu med pa skyed 
[\[302b.2\]]do/_/shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can nas/_'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa zag pa zad par gyur la/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis de dag la 
[\[302b.3\]]ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gos dang /_zas dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa bas gang zhig rjes su yi rang ba 'dis rjes su yi rang na de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do/_/shA ri'i bu de bas na rigs kyi bu'am/_
[\[302b.4\]]rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas rjes su yi rang ba 'dis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/_/bud med skyes pa'i dbang po thob par 'dod cing bud med kyi dbang po rjes par 'dod pas kyang rjes su yi rang ba 'dis rjes 
[\[302b.5\]]su yi rang bar bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ba dang /_da ltar byung ba'i byang chub 
[\[302b.6\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa skyed par 'gyur ba'i bskul ba'i phung po bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi 
[\[302b.7\]]theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]bar 'dod pas nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar na/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 
[\[303a.2\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bskul gyis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis skye bo mang po 
[\[303a.3\]]la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba'i slad du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor du gsol/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bstan du gsol/_/chos kyi 
[\[303a.4\]]tshul rab tu gzung du gsol/_/chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa gzung du gsol/_/chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad du gsol/_/chos kyi char dbab tu gsol/_/chos kyi rnga brdung du gsol/_/chos kyi rnga bo che brdung du gsol/_/chos kyi dung 'bud du gsol/_/chos kyi srog 
[\[303a.5\]]shing bsgreng du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_sems 
[\[303a.6\]]can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/_nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da lta na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na tshe'i 'du byed btang 
[\[303a.7\]]ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag phyag 'tshal nas gsol ba 'debs kyis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba'i slad du chos kyi 'khor lo ni rab tu bskor/_chos kyi sgron ma ni 'bar bar mdzad/_chos kyi char ni rab tu 'bebs/_chos kyi char ni rab tu gtong /_chos kyi rnga ni rab tu rdung /_chos kyi rnga bo che 
[\[303b.2\]]ni rab tu rdung /_chos kyi dung ni rab tu 'bud/_chos kyi srog shing ni rab tu bsgreng /_chos kyi sgron ma ni mched par mdzad/_sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas ni tshim par mdzad/_nyam bag tu spyod du ni 'dzud cing re zhig bzhugs su gsol/_gsol ba btab pa'i 
[\[303b.3\]]phung po 'di yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/_ji ltar na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de bzhin du 'di yongs su bsngo'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ni gsol ba gdab pa'i phung po ste/_rigs 
[\[303b.4\]]kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gsol ba btab pa'i phung po 'dis gsol ba 'debs na/_bsod nams mang po grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do/_/shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag 
[\[303b.5\]]rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul ba phul ba bas/_gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar bskul na de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do/_/shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi 
[\[303b.6\]]stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lta zhog ste/_shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul ba phul ba bas/_gang gis 
[\[303b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la gsol ba btab na de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar gsol ba btab 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des na nga la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_
[\[304a.2\]]sman pa dang /_bde ba'i slad du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol zhes chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol ba btab bo/_/shA ri'i bu ngas sngon byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ring du bzhugs par gsol te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des na nga mi 
[\[304a.3\]]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa thob ste/_nga'i dam pa'i chos kyang yun 
[\[304a.4\]]ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_rang sangs 
[\[304a.5\]]rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar 
[\[304a.6\]]bgyi ba'i slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ji ltar yongs su bsngo bar bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag 
[\[304a.7\]]par zhugs pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]nyin lan gsum du mtshan lan gsum du tshig 'di skad ces thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus bgyis par gyur pa/_sangs rgyas sam/_chos sam/_dge 'dun nam/_gang zag gam/_tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba rnams sam/_sems can gzhan 
[\[304b.2\]]dag la yang rung ste/_zan chang gcig tsam stsal bar gyur pa gang lags pa dang /_'chags pa gang lags pa dang /_gsol ba gdab pa gang lags pa dang /_skyabs su mchi ba gang lags pa dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_so sor 'chags pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[304b.3\]]gang lags pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po gang lags pa dang /_gsol ba gdab pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus gzhal bzlums te/_sems dul zhing rnam par grol ba dang /_gzung ba ma mchis pas sems can thams 
[\[304b.4\]]cad la stsal to/_/ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad la gtang bar bgyi ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa mi mnga' bas ji ltar mkhyen pa de lta bus bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de gtang ngo /_sems can thams cad lag na rin po che dang ldan par gyur cig_/nam 
[\[304b.5\]]mkha'i mdzod dang longs spyod zad mi shes pa dang /_bsod nams zad mi shes pa dang /_chos zad mi shes pa dang /_ye shes zad mi shes pa dang /_spobs pa zad mi shes pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 
[\[304b.6\]]thob par gyur cig_/bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad la stsal ba las byung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus gzhal bzlums te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad bla na 
[\[304b.7\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig_/ji ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du dge ba'i 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 
[\[305a.2\]]gyur cig_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig_/ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su sngo bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang 
[\[305a.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur 
[\[305a.4\]]cig_/ji ltar de lta na da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su sngo ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du dge 
[\[305a.5\]]ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub 
[\[305a.6\]]pa des byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs te/_sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dri ma med pa shin tu dkar ba la bzhugs nas bdud sdig can bcom ste/_shes par bgyi ba dang /_blta bar bgyi ba dang /_rtogs par bgyi ba dang /_mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bgyi ba gang ci yang rung ste/_de 
[\[305a.7\]]thams cad nam gyi tho rangs skya rengs 'char kar skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bdud rtsi brnyes te/_'chi ba med par 'gro ba'i lam mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bzhin du bdag dang sems can thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]gyur cig_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang /_'od mchog dang /_'od dge dang /_bsod nams 'od dang /_mi 'khrugs pa dang /_seng ge dang /_'od zer brgya pa dang /_'od zer mtho dang /_'od dra ba can dang /_rin chen 'od 'phro dang /_'od 
[\[305b.2\]]'bar dang /_snang ba'i rgyal po dang /_shin du brgyan dang /_rin chen tog dang /_chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_yan lag mchog de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 
[\[305b.3\]]par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ji tsam du skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye ba mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang /_mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba'i slad du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba de bzhin du bdag dang sems can thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang 
[\[305b.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye ba phal po che dang /_lha dang /_mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba'i slad du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar shog shig ces brjod par 
[\[305b.5\]]bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ni yongs su bsngo ba'i phung po ste/_bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas yongs su bsngo ba'i phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mdo 'di len tam/_kun chub par byed dam/_'dzin tam/_klog 
[\[305b.6\]]gam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na de ni bsod nams kyi phung po de bas ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do/_/shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/_snga phyi med par mi'i lus 
[\[305b.7\]]thob nas kyang rang byang chub thob par gyur te/_de dag la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bsti stang dang /_phu dud du bya ba'i phyir gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byas te/_rim gro bya ba lan cig cing yang rin po che'i phung po ri rab 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]tsam gyi rin po che rnams yongs su zad par byas la/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun te/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_spug dang /_mu tig dmar po las 'phang du dpag tshad bcu pa byas te/_de dag la gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan 
[\[306a.2\]]dang /_ba dan phra mo rnams kyis mchod pa byas na shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi 
[\[306a.3\]]bu mo gang mdo 'di 'dzin tam/_kun chub par byed dam/_'don par byed dam/_klog gam/_skye bo mang po la yang dag par rab tu ston tam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs na de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed de/_bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i brgya'i char 
[\[306a.4\]]yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo sgrub pa 'di la gnas nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu sbyin pa rnams kyi nang na ni 'di 
[\[306a.5\]]lta ste/_chos kyi sbyin pa ni mchog ces ngas bshad do/_/de nas 'khor de las srog chags khri stan las langs te/_so so nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[306a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di gzung bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o/_/bsgrub pa la gnas par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dge ba'i chos de lta bu dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[306a.7\]]rgya bar 'tshal zhing don du gnyer ba lags so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la lha'i me tog man dA ra bas mngon par gtor to/_/mngon par gtor nas kyang tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]bskrun pa dang /_las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa'i gces spras bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin no/_/kau shi ka de de bzhin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i dbang po ngas mngon par shes te/_'di nas bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med par gyur pa na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[306b.2\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kho lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang /_mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/lha'i dbang po de bzhin 
[\[306b.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer gyi phung po chen po de'i tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag drug cu thub par gyur to/_/de'i nyan thos thog mar 'dus pa ni bye ba phrag 'bum yod de/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa sha stag go/_/de'i nyan thos 'dus pa gnyis pa ni bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu 
[\[306b.4\]]bcu rtsa brgyad yod de/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa sha stag go/_/de'i nyan thos 'dus pa gsum pa ni bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu yod de/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa sha stag go/_/lha'i dbang po de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[306b.5\]]'od zer gyi phung po chen po de lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i don gyi phyir rgyu'o/_/lha'i dbang po de'i tshe bud med gang gA'i lha mo zhes bya ba zhig 'khor 'dus pa de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par gyur te/_'dug pa des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcom ldan 
[\[306b.6\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyi phung po chen po las mngon sum du bzung /_kun chub par byas/_blangs nas skye bo mang po la yang dag par bstan te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to/_/de de nas shi 'phos nas bud med kyi lus spangs te/_skyes pa'i dbang po thob nas rtag par 
[\[306b.7\]]rgyun du lha dang /_mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te/_lan brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya bar gyur to/_/kau shi ka 'di nas shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong phrag brgyan chos ston te/_ngas da lta na yang mthong ngo /_/kau shi ka su dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de'i ming thos pa de dag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par nges par 'gyur ro/_/bud med gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 
[\[307a.2\]]'od 'phro de'i ming thos sam/_'chi kar yang mngon sum du byed na de nyid de'i bud med kyi lus kyi tha ma yin no/_/lha'i dbang po de ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sgrub pa dang /_las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa'i gces spras byed pa yin 
[\[307a.3\]]no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[307a.4\]]kau shi ka de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya bar yang zung shig_/'di som nyi gcod pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_lha'i dbang 
[\[307a.5\]]po brgya byin dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_lha dang mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen 
[\[307a.6\]]po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis bcos shing gtan la phab pa//_//
